title: Awesome Place!
review: Best hotel on Ft Myers Beach - great rooms, all with a view. Awesome food, best restaurant on the beach, by far. Great pool/beach bar. Friendly staff, and live music every day we were there. This place has it all.

title: Great trip!
review: Hello TFCCchris- Seriously, that is so kind! We are thrilled that you think we are the best on the beach and found everything you needed to have a great time. We appreciate the feedback and enjoyed the opportunity to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Give it a MISS - nothing to recommend .
review: Very clean!  Nice room.  Perfect pool.  Huge beach!  The food at the restaurants was very good and the live entertainment was great.  Hotel is within walking distance of Town Center.    Must eat breakfast at the Salty Crab just north of the hotel!!

title: $10 Charged to play bingo at pool!! ?? Craziness!
review: Hello Mollie2000- Thank you for staying with us! Beach, pool, food, music - the best ways to spend your day on Fort Myers Beach! We hope that your time here was restful and relaxing. We appreciate your feedback and always love to hear from our guests. It was a pleasure to have you! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Nice comfortable hotel.
review: Arrived for a weeks stay .  Room on 2nd floor overlooking the pool near the lift. The corridors were a revelation, something out of Guantanamo Bay or Alcatraz . The noise from the pool, people getting out of the lift, screaming at the top of their voices while walking down the corridors is unsupportable.  Requested a change of room - No ! Funny how the sign outside the hotel says Vacancies.  Also a raucous  party in the evening. People are entitled to have fun, sure, but the noise , plus some folks standing on the stairs smoking right outside our balcony  Following day able to change room to the 12th - top floor. Much better sea view Then an enormous crane arrived delivering a load to the roof. Took the entire day. Noise ! The hotel is ideal for families and young children. Couples - forget it. Expensive - you are paying for the position on beach, although no beach beds or umbrellas supplied - an additional cost. Our last morning, leaving 3 days early, the fire alarm went off, the alarm issued instructions and there was an orderly evacuation of the hotel , all 12 floors, to the beach. Although once outside, there was no member of staff directing where to congregate or taking a head count.…

title: Family Vacation
review: We are owners in the Vacation Club and this was our yearly visit. We have been coming for 12 years and we absolutely love the area. There is something to do for all ages. Everything is within walking distance.

title: A beautiful wedding
review: Hello JKourt2019- It was great to have you back and we hope your visit was everything you hoped it would be. It is a privilege to have you as an owner. Thank you for sharing your experience, we love to hear from our guests! Your feedback is always welcome and we look forward to many more years of providing memorable beach vacations! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: METDA 2019
review: It was a well done wedding reception and very layout was beautiful towards the wedding. The variety of food was good and drink service was quick and all workers were excellant in making it a good memory

title: Beautiful Beach View
review: Hello marg0437- We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the wedding and felt that our efforts contributed to making a memorable day. We really appreciate your feedback and are grateful that you shared your review. Cheers to the newly weds! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: workers outside our lanai
review: The property and facilities are great, we love coming here. Staff is awesome. the only issue we had this year was the bed was very hard and we didn't sleep very well. we will be coming back next year.

title: DiamondHead is indeed a jewel
review: Perfect resort.  We  walked to the pier where there is great shopping.  Watched incredible sunset from the beach.  The rooms were immaculate and well appointed.  The food outstanding.  The staff was friendly and accomodating.  We will certainly go back.

title: Our October getaway
review: Hello Freedom755775- We are glad that DiamondHead was the perfect a perfect resort for your recent visit to Fort Myers Beach. We are pleased that the accommodations, food and service added to your enjoyment of the area. We would certainly love to have you back and appreciate you taking the time to share your review. Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Views are breathtaking
review: What a fabulous place to stay!!!  The food was a real bonus.  Quality was the best on the beach!!!! There was always something to do.  The entertainment downstairs and upstairs at the bar were really enjoyable also.  Ask for Mark as your server at Coste Island Cuisine for the best service!!!

title: Vacation
review: Hello mkg4260- We are glad to hear that you enjoyed a nice October getaway at DiamondHead. Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We are glad you enjoyed the resort and our onsite dining options. Mark will be happy to hear your compliment. We appreciate your feedback and it was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Awesome staff
review: The rooms are dated but clean. Our bed was comfortable and the rooms were spacious. The balcony had screening up which spoilt our view but if you had young children then great for reassurance. Plus no bugs could get in 😏. The hotel itself seems cold and uninviting, similar feel to an underground multi store car park. The views are spectacular though, the staff were attentive especially the bellman from Kentucky! Friendly chap!   You don’t need beach towels as they are provided as well as a hairdryer.  Wouldn’t return but enjoyed the 6 nights we were there.

title: Don't miss
review: A great place to stay in fort Myers beach.  The suites are bright, airy and comfortable.  We had a sunset view room, wonderful.  It's right on the beach.  Sun loungers for hire.  The restaurant has been refurbished, every table has a sunset view.

title: Renovated but Fire the Decorator!
review: Hello CBlake123- Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are glad you enjoyed the accommodations and sunset views. We are also pleased that you appreciated the enhancements we've made to our dining options. We are grateful for your feedback and enjoyed the opportunity to serve you as our guest! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Disappointed
review: Had stayed here five years ago and decided to test the new restaurant and see the newly renovated resort which is right on the beach. Self-park was easy. Lobby is Miami look, which I love, but very spare with cheaper furniture, not at all like Miami hotels which have same look but are inviting and warm. We three saw two renovated rooms. Each room has a tiny kitchenette inside a nice size living room, with a separate bedroom, and bath. Outside screened lanai is spacious compared to other hotels with a table and chairs and chairs also for seating. Each room also has some view of the water--we saw a side one and also a waterfront room. Again the new furniture and decor was just very average. The corridors were SO dark with pea green walls and floor and no pictures or fabric of any…

title: Ft. Myers trip
review: Hello MetroLady555- Thank you for returning to DiamodHead, we are glad you decided to come back and stay with us. We are sorry that our decor was not pleasing to you. Your feedback is very important and has presented some important considerations for us to look into. We don't want to overlook any aspect of the guest experience.  We appreciate your observations and will discuss them with our team. We appreciate your review and it was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: OPA Boat Races
review: Chose this resort to celebrate my birthday because it’s on the beach and it has 2 restaurants I was eager to try. After the beach my friend and I went to the Cabanas bar and was ignored by the bartender(On my B-Day!!) .There were no bar guest when we arrived ,but she was busy fraternizing with her co- worker. We asked for two waters she said sure and continued talking to her co-worker. Needless to say we left. My friend and I are both bartenders , we were appalled .That  experience left such a bad taste I was not interested in trying Coste .We enjoyed lunch and awesome service at Cottage. I called the Bev Manager the next day, he never apologized , told me he would check the cameras. Haven’t heard from him since. This place is poorly managed (restaurant ) and it reflects in the…

title: ROAR offshore races
review: Beautiful view. Beautiful suite. Excellent service.  A job well done for the Roar event.  We will be back!  The Tiki bar is great! Very impressed by how the staff handled the mass of people. Thanks for a lovely weekend.

title: Good stay  Some improvements needed,  would return.
review: Hello SanibelGypsea- We are thrilled that you enjoyed the race weekend here at DiamondHead. It was a fun weekend! We are glad you were pleased with your suite and thought that our crowd management was effective. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, thank you for sharing your review! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Anniversar beach get-away
review: Beautiful beach,  nice to have rooms with a separate bedroom/balcony,  good for parents with kids.  Hotel was preparing for a large event the weekend after our stay therefore seemed staff may have been preoccupied with other duties vs focusing on current guests. Guest service wasn't that impressive.   David and John in concierge stood out as being the most hospitable.   But overall the pool was big and warm.  Hotel beach bar was a great atmosphere and good bar food,  great drink selection.  Parking was easy,  complimentary beach toys for kids,  crib and highchair were also provided.  Wonderful location,  but construction around the hotel was a bit loud and annoying. Housekeeping was slow and didn't get to our room until after 1pm, which sucked when toddlers needed to nap.  …

title: Diamondhead is the Best on Fort Myers Beach
review: Hello Aharris624- Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. They may be minor details but even the little things are important. We apologize that our service was not more attentive. Regardless of what is happening in or around the resort, our guests deserve the best. I will address this with our team and make sure that we have sufficient resources to adequately serve our guests. We are glad your family had a nice stay and enjoyed the beach. Thank you for staying at DiamondHead Beach Resort! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Another Excellent Stay at Diamondhead Beach Resort!
review: Service, facility, beach everything was great! Location was great, walking distance to everything. It was our first time to Fort Myers and we definitely picked the right place to stay. We will be returning!

title: Return visitor
review: Overall my visit was very pleasantly.  I suggest moving the cable box from  behind the chest of draws in the living room.  A little disappointed that I was woken on Monday morning by construction work from a nearby unit.  Perhaps having the noisy work start a little later morning.

title: Weekend getaway
review: Hello finnm675- Thank you for returning to DiamondHead, it was a pleasure to have you back. We are pleased to hear that your overall stay was pleasant. We appreciate your suggestion in regards to the cable box and will look into this. Our property team should not have been engaged in an early morning projects and I apologize for the noise. I will follow up with them to be sure that all staff respect the comfort of our guests. We appreciate your review, thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great resort, perfect location
review: Staff very friendly and helpful. Beautiful view from our room we had the beach view suite. Just wished the WiFi worked for me. Property was clean and food was not over priced. Would definitely go back

title: Wonderful hotel at a fantastic location. Scott Smith pool server & KY John at the Bellhop desk-Super
review: Hello Tomalin2019- Thank you for choosing DiamondHead Beach Resort. We are pleased to hear that our staff was accommodating and your suite was enjoyable. We apologize for the WiFI connectivity and hope that our team was able to assist in resolving this issue. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we would appreciate the opportunity to have you as our guest again! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Diamondhead resort excellent choice
review: Booked a one-bedroom suite for a September “recharge” trip during shoulder season, and we hit the nail on the head for timing - arrived a week before the powerboat races, checked in on a Monday. Room was VERY reasonably priced (tip - I paid the non-refundable rate and got a great deal). Not crowded, and the beach view is to die for. You’ll pay for everything, beach chairs are rented from a 3rd party (not unreasonable), room service is a little pricey, but it’s a 5-star resort - on the gulf - with a 10 star view. The on-site restaurants serve food quality food, drinks aren’t shy on the pour ($$$$, take advantage of happy hour specials). Again, we took a vacation to a resort that is literally on the Gulf of Mexico, and couldn’t be happier. Front desk, bellhop, cleaning crew, staff…

title: Not worth the price
review: Very friendly and customer service oriented staff that would meet your every need but the facility needs maintenance as it is becoming worn and dated. Several things were not working during our stay. The hotel was not nice enough to justify the price paid.

title: Another great stay at Diamondhead
review: Hello jimfS802SH- Thank you for choosing to stay at DiamondHead Beach Resort, we are pleased that our service was pleasant. We regret that our facilities did not meet your expectations and apologize for any issues that you experienced while visiting. I hope that our team was helpful in assisting with any problems and provided quick and efficient resolutions. Guest reviews are very important to us and we appreciate your feedback. We are committed to continually improving the way we serve our guests. Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: This is the place to stay!
review: A great property and very convenient location on FMB. Very close to Times Square and many restaurants. The hotel's Coste restaurant is very chic and has a beautiful view of the gulf. Terrific salt water pool and bar/ restaurant area poolside. Beach rentals right on property.

title: Another Great Stay
review: Hi GreggSBuffalo_NY- Thank you for returning to DiamondHead, we are delighted to hear that your return visit was great. We are glad you enjoyed the dining experience at Cōste and Cabañas as well. We are thankful for your review and love hearing from our guests. We enjoyed the opportunity to have you as our guest and hope you will consider us again in the future. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: An Excellent Beachfront resort
review: Stay here if you are looking for a clean hotel with beautiful views of the ocean, screened balcony, restaurants and bar, and did I mention the staff? The customer service was above and beyond from the moment we walked through the door! Everyone is so friendly and they went out of their way to make sure we had an amazing time.

title: Excellent experience!
review: This resort was beautiful and has a wonderful location.    Our room was spotless-it was the cleaning hotel room I have ever been in. The room had a kitchenette which was filled with dishes, silverware, glassware, appliances, dishwasher, microwave and much more.  The Bathroom was big and modern and it provided a lot of storage for personal items.  The bedroom also provided plenty of drawers and closet space for personal items and clothing.    We would not hesitate to return here.

title: Our First Time to Fort Myers Beach, and DiamonHead Beach Resort made it Perfect!
review: Hello sstout846156- We are thrilled to hear that your accommodations were the cleanest room you have ever received. Cleanliness is a top priority and your feedback means a lot to us. We are glad you enjoyed your stay. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we would love to have you back again in the future! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great resort right on Fort Myers Beach
review: Our friends referred us to the DiamondHead Beach Resort and we absolutely loved the location, the room, the service, and the sunset views!  We would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the Fort Myers Area!

title: Family Emergency Much Easier
review: Hi E7976LHdanielp- We are pleased that you chose to stay at DiamondHead and are grateful for your recommendation. Your feedback is very important to us. Thank you for visiting, we hope to have you back again! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great find!
review: I would definitely recommend this resort to anyone looking to stay right on Fort Myers Beach and within walking distance (10-15 minute walk with lots of bars, stores and hotels along the way) to Times Square and the Pier. Rooms are all modern one-bedroom suites with full kitchens and screened in lanai-type balconies. Ours faced the pool and beach, which I would highly recommend. Pool was beautiful and refreshing with 2 hot tubs. They have a pool/beach bar with live music. It offers service at the pool and has good food and great happy hour specials from 3-6pm. They also have an upscale restaurant at the hotel and we had dinner there one night. Food and service was great, but lacking in ambiance as there was practically no one there, but I’m sure it’s due to it being off season. …

title: Our summer Getaway
review: Whenever we travel there is always one thing that may be detracts from a stay. In this case, there were none. Having a hotel on the beach plus having a view of the beach was terrific. Being just a short walking distance to Times Square added up to a most enjoyable vacation.  All our interaction with the staff was met with a smile and hello.

title: Great Resort
review: Hello jplaczek- We are thrilled to hear that your vacation at DiamondHead was very enjoyable and our service was warm and friendly. We are glad that the beachfront location added to your happiness as well. We love to hear from our guests, thank you for posting a review. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Wonderful weekend at the beach!
review: Location.Location.Location. We could walk to almost everything we wanted to do. Clean room with a great view. loved that the balcony was screened in so no bugs.We had a great stay and would stay here again and again.

title: Great Customer Service!
review: Hello cjagg1990- We are delighted that our beachfront location was so enjoyable and your recent stay was a pleasant. We would love to have you back again and again too! Thank you for your review, your feedback is important to us. We enjoyed the opportunity to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Family-friendly and reasonably priced
review: You never know when you book a hotel just from visiting a website, but we were not disappointed.  It was lovely to be upgraded to a beachfront room and I spent a lot of time on the huge balcony.  The food and drinks were lovely and we really enjoyed our stay.

title: Great place to stay
review: Stay was great.  Staff are very friendly and accommodating.  Food is excellent and resort very clean. We traveled with our children and our friends.  Pool bar excellent, staff friendly and attentive.  Plan to go back often.  Weather was perfect

title: Impressive Ocean Front Suite
review: Hi joelynquigliano- Thank you for staying at DiamondHead with your family and friends. We are pleased that the service, accommodations and dining options provided for and enjoyable experience. We are also glad the weather was pleasant and hope that your beach days were amazing. We are grateful for your review and thankful for the opportunity to have you as our guests. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Wonderful... But...
review: I have seen this hotel on Fort Myers Beach for years and finally got the opportunity to stay. We had a 1 bedroom suite ocean front. The room was much bigger and more than adequate for our 1 night stay. The balcony was screened in which was a huge plus for us. We sat out there for hours watching the lightning offshore. There was a very nice full kitchen and separate living space for those that like to stay in and prepare a light meal. Very clean hotel with very friendly staff. We are looking forward to going back. Oh!! I forgot to mention they provided some coupons to the onsite restaurants upon check in. We didn’t take our car anywhere. Excellent location.

title: Excellent Hotel!
review: Hi SarahsSky- We are glad you had the opportunity to stay with us and you enjoyed your time here! Thank you for sharing the details of your experience, guest feedback is so important to us. We are glad you enjoyed the spacious rooms and found the service and cleanliness to be pleasing. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we look forward to having you back! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Summer in Fort Myers Beach
review: Everything fine but they make you pay 21.30 a day for chairs and umbrella at the beach!!  Unfair,  and  unheard of... They charge a resort fee already and you have to lay for beach chairs!!!?  Thus the 3 stars.

title: Can’t beat this resort!
review: So thankful we chose this resort for our first trip to Ft Myers! We will be back! Can’t beat the great staff, food, live music at the bar and rooms with a view!! So happy with our getaway, even if we had rain for much of it. The pics don’t do it justice

title: Great time had by all!
review: Hi Sarah- Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review on TripAdvisor. We are thrilled that your first visit was so enjoyable and it would be a pleasure to have you back. We are thankful for the opportunity to have you as our guest. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Anniversary weekend
review: DiamondHead was fantastic and will definitely recommend to others. Temp was very hot and humid but beach was cool and drinks were flowing. We wished we would have booked at least one more day. We didn’t get to do the excursions.

title: Very mixed feeling
review: Hello Kelly- Thank you for choosing to stay at DiamondHead, we are pleased that you had a pleasant visit. The best way to beat the summer heat is floating with a cold drink! We are thankful for your review and appreciate the recommendation. It was a pleasure to have you all as our guests! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Avoid this hotel,
review: Just got back from our Anniversary 3 day weekend away.  Although we booked late we got a good price.  I will say we were put in room 411 which is the worst room and  had the air conditioner right next to room so stay away from that room.    We did have an amazing view from that room but the air conditioner was noisy. Try to get higher up if you are on that side for gulf view.  The 2nd night the amazing staff moved us to a pool view that did us just fine.   I will say the staff was nothing but nice to us and was there for anything we needed.    Location is is great.  Easy 10 min of walk on the beach to the pier,  live music, kilwins ice cream and some restaurants.   The pool is great and had 2 hot tubs.    The bar is right there and they are always walking around taking orders.  …

title: Great Place to Stay
review: This is a lovely hotel, but pricey. Elevator goes right to the Cabanas and beach. Staff very friendly and helpful. Room is nicely appointed and very clean. The one bedroom is perfect for three people, four may feel a little crowded.

title: Wonderful 6 day stay
review: Hello ttkendall- Thank you for staying at DiamondHead. We are pleased to hear that our staff was friendly and your accommodations were clean and well appointed. We hope that your time here was fun and relaxing. Your review is important, thank you for sharing. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest. Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Diamondhead resort Ft Meyers Beach
review: Terrific Beach and pool, terrifically nice staff, good bar, lounge and Coste restaurant. Does need some activities in case of rain, game room for kids, gift shop, etc. They do have special meal discounts for dinner and breakfast for occupants, and happy hours. They also have music both in the lounge and in the pool and beach bar, lunch and early dinner.

title: Vacation stay
review: Hi 56rjl- Thank you for visiting DiamondHead, we are glad you had a nice stay. It's great to hear that our staff was helpful and you enjoyed the resort amenities. Thank you for the suggestions in regards to activities. This is something we will look into as we plan future improvements. Your feedback is important and we appreciate your review.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Nice Place To Stay And A Great Area
review: What a great place to stay on Ft Meyers Beach! I can't imagine any of the others properties being better! Conveniently located to Times Square where all the action is, and all the water activities you could want located on the beach right behind the resort. Best beach vacation we've had!

title: Very good hotel directly at the beach
review: Convenient, good location, nice rooms, good restaurant, good service. The pool area is nice and clean, however, there were not enough sun-umbrellas. The live music at the bar was sometimes too loud. We enjoyed our stay and will come back.

title: Repeat Guest
review: Hello Resort22793- Thank you for staying at DiamondHead, it was a pleasure to have you as our guest. We are glad you enjoyed the service, rooms, restaurant and beachfront location. We apologize that you were disappointed with the amount of beach umbrellas and volume of the live music. We will look into both of these issues to see if we can better regulate them. Thank you for your feedback, it is very important to us. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Best in the area
review: This was our 2nd time visiting. Last year there was construction so it was hard to rate. This year the new restaurant was completed. Coste food was great. A bit overpriced but delicious. They gave us $20 off 2 entrees so that was nice. Repeat guest get 15% off their stay which was nice as well. We had issues with bell service and management seemed to disregard our concerns. My brother had issues with their room lock ...1/2 day not being able to enter their room without calling maintenance to enter their room every time because the lock broke. No compensation was offered or given. It was definitely asked for. Margaritaville will be going in soon and with so many options it will be hard to return. They say genuine hospitality is important to them, but it failed on this trip.

title: Overnight stay
review: Hello Pioneer702017- Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We regret that you had a disappointing visit. Your are correct, genuine hospitality is always our goal and we sincerely apologize that this was not your experience. We are sorry for the trouble with your room lock and the dissatisfaction with our bell staff. I will be sure to look into both of these problems to identify what went wrong. We rely on guest feedback to improve and hope that you will give us another chance in the future. Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Anniversity trip
review: This hotel is located in a good area. Walking distance to some great restaurants and the pier near by. Great view and beautiful beach. There were some good features along with some not so good. But it is the best in the area.

title: Small get away
review: We decided to get away with friends for a few days and ended up staying here. Very nice rooms, views were good, staff was amazing and we had lots of fun. Rick, our bellhop was amazing and I want to give him a special shout out as he got us off on the right foot, from the moment we pulled in and unloaded our car. (Pull in under the building and make sure go see Rick before getting started)

title: Didn't want to leave...
review: Hello Mpricerealtor, We are glad that your stay with friends was fun and relaxing. We think we have the best bellman on Fort Myers Beach and we're glad that Rick's service was amazing. I will be sure to extend your gratitude. We enjoyed the opportunity to have you as our guest and hope that you will consider us again for future getaways. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: A great place to stay.
review: Wonderful resort! My son and I were in Room 701 - Corner Pool Beach View One Bedroom Deluxe Suite. The resort is amazing with very friendly staff (shout out to Derek, Mark and Nathan!), many amenities (pool, bikes, Holiday Water Sports), two restaurants, and beautiful views of the gulf and surrounding areas. The room was very spacious with a kitchenette (small fridge, dishwasher, cooktop, coffee maker), separate bedroom with a King bed, access to the screened balcony from both the living area and the bedroom. The pool area was very well laid out and the water temp was perfect to cool off on a hot day!

title: Lovely visit
review: Hello catcrazy1201- Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are so glad that our service was amazing, I will be sure to share your compliments with our team. It sounds like your visit was fun and relaxing and we hope that your stay was a memorable one. We enjoyed the opportunity to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: We had a great time!
review: We decided to stay here based on the other reviews. I was not disappointed! The hotel staff was friendly and always helpful. The rooms were spacious and clean. They supplied us with fresh bath AND beach towels daily. We were there for 5 days. 5 beautiful days on the white sandy beach front. You can rent chairs and umbrellas, jet skis, SUP, a sail boat, among other things. What we did was go to The Goodz, buy a few floats/rafts for $6-11 and use those to float around on the ocean. It was a great time. We would stay here again.

title: Great little resort
review: Diamond Head has everything and choices can be limited on Fort Myers Beach. This little resort has it all. Clean, nice accommodations, beach, pool, spa, bar, restaurant and activities. Highly recommend.

title: DiamondHead is an Excellent Choice
review: Hello ManondB- We are pleased to hear that you found everything you needed while visiting DiamondHead. Your recommendation really means a lot to us and we are grateful for your kind words. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, it was a pleasure to have you as our guest. Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Too notch
review: I love staying at DiamondHead, and have done so multiple times. The staff are very friendly and helpful, the resort is clean and a good value for the price, and I love the location close to Time Square. I recommend DiamondHead to all of my friends and family.

title: Family trip
review: Hello dleseman- Thank you for repeatedly choosing DiamondHead while visiting Fort Myers Beach! We are delighted that our service and accommodations are worth coming back for. We really appreciate your recommendation to friends and family! Your review means a lot to all of here and we look forward to having you back again! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great beach front hotel
review: We usually travel to the Caribbean..we went on a chance and came to Diamondhead and everything was fabulous! From the beginning to end! Bellmen, guest check in, servers, housekeeping, food etc.  my kids said it’s the best vacation ever and I agree! Will definitely be back!

title: A World Class Resort
review: Diamondhead Beach Resort is a world class resort on Estero Beach. We have been coming here for over five years and it continues to improve every year. The staff is amazing and goes above and beyond to ensure that you have an awesome vacation.

title: Diamond Head stay for June 28-July 2.
review: Hello Climber38624025758- Thank you so much for your loyalty, we are glad that we can provide an experience worth coming back for! We have a great team and I'm happy that their service is amazing. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: "Great Location, Beautiful Resort"
review: Cabana and poolside are very nice.  The rooms are nice, but there was no dishwasher and the sink did not drain.  An employee of the Jet ski company located outside of Diamond Head, provides service to Diamond Head customers, harassed us when net fishing.  In the State of Florida up to July 1, 2019. It is legal to cast net.  We showed are children the fish and released the fish.  The employee with long hair, who didnt know Florida law, harassed our family which started others to join.  I mention this due to the companies affiliation with Diamond Head.    Other than the sink not draining and the open harassment, our stay was pleasant.  We will probably stay somewhere else next year that is more peaceful.

title: OK stay
review: Hi Go514380- Thank you for staying at DiamondHead, we are glad that most of your time here was pleasant. We apologize for the sink drain issue and hope that our team was able to resolve this during your stay. We are terribly sorry that our beach vendor was not pleasant to your family. We will discuss this with them immediately as we want every part of the guest experience to be pleasant. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, your feedback is very important to us. We hope that you will reconsider and give us another chance. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Exceeded all expectations
review: The rooms were very clean, Furniture in my room was a little worn and outdated. Bathrooms need to be redesigned for more privacy. Absolutely Loved Cabanas Beach Bar & Grille and want to give " A Big Shout Out" to our Absolutely Favorite Server Cassie ! She was always pleasant,  very informative and kept us laughing! She definitely made our stay enjoyable !! My overall first time experience was Great anand I willl be returning, Hope to see Cassies Smiling Face again next year :)

title: Great location, very good resort
review: I’m return customer. While the property could make some I Improvements, the overall vibe was great and the views are amazing. I’d love to see some news bedding, the sheets were very rough and mattresses starting to show their age.  Perhaps DVD players for those rainy florida hours, and longer hours for the beach bar. The entertainment was great! But would love the karaoke and piano player to come back. Loved my stay overall.

title: Great Experience
review: Hi Blasthockeymom02- Thank you for returning to DiamondHead, it was a pleasure to have you back. We are glad you enjoyed the vibe here at the resort. We appreciate your suggestions and will review all of them with our property team. Looking for ways to improve our facilities and service is something we are always doing. Thank you for sharing your feedback, we really appreciate it! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: yearly visit
review: I was not sure what to expect, the price seamed very reasonable compared to other properties, but I was very surprised.   Great clean rooms and all the staff were fantastic great pool for kids and the beach is right there.  The restaurant had just been remodeled and looked like it could have been in the Ritz... and yes I have been to a Ritz. (get the seafood soup!)  Great value!!

title: Perfect getaway!
review: Hi FarAway54006165118- We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the resort and found our prices to be very reasonable. It sounds like your family had a nice visit and enjoyed some time in the sun. Thank you for stopping by Cōste, we are flattered by your comments. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we appreciate you leaving us a review. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Disappointed
review: excellent hotel right on the beach plenty of things and places to go within 15 miles. Your only down the road from the pier where there is entertainment and plenty of bars and restaurants. You see plenty of wildlife on the beach sometimes even dolphins.

title: All around hotel
review: We spent 8 days at this hotel. We had a gulf view room with a terrace, kitchenette etc. We were on the 12th floor and each morning the pelicans would fly by. Our room was clean and neat. All the amenities we needed for our eight days were provided. Hotel is right on the beach. They have bell attendants to help with your luggage or to guide you to where ever you needed to go. John Spicer was our go to bell attendant and we thought he was the absolute "best." They had bikes that the guests could check out and use. We rented a car for our trip and visited Santibel Island and took in the Flea Market in Fort Myers on the weekend. We were doing something everyday which also included time on the beach. We especially loved that the hotel had a laundry room on our floor. Need to purchase…

title: Good night Irene
review: Hello chezhed12- Thank you for choosing to spend your 8 day vacation with us, it was a pleasure to have you! Fort Myers Beach offers an authentic experience and it sounds like you were able to enjoy a lot of what makes this place special. We appreciate your review and the time you took to share your thorough feedback. We would love the chance to have you back at the resort! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: NOT A “GULF VIEW”
review: Enjoy your self because the time goes by fast, nice location for walking along the beach. Friendly mom and pop stores all along the main street with some good deals. The beach view room has beautiful view of the ocean.

title: Trip with friends
review: Hi Gerard- If only we could slow down time! We are glad that you enjoyed your time here and found the accommodations to be pleasant. Thank you for sharing your review, it was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Nice clean hotel, Management has good grasp of guests expectations, Will definitely return for another stay
review: The whole reason I booked with this hotel was because of the “Gulf view” it boasted on it description online. Our view from our room was of the room next to us and the hotel next door. A 10% view of the beach is not a Gulf view. It’s not even a partial Gulf view. But the description was a Gulf view and we did not get that. When I l voiced my disappointment with the front desk I received a sarcastic “sorry” and no change to our room.  Rooms were quite clean but needed updating. The lobby was quite updated but the rooms did not reflect that. Overall the hotel was kept super clean and maintained nicely. Cleaning staff was always friendly. Pool area and pool were always clean. Beach was alright. I know that’s not the hotels fault but the beach water was so murky and full of seaweed.…

title: Anniversary Trip
review: Came to Ft. Myers for our anniversary and were booked at a different nearby property. When we arrived there, we quickly realized it was a location geared to a much larger party atmosphere than we were looking for. Nothing wrong with that, but we needed something quieter, especially after a very long day of travel. We found Diamond Head had one room availabile and we booked. We could not have been happier with these accommodations. All rooms have a large screened porch which overlook the beach and are set up suite style with a kitchenette, living room and separate bedroom. It's also amazingly quiet on the property. The staff here is wonderfully helpful and professional.  Don't miss the opportunity to eat at Coste. It's absolutely top notch.

title: Family loves the beach
review: Hello Doug- We are glad to hear that you found the peace and quite you were looking for at DiamondHead. Our staff is tremendous and I'm happy that their service was friendly and welcoming. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, it was a pleasure to have you as our guest. We are pleased that you enjoyed the accommodations and had a pleasant dining experience. Your review means a lot to us! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Very nice!
review: Great staff, great clean beach, kids loved the jet skis, the steak was awesome, within walking distance of everything, the pool is great, we come here every year, the grand parents get the room next to us...

title: Great Family Vacation
review: Hello Explore44838612956- We are pleased to hear that you had another great visit. It makes us happy to hear that the experience we offer is something you and your family enjoy every year. It is a pleasure to have you as our guests and we look forward to seeing you next year! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: 15 year anniversary
review: Very nice property and looks like the photos, which I am usually leary of when looking online. I wouldn't advise staying for food/drinks as there are better choices for food and drink quality for price, but both restaurants on site are very nice. Incredibly, there is no walk to the beach.  We loved it, and hope to return soon!

title: My stay
review: I  would recommend But change the pillows .I had a stiff neck every morning  . Staff was  friendly and helpful  ,  drinks in the Cabana Restaurants were very weak even after mentioning to Bartender Worst drinks on the beach  So we did go else where when we wanted to relax

title: Great hotel!!
review: Hi DayTrip66084591840- Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. We really appreciate the recommendation, it really means a lot to us. Your suggestions are important and will be reviewed by our management team. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: 1st family vacay
review: Great hotel with great amenities and wonderful beach access!!  Staff were friendly & helpful.  Room was spacious and very comfortable.   We thoroughly enjoyed our time there and we’ll stay here again!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Great Resort
review: Hi Connector35316766906- We are delighted to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay at DiamondHead Beach Resort. We really have a great team here and I am proud of the hospitality they extend to our guests. It would be a pleasure to have you back again! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Weekend trip
review: Great location. Most places are within walking distance. Trolleys are available for most locations that are not within walking distance and to the other beaches. Good for the price. Coste has great food and live bands often.

title: Nice Resort Right On The Beach!
review: The resort is great! We arrived and immediately was greeted by the bellman right by the elevator to the lobby. He helped us get oriented and where we needed to go. The lobby was nice and the person at check-in was incredibly kind and helpful. My luggage was going to be delayed so I let them know and they told me that it will be all taken care of. The room itself is very spacious and clean... It had pretty much everything we needed. The balcony and a view of the beach was great! The beach the property sits on was clean, quiet and amazing! We had absolutely not complaints about our stay here and would recommend DiamondHead to anyone!

title: Overall
review: Hello vacationdude2004- Thank you for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear that everything was pleasant and your recommendation really means a lot to us. We have a great team here at the resort and I am glad that their service and flexibility added to your enjoyment. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Excellent Hotel on Estero Blvd., Ft. Myers
review: Outstanding place to stay on Fort Myers Beach. All the amenities you could want. location, food, pool, service. We are Timeshare Owners here for twelve years and it keeps getting better and better each year we come back.

title: Resort was GREAT.
review: Hi pasetto108- It was a pleasure to have you back at the resort! We are thrilled to hear that it keeps getting better each year. We are committed to continually improving our service and facilities so that our guests love to come back. Thank you for your loyalty and we appreciate the opportunity to have you as vacation club owners. Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: clean on the beach
review: Everything about the experience was great. From what we could tell, the Diamond Head was the most modern hotel we saw on Estero Blvd. Sleep as 4 out of 5 because two of us slept on the pull out bed and it was a bit uncomfortable (like most pull out beds), the metal on one side of the bed was prominent. Probably because that was the side that was most used.  But all in all, it was a great stay, the room was clean and modern with a great view (Gulf view). Also, each room has its own Wi-Fi.

title: Lovely place on the beach; fabulous, just fabulous food
review: Like the one bedroom, especially situated so I can see the beach from our balcony. Very clean and the staff was absolutely first class. They are updating the facility, adding more activities. And the restaurant ... truly first class!

title: Very helpful staff!
review: Hi Jodi- Thank you for choosing DiamondHead. We appreciate the review you left for the resort and restaurant. We are delighted that you enjoyed the accommodations and found the staff to be first class. It was our pleasure to host you! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Best hotel in Ft. Myers!
review: We showed up tired. There was a mixup in our reservation, which was made with an outside travel agency. Heather, the manager on duty took care of us. Even though we were stressed, she was calm and reassuring. The front desk staff, led by Heather bent over backwards to accommodate us.  The hotel has a great location on the beach. Beautiful view. Great beach bar and happy hour. Fun pool.

title: Great spot on Ft. Myers Beach
review: Hi RandySpence- Thank you for choosing DiamondHead, it was a pleasure to have you as our guest. I am glad that Heather was able to help make light of a difficult situation. We are pleased that the efforts of our team helped turn the situation around and you had a pleasant stay. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: My favorite getaway spot
review: Excellent hotel and facilities. The new Coste restaurant was awesome and our server, Holly, was very nice and friendly and was very helpful with our dinner choices.  Food was perfect and so was all of the staff.

title: " Relaxed ! "
review: Diamond Head Resort is just one GREAT place to be on Ft. Myers Beach. The recent remodel work of which took place on the lobby floor is just Fantastic! The new restaurant & bar area are very nice. This resort is located close to must everything one would want to do to have a Great Time.

title: Mini Vacation
review: Hello Gary- We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our resort renovations and had a relaxing time at DiamondHead. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. Your review really means a lot to us! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: great place, great stay!
review: My husband and I enjoyed our mini-vacation at DiamondHead. The Coste Island restaurant was excellent as was the wait staff. The pool is very refreshing and the beach is great too.  Although there are great restaurants in sight, it is within walking distance to other restaurants and shops. We will be back!

title: Steve
review: Hello pldjrd84-   Thank you for staying at DiamondHead and dining at Cōste! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time with us! It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we look forward to welcoming you back next time!   Kind Regards,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great hotel
review: we came for a sat.-tues stay.   from the painless and friendly check in, everyone was awesome. we .made the reservation after i heard my work boss say when he went to ft. myers on business he stayed here and loved it.   we are thankful for a great place to spend our vacation. we will be back for sure. thanks for a great stay!

title: Experience at DiamondHead
review: One of two things needs to be done here. Either the price should be dropped to $110 a night. Or the rooms should be renovated. The front desk staff member was horribly rude and egotistic towards us. We both were very unsatisfied with this hotel which was really sad since we were recently engaged.

title: It's like coming home!
review: Hello Culture11239115641-   We are disappointed to hear that the resort did not meet your expectations. We will certainly share your review with our team as we continually look for ways to improve. Please accept our apologies for the way that you were treated at the front desk, I will personally address this situation with our guest services team. Congratulations on your recent engagement and we wish you the best!   Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Excellent resort hotel
review: Our week of relaxing, pool, dining, beach walking and having fun every day begins the moment we walk into Diamond Head Resort. We feel so welcomed - they remember who we are. We meet such nice people. The rooms are clean and whatever we need, it gets taken care of. The new Coste dining room is wonderful and delicious.  The staff there is exceptional: Deb, Holly and Pam took great care of us. Then you can finish off the evening at the great bar with really good entertainment. That's why we go back every year.

title: Wish we could have stayed longer!
review: Hello Freedom710554-   With so many options for accommodations on Fort Myers Beach, we truly feel honored that you continue to visit us and feel at home! We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review and are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience at Cōste! Your kind words will certainly be shared with our team and we look forward to your next visit with us!   Kind Regards,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: FMBx3
review: Nice secure beach front hotel and dining location.   Can have a meal or drinks right on the sand or at beach front air cabana restaurant or elegant dining experience at beach front enclosed restaurant or terrace.  Restaurant ( Coste is very upscale and brand new)

title: Very clean beautiful rooms
review: Rooms were great, restaurant and pool areas were e cells to but very noisy at night with the outside patio restaurant positioned surrounding rooms you could hear the peoples conversations past 10pm to 11pm

title: Diamondhead Resort
review: Hello Wanderer29499713881-   Thank you for staying at DiamondHead! We are pleased to hear that you found the rooms to be great. Please accept our apologies regarding the noise level at the pool and restaurant. You feedback is appreciated and we will be sure to share your review with our team. We enjoyed having you as our guest!   Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: 5⭐️ Isn’t Enough!
review: This is our third year vacationing in FMB. The last 2 years we stayed at the Pink Shell and loved it there. We thought we would try something different this year. We picked Diamondhead because of the ratings and the location. It is a really nice hotel with everything you could ask for. It’s location is perfect for walking to many restaurants and shops at Time Square. It is right on the beach too. The pool area is a little small but clean. There are plenty of parking spots for your car so you don’t have to valet every time you want to leave.  Our room was really nice. We stayed in room 602 and I would recommend a room that ends in 2. That room has a great pool view and beach view. The screened in balcony of the rooms are huge! They have a table and chairs for 4 people and also 2…

title: Perfect Hotel and staff
review: Hi chris13209-   Thank you for staying at DiamondHead! We truly appreciate your thorough review and are happy to hear that you enjoyed the resort! Your feedback regarding the stove is also appreciated. We will be sure to share this with our team as we continually look for areas in which to improve. It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we hope to see you again next time!   Kind Regards,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Beautiful Property!
review: Let’s just say if you’re looking for a lil heaven on earth... Here It Is! From check in to departure, we have had an amazing time. Customer service is top notch! They have Cabanas (bar & grill) which also offers poolside services & a very elegant restaurant called Cōste (it’s wonderful.. check my review!) Rooms are a teeny dated, but honestly that’s what I love to see.. old retro charm! Definitely one of the nicest resorts on the beach! We love it so much, we are already planning to come back! Keep up the good work Diamondhead!

title: Vacation
review: This is the third or fourth time I’ve stayed at Diamondhead - and we absolutely love it there ... had one small problem one morning with no hot water maintenance was called and the problem was solved within the day !

title: Florida getaway
review: Hello Wanderer19228141641-   Thank you for staying at DiamondHead! With so many options to choose from in the Fort Myers Beach area, we feel truly honored that you continue to choose us for your accommodations! Please accept our apologies regarding the water during your stay, we love to hear that our maintenance team was able to remedy the situation promptly. It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we hope to see you again soon!   Kind Regards,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Diamonmd Head Beach Resort
review: We stayed 5 nights at the Diamond Head Resort the first week of April. The resort had great access to the beach. The dining room and lounge were great. Unfortunately we had to get a few repairs done on our arrival. Firstly and most important the air conditioning was not working. The coffee pot handle was broken, the bread board was badly "used". The bathroom rug was noticeably dirty. The hotel was prompt to fix these things but housekeeping should have noticed all of the problems when they cleaned after the last people staying in the room.

title: Perfect Place For Rest
review: Hello Pelican87- We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and post a review. We apologize for the oversights and are glad that our team was able to resolve the issues quickly and to your satisfaction. We will address this with our team to be sure that all room inspections are being followed. We are glad you enjoyed the accommodations and dining experience offered here on property. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Family review
review: Diamond Head Beach is the best hotel on the Fort Myers beach strip. The cleanest, the most comfortable, odor less - no strong smells of disinfectants, humidity, mold etc … it is spotless! Staff and maintenance crew are experienced, friendly, chat with all visitors both young and elderly! Very caring bunch. Super efficient at the bar and with food request  Service in the dinning areas is exceptional.  The new restaurant and bar and breakfast glassed in area is top of the line! Like a cruise ship! All Aboard!!!  ---  enjoy!  Loved - would highly recommend to all.  Cant wait to go back! See you there!  And the beach - OMG!  The sunsets OMG!!!  no need to go on.....just pack and go!!!NOW

title: Love this Property!
review: I stayed at DiamondHead 2 times in 3 months.  Once with my 4 teenagers for spring break and the second with just my husband for our Anniversary.  Both times were AMAZING.  Love the property and the area! Clean,  Friendly, accommodating - super place.  Love the use of the bikes!!  My only mild complaint is in all the hotels I've stayed in, there has always been at least 2 mirrors - one in the bathroom and one in the living space - this property only has one!!! ugh!!!

title: Great Location!
review: Hi brendad03- We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed DiamondHead on both of your recent visits! We are happy that the accommodations and amenities were pleasing. We appreciate your suggestion in regards to the mirror and will review this with our property team. Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Guest feedback is so important to us. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Incredible Resort
review: Great location, friendly staff!  Very comfortable beds!  Pool was nice & they had neat things for the kids to do each day.  Great outdoor bar with entertainment a few nights a week.  Great location!  Close to “Times Square” with only 1 mile walk - or hop on the trolley/tran at stop right outside hotel!  Download the “Transit” app to help with times & stop locations.  Tram is free, trolley is 75 cents but you can also pay for a day pass I believe.  Never ate in the restaurant but the bar food is decent.  Only 1/4 mile from Heavenly Biscuit! Good variety of drinks!  Would definitely stay here again!

title: My home away from home
review: Hello sklagrange- Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! We are pleased that you enjoyed the location, comfort and kid's activities at the resort. Fort Myers Beach is such a fun destination and we are glad you had fun exploring. We enjoyed the opportunity to have you as our guest and we would love to have you back again in the future! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great Beach-Front, Family-Friendly Hotel
review: We had a great stay at DiamondHead Beach Resort.  Resort was very clean and well maintained.  The   staff were all friendly and very helpful.  The food and drinks at the Coste restaurant were amazing!!  The bartenders were all very friendly.  Cabanas also had great food and drinks and very convenient right off the beach and pool.  I will definitely stay here again next time I am in Fort Myers Beach.

title: overall a nice experience
review: Nice clean room and good service. Would like to see some night lights or mood lighting in the rooms since I get up for golf and don't want to wake the wife with the lights on. Plenty of free parking. Attentive staff

title: One of the nicest places on Fort Myers Beach
review: Hello James S- Thank you for sharing your feedback, we are pleased to hear that you had a pleasant stay. We hope that you enjoyed your time on the golf course. We appreciate your suggestion in regards to the lighting and will take this into consideration. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Diamond head beach resort. Fort Myers beach
review: Loved this place!!  We will definitely be coming back.  We picked this right off the internet and we were not disappointed.  We stayed in an ocean front and I'm glad we paid extra for that!  The only way to see the beautiful beach and sunset!!

title: Diamond Head Resort Wonderful!!
review: Hello Safari33966214149-   Thank you for staying at DiamondHead! We are thrilled to hear that you loved the resort! We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!   Best Regards,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Freshly Remodeled and Upgraded
review: The hotel is one of the nicest on the beach! The restaurant was very nice with great  food and views. The beach was nice but didn't go in do to the red tide. Hotel staff were friendly and the pool bar cabanas made great drinks especially the key lime pie drink.

title: Amazing First Vacation at Fort Myers Beach!
review: We picked this place for the location, but it far exceeded our expectations. The pool, beach and staff were excellent.  Our room had beachfront view and the balcony/lanai was private and spacious!  We were able to walk to all the attractions such as Time Square.  The outside bars and entertainment were awesome!  Will be back next year!

title: exellent accomadations
review: Hello snowbirds27-   We are thrilled to hear that your expectations were exceeded and that you found the pool, beach and our team to be excellent! It was a true pleasure having you as our guest and we cannot wait to welcome you back next year!   Best Regards,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Really great for an extended weekend
review: Great location;, clean accomadatios. Rather pricey; resturant quite so. Helpful personable staff. Great views of the Gulf. Rooms spacious with enough emmenities. Pool and outside hottubs clean. Ft. Myers beach in front of hotel seemed to stretch for miles. Easy acess to recreational activities such as Jet Skis, Para Sailing etc. right on the beach in front of hotel Easy walk to shopping and a variety of eateries. A nice plus was the free shuttle provided by the city that travled the length of Estero blvd.

title: FRIST TIME STAY AT FORT MYERS BEACH
review: Hello goatman247-   Thank you for staying at DiamondHead! We are so happy to hear that you found the accommodations to be excellent and enjoyed the amenities provided by the resort. We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review and hope to see you again in the future!   Best Regards,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Amazing vacation
review: My main goal on my Fort Meyers Beach trip was to sit on the beach, and walk anywhere I wanted to go. This resort exceeded my expectations in so many ways. The staff was friendly and helpful. We ate (and drank) at both restaurants and the food was excellent. The Resort is easy walking distance to wherever you’d like to go, and the views from the huge, screened balcony were stunning. I would definitely stay again.

title: Great Place to Stay
review: This was our first time to Ft. Myers Beach and DiamondHead Beach Resort. Our travel agent found this property for us. We were very pleased with every aspect of our stay. I would visit this resort again and highly recommend it!

title: Recent visit--April 2019
review: Hello Car74884-   Thank you for staying at DiamondHead! We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review and love to hear that you were pleased with every aspect of your stay. We hope to be able to welcome you back in the future!   Best Regards,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: DiamondHead 2019
review: We recently stayed at Diamond Head for our spring break trip.  The front desk staff (Vicki and Marika) are really wonderful.  When we checked in were placed in a limited view room which was really bad, and they worked hard to get us into a new room.  I knew that when I booked the room it was a handicap accessible room but I missed the fact that its a limited view room.  I'm usually pretty careful about this but I did not see anything on my reservation that indicated this room would be looking out onto the roof and air conditioning units with a very limited gulf view.  I really wish that there was some information in BOLD lettering on this room when booking.  But, with that said, Vikki and Marika went above and beyond for us and we were moved to a new room.  We ended up extremely…

title: Fantastic Resort, and Friendly Service Staff!
review: Hello Climber54459778541-   Thank you for staying at DiamondHead! We are so happy to hear that Marika and Vicki were able to move you to a different room and that you were able to enjoy your stay. We appreciate you sharing your feedback with us and we will share your suggestion with our team. It was a pleasure having you as our guest!   Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Mostly disappointed in the cleanliness of beach.
review: Awesome property-something for everyone! Food is great, drinks are great. Free bike rental and nice beach location - low partying noise after 10 pm. Every room view is nice, too. Staff is wonderful and very attentive.  New restaurant is good with an amazing view of the beach and gulf

title: Diamond Head Resorts
review: Rick the Bellman was great. Friendly and helpful.. Heather the server at the pool was great  Staff overall was good all around.  Pool towels in rooms was a good touch.  The staff goes out of their way to be helpful.. BloodyMary Sunday is great at Caban`s  New restaurant was Coste` was upscale and very good change from other restaurants in the area...

title: Well we visited during spring break
review: Hello Storyteller161538-   Thank you for staying at DiamondHead! We truly appreciate your kind words and will be sure to share them with Rick, Heather and the rest of our team. It was a pleasure having you as our guest!   Best Regards,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Spring break 2k19
review: The rooms are spacious and clean. The beds are comfortable. The shower leaves a bit to be desired. I am short and had to stoop to wash my hair. My husband is tall and had to almost get on his knees. We loved the restaurant Conde’ although our waiter was either new or inexperienced with the menus. Cabanas was your usual beach front cafe. It is a bit dark and loud in the evening. And it was Spring Break so many loud inebriated folks. Not their fault.   The one thing we had the biggest problem with was the spotlight on the beach at night. We like to go out and see the stars and look at the ocean at night. The only thing we could do at night here was squint and we could have made shadow puppets in the sand by the light of the spotlight.   But it has spacious rooms, is clean, within…

title: Wonderful Time.
review: Hi terryb0516-   Thank for you for staying at DiamondHead! We are so happy to hear that you found the rooms to be clean and the our staff to be helpful and pleasant. Please know that we truly appreciate your feedback. We will certainly share your review with our team as we are continually looking for ways to improve the resort.   Best Regards,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: ANAZING
review: I grew up in SW Florida and i could stay anywhere I like and I choose to bring  my family here every year to visit. Diamond Head is very clean, great beach views, the staff are so friendly, and the food at the Cabana Cafe is delicious. I never have any reservations about staying here!

title: Spring Break 2019
review: From Barbara in reservations to Rick at the concierge the customer experience was welcoming & relaxing.  Every employee we interacted with were friendly & helpful.  Very nice resort.  From the rooms to pool to restaurants

title: Theft on the property
review: Hi BluRose1018- Your review brings us so much joy! We always try to exceed the expectations of our guests and we are thrilled that your experience reflected this. Thank you for taking the time to share your review. Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Spring training 2019
review: On the first day, we were robbed. I immediately went to the front desk and asked for a member of Security to contact me. We had a detailed description of the person, who they were travelling with, and very detailed info including an unusual and distinctive hair feature, and included the fact that they were captured on the hotel's security camera multiple times per day as they were staying at the resort and had been in and out of the resort several times during the day, passing by the security camera near the bar. We saw them.   Security never called. Instead, a female Asst Manager called the NEXT DAY to tell me, and I quote "they wouldn't be willing to take the time to watch the security tapes with us." My family and I could have VERY EASILY identified the woman so the Police…

title: Great time!
review: Hello 593MAvisitor- The safety of our guests and their belongings is always a concern to myself and the staff of DiamondHead. Safety and protection is a priority and it's the reason we have the resort monitored by security cameras. For the privacy of our guests, we do not watch or review footage with other guests. We always cooperate with law enforcement and will allow them to review footage as they see necessary for their needs. If you would like to further discuss this, you can contact me by calling the resort at 239-765-7654. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Family Vacation
review: The pool and Cabana area were excellent and the wait staff went out of their way to make sure everything was perfect. The new restaurant is worth the trip to watch the sunset and have an amazing meal.

title: Excellent
review: Excellent the location was perfect to walk in town the beach access was perfect the cleanliness was perfect the view from balcony was priceless I cannot wait to come back we loved walking in the town all activities like shrimp festival most of all we had coffee in room it was so easy and enjoyable

title: NICE PLACE BUT EXPENSIVE
review: Hello Trip24589732179- We are thrilled to hear that the cleanliness of your room was perfect and you thoroughly enjoyed the beautiful sunsets from the balcony. The shrimp festival is always a lot of fun and we're glad you enjoyed the festivities. Thank you for visiting and we look forward to having you back! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Emergency
review: This is a very nice resort but it is on the expensive side so bring your wallet. The staff is very professional and courteous. As you can guess it's not for young spring breakers who are partiers so that's nice. The pool and hot tubs are excellent. The hotel is conveniently located. The hotel wasn't full so I'm not sure there is enough parking when they do fill up.

title: Coste
review: Hello TOMINATOR2302- Thank you for taking the time to post a review and share your experience. We try to deliver the best beach experience possible and hope that the price aligned with with the quality. We are glad to hear that our staff was professional and courteous. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Customer Service Already Impressive
review: Rick was my hero for helping me out in a crisis. He was a lifesaver and I appreciated his generousity.  I would definitely choose Rick at Diamondhead if I ever needed help again! Thank you for helping a lady out!

title: Very relaxing stay
review: Stayed here on a business recognition trip.  Hotel is a little weathered on the outside but our room was very nice with a private screened in balcony.  Great sunsets on the West side.  I don;t think they are as private on the east side.  Nice pool with bar next to it.  They had a good band playing Friday and Saturday afternoons.  Beach access right at the bar.   Great fine white sand.  Elevators were very slow at times.  Overall a very relaxing trip.

title: Immaculate Rooms
review: Hello Tom- We are pleased that your time at DiamondHead was relaxing. We are glad you enjoyed some live music and we hope that you had plenty of time on the beach. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, we really appreciate learning about our guest's experience. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Wow, our stay at this beautiful facility was a SLAM DUNK
review: We have traveled throughout Florida but this was our first visit to Fort Myers Beach.  As we approached the hotel I thought maybe I had made a mistake. The beach is nice but the “strip” is crowded and might be a bit wild during peak season.  The hotel is a large, concrete high rise but don’t be put off by the exterior.  The lobby & restaurants have a clean, modern feel. When we entered our room we were pleasantly surprised.  We were on the top floor with a great view of the beach-definitely a “gulf view” room.  The furniture and fixtures were fresh and appeared to be new.  The cleaning staff deserves extra kudos (& good tips). Our room was immaculate. The room was spiffed every day and made for a nice oasis from the crowds.    Parking at the hotel was easy and even though the…

title: Vacation
review: Hi tashapVermont- Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. We are grateful for your feedback and pleased to hear that your visit was pleasant. We apologize for the poor WiFi signal and are in the process of upgrading our equipment to improve connectivity. We hope that your first visit to Ft. Myers Beach was fun and relaxing. Thank you for the recommendation, we really appreciate it! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Diamondhead visit
review: Beautiful facility, excellently maintained.  Well worth the cost.  The staff was very friendly, amenable, and knowledgeable.   All of our needs were immediately met.  RIGHT on the beach, beautiful views from the balcony (living room and bedroom view).  The onsite bar/restaurant had wonderful food with great healthy options at incredibly reasonable prices.  We felt like we were in heaven.

title: Awesome beachfront resort!
review: The rooms, grounds, amenities and services were all exceptional here!  We took the Dolphin jetski tour with Joe and he did a great job! The screened lanai is huge and offers great sunset views! The hotel has been recently remodeled and is well cared for.

title: Great Resort!
review: Hi Sandra H- We are delighted that you enjoyed the resort and the recent improvements that were made. The dolphin tours are amazing and its fun to see them in their natural habitat! We are so glad you had a great time and we really appreciate your review. Thank you for staying at DiamondHead! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Ok place to stay
review: This is a first class resort. Everything you need in one location. Staff is very polite and helpful. David at he bell desk is always happy and helpful.Pool and area around is always clean. Live music every night at the bar. What more could you ask for?

title: Awesome beach
review: Hi Nomad08350489661- We are glad you enjoyed your stay and found everything you needed right here at the resort! Your kind words mean a lot and we will be sure to share your compliments with our staff. Thank you for staying at DiamondHead, it was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: EZ-PEEZY
review: Hotel lobby and staff are nice. Rooms need some refreshing. My infant found a blood pressure pill (assuming from the previous guest) under the bedskirt- that god we grabbed it before he put it in his mouth. Called the front desk and they did nothing- did not even send someone up to clean the floors again. Good location being right on the beach. Felt nickel and dimed a bit as they charged for kids activities poolside and kept offering bingo (for cash), hermit crab races (for cash). They do not have easy access to towels for the pool- you have to wall to lobby to exchange every time and you have to keep count of the towels or you get charged. People can smoke poolside and on their balconies making it terribly unpleasant for nonsmokers/kids. We had to get off balcony and close…

title: Great Hotel and Great Location
review: The staff is very friendly and helpful. It was nice having bikes to use and the location is also perfect for walking the Fort Myers Beach area. For a hotel right on the beach they do an excellent job keeping everything very clean.

title: Great stay at the beach
review: Hello Navigate57482690940- We are pleased that the cleanliness and service at DiamondHead were two things that stuck out. We hope that you enjoyed the bicycles and had plenty of time to explore the beach. We appreciate your feedback, thank you for leaving us a review. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Guest Services Agent
review: The hotel is clean and up to date.  The room was spacious and comfortable.  Our room had a kitchen, living room, bathroom, and bedroom. The bed was pretty comfortable and we had no trouble sleeping on it.  The location is ideal for getting around Fort Myers Beach without the need to rent a vehicle.  The hotel has bikes that you can use for free.  The town/county runs a tram and trolley system.  It is a comfortable walk to Times Square. The only thing the kitchen was missing was a freezer in the refrigerator.  It was a mild annoyance as one night we took home dessert that came with ice cream.  The kitchen has enough basics that you can eat meals in.  We did not experience any issues with noise.  In fact, when the sliding glass doors were closed you couldn't hear the activity at…

title: Curious
review: Hi colleenj295- We are pleased to hear that you had a great stay at DiamondHead. We appreciate your thorough review. It is very helpful to other travelers and we are grateful for your feedback as well. We hope that you had plenty of time to relax outside and enjoy the beach and pool. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: loved location plus new Coste had great food ans service
review: Diamond Head is an amazing resort: Rick and John are top notch employees, as well as other staff! My mother owns a timeshare, and absolutely loves it at Fort Myers Beach! There are activities daily, they renovated the restaurant, called Coste, beautiful! It's amazing and excellent food! They are renovating the units this year, can't wait to see the changes! Very happy with Diamond Head! All employees are attentive to our needs! 5 Stars for sure!!

title: Great resort
review: My wife and I have stayed here before. I continue to believe it is the premier place to stay within walking distance of the downtown area where there are fun things to do.   On this visit we were greeted by Rick, the bell hop. He could not have been friendlier. Brought our bags to our room, and offered advice including his favorite musician (they had someone each night of our stay, and all were very good to excellent).

title: Great Beachfront Getaway
review: Hello wal2- Thank you for staying with us, we are thrilled that you had a nice stay. We are pleased that Rick added to your enjoyment and provided helpful and friendly service. I will be sure to share your compliments with him. Your review means a lot to us and we are grateful you took the time to post it. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Sketchy
review: DiamondHead was a great resort - beachfront with a fun bar and upscale restaurant.  Walking distance to Time Square which was awesome!!  Clean room - only has small refrigerator and no stove top.  Also, rooms are only one bedroom so a large family may have trouble fitting in one room.   Beach chairs/Umbrellas NOT included $30/day which was disappointing!!!  Pool was crowded everyday!!  Very clean nice resort !!

title: A MUST for Great Service, Awesome Food...Amazing Beach Views
review: Hello NewYorkJRG- Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and were pleased with the cleanliness of the resort. The beach chairs are offered by an outside vendor and apologize that this is not included. If you return again, we do offer rooms with a stovetop and would be happy to reserve one for you.
