Thank you for staying with us, it was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great vacation at Diamond Head Beach Resort
review: My husband and I and another couple came to the lounge area to enjoy the beautiful music we heard as we made our way through the hotel.  We entered the space in the lounge where we saw a young woman playing the keyboard and singing. She was extraordinary, and we wanted to sit and have cocktails and enjoy the music. As we made our way to a table, A large group of men stumbled to the singer and cat called and heckled her, grabbing at her mic, demanding to sing. The men were severely intoxicated and out of control, screaming and hollering, however the bartender continued to serve them drinks. It was very hard to hear the entertainer, and my friends and I felt extremely uncomfortable with the lack of management and order in this environment, so we left.  We own a home on island…

title: Valentine’s Day
review: This restaurant has put a new meaning to fine dining. The view of the sunset is breathe taking. Our server Heather had the best recommendations for food. Our entire group LOVED her personality. Will definitely be back and tell our friends to  ask for her in the future.

title: Amazing vacation!!
review: Hi Tucsonforme- Thank you for visiting Cōste, we are glad to hear that you had a pleasant dining experience and loved Heather's service. It would be a pleasure to have you back! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: And continue to go bacj place on ft myers beach
review: Favorite place to stay. Located right on the beach!! Walking distance to downtown. Enjoyed the restaurants and bars located in the resort. Best bartenders and wait staff. They also have a great pool area always clean and plenty of chairs.

title: Just as great as it was the first time
review: Hi GoPlaces68147065227- We are pleased to hear that you had a nice stay and enjoyed your dining experience while at the resort! We are delighted to hear that we are your favorite place to stay! We appreciate your review and we're pleased to have the opportunity to host you. Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Convinient stay
review: Nothing to say bad about the resort. Can't wait to go back. In a perfect location near all attractions. Great Restaurants. Really nice rooms  great pool area. We have been there many times over the years and continue to go back.

title: Fantastic room, great little bar downstairs, quick and easy access to jet skis on beach
review: We had a great time here for a 4 day vacation from Indiana.  There WAS a huge storm that rolled in so we were actually stuck in the room and hotel area much more than planned, however we enjoyed the little bar downstairs, breakfast and later evening entertainment in another little hotel lounge area, and when the weather was nice before the storm arrived and stayed, the walk out to the beach from our room was lovely.  We quickly found plenty of outdoor activities to do, and chose to jet ski right there which was awesome.  Our bed was comfortable and the suite we stayed in was very roomy.  Storm balcony was large and really neat to enjoy being out on to look over the ocean and out to the sky.  Bathroom was spacious. Kitchenette area was perfect too, for our leftovers and morning…

title: Wow what a sweet resort
review: Hi Juliane M- Thank you so much for visiting DiamondHead. We're sorry that the weather didn't fully cooperate but it sounds like you all made the best of it and still enjoyed some time on the beach. It's nice to hear that the accommodations and amenities were pleasant and we really appreciate the recommendation. We enjoyed having the opportunity to host you! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Winter Get Away
review: Checked in a week ago truthfully expecting a so so accommodations since I traded thru Interval and it was a place in Orlando. I was surprised to find I had a fabulous tenth floor ocean front room  well appointed with everything you could possibly need. The balcony was huge and actually had comfortable furniture. But by far the best here is the BEACH. Big white sand beach with calm water and shells galore. Also a great pool by the great Beach. Wonderful restaurant Coste on property and a casual bar restaurant for lunch. I would suggest just stay here the whole week except for Royal Scoop across the street no reason to go anywhere.

title: January 2019
review: Hello Carole- Thank you for choosing DiamondHead, we are glad the resort exceeded your expectations. We are glad you enjoyed the beach and had a pleasant dining experience as well. It is always nice to hear the perspective of our guests and we appreciate you taking the time to post a review. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great Resort and Location
review: Diamondhead is a great resort in a nice area right on the beach. The people are friendly and responsive. The rooms are great. There is a very large balcony with table 4 chairs and two loungers. The balcony is screened. They have  large two room suites with a nice kitchenette. Dorm size fridge, microwave and sink are perfect for travelers. A Publix is down Estero 2 miles and a Walmart is a few miles the other way.  We may be here at an off time but found the two bars quiet even though there were live performers. The weather was a bit chilly so that may also have affected the number of people out and about.  Only real negative is that when I booked the room back in early Sept for an end of January trip, I requested a higher floor away from elevator and ice machines. We were told…

title: Beachfront Island
review: This exquisite Beachfront Island Resort located on Ft. Myers Beach, Florida is the best!!.....All the amenities that you can imagine.... You will feel like a King or Queen for the week!!!....Lots to do just a walk a way.... You can even rent a car for going over the bridge... But, why bother when just before going over the bridge is the Fast Speed Ferry to Key West where you can revisit all the famous spots and getaways... You can even stay over night....as long as you book it ahead....The sands are like snow...The ocean waters are like Aqua....Trust me you can't go wrong...Just get the Beachfront Lanai condos.... Like floor numbers 9, 10, 11 & 12... I think the 10th floor room 1009 is the best because you can see the Oceanfront all day long as well as the west for those awesome…

title: Beautiful
review: Hello Lydia- Wow! Thank you so much for the kind words! We are thrilled that we could deliver such a pleasant vacation experience. Thank you for taking the time to write such a thorough review. It is very helpful for future guests and we appreciate your feedback as well. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope to have you back again! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great Breakfast, Well Run Resort
review: Diamondhead is a great resort.  The views of the ocean, the sunrise and the sunset are marvelous. My ocean front suite was spacious and comfortable. The screened - in balcony was also lovely. When the fire alarm sounded, two gracious young staff members came to walk me down the 12 flights of stairs from my suite. The new restaurant is beautiful with a grand view of the ocean.  The food is excellent and the portions are generous.It is mostly good American cuisine.  The braised short ribs were my favorite entree. The staff members at the resort are friendly and kind....several of them remember me from my previous visits. John, David and Rick are fantastic bellmen..all 3 are so helpful. Vikki at reception was friendly....as were other staff members...I am sorry that I don't…

title: Breakfast with a view.
review: Hello Rebecca- It was great to have you back again! We are so glad that you enjoyed your accommodations and dining experience. We apologize for the fire alarm and are glad that our team was helpful in assisting you out of the building. I will be sure to pass your compliments along to our staff. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope to see you again next year! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Awesome Long Weekend Getaway Before Christms
review: Breakfast was excellent, with great service from Pam. The beach area is nice, not too crowded. The pool area is good too......the vibe is definitely a more laid back. Not loud with kids screaming or rowdy groups. Great place for retirees, snowbirds, or just people who want to enjoy a beach resort without the chaos and noise found at many other places.

title: Always The Best on The Beach
review: We stay at Diamondhead couple times a year and always enjoy everything about it, the staff, the view and the service. The recently completed renovations and new menu at the resteraunt and bar are fantastic. It now makes Diamondhead a dinning destination on the beach. It's great to see the on-going upgrades and improvement to this already top notch hotel & resort!

title: Fantastic Place!
review: Hi billc255- It was so nice to have you back and we're pleased that we have earned your loyalty. We are continually trying to improve our operations to create the best possible experience for our guests. We're thrilled that you liked the new restaurant and room renovations. Thank you for staying with us, it was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Not this week!  Smells like fire
review: The views were breathtaking from ninth floor. We had a beach/pool view. Pool area was very nice. Beds very comfortable. My kids even slept on the lanai to hear the gulf waves all night. Staff is VERY kind. We enjoyed using the bicycles from the resort (included in price). Cabanas was a great place for happy hour with good specials. We will definitely be staying here again!

title: over priced! tourist trap! stay away!
review: Hi Deborah- Thank you for choosing DiamondHead, we are glad to hear that the accommodations were pleasing. Sleeping to the sound of the waves sounds amazing! We enjoy receiving guest feedback and we appreciate you taking the time to share your review. We look forward to your return visit! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Not impressed
review: Although I've stayed here several times this visit started out wrong. Our room was not ready at 3 which is check in time. They told me a couple more hours which was upsetting. Being exhausted travelers made it worse as we couldn't meet our friends as planned. They explained there was a fire earlier so they were running behind. We checked in just prior to five o clock and there were a lot of people in our shoes.  They didn't comp us or offer any freebies. I called Travelocity and at least they are sending me a coupon for next trip. Won't stay here again unless things get better. Hard to get service at the bar; easier at the pool. Daughter ordered room service they hung up on her twice. She persisted and had a great burger and the side salad was one of the best I ever had. Love…

title: great place to stay!
review: we love diamondhead and only stay here when we come to ft. myers beach.  the location is great, the people are marvelous, the rooms are wonderful, what more could you ask for!  you park your car (free parking) and never have to move it again until the day you leave.  i have never had a bad experience with this hotel and will continue to come back!

title: Best stay on Ft Myers Beach FL!
review: Hi jodibrittni- Thank you for staying at DiamondHead, your loyalty really means a lot to us. We are thrilled to hear that you have always had a great experience when visiting the resort. We too are excited for your return visit and look forward to having you as our guest! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Well located and nice view
review: We love this place! Our family comes down from MN every winter to get away for 10 days and it’s perfect!  Customer service is excellent, food is great, rooms with gulf view as great for sunsets. Cabena’s is a perfect spot to hangout next to the pool and the white sandy beaches!  One area to be improved: the spa!  We used to relax and use lots of spa services, and now with some remodeling, the spa has been reduced.  People still great!

title: Wonderful stay!
review: Hello FunMama1- We love having you all as our guests! We are glad that we can be your winter escape and add a little warmth to the season. Thank you for taking the time to share your review, we really appreciate your feedback! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Fantastic Stay
review: Very modern and well located hotel, beautiful view and big apartments with an equiped kitchen. The swimming pool was a bit crowded but nothing disturbing at all and the cleaning service was average. I would definetly come back.

title: Outstanding hotel
review: What a fantastic hotel! Beautiful rooms. Quiet and comfortable at night. The rooms were very spacious and had everything we needed.  Clean rooms and attentive staff! Fun activities poolside and great live music! Loved our stay!

title: Great time
review: Hi Camper601260- We are so excited to hear that you loved your stay! Our staff really enjoys the opportunity to serve our guests and we are happy that your interactions were pleasant. We are glad that the resort and rooms set the stage for an enjoyable beach retreat. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Wonderful Experience
review: Right on the beach. Walking distance to the Boardwalk and more bars and restaurants. Check in was very simple and fast. Our room was beautiful. 4th floor, directly over the pool and on the beach. Tastefully appointed and more of a condo rental than just a room. We had a one bedroom suite. A full kitchen with a two burner range top, a half refrigerator, a dishwasher, all the dishes, glassware, silverware, pots and pans...it was fantastic. Also included is a large balcony furnished with table, chairs and two lounge chairs. People all very friendly. The restaurant is in the process of being built. There is a bar/restaurant called Cabanas on the ground floor adjacent to the pool. Pool featured two hot tubs and plenty of chairs, tables and lounge chairs. The food is bar grub but…

title: Very Nice Overall
review: Hi Walgreenguy- We really appreciate you taking the time to write such a thorough review. This is very helpful to other guests and also keeps our team accountable. We are so glad that your accommodations were pleasing. Your recommendation means a lot to us and we hope that we will have the pleasure of serving you again in the future. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Right on the Beach
review: This is a wonderful hotel resort. Nice dining options onsite.  Huge pool, 2 hot tubs, instant beach access, great location.  This place has it all.  This was my first time ever visiting Fort Myers Beach. I am looking forward to coming back here soon. Rooms are very spacious and have great accommodations. I love their wristband keys such a great idea! I will definitely be back here soon all things being equal.

title: Big and Beautiful
review: We stopped here on our road trip from  Florida Keys to Kissimmee got there quite late due to traffic and they were nice enough to let us have a late check out. Beautiful views from both sides of the hotel, the double bed was huge and the kids had a pull out sofa bed. Hotel room was like a flat with a kitchenette and dining room. Wish we could have stayed longer the beach was amazing and full access of the swimming pool with complimentary towels. Thankyou.

title: Resort fees
review: Hi roxyboxer- We are so glad that you could stay with us while passing through. Our beaches are beautiful and we hope you had a little time to enjoy them. We are glad the accommodations were comfortable and would love to have you back in the future. Thank you for sharing your review, we really appreciate it! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: great resort!
review: Nice hotel right on the beach. The rooms are spacious and clean. Staff is great. The only downside is the resort fees.  I wouldn't  mind them if they didn't  charge you an extra $ 30 per day for beach chairs. It seems pretty low class .

title: Top notch all the way
review: Hi Tom- Thank you for taking the time to share your review on TripAdvisor. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our beachfront resort and our staff was great. Beach rentals are provided by an outside vendor and are not a part of our resort operations. Our resort fee includes amenities like use of bicycles, resort-wide WiFi, parking, daily newspaper, pool towel service and in-room coffee service. We apologize if this was miscommunicated and caused any inconvenience. Thank you for staying at DiamondHead, it was a pleasure to have you! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: The visit was for a Family Gathering fo about 50 persons.
review: stayed at diamond head three nights and it was great!!! from the hotel it’s self to customer service! simply the best. to top off everything is walking distance! the pool is a good size, and has two hot tubs as well.

title: Clean and convenient, but nothing special
review: We were a little disappointed in our stay at the DiamondHead Beach Resort.  There were just so many less than optimal details that should not have been at a hotel that presents itself as a deluxe type hotel.  For one thing the design of the building is such that only about a third of the balconies are really private -- we were in a corner room and we could not only see into the balcony of the room adjacent, but into the room too.  A kitchen area, with dishes (nice), but no wine glasses??  The hair dryer was one of those tiny things that I take when I am traveling and need to bring my own.  These may seem petty, but the hotel bills itself as fancy, charges fancy prices, and these little things add up.  They also should reduce prices until they get the construction done on the…

title: Best place to stay if you ask me!
review: Hi Betsey- We apologize that your experience at DiamondHead did not meet your expectations. We want each and every guest to have an amazing stay so this is very troubling to us. We are sorry that our balconies did not offer the privacy you hoped for and we do our best to accurately portray the experience in our online photos. We appreciate your feedback in regards to the room amenities and will discuss these as a team. Thank you for your patience as we remodel our restaurant. We are working as quickly as possible to open an entirely new beachfront dining experience for our guests. Your feedback is so important, thank you for taking the time to share it. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Lovely, Awesome StayCation
review: The rooms were clean and beautiful with amazing views. The staff were friendly and helpful and we will definitely be coming back to stay here on our next trip down! Thank you to all the staff for their restaurant recommendations and making this place feel like home away from home.

title: Wonderful Sunset
review: Hi debbytyron7- We are pleased that our staff was hospitable and made you feel at home. Guest service is a top priority so this really means a lot to us. We are glad that the accommodations were pleasing and would love to have you back again! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Best Resort in Fort Myers Beach
review: Check in was easy breezy, Thanks to Mr. Nathan. The room was great. The pool and Gulf view was awesome. I Love the set up. Tile floors throughout is a plus, not the old nasty carpet. Screened in balcony a double plus, (No bugs). Loved the waterproof wrist keys. No losing, or looking for card keys. Had an maintenance request. The maintenance guy Mr. Frank was at my room before I made it there from the Lobby. Very efficient. The other staff i encountered was nice and friendly. Hilton & Embassy step your game up.

title: Just Fab!
review: Stayed here in March of 2017.  It was awhile ago but when we went it was great.  Stayed here for 3 nights. Wonderful suites with beautiful beach and ocean views. Very clean, nicely decorated, friendly staff. Breakfast was very good. Cabanas for lunches and drinks was fantastic. Walking distance to shopping, other restaurants and entertainment. Pool was nice but we mostly stayed on beach. Lots of activities there and nearby.  We would stay again. My only complaint would be we didn’t win the draw prize of a free 2 nights. ☹️ Oh well.

title: Disappointing
review: Hi ajbaby2016- We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your visit last year and we would love to have you back! We have continued to improve the resort and are in the process of creating an entirely new beachfront dining experience that will open later this fall. If you are considering a return visit, be sure to check our website for the latest promotions. It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we hope to host you again in the future. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Weekend getaway
review: We just returned today August 11,2018 from a week stay at DiamondHead. The positives, our room was very nice except for the ironing board which was falling apart and a big tear in the screen on the balcony. The employees were all very nice. The down side, we arrived late Sunday night and got to sleep around 2am. At nine am we were awaken by sledge hammers and other extremely loud construction noise. The noise wasn't as bad Thursday and Friday but the other days it was terrible. We wanted to relax, take in the sun on our balcony etc. The pool was half closed off which pretty much meant not to many chairs to sit in. We went to Cabanas to listen to the music during the day but couldn't hear the talented singers singing due to construction. Needless to say you could not go to the…

title: Great for couples or singles
review: Hi TrippyPa- We are truly sorry for that you did not have a pleasant experience at DiamondHead. We apologize for the construction noise. We are working to add a new beachfront dining experience for our guests and regret that it was an inconvenience. The red tide has been incredibly difficult for us as it has been unpredictable and inconsistent. Guest satisfaction is always our priority and we would never knowingly try to fool people into visiting the resort. We appreciate you taking the time to post a review. Your feedback is very important and will be discussed with our entire management team in our daily meeting.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Construction
review: We booked this hotel for a long weekend get away before school started.  Unfortunately, due to no fault of the resort, there was a red tide.  The beach was compromised due to dead sea life and the heavy equipment being used to clean up the mess.  The smell was awful.  Aside from that, we did find some issues with the resort.  1.  check in time is listed as 3PM.  We arrived at 2:40 and our room was still not ready.  We did not get to check in until 3:45.  2.  One of the days we returned to our room at almost 4PM and it still had not been serviced by housekeeping.  These 2 factors were disappointing due to the fact that the resort was not at capacity.  Also, the restaurant/lounge were closed due to construction.  The work was being done Monday - Friday so this also meant that 1/2…

title: Wonderful hotel on Ft Myers Beach
review: My husband and I stayed for a few days last week - the hotel was great! The service was excellent, the hotel was very clean - the rooms were updated and very clean. We chose a beachfront property since we love to watch the water - a little disappointing that the water was brown - I heard that Lake Ockechobee was opened to reduce the levels and it affected all of the surrounding waters. Not the hotels fault at all. So we stuck to the pool. It was clean and refreshing - we were there off season so it was not overly crowded - but I can bet during peak season the pool would be a little small and overcrowded. There is construction going on - the main restaurant is down for renovation - will be beautiful when it is done. A little noise - but nothing we could not overlook. Would…

title: Great place to stay
review: Hello lahogrider- We are pleased to hear that your recent stay was great. The water quality was not great last week and we appreciate your understanding. We are working with local government to fight against future water releases from Lake O. Our new restaurant will be complete later this fall and will offer an amazing new beachfront dining experience. We would love to have you as our guests again in the future! Thank you for choosing DiamondHead. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: July 19-23
review: Just visited July 22nd through the 26th 2018. Although there's some construction going on and unfortunately the beachfront water was brown due to circumstances beyond the control of the hotel everybody at the hotel was very accommodating we would definitely stay there again.

title: Spacious rooms and friendly staff!
review: Hi Linda- We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found our staff to be accommodating. We are in the process of adding a new beachfront dining experience and apologize for the construction. It would be a pleasure to have you back to the resort again! Thank you for taking the time to share your review. Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Looking for place
review: Another great trip to DiamondHead! Happy to see Randy and Carly still working the bar. They really make the place feel like home and do a great job keeping up with the bar rushes. We did the jet ski Dolphin tour this trip with Holiday Water Sports, Joe did an excellent job guiding us despite some rough waters. We had a blast! In spite of some bumps with our trip, room wasn’t ready, construction and getting stuck in an elevator (after which, my son refused to get back on) I still review a 5 because of the great customer service we received. Just another reason why we will keep returning. Thanks again!

title: Under construction
review: The hotel is decent and has a good restaurant and bar.  Only complaint I have is we were not told about the construction going on when we booked.  It's so loud we couldn't really enjoy the pool or the kids activities. I see now they are offering a discounted rate on their website but not sure if it is worth it.  They did credit us $100 at check out but that wasn't fair IMO.

title: Good...but expected a bit more
review: Hi Adam- We sincerely apologize for any construction noise that disrupted your stay. The demolition process went past the contractor's projected date and we did not anticipate it lasting this long. Our new restaurant will bring an amazing new dining experience to the resort but unfortunately we had to make some noise first. We want each and every guest to have a fun and relaxing experience. We regret that this was not the case for you and your family. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and post a review. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Best hotel on Fort Myers Beach
review: There is no doubt that the hotel is situated in a perfect location- steps away from the beach and beautiful sunset. I understand that the hotel is undergoing construction and renovations and for that reason will be generous...but the room was definitely outdated and the hallway a little ominous (dark). The cleanliness was...ok.

title: Great location with screened in balconies!!
review: Hi Piglet1981- We are glad that you had a good experience but we wish that it had been excellent. We apologize for the inconvenience of our renovation project and hope that it did not disrupt your stay. Thank you for sharing your feedback in regards to areas that we can improve. Guest feedback is very important and we are committed to always improving our service and facilities. Thank you for staying with us, it was a pleasure having you as our guest. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: VERY GOOD RESORT
review: Absolutely wonderful location right on the beach, great restaurant and bar!   Pool was so refreshing!    Service was outstanding!   Could not have asked for a better location.   No need for a car you can walk everywhere.   Loving this hotel.  Patio and room was beautiful!!!   Location is right in the center!!!  Would definitely recommend to families or couples ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

title: True Beach front.
review: Many places advertise beach view but this is truly beach front. I would recommened spending the extra amount and getiing the beach front room. Great service from all staff. We had a great stay with no issues. Will be back soon.

title: Another Great Stay
review: Hi Lucycat727- We are so happy that you enjoyed our beachfront accommodations. You can't really get any closer to the beach! We are glad that you were satisfied with your service and we look forward to your return visit! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Highly recomend!
review: Another stay at this terrific place.  I have stayed here several times and continue to love it.!  This is my favorite place to stay.  The service and amenities are top notch.  They have done some remodeling and it looks awesome.  The rooms are spacious and have great views.  The staff are always super friendly and helpful.  The food and drinks are great!

title: lovely location.....
review: Hi Angie- We are pleased to hear that you had another terrific stay at DiamondHead! We really appreciate your trust and loyalty. It was a pleasure having you back and we hope to see you again soon! Thank you for taking the time to share your review, it means a lot to us! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: First Class all the Way
review: This was our 3rd visit to Diamondhead.  The rooms are so spacious, clean, amazing decks. All the staff is friendly and very accomodating   I love the location right on beach and walking distance to everything.

title: 40th Brithday Couples Trip
review: We had 7 couples that went down here to celebrate our 40th birthday in April, and we had an outstanding time!  Service was excellent.  Suites are perfect for couples that want to have some food and drinks in rooms. Screened in patios are incredibly relaxing!  We all had a fantastic time on the beach, the beach bar and easily walked to plenty of other bars and restaurants nearby.

title: Best. Birthday. Ever!
review: Hi Chris- We are thrilled that you chose DiamondHead for the location of your birthday celebrations! We hope that you all had fun and enjoyed some rest and relaxation as well. It was a pleasure having you all and we hope that you will stay with us again in the future! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great vacation spot!
review: The room was BEAUTIFUL! We booked it for my 23rd birthday to have a getaway from all the puppy stress I've been dealing with at home. I was unaware of their policy that you must be 25 or older to check in but, Lauren gave us a chance and I thank her so much. The view was incredible. Everything was clean and neat. The hot tub was perfect and the drinks from the bar next to it were amazing. The staff, from the front desk to the woman in the pool hut, were friendly and helpful. Ordered room service in the morning before check out and it was better than expected. Definitely have to do this again!

title: Fun in the sun
review: Hi Nicole- We are thrilled that you enjoyed your birthday weekend at DiamondHead! We hope that you had time to relax and unwind while visiting the beach. It would be a pleasure to have you back again! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Clean, friendly, and awesome food and drinks!
review: Room was great - loved kitchen so we could fix a little breakfast each day! Wonderful restaurants within walking distance - food at pool bar was really good, grouper sandwich was fantastic. Drinks a little pricey but good - not much liquor in frozen ones😐 major problem for us was smoking is allowed around pool. I would have given this 5 stars but could not stand the smoke😝

title: The Best on the Beach!
review: We visit Diamondhead Resort a few times a year and It's always great. Their new renovations make it better than ever. The hotel, the entire staff and the view are top notch in every way. Make reservation early, Diamondhead Resort is always full.

title: Nothing to Write Home About
review: Hi Bill- We are flattered! "Best on the Beach" really means a lot and we are so happy that you enjoy the resort. We are glad you like the new renovations and we have some more exciting updates that we will be announcing soon. Hope to see you again soon! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Outstanding service in the lounge and restaurant
review: First, the people were very friendly.  None of the employees were nasty, and quite the contrary.  All were extremely nice.    Our first bad impression was on the first day.  Check in was supposed to be at 3pm and we were finally allowed in well past this due to the cleaning crew being behind schedule.  Waiting in the lobby isn’t a whole lot of fun.    Secondly, when we finally got in our room, we couldn’t use it since the recently mopped floor remained wet for about 3 hours.  No one told us to crank the A/C in order to dry the very wet floor until we brought it to the front desk’s attention.  Third, after waiting a long time for our luggage to be delivered to our room, we eventually gave up after 1 1/2 hours.  I retrieved my own luggage after ours was misplaced somehow.  When I…

title: fun place
review: Hi Sean- We are incredibly sorry that your experience on the first day was disappointing. We have very thorough procedure in place to deliver the highest level of cleanliness to our guests. We are sorry that this process took longer than anticipated and delayed your check in. We also apologize for the wet floors and oversight with your luggage. This was our mistake. We are glad things improved and we appreciate your patience. Thank you for sharing your feedback as it help us identify how we can better serve our guests. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Fabulous stay for our family
review: I celebrated my 40th Birthday here at Diamond Head and Tracy, Cassie & Janet went out of there way to make it special!  I have been coming here since my 20’s and my wife and I always enjoyed ourselves..... Great Job to the Restaurant Staff!!!!

title: Wish we could have stayed longer
review: Francis was so helpful at getting us two rooms at this amazing hotel. The venue is perfect: right on the beach, a pool and two hot tubs and a bar on the beachfront. The bed was great, the kitchenette well stocked and the balcony wonderful in the sun; only strange element is the sliding door to the bathroom but I suspect that’s to save space. We wished we could have stayed longer; we'll just have to come back!

title: Ok, but overpriced
review: Hi Portia- Thank you for taking the time to share your review on TripAdvisor. We are so pleased that you had a great stay at DiamondHead. It was a pleasure to have you as a guest and we can't wait for you to come back! Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Awesome Resort
review: Nice place, but just not quite worth the price in my opinion.  The pool is nice, and the servers friendly.  It was challenging at times to get their attention.  My biggest complaint really is the beach.   The company that rents chairs, jet skis and etc. takes all of the front row spots on the beach.  So you either have to rent a chair from them, or take a spot back behind everyone.   Otherwise nothing bad, it just isn't as amazing as I might expect for the price.

title: Everything You Need for a Beach Resort
review: Hi jaco0268- Delivering value to every guest is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback. We are sorry to hear that you were frustrated with the attentiveness of our pool staff. I will meet with this team and see how we can better serve our guests. We wish that your experience had been amazing. We appreciate your feedback and rely on guest comments to continually improve our operations. Thank you for taking the time to share your review. Best Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Winter Getaway
review: We stayed here for our 40th wedding anniversary trip. This resort is top notch. They upgraded us because of our anniversary and the room was excellent. The room was clean and the bed was wonderful. The weather was spot on which meant that because the balcony is screened in we could leave the sliding glass doors open the entire time. We had a great view from our room as well. All of the staff that we encountered were super friendly and lots of fun to be around, especially the bartender.  The only compliant that I have is the pressure from the shower head could have been better.

title: Fun at Cabanas
review: So much fun at Cabanas Bar @ Diamondhead on Fort Myers Beach. We always have a great time at Cabanas. Dylan is the BEST. He always makes our visit fabulous. Also love that they now have Sheena Brooks performing. Perfect day!!!

title: Staying at Diamondhead made our vacation perfect
review: We felt very welcomed at Diamondhead and saw the staff go above and beyond to help us.  We had been at a poor hotel and needed a change, the staff went out of their way to help us get a room and provide support to have a room be available right away.  We know we will always stay at Diamondhead when we return annually or more to Ft. Myers - thanks Diamondhead staff for taking care of us.

title: Close to everything
review: Hi Z8857FEjulies- It was a pleasure having you as a guest and we are thrilled that we could be a part of your vacation. We are happy that we could provide the accommodations you deserve while visiting Ft. Myers Beach. Thank you for choosing DiamondHead and we look forward to your return visit!! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: AWESOME RESORT
review: Great location. Beautiful pool and easy access to beach.   Rooms were very comfortable and beautiful view of beach. Enjoyed poolside restaurant with outdoor bar especially when there was was afternoon showers.

title: Great staff!
review: Hi Dona555- We are happy that you enjoyed our accommodations, beachfront location and Cabanas Beach Bar. Those afternoon showers do go well with a delicious drink and some good company. Thank you for choosing DiamondHead and taking the time to share your review! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great girls trip!
review: My mom, sister and I stayed at Diamond Head for a week and loved every minute. The location is perfect - right on the beach and within walking distance of everything you need while not being right in the middle of all the loud busyness. The restaurant / bar on site is great for poolside cocktails and live music in the early evening. Randy, John and others provide great service. Can't go wrong staying here!

title: Best Beach Spot
review: Hello Sarah- We appreciate you choosing DiamondHead and we are thrilled that your girls trip was great! Beach, cocktails and live music - sounds like you had the right recipe for a relaxing week. We are happy that you had a experience and hope you'll consider us again when your travels bring you back to Fort Myers Beach! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Pool bar
review: Extremely pleased.  We come here every year!   Can’t beat the atmosphere and service.  Walking distance to all the hot spots.  We loved it so much we bought a time share!   Try the fish taco’s!   Jon is the best!

title: Best beach
review: We are happy to have you as part of the family of great vacation club owners and look forward to seeing you each year! We have an amazing staff and I'm happy that Jon was so accommodating! I will be sure to pass along your kudos. Warm Regards, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: We can't wait to return!
review: We love Johnathan at the bar.been coming for 5 years and love seeing him each time.best ever.love everything at diamond head.bar food is great, access to the beach and times square within walking distance

title: Lunch
review: My daughter, sister, 2 grandsons and I had lunch there Feb 14 th, 2018, the three adults ordered a frozen cocktail to celebrate the day.  I ordered a chicken sandwich and my youngest grandson ordered chicken strips.  The 3 others ordered non chicken items.  I discovered, after 2 bites, my chicken was raw.   It was like biting into an apple.  Then we quickly discovered my grandsons chicken tenders were also raw.  They offered a credit of $15.00 for two frozen drinks.  They asked what I wanted in exchange.  I ordered a hamburger well done, which I was charged for.     In addition of my grandson ordering something else, which I was charged for.   I was then presented with a bill of $85.00  excluding the tip.   It totally ruined my appetite and ruined our lunch. I would NEVER order…

title: Honeymoon
review: Hi Kathy- This is not the type of experience we aim to deliver at DiamondHead and we are sorry that yours was unpleasant. Guest feedback is important to us as we are continually trying to make our service the best it can be. I will share your experience with our staff so we can be sure it is addressed accordingly. Thank you for taking the time to share your review. Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: A Beach Resort on the beach
review: This hotel was FANTASTIC!!! Would highly recommend for couples get away. Not many (if any) kids. Great bar on the beach. Rooms were really nice, as was staff. Great location - walking distance to Main Street and other fun, local bars. Room has mini fridge which makes it easy to save money on some food and drinks. Apartment-like setup with balcony door in both LR and BDRM. Bathroom access from both bdrm and kitchenette area. Really a great place to stay - we will definitely be back!!!

title: Strange place
review: Hi Lauren- We are pleased that your honeymoon at DiamondHead was FANTASTIC! It sounds like you had a very relaxing time on Fort Myers Beach and it was a pleasure having you. We look forward to your return visit and wish you the best as you begin this new chapter together. Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Wonderful location, beautiful rooms
review: We were pleasantly surprised by Diamondhead Beach Resort.  The staff welcomed us and provided complimentary drinks since our room was not quite ready.  The room was modern with a pleasant beach-type decor and mini kitchenette.  The floor was a light gray/white tile and the interior decor all matched.  The bathroom had a single sink, good walk-in shower and was large enough for both of us.  We had a screened in balcony the length of the room.  The screened in idea is great, it is possible to leave the doors open for fresh air.  We ate at the bistro on the beach as well as the dining room and both the food and service were good.  The staff is friendly;  they really care about the hotel and the guests.  Parking is abundant.  The bell staff is helpful with parking, luggage, and…

title: Fantastic location
review: We stayed at the DiamondHead Beach Resort for a night and our only regret is that we didn't stay longer.   Our room was upgraded for free so we had a beautiful view of the beach from the 2nd floor.  The heated pool wasn't busy at all, it's a great place to take a dip if the ocean is too cold.  The hotel is right on the beach and there are plenty of options for food and entertainment - we had breakfast at the hotel and cannot recommend the cooked breakfast enough.   Would definitely stay at the DiamondHead if we were in the area again.

title: Great Place
review: Hi jayleemiguel We agree, one day just isn't enough time to take it all in! We would love to have you back and appreciate the kind words! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great beach front!
review: This place is nice and every room has a view. Lots of amenities, pool, bar, restaurant, 2 jacuzzis  etc.... The bed is comfy and the room is very spacious. It’s close to tons of restaurants and it’s on the beach. You can walk the beach down to other restaurants and bars. They also have water sport rentals. Great place will only stay here when traveling to Fort Myers!

title: Short Vacation to Florida
review: Hi Reese_ml- We are honored to be the only place you will stay when traveling to Fort Myers Beach! Thank you for sharing your experience! Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: weddomg
review: Really enjoyed my quick winter get-away!  The staff was very friendly.  Hotel is maintained & clean.  Has pretty much all you need including a great location.  All rooms have a beachfront view, some sunrise, some sunset or some with both.  It is a time share if you are interested, but they did not pressure only mentioned it. Location is a short walk to the "time square" area. In February it is more of a go getting retiree crowd, They are friendly, fun & over take the pool area. Our room did not have a tub, only walk in shower which is what I think they all had.  Our room had a separate living room with an efficiency kitchen; it was great even had serving ware for 4. Screened in patio with furniture & access from living area & bedroom.  Does have restaurants & bar on site.   Many…

title: Smoky Haze
review: Nice enough room but both rooms below us had people smoking on their balconies and drifted directly to our balcony and into our room. Property is listed as non-smoking. Called front desk and the only option they offered was moving us to another room. Had to completely repack our suit cases and go down the hall to our new room. Could see the people on both balconies smoking from our new room and management failed to do anything about it. Talked to the manager the next morning and she acted like they had done us a favor by having us move which was a huge hassle. None of the staff seemed to care about our problem. Would never go back to this timeshare facility. We had done Priceline and this place hit us up for an additional "resort fee" that was not disclosed.

title: Had a Great View
review: Dear Tim,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. At DiamondHead, we are highly dedicated to providing each and every guest with a comfortable, enjoyable experience, and we sincerely apologize for any issues you recently encountered regarding our smoking policy. I can assure you that the experience you have described is completely atypical to a standard stay at DiamondHead, and we hope that if your travels bring you back to our area, you will give our facilities another try. Again, we apologize for any frustrations you encountered. Please don’t hesitate to reach out directly if you would like to discuss your experience further.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: We Loved It
review: Stayed here one weekend and had a great time. We had a room facing toward the beach so it was very relaxing to watch the water from the porch. However like others have mentioned it is noisy if you are near the pool which was very irritating at night. Other than that everything was great. We had great service and both the bar and the pool and the food and drinks where very good and reasonably priced. The room was also a very comfortable size with a mini fridge and dishwasher included.

title: Holiday vacation
review: What a great experience! The suite overlooking the pool and Gulf of Mexico was very nice and large.  Great bathroom, bedroom, living room, and small efficiency kitchen.(If you want to cook a full meal this is not the place) They have an outdoor pool and two hot tubs, three places to eat. Including a beach bar and patio dining.  All the meals we ate here were very good. The staff was outstanding in all respects when we had a light bulb that burned out and reported it to visitor services someone was up to take care of it in about 10 minutes. We can not say enough good things about DiamondHead Beach Resort, it would rate as one of the top three timeshare resorts we have stayed at. We definitely would go back, and you should enjoy it when in the area.(They do take non-timeshare…

title: Noisy
review: The resort and amenities were very nice. The Cabana bar And grill was convenient and the food was pretty good. Room service was really pretty quick for a resort this size. The pool and hot tub were nice. Our ocean view room was very very nice.

title: NICE PLACE AND QUIET
review: Very friendly service, staff constantly saying hello.  Rooms very neat, two televisions provided, fridge, microwave, flatware, silverware,  coffee pot, and glasses.Both rooms and property very clean. I believe there was also free parking since I took a cab from the airport.  Every room has at least a partial view of the Gulf of Mexico. Terrace is huge with loungers ,tables and chairs with a light and screened in porch.  You can eat all meals there, on the main floor and beach level. Food is a tad bit more in price compared to other places nearby. The main place to eat on the main floor had predominantly fish dishes but there was a burger and 2 steak options.  The pool area has a tendency to get crowded, free towels provided and games played through the day. Pool area has a quick…

title: I really liked it
review: Dear Z2526BTthomasf,  Thank you for staying at DiamondHead and providing us with your feedback. We’re happy to hear you had such an enjoyable stay. From our friendly team members to the cleanliness of our accommodations, it sounds like your stay was top notch! We appreciate your comments and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Clean, friendly, great location.
review: We stayed for three nights at the DiamondHead Beach Resort, and I really liked it. I would've given the view from our suite five-stars on its own, the weather was also perfect (for early November), the beach was nice and the staff was also a five-star experience.. very nice and really helpful.  The only drawback and the reason I must give DiamondHead four stars, despite there being so many five-star attributes to the resort is that fact that there was so much noise coming from a fan at the ground floor (we were living on the 7th floor). The noise wasn't bad when everything was locked up, but let's be real here.. When you have an oceanview balcony, why would you sit inside?  All in all- very good! I really liked it.

title: Great hotel with amazing views
review: Dear Lars,  Thank you for staying at DiamondHead Beach Resort. We’re happy to hear you had an overall enjoyable stay, from our beachfront location to our friendly team members. Please accept our sincere apologies for any noise issues you were caused during your stay. We can certainly understand your frustrations and hope that if your travels bring you back to our area, we will have the ability to welcome you again as our valued guest and have the opportunity to provide you with the high level of service and personal attention that DiamondHead is known for.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Nothing to write home about
review: Very pleased with our experience. Rooms and grounds were clean, drinks/food was good and not too pricey, service was always with a smile.  Just a note - the ramp from the bar to the beach could use some repair, as we saw two people fall. Screws are sticking out and "sticky pad" needs to cover the whole ramp, not just part of it.   Also - when I was called about visiting their time share options while there, I told the woman on the phone that I couldn't talk because I was at work and she replied, "Well, so am I." What??

title: Love the location and amenities but HATE the cheap bed
review: I prefer to start mt reviews with the positive aspects of the hotel. First the staff was pleasant from Steve the Parking guy to the dinning attendants. The location was 0.6 miles from the boardwalk and there's a ton of dining options within walking distance. More surprising was that the dining options at the property. The food was surprisingly well priced for onsite dining. Most dishes were competitively priced with local restaurants and made going out for a meal a much harder choice.  As a party of two the king sized room was perfectly sized. It featured a king bed in the bedroom, a separate well designed bathroom, and a living room with a kitchenette featuring a dishwasher. Our room (1204) faced east and provided a beautiful view of the sunrise and the beach. The balcony was…

title: 25th Anniversary Get away
review: Dear MD4383,  Thank you for leaving us such a thorough review. While we’re glad you enjoyed our resort, we’re sorry to hear the bed was not to your liking. Guest comfort and satisfaction remain our top priority and we hope that if your travels bring you back to our area, we will have the opportunity to welcome you again as our valued guest and improve upon your recent visit.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: LBA
review: We live about an hour and a half away but really wanted to celebrate our anniversary but not waste a lot of time driving.  This place was phenomenal.  The weather was absolutely stunning, warm in the days and cool in morning and evening.  The suite we stayed in was immaculate and the balconies overlooking the beach in the bedroom and family room were one of my favorite features.  My hubby and I thoroughly enjoyed long walks on the beach in the morning and evening (I think we walked about 10 miles every day).  We ate out once a day and loved being able to walk everywhere.  There were many beach side restaurants within 1/2 a mile of the hotel.  Everything was perfect and we are already planning our next trip.  While speaking with some locals, they did comment we came at the…

title: Ft Myers Beach Best
review: Dear Kristen-Colin,  Thank you for leaving us such a beaming review. We’re so flattered you chose to celebrate such a special occasion at our resort and are already planning a return visit! We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Rude manager ruined our family vacation
review: Always love staying at DH ! All the staff is exceptional ! Kim in Chloes Lounge makes the best Chocolate Martinis on the earth ! She is so fun and gets your drinks in a jiffy !  Love John (bell man), and John(waiter) Derek, Tracey, Randy, Yvonne, Rudy, Nathan, Carly and Wendy! The fact their employees stay so long says a lot for DH.! I've been coming since 2010 and have enjoyed every visit !

title: Great property
review: Another great stay.  Checked in on a rainy Saturday evening and received a 4th floor room.  Room was nice but realized in morning that when you when out on balcony that AC's were right below and really loud. Called front desk and Vicki immediately said she would change our room. 11th floor. What fabulous service.  Our stay was great, location great, and wonderful staff.  A joy to see that Bellman David is still there.  He is truly outstanding.  Will definitely return.

title: A walk on the beach to start your day
review: Dear Joe,  Thank you for staying at DiamondHead and providing us with your comments. We’re happy to hear you had an enjoyable stay, from our friendly, accommodating team to our convenient, beachfront location. Your intent to return means a lot to us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Excellent property!
review: First time to this resort and loved it!  You can't beat the location- right on the beach and within walking distance of multiple restaurants and the boardwalk area. Nice bar and restaurant n site  with outdoor seating available. Plenty of chairs and towels at the pool along with friendly servers from the bar.  Although we were in a suite that hasn't been renovated in a while it was extremely clean and has been kept in good condition. Had a couple of issues with a light and the cooktop but both were taken care of quickly. Everyone who worked there was pleasant  and helpful. We definitely will be back!

title: Fantastic Resort
review: Dear pak4489,  Thank you for staying at DiamondHead Beach Resort. From our convenient, beachfront location to our friendly team members, we could not be happier we met all your expectations and that you intend to join us again! Please feel free to reach out to us directly when booking your next stay and we will certainly do our best to place you in an upgraded unit.   Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Fantastic!!!
review: You will never need to leave the property! Our room was beautiful, with a king size bed, kitchenette and the ocean view was wonderful. Also has 2 restaurants, Chloe’s and Cabanas. Also a Spa! This property is on the main strip of Fort Myers beach. Close to Time Square with many local shops.

title: Saved our getaway.
review: We originally had reservations right down the street from Diamond head at a cheep place, needless to say, we were not happy with our room. My better half was an emotional wreck. I told her not to worry, and i would take care of it. We immediately left the place, took a right, and another right, into the parking lot of DiamondHead. We were met by Dave and we explained our situation. He said he would do everything he could to help us out. It was approx 8 pm on a Monday night and we only had till Thursday for our get away. We wanted a beach front room and there was only 1 available and was room 109. Dave even showed us the room. The staff was amazing and we were treated like gold. The Resort itself is super clean and beautiful. There are two hot tubs and a big size pool and views…

title: The Best On FMB
review: Dear crnttkns,  Thank you for staying at DiamondHead and leaving us such a beaming review. It’s a huge compliment to us that we’ve secured such a positive, lasting impressive. From our friendly team members to our on property amenities, it sounds like your stay was top notch! We appreciate your kind words and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Cabana bar tops
review: We stay at Diamondhead several time a year and always enjoy the hotel, the staff and the beach. The recent renovations make the hotel even nicer. Year after year, Vicki at the front desk & David at the Bellstand are terrific.

title: Great Beach Access
review: Dear Bill,  Thank you for staying at DiamondHead and providing us with your comments. Nothing makes us happier than guests who frequent our resort and continuously have wonderful experiences. I look forward to sharing your kind words with Vicki, David, and the rest of our team and hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great Vacation
review: Staff friendly and fun. Carly was fantastic whether waiting poolside or bartending and  especially for staying late for Cubs fans (since strangely rooms didn't have tbs,.,) during our stay. Food is good. Fantastic massage at spa. Rooms and grounds clean. Security patrols after dark. Location is great for all island restaurants, bars, activities etc.  would rate this 5 on cleanliness,location and service but form won't let me?

title: DiamondHead is our happy place
review: We absolutely love DiamondHead. The rooms are super clean. We love the screened in balcony. The staff is so friendly!! Cabanas has great food. Kim in Chloe's lounge is amazing!! She make great drinks and really makes you feel special. Make sure you stop in and visit Kim  for fantastic drinks!!

title: Kim at Chloe's lounge is great!!!
review: Dear kellybB1893FU,  Thanks for leaving us such a flattering review. From the cleanliness of our accommodations to our friendly team members, it sounds like your stay was top notch! Kim is a wonderful asset to our team and I look forward to sharing your kind words with her. Your feedback is valued and appreciated and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great Weather!
review: You couldn't ask for a better bartender! Super friendly, strong drinks! She knows all the best places in town, where to go and what to see!  DiamondHead will be one of my new favorite resorts! I will be back again!

title: Excellent Stay!
review: Dear JCR37962,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We’re so flattered to hear you consider us one of your new favorite resorts! It’s also great to hear Kim was able to make your stay extra memorable. I look forward to sharing your kind words with her and look forward to having you as our guest again in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Amazing
review: Are stay here was right after Irma. The weather was great and the staff was very friendly. We had an issue with the AC not working, but when I let the staff know. They had someone on it. By the time we came back in form the Pool/Beach it was fixed. I was disappointed with the ocean being so discolored. Not sure if that was Irma or an algae explosion. Couldn't go in two feet of water and still see your feet. Kind of creepy. The other thing was we rented an umbrella and chairs. The umbrella was so low, it felt as you were crawling to get in and out from under the umbrella. Beside those things it was a nice stay.

title: Truly a delightful stay, don't hesitate to stay here
review: Staff is wonderful, location is great, rooms are clean and large, pretty views.  Even though we live in Fort Myers (about 7 miles away) we stay here from time to time just to enjoy the beach and as a little get a way.  The staff is wonderful, rooms are very nice, food is good (not exceptional but good), pool is very nice. Much more quiet than other hotels.  Don't hesitate to stay here as opposed to other places, this is a very nice beach hotel.

title: Cabanas Bar so fun
review: Dear Sperry566,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a flattering review. Nothing makes us happier than guests who frequent our resort and continuously have wonderful experiences. I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team and hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Cabanas Bar Awesomeness
review: Dylan at Cabanas Bar made our entire weekend. A few girls hanging out for a girls weekend on FMB. We had so much fun and Dylan was a breathe of fresh air. The facility was very nice and we enjoyed all of the surrounding businesses.

title: Taking refuge during hurricane Irma
review: Dear Kris,  Thanks so much for leaving us such a flattering review. We couldn’t be happier to hear Dylan was able to make your Cabañas experience extra special. I look forward to sharing your kind words with him and hope you come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Does not disappoint
review: So much fun at the Cabanas Bar in Diamondhead Beach Resort. Dylan always makes our time spent there a blast. Fun, reasonably priced and always entertaining. Can't wait for the upcoming Island Hopper Songwriter Fest, we will be there.

title: Great Stay!
review: You can tell right when you arrive that service is important to this hotel.  The parking lot attendant was super nice and called up to let them know we had arrived.  The front desk attendant was also super nice.  I like that the wrist bands are your keys to everything.  Our suite was great and huge.  We were on the end and had an amazing view down the length of the beach.  The room was well appointed, but the bed was a bit too soft.   It is an easy walk down to the beach.  They had jet ski, chair, and paddleboard rental right there.  The bar was good for getting drinks for the beach whenever we wanted.  The resort gives you a list of activities that you can participate in--many for kids, some for adults.  It wasn't as long a list as some places.  We didn't do any of them but it…

title: Diamondhead Beach Resort
review: Dear lizardtiff,  Thank you for leaving us such a thorough review. It’s a huge compliment to us that we’ve secured such a positive, lasting impression. From our friendly, accommodating team members to our spacious suites, it sounds like your stay was top notch. I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Thank you, Dylan
review: My wife and I spent Labor Day Weekend here and had a great time. The place was very clean and up to date with a very friendly and helpful staff. The rooms are all suites and are very nice and comfortable. There is an excellent beach bar and grille on the property along with a very good restaurant on the property also. Also has a very nice pool and two hot tubs next to the beach bar. We will be staying here again.

title: Wonderful On-beach 1-bedroom suite
review: Dear Michael,   Thank you for staying at DiamondHead and providing us with your feedback. We couldn’t be happier to hear how enjoyable your stay was. From our friendly team members to our newly renovated accommodations, it sounds like your stay was ideal. Your intent to return means a lot to us and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Chloe's Lounge, hanging with Kim!
review: Second visit here with my husband. We came the first week of September, despite not being heavy drinkers, Dylan's friendly service kept us here at Cabanas Beach Bar for hours. Best bartender here. Be sure to ask for his hours so you can experience the ideal vacation. You will not be disappointed.

title: Cabana Bar
review: Stayed one week at the diamond head beach resort, as always a wonderful time. Dylan at the Cabana bar is fantastic. Makes the best drinks and his service is excellent. Love the pool side service, playing poolside bingo is the best.

title: All about the staff
review: Dear Sonny,  Thank you for taking a moment to leave us a review. We’re so glad you had such an enjoyable stay at our resort. Dylan is a wonderful asset to our team at Cabañas and we’re so glad he was able to make your stay extra special. It’s also great to hear you were able to take advantage of our poolside activities during your stay. We appreciate your feedback and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: First Visit -  31 year Wedding Anniversary
review: My husband and I and our two boys just returned from a four night stay at Diamondhead resort. We arrived Saturday afternoon in the middle of a tropical storm producing rainfall and flooding not seen in over 100 years. Although not anywhere near the tragic situation in Houston, Texas (our thoughts and prayers for Texas)- we were kind of bummed out. The staff working during those miserable couple of days- particularly the front desk staff and Kim- best bartender/therapist in the world- not only made that experience ok- they made it fun!( even when perhaps their own homes were in peril) The storm eventually passed and we were able to enjoy the beautiful facilities, our great suite, and all the fun and beauty Fort Myers Beach has to offer. I can not recommend this resort more highly…

title: Value Property, Great quality at a resonable price
review: Dear gemlibaries,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We’re so glad our team members were able to make your stay extra special during the storm. It’s also great to hear you were able to experience some sunshine while visiting. I look forward to sharing your kind words with Kim and the rest of our team and hope you come back and see us again soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Smoking
review: We had a great experience!  The room was top quality and the view of the ocean was OUTSTANDING!  We would definitely recommend the Diamondhead hotel to our friends and family.  The hotel staff was very accommodating and the amenities gave us many options to choose from.  Restaurant, Bar, Pool, BEACH Activities, hot tubs, and the warm surf in the ocean were available to relax and have fun.  Perfect opportunity to take long walks on the beach and look for shells.  Plenty of night life activities also.

title: Awful colour both outside and corridors, but an excellent laid back Hotel inside.
review: Having passed some wonderful looking hotel and apartment buildings on the drive past Bonita Springs and along Estero Road, we approached this large grey building, then used the dull grey painted corridors to the Suites.This appearance and a liitle slack maintenance are the only reasons for not giving all five stars for our stay. The suites were  adequate for us four adults,we enjoyed the laid back feel of both the hotel and resort,enjoyed the pool bar food,and service.Whilst pool and hotel entertainment will never please everyone, I thought Fort Myers Beach had this 60's - 80's laid back feel to it, and the music at the pool, the excellent local musicians at the hotel and in the resort reflected this.From here we went to Fort Lauderdale and Miami Beach but my family enjoyed FMB…

title: LOVE THIS PLACE
review: This place is great to go with a family or with adults only.  Staff is amazing, great beach and pool, and love the cabana bar.  Top notch.  My only complaint is the awful music they play on a loop at the pool.  It's 1960's and 1970's music and they definitely weren't hits then.  You can't play your own music, so while you soak up the sun and sip fruity drinks, you are hearing crap music.  The live music at the bar is always awesome.  I have stayed there 4x in the past year and this is my only complaint.

title: Great vacation. Dylan, Wendy, & Miguel rock!
review: My first time in Ft. Myers, and I had a blast!! Cabanas was our favorite spot, & Dylan's drinks couldn't be topped by any other bars/restaurants on the island. We were spoiled on day 1 and continued that throughout our trip. Dylan invited us to play some beach volleyball & we were immediately embraced into his group.   For an adult I embraced the crab races too much, but made friends with Wendy along with some adorable kiddos.  Within 5 minutes of calling to report our AC was not working correctly, Miguel helped to fix us right up, & was such a sweet & friendly guy! Thanks for keeping us Ohioans cool in the Florida heat.   Overall, we had a fantastic trip that was made by the staff, who made us feel at home. Thanks! <3

title: Top notch
review: We loved this place. Beautiful views, amazing pool, and plenty of activities for kids. They did an outstanding job, and took very good care of us. The room was clean and updated. Love the balcony! I left a gold necklace behind and when I called, Jennifer in housekeeping said they had it and would mail it back to me! What amazing people. This place is right on the beach, which we went back and forth between the pool and beach and it was so convenient. It also is laid back, which we liked. Very family friendly, as well as good for couples. Thank you for a great stay!

title: August Beach Stay
review: Located directly on the beach with a small pool for relaxing this is a great location.  Things to know:  almost all the rooms have a beach view and great lanais, the beach is steps away but you have to rent chairs & an umbrella from a 3rd party company ($30 for two chairs & an umbrella or $25 per day if you do 3 days).  There are numerous stingrays in the water this time of the year.    We found nearly all of the staff to be friendly and helpful.  However, they do not do a good job of not allowing people to reserve chairs despite numerous signs.  Chairs with umbrellas are gone by 9am.  You cannot have a cooler at the pool.  The happy hour at Cabanas isn't a great. Most happy hours have a 2 for 1 but this was really just a $1 off well or cheap (sometimes warm) beer.  The food was…

title: Weekend getaway
review: The resort is nice, but the pool area is not clean. People are allowed to eat and drink in the pool, not just the pool deck but in the pool. We sat and watched people eating and dropping food in the pool and just leave it there, people drinking mixed drinks and beer in the pool and one man kept pouring his beer in the pool as he was drinking it. Employees were everywhere so we know they were aware of what was going on. Also they allowed one man to smoke cigars in the restaurant. It's bad enough that people could smoke anywhere around the pool as there was no designated smoking area. And yes there were signs posted around the pool stating no food or drink on pool deck, but since the resort was serving all of the food and drinks they were well aware of what was going on. For a…

title: Birthday weekend
review: Dear Moe1016,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. Please accept our sincere apologies that your stay did not go as expected. Food and beverage consumption in the pool is not tolerated at our resort and we will be addressing this matter with our team members to avoid these issues in the future. Your feedback is valued and appreciated and we hope you give us the opportunity to improve upon your recent visit.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Nice Beach Hotel
review: This was my first visit to DiamondHead Beach Resort and  my family and I thoroughly enjoyed it. It was my birthday and we were upgraded at no extra charge to a beautiful room with an awesome view. The pool bar made delicious drinks and all the staff was very nice. Would definitely stay again. Great rate for such a nice hotel on the beach. Thank you!

title: Great location
review: We arrived for our stay well before check-in time. The front desk staff was very helpful and we were told our room was ready. How nice! Our room was on the 9th floor, directly overlooking the beach and the Gulf. The screened balcony was huge with 4 chairs and 2 lounges. The bedroom was a nice size and the living room was spacious. Having Cabanas right downstairs is very nice. We had drinks and apps during Happy Hour and spent a few hours there during a late afternoon thunderstorm. The frozen drink menu is extensive and the bartender, after hearing my husband likes craft beers, offered a few local ones which was nice to have rather than the typical Bud, Bud Light, etc.  The beach is a very short walk and my one complaint is the seaweed. I think the hotel could rake this away each…

title: Great lunch at the bar
review: This was our first time to this property-and we were not disappointed.  The location was great....dined at the restaurant Chloe's on property for breakfast and dinner and it was very good.  My daughter took advantage of the Spa also on the property which was nice and convenient.  We liked how the water sports activities were available on the property and didn't have to drive anywhere. We had an ocean view room and they view was spectacular. The balcony was very spacious which we were pleasantly surprised. so we took full advantage of that for the sunsets.  I know we were there high season so pricing was fair, but on the higher side.

title: Cabanas made the trip
review: As soon as we got off the flight we headed to the hotel. We arrived at 10:45am and Cabanas was set to open at 11. We were greeted by the bartender Dylan. He was friendly, helpful, funny, and great as his job. His margaritas are the best! The only ones I would drink all week. You have to request Dylan as your bartender! We will be going back to visit.

title: Relaxing Getaway
review: Dear Ashley S,  Thank you for staying at DiamondHead and providing us with your feedback. Dylan is a wonderful asset to our team at Cabañas, and we’re so glad he was able to make your stay extra special. I look forward sharing your kind words with him and look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Excellent family vacation!
review: The Diamond Head resort has a great location right on the beach with most rooms facing the Gulf of Mexico. Each room is spacious and comfortable. Our room was like a mini suite with a kitchenette area. The screened in balcony had a table with four chairs and a lounge chair. We enjoyed swimming in the pool and long walks on the beach. The tiki bar is very inviting and serves lunch or just apps. We enjoyed having a drink at Chloe's Lounge before we had dinner.  The bartender was very friendly and informative. Dinner at Chloe's restaurant was delicious. My wife had the Mahi and I had the Grouper dinner. We were very happy with the service and the food.

title: Family beach vacation
review: This was our second time visiting this resort, but it had been renovated since our last stay and it was definitely noticeable. Room 603 had a beautiful view of both the pool and beach. It was very clean, and tastefully decorated. The staff was friendly and accommodating. Housekeeping was superb! They came each day to tidy up, and leave fresh towels. We ate at the tiki bar on site once, but I was disappointed with the food. It wasn't as good as it had previously been. It is convenient, however, if you have children or want something quick. We did not get a chance to eat at Chloe's (restaurant on the lobby floor), but it did appear to have better options than the tiki. The pool was clean, and music/beach towels/lounge chairs are provided. If you're looking for a clean resort in a…

title: Great place A+ staff
review: I recently stayed at Diamond Head Resort with my 2 boys. June 25 thru June 27 2017. We had a great experience, room was spotless, resort was very clean.  Most important for me the staff was exceptional, everyone was nice, helpful and so pleasant from the time we drove up until we checked out.   We had a room with a view of the pool and beach, kids loved walking on the beach at low tide and finding lots of cool sea creatures.  Would recommend this resort for a great family vacation,, oh you can walk everywhere or grab the shuttle!!!!!

title: This place deserves ten stars!
review: I wish I could give this place ten stars! We had a wonderful time here. The pool is clean, the rooms are large and beautiful. We had a room on the beach side so it was fun to be able to get up in the morning and look at the beach. The patios are screened in so, beautiful view with NO bugs. We originally were supposed to stay somewhere else that I had booked online and upon arriving at 1:30am and unable to stay because it was so gross I called the Diamondhead and the gentleman working (I believe his name was Frank?) said to come in and he would get us a room, which he did. He was so kind and guaranteed us that the Diamondhead's rooms were clean, which ours absolutely was. He gave us coupons for different things the hotel offers as well. One of the coolest things about this hotel…

title: Tropical Paradise
review: Dear kathleen5237,  Thank you for staying at DiamondHead and providing us with your feedback. We couldn’t’ be more flattered by your kind words! We’re so glad you stumbled upon our resort and had such an enjoyable stay. I look forward to sharing you kind words with our team and hope you come back and see us again soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Beach!
review: We recently stayed two nights at the Diamondhead Beach Resort. We stayed in room 902. We had a partial beach view and full pool view. The room was spacious, clean and modern.
