We enjoyed the balcony at night and listened to the sounds of the beach. We had a King size bed, very comfy with plenty of pillows. We did not spend a lot of time in our room, we took full advantage of the beach, pool and local bars and restaurants. We used the complimentary beach cruisers to get around the island and really enjoyed riding them on the beach. We had outstanding customer service at check in and the Bellman was courteous and kind every time we saw him. We had excellent service at Cabanas the bar by the pool. We will definitely be back!

title: Paradise
review: Room 903. Partial beach view and complete pool view. Room was nice, living room and bedroom..bathroom was nice, but no shower curtain so floors tended to get wet.  Someone posted that there was nothing to hang towels on. Must agree.  A few hooks would have been convenient.   Great TVs.   Lanai was screened in.   Exterior doors.  Nice to walk out and look out over the street.   Ice machines on even numbered floors only.   Stayed there July 4th week.  Beach was awesome to watch fireworks and an easy waslk to the pier and times square.  Two restaurants, one casual, one more formal.      Casbana bar and grill was very good but not a big selection of food.  Chloe's restaurant was understaffed in my opinion.   Food quite expensive.

title: Always a wonderful time here
review: The rooms and views are spectacular. I especially love the lanai. Our super special guest services from John were impressive. I look forward to seeing you all soon.   We could see the pool and the beach from our room. What a lovely time.

title: No better place!!!
review: This resort has it all! You couldn't want or ask for more in professionalism, service, friendliness, location, amenities, etc.... The staff was excellent, the beach was beautiful, the restaurant, lounge and cabana bar were all excellent. 5+ stars!!!

title: Excellent facilities but choose your room well
review: Dear Tim Q,  Thank you for staying at DiamondHead and sharing your comments with us. It’s a huge compliment to us that we’ve secured such a positive, lasting impression. From our friendly team members to our on property amenities, it sounds like your stay was top notch! We appreciate your kind words and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway.   Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Nicer hotel/resort on Fort Myers Beach
review: Don't let first impressions put you off, the DiamondHead looks a bit out of place, it's kinda like the death star has landed is the shabby chic ambiance of Fort Myers Beach. However the facilities, rooms, cleanliness and service from all staff were excellent. As mentioned in other reviews it's ideally situated to be near the action at Times Square but far enough away to be really quiet.   My main reason for leaving a review however is a warning......our room was on the sixth floor at the north end of the building, facing the pier. Directly below us was the hotels garbage collection area. Dumpsters came in every morning of our stay at 06:15 to empty the trash & the noise of breaking glass and metal bins being slammed down was horrendous and will wake you up if you stay in one of…

title: 5 stars!
review: My husband and I took a quick trip to Fort Myers Beach over 4th of July weekend.  We had never stayed there before and chose our hotel based on Trip Advisor reviews.  Based on what we saw (other hotels/resorts) once we got there, we were very happy we chose Diamondhead.    Check in was easy, our room was not ready, but they took our cell phone and it was ready around 1pm.  The room was ocean view and perfect for just the two of us.  It has a microwave, stove-top and nice separate living room from the bedroom and bath.  The lanai was very large and had two loungers and 4 chairs and table.    The bar on the first floor (Cabanas) was great for drinks and snacks and seemed to have different activities every day.  The day we were there they had trivia and we enjoyed having a few…

title: Are there diamonds here?
review: We had an absolute blast.  Originally only went for 1 night but then decided to stay for 3 lol. We live in Tampa so it was supposed to just be a quick getaway.  Anyway,  the rooms were fabulous and we stayed in the sunset side with breathtaking views of the sunset and moon lit ocean.  Huge balcony with 2 sliding doors one in the bedroom so you can view the ocean from your bed. The staff was great!  Vikki hooked us up and we were able to stay in our same room when we added the days.  Wendy was great at the tiki , Carly was a great server.. always checking to see if we needed drinks or food.  Randy was also a great bartender. Everyone was great. The ocean was awesome with lots of rays and dolphins! Also just a short walk to the town square an d ft Myers pier.  WE WILL BE BACK!

title: Gem on the Beach!
review: We stayed for 4 nights and loved this place! Our room was completely updated, clean, met all of our needs (refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, comfy bed, warm shower with good water pressure) and then some. Our beach view was spectacular (even the reflection in the bathroom mirror when I was getting ready, and the view out the sliding door from our bed)!!! Only complaint was that our air conditioner/thermostat were especially loud (but the room was cool) which we've reported to be fixed. Cabanas, the tiki bar, had delicious drinks and food, and the beach was perfect. We had quite a few stingray sightings, as well. So much fun!!! Would definitely recommend and return!

title: Great!
review: Just going to hit on important points to make review easy to follow. We stayed two nights in ocean view room.  - very clean rooms, surprisingly large balcony with excellent view.  - no cooktop.  Just enough kitchenware to eat micro dinners, heat up leftovers or have a quick breakfast. - bar/pool area nice, food at bar only ok. - 7-11 close-by, Publix supermarket a couple of miles away - able to walk to "Times Square" via beach (nicer than by the road). Probably 10 minutes ish.  -beach is easy to walk on, not too soft.  Bring your own chairs if possible- if you are there for several days it might be cheaper just to buy cheap chairs then rent the resort chairs/umbrellas. - parasailing, banana rides and other water activities rentals available on beach at property.  - don't go to…

title: Beautiful
review: The views are awesome.  Beach is warm and friendly. Service is with a smile. The only bad part is the pool is supposed to close at dusk. Well then close it.  And people that bring children to the pool and hot tubs at 10:30 at night should be asked to leave. When I am in vacation I am here to relax. And if I were to do something past the hour that it is closed I would be quiet. But people in general only think of themselves not others.

title: Soggy Vacation
review: We have stayed at this resort several times so we knew it was a nice place. We arrived early on Wednesday but was told at first our room wasn't ready. Another person came out to help and went ahead and upgraded and checked us in by 11:00a.m. So we didn't have to wait. Very courteous at the front desk. We proceeded to our room it was a gulf view/pool view room with a king bed. The resort has been updated since our last stay a few years ago. It's within walking distance to Town Square. There are numerous restaurants to choose from there. You really wouldn't need a car except to get to the hotel. I think we only went out once in 6 days.  I would like to acknowledge Audra Fak the activities director and Lauren at the pool. Audra did a great job of keeping things in order and letting…

title: Nice place!
review: Stayed for 4 nights with friends.  Nice location and the staff was wonderful.  Really enjoyed Heather as our server in the pool and bar area.  Would definitely head back again.  Rooms were spacious and nicely maintained.

title: Won Nothing
review: Recently won a contest from a local radio station for a two night stay at Diamondhead Resort. When I went to pick up my prize I was shocked that the hotel had valued the prize at $799...That's $400 per night...  Because the value exceeded $600, I was required to provide my tax ID and would be receiving a Federal 1099 tax form which I would have to pay tax on the $799. Not exactly a winning prize. This wouldn't be so bad if the true value was worth $799. However, in checking their website rooms go for less than $175 per night. In addition the certificate included several restrictions including no holidays and booking must be less than 30-days in advance. Allowing them to know how many empty rooms they have for these certificates.  When I spoke to a hotel manager she explained…

title: Our Happy Place
review: Anytime we can be at DiamondHead we are happy and find that to be the general feeling among other guests. The entire staff makes everyone feel like the most important guest. We truly appreciate all of them and the work they do.

title: Stay somewhere else
review: We stayed here for five days over the Memorial day weekend and this resort was well below my expectations.  Without boring you with a lot of words, I will list the good, bad and my final comments.  Good: 1)  Room had a kitchenette and featured a set of four dishes and eating utensil 2)  Bellman was knowledgeable and courteous 3)  Housekeeping is good, you just have to ensure you get service if they pass by your room because you posted the "do not disturb" surfboard on your room door. 4)  Room keys are an electronic wristband which is waterproof and are great as you never lose/misplace them.     5)  Screened balcony was nice. 6)  Trolley pick up and drop off is right in front of the resort.  Bad: 1)  Resort pictures show a bathtub, but they are in the process of remodeling and…

title: Memorial day weekend
review: Dear Dayln D,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a thorough review. We’re disappointed to hear certain aspects of our resort did not meet your expectations. We’d like to sincerely apologize for any frustrations encountered during your recent stay regarding the spa and bathroom. Your feedback is valued and appreciated and we will certainly use your experience to focus on areas in which we may improve.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Pleasant quick getaway
review: Check in was not a smooth process We were not notified that the pool was closed on a 95degree day!  Downstairs bar not busy but couldn't get service??  When asked why we weren't told about the pool and what are they going to do to compensate us, lip service from the desk? We can send you somewhere else!!!! After unpacking? You got to be joking,right?  This is not a cheap beachfront resort and to be treated this way was not what we had in mind as we travel alot.  We were just a little disappointed by the staffs way of resolving this,or the lack of resolving this at all!

title: Beautiful beach property
review: Beautiful hotel right on Fort Myers Beach. We had views out our front and deck. Very clean rooms with a beachy feel. Little kitchenette was great!! Bathroom was spacious and beautiful. You couldn't see the sunset from our room (we could see the pool and the Gulf) but beautiful none the less.

title: Beautiful view
review: The view from our room of the beach and the water was lovely. The balcony was small but efficient. As a family of four adults, we found the room a bit tight. The master bedroom with a king-size bed was comfortable, but there was only one bathroom and a very uncomfortable sofa bed. For the price we expected more, but what we had worked for the one night we were there. The kitchenette looked practical and sufficient, but again as we were only there for one night we didn't make use of it. The room would be fine for a couple. At checkout, we mentioned that the heat/ac control did not seem to make a difference in the room temperature and the clanging of the unit rattled the metal doors that enclosed the unit loudly enough to wake up those sleeping on the sofa bed several times during…

title: Wonderful Stay!
review: First time staying in Fort Myers Beach.  DiamondHead met all our needs and expectations!  Very nice room, friendly staff (especially Audra out by the pool), and great location.  Lots of activities on site. Will return here again!

title: Great stay
review: We just returned from 3 night stay and found this resort to be wonderful. We found the room to be very clean with a wonderful screened porch with 2 lounge chairs and table for 4. The only complaint was the sofa was very uncomfortable to sit on. The kitchenette was fully stocked with dishes, glasses etc. When stepping off the elevator into the hallways it is very bland and uninviting but the room made up for it. We used the bicycles 2 of our days and this was so much fun. Food was great in all the resorts eating places and we tried them all. Great happy hour at Chloe's lounge on wednesday night and a bargain breakfast at Chloe's restaurant. Great location right on the beach and close to everything!

title: Perfect!
review: This stay was really couples, friends, & family! This really was a perfect weekend getaway. I am from the area & wanted to spend the weekend on the beach. We went early to enjoy the beach & pool before check in, but our room was ready! The room was perfectly clean. It had everything we needed & wanted. The laini was roomy & wonderful with an awesome view of the gulf! We had so much fun at the pool and the beach. It really was a perfect weekend!

title: Hi rise on the beach
review: We stayed here for a weekend beach wedding.  The rooms were very nice, front desk staff exceptionally helpful.  Located right on the beach with a bar/grill on the beach level.  Our only drawback was that there were lots of children at the pool and in the hot tub.

title: Not as thrilled this time ....
review: This review is long but if you're not well-to-do financially and really want to know what to expect regarding some specific details about this place, take the time to read it. This is our second year in a row to DiamondHead. Last year we came to the conclusion there will be no other hotel for us on the island. We love it!!! The rooms are just lovely, every room has some sort of view of the beach and it's a pretty decent value. The servers and bartenders are all topnotch and so friendly. It's clean! The restaurants, bars and food are all fantastic! They take excellent care of this hotel!  That being said, there were a couple of glitches this time that I'm not too happy with. One, we come to this hotel because of the fairly older (we are late 30s and want nothing to do with the…

title: Absolulely amazing!
review: Dear Amber M,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a thorough review. As you can imagine, we’re disappointed to hear your second stay wasn’t as enjoyable as your previous stay with us. We sincerely apologize for any frustrations you were caused regarding the noise and time share tour. This is not at all reflective of the type of experience for which we aim to deliver and deeply apologize for any disruptions and discomfort you may have experienced. Please know that our front desk team does offer information on how we process debit cards during the check in process and apologize if this was not thoroughly communicated during your check in process. We appreciate your feedback and hope you give us the opportunity to improve upon your recent stay.   Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Huge suite. Great value
review: We stayed at Diamond Head Resort for our honeymoon.  What an amazing week.  The resort is truly wonderful, the staff amazing, and the suite was beautiful.  The pool, the activities, the bar and restaurant, all 5 star quality.  We already have made reservations for next year.

title: Our First 2017 Visit
review: Dear foxbksc,  Thank you for staying at DiamondHead and providing us with your feedback. We’re so flattered you chose to celebrate such a special occasion at our resort! From our friendly team to our on property amenities, it sounds like your stay with us was ideal. Your intent to return means a lot to us and we look forward to welcoming you back next year!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Perfect beach location
review: If you are looking for an ocean getaway this is your spot. Its located right on the beach and within walking distance to beach bars. Hotel has pool bar and a lounge as well. We had an ocean front room and the view was spectacular. Shout out to Derek,Vicky and John for great friendly and helpful service. They could not have been nicer! The rest of the staff...a little stand offish overall to be honest but those three more than made up for it. Rooms are spacious well decorated and well equipped. Beds comfortable but bring your own pillows as the ones provided are the worst and they would do well to invest in better quality ones. We ate at Chloes the restaurant inside...large portions and market prices on many items were slightly high. The concensus from our group was that steak…

title: Excellent Location
review: We stayed at Diamondhead for 10 nights in April 2017 with our 16 and 18 year olds.  It was great.  The views are awesome from the lanai.  Beach is beautiful.  Lots of restaurants and bars down by the pier.  PROS:  location, view, clean, friendly staff.  CONS:  pull out not big enough for 2 teens - needed to go buy an air mattress.

title: Excellent, Clean, Comfortable
review: Great overall experience, plan on returning next year.  Updated room with great gulf views, locations convenient, many amenities within walking distance.  Only issue was hotel Wi-Fi, entirely unreliable.

title: Loved the time away
review: Pros:  Staff are welcome and so friendly.  Our room view (9th floor looking at beach and pool) was very nice.  Beach was clean.  Location for walking to a convenient store of the square with shops is close.  Close to marina (we rented a boat one day).  Cons:  The suite is nice, but if you are traveling with women know that there is ONE mirror in the entire room. The bed is quite uncomfortable as is the couch in the living area.  Budget in renting chairs (about 40 bucks a day for two people) if you want to lay out on the beach.  Chairs/umbrella are not included.  And, unfortunately, our cleaning service always was showing up around 5:30 which is about the time we were coming in and wanted to chill out for a bit.  We liked it here...didn't love it.  Ft Meyers is a little too…

title: Stay here
review: My husband, teen daughter and I stayed here for spring break.  Things were quiet thankfully, it was far enough away from the pier.  We enjoyed the gulf view room on the 10th floor.  We did have a deluxe room with a cooktop, frig, microwave and dishwasher.  the interior was clean and wonderful.  We also loved the screened porch /balcony.  We sat on the beach each day.  You do have to pay for the beach chairs/umbrellas daily, but was worth it for the comfort, was $40/day, provided by a separate company. Budget that in.  Or you could buy beach chairs at walmart.  The property staff was very helpful and i don't have any negative comments!

title: Beautiful Location, All the Amenities!
review: My wife and I spent two nights here in February.  The traffic around Fort Myers Beach is horrific, but when we reached our hotel, it was worth the effort!  The staff, with one exception, was very friendly and helpful.  Our beachfront room was spacious and clean.  Comfortable lounge to enjoy a cocktail.  Breakfast was ordered from menu and had  choices to please most everybody.  The one exception on the staff mentioned earlier was Greg at breakfast.  He didn't write our orders down, had to come back twice get it right, and even then it came wrong.  His mind was elsewhere, obviously. Altogether this was an excellent getaway and introduction to Fort Myers Beach!

title: Holiday Water Sports Fort Myers Beach
review: Booked a dolphin excursion from this company.  They were excellant and gave us our money worth!  Waverunners and guide took us to the area where dolphins feed. Had a wonderful time!  Zax was our tour guide.  He was very helpful to us in understanding the dolphin habitat.  He was very respectful of them and guided us carefully through the bay.

title: Great hotel with all of the amenities you could look for!
review: We had an excellent experience staying at the DiamondHead Beach Resort. From the moment we entered the property, the bellman and front desk staff made us feel right at home and welcome. The view from our gulf view suite was amazing and the screened in back porch was a pleasure to sit and enjoy the view at all times of the day and night. The pool was excellent, food at Chloe's was very good and impressive. The beach was very nice and close proximity to the property. Would definitely stay again.

title: Great Resort
review: Dear ssok2020,  Thank you for staying at DiamondHead Beach Resort and taking a moment to share your experience with us. We’re so glad you had such an enjoyable stay at our resort. From our friendly team to those amazing views of the Gulf, it sounds like your stay with us was ideal. We appreciate your kind words and hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: The best place to stay in Ft. Myers Beach
review: This was a great resort for myself and a group of teens. We had separate rooms close by and the staff was very helpful with any questions I had. Spa has a nice massage. Be warned room 908 has a loud annoying wind noise when it is very windy. Which is a lot of the time. Nice oceanfront room but hard to open and shut door had to lock it sometimes so would t blow open and very loud in the living area.

title: First trip to Fort Myers Beach
review: We recently stayed at the DiamondHead for three nights with our family of 3 (my husband, my toddler and myself). The resort was very clean. We were greeted upon arrival by a very nice gentleman who manages the parking lot. He was very helpful and notified the front desk we were on our way up so they were ready when we got there. Despite requesting early check-in, our room wasn't available until 15 minutes prior to usual check in time. They do allow for parking and pool use though which is a bonus!   THE ROOM- the room had everything we needed. A nice kitchenette. They provided a crib, a high chair and a tub for my toddler which was very nice. The view was great. We were in room 1111 and you get a lot of noise from the street & parking lots and very little ocean sound which was a…

title: Stayed for a week couple vacation.
review: Very nice place.  They welcome helping you.  Gorgeous are on Fort Myers Beach on the north end of the island which is quiet.  It is, also, easier to get on & off the island from the north end, we think.  Next to a very nice park where it is fun to wander through and search for the sand tortoises. Would stay, again, but we think it is out our budget for what they charge for rooms.

title: Location is PERFECT. Good for 2 people. Good/Not great!
review: Diamond Head  THE GOOD: Location, location, location: First of all this is a wonderful place to vacation, secondly the island is a wonderful place to be, thirdly the hotel is in a perfect location on the island.  Exterior appearance: it's a very nice looking place & on the surface very, very nice!  Staff: almost every step person I have come in contact with has been very friendly, very professional, very service oriented.  Kitchenette: The kitchen has a small refrigerator, a small dishwasher, small coffee pot with supplies, microwave, and a few plates cups and pieces of silverware. There was even a partial roll of paper towels which was very helpful!!!   There was salt and pepper in the room which was a nice plus!   I did get a newly remodeled room and the tile and granite or a…

title: Nice place but just cant seem to get it all right
review: Good intentions but just cant seem to get much right. Chloe's restaurant is horrible. First night sat and waited 10 minutes until we even had a menu. Second day called for breakfast room service and never ever even got a call back. Third Day called in order a pizza and to no surprise, they didn't get the pizza right. Very willing to give a complimentary 2 drink coupon but on the third day... that's pretty tired. Unfortunately not many good service places around here to even pick from. It's FLORIDA!

title: This is my favorite place to vacation..... but I wouldn't bring anyone that needs to use the couch
review: I love this place so much that I bought a timeshare here a few years ago to ensure that I could always come here.  The people are awesome, the location is great and the balcony makes my entire trip.  Cabana's (especially Joe and Randy) has always been a highlight of my trip.   This year I brought my parents down and they rented the room next to us - it was great because the balconies could be opened so we shared an extra long balcony.  Sunsets were gorgeous as always.  Now, I have written reviews of this property before, and I have never complained but this year I am adding a complaint.  The couches.  I have gone down here many times and have usually had a person that sleeps on the pull out couch.  I was so thankful this year that I didn't.  The couches are awful.  They squeak…

title: Spring break
review: Bent spring break with family at the Diamondhead Resort. Had a wonderful time and experience. Special shout-out to Heather in Cabanas who gave him amazing service and always a great smile. Also our appreciation to Kim at Chloes. Kim and Heather and the rest of the amazing staff made of stay much more pleasant :-) would definitely go back.

title: Really enjoyed Diamond Head Beach Resort.
review: Husband and I traveled to Ft. Myers for a trip to relax.   The accommodations were good having a separate room for sleeping.  Loved the pool/beach bar and wait staff.  Food was pretty good and drink prices were reasonable.   Beach was nice too!    The downside was the bed wasn't very comfortable. Also, was on the first floor ocean view which was nice but would have preferred a higher floor.    They upgraded me since I was only gulf view.  However, it was very noisy being near elevators as staff was getting on and off the elevators early in the morning talking, making noise with carts, etc.  Tried to move rooms but were told they were booked.   Overall pleased with the stay.  It is close to many restaurants to walk since you don't want to drive on Estero Blvd... ugh.

title: Good Hotel directly on Ft Myers Beach
review: This is a high rise, nice property directly on Ft. Myers beach. The rooms are mini suites with a bedroom and separate living room /kitchenette area with microwave, sink and mini fridge. There is a veranda/deck large enough for sitting that can be accessed from the dining room and from the bedroom: great for a relaxing drink in the evening or breakfast in the morning. These are well appointed spacious, comfortable rooms with a sea view.The living room has a pull out couch so the unit can accommodate 4 persons comfortably. The room was clean and there is daily housekeeping service. The pool is large with enough chaise lounges. One complaint was that the piped in music at the pool is on all day and the playlist gets monotonous after 4 days and can be a bit loud. We asked that the…

title: Great Trip
review: We had a great stay at the DiamondHead Beach Resort.  The staff was exceptional and always had smiles on their faces.  Our room was very nice with a beautiful view of the ocean.  I would suggest this resort to anyone.  Walking distance to restaurants and shops. We did not need our car unless going into downtown Ft Myers.

title: Glad we stayed
review: After reviewing several hotels in the area, I am so glad we choose this one. The room was outstanding, the staff was helpful, the pool and beach area were clean and perfect!! The only negative It is a lot of money for a night in a hotel. I would love to stay longer in the future. It a perfect location for walking to everywhere. We were never approached for a timeshare. We were also upgraded to a pool beach view. But the gulf view would have been perfect, there is no reason to view the pool.

title: Robin G. at Esterra Spa THE VERY BEST masseuse
review: We love Diamonhead.  Super beach location.  Our unit looks out over the Gulf.  But the best amenity in Fort Myers Beach is getting a deep tissue massage from Robin G. at Esterra Spa, located on the third floor at Diamondhead, 2000 Esterra Blvd.  I have had a lot of massages from many very good therapists.  But Robyn is the best.  Do yourself a favor, make an appointment to see her, and make your great Fort Myers Beach vacation even better.  If you work in Fort Myers Beach and have to deal with us vacationers, you need to see her too!

title: Golf Trip
review: Great hotel right on the beach with a nice beach bar to watch the sunsets over the gulf.  Also very close to shops and bars in Fort Myers beach.  Rooms are large with kitchenettes. Some floors are "club" which have limited access.

title: Sweet Suites
review: Our 2-room suite was more than just a room.  The bed was comfortable (a king this time), and the "living room" was spacious and included a refrigerator, dish washer, microwave, and dishes for 4.  Even the dish detergent was included!  With a TV in both rooms, you could watch what you wanted, when you wanted, but there was regular "freezing" of the picture at times (something the hotel needs to work on).  The staff was most accommodating and friendly, making sure your needs were met.  For the money, a little pricey, but a nice stay right on the beach!

title: Lovely Resort
review: My wife and I really enjoyed our stay here.  Our room was fabulous: A one bedroom condo unit facing the water with a huge balcony.  Our screened-in balcony had 2 chaise lounges, 4 chairs and a table with lots of sun.  Full kitchen.  Right on the beach. Very good breakfasts in their restaurant.  The staff was very helpful and friendly.

title: Holiday Water Sports Dolphin Tour
review: We went on Dolphin tour yesterday with Zack as our tour guide. He was absolutely fabulous. He made sure we felt safe on the wave runner. He was very knowledgeable about the dolphins and their habits. We saw many dolphins and he even got some pictures of us with the dolphins around us,which made the experience more memorable for us. We will absolutely come back and ask for him.

title: good place to relax
review: Diamondhead as a property is very nice. It's location is a little bit removed from the busier part of the beach and the rooms are well maintained. The beachfront rooms are exceptional and the screened balcony allows you to open the doors and hear the ocean (if it isn't too hot).  They have a variety of daily activities and specials and the property is close to a variety of other restaurants. The only downside for us was the karaoke night. It is well-attended by locals (which is not a bad thing) but we waited over and hour and a half before leaving (without singing) after several people that arrived after us were called to sing.

title: Awesome
review: Room was clean and very nice. It had a kitchen. Staff was great. We got a upgrade for free to the club level. Room 1009. Views of the gulf coast wss great. Bed was nice. Pillows alittle to soft for me. Nice balcony. Screened in. You can walk to any where within 10 minutes. Beach was great. The bar called cabanas was nice. Alittle pricey. Didn't eat at chloes the in house restaurant. Parking is tight. All in all we will definitely be back.

title: Great place
review: top notch! everything was perfect, will be back!!!! The doorman was so helpful in finding a fishing trip on short notice, the bikes where great to use. The pool area and rooms 5 star. Enjoyed the bar and the prices are on target. There would be no reason

title: Wonderful Celebration at Chloes Restaurant
review: My wife and I recently celebrated a momentous occasion with six friends at Chloes Restaurant in the Diamondhead Beach Resort on Fort Myers Beach, FL and thanks to the work of the staff of Chloes and Diamondhead, the event was just perfect. Kimberly, the event coordinator, took over to plan it for us and the restaurant staff was very attentive to our needs, even allowing us to bring in our own champagne and sparkling cider as well a special desert. All in all, it was a wonderful event and we can't thank Kimberly and the Chloes staff enough for their help in making it so.

title: Very nice pool and room was great setup.
review: Dear DogProf,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your special occasion at Chloës! We’re so glad our team was able to make it a great success. I look forward to sharing your kind words with Kimberly and the rest of our team and hope you come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Ft Myers Beach/Diamond Head resort
review: Beautiful rooms!  It was nice to have the kitchenette. Close to plenty of places to eat. The restaurant/bar had good food but the service was unpredictable. Loved being right at the beach!!  Don't spend money renting the chairs and umbrellas-purchase a chair for $15-$20 at the local shop, then donate it to someone at the beach!

title: Great resort and beautiful beach
review: My wife, my 2 year old daughter and I all stayed at this resort January 31st to February 4th 2017 and had an amazing experience.  The only reason I didn't give this hotel an excellent rating was because of all the construction going on right now in Fort Myers beach and the fact that it happened to be right in front of the hotel the entire time we were there making travel to and from the hotel a little challenging.    The room was perfect with a beautiful panoramic view of the beach and south part of the island with a small fridge and microwave in the room for convenience.  The rooms are suite style separating the master bedroom from the rest of the living space which was nice to be able to put my daughter in the pack-n-play in the living room where we wouldn't bother her.  I…

title: What a disappointment
review: Dear Gary R,  Thank you for staying with us at DiamondHead and sharing your comments with us. We’re so glad you had such an enjoyable stay at our resort. I do apologize if the nearby construction was an inconvenience during your stay. Please know that this is scheduled to move a mile south in the next few weeks.   Heather is a wonderful asset to our team and we’re so glad she was able to make your stay extra special. I look forward to sharing your kind words with her and the rest of our team and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Beautiful sunsets
review: My first indication that this "resort" might be a problem was when we arrived and no bellman greeted us.  We were given  a "newly renovated suite" on the second floor and when we got off  the elevator, my first thought was prison.  Steel gray floor, walls and ceiling and dimly lit.  Not at all welcoming,  Room had no hooks to hang any of your bath towels and on the second day, no one cleaned our room and when we called for fresh towels, their response was ... well our staff has left.  . Exiting their Chloe lounge you are faced with 2 bathroom doors that are disgusting.  You also have to pay to use the beach chairs. We left the next day.  Yuuckkk

title: Excellent hotel
review: Dear ctorrey2017,  Thank you for taking the time to voice your concerns. I can assure you that the description of your stay is not at all representative of a typical DiamondHead experience. Guest comfort and satisfaction remain our top priority and we sincerely apologize for any frustrations encountered during your recent stay. Please reach out to me directly if you would like to discuss your stay further.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Wonderful place to stay!!
review: This is our third time staying at Diamondhead. We appreciate how clean everything is but most of all how nice the entire staff is. One young lady, Heather from Wisconsin, who servers at Chloes for breakfast and Cabanas for lunch made us feel like family.  We were shocked that Heather remembered our names. Great food and drinks!!!

title: The best hotel.
review: Dear thermaltechgroup,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We couldn’t be more flattered by your kind words. Heather is a wonderful asset to our team and we’re so glad she was able to make your stay extra special. I look forward to sharing your kind words with her and hope you join us again soon for a fourth visit!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: First time at Diamondhead Beach Resort 2014
review: Excellent room. The beach is great, you can find sea urchins, shells, sponges, etc. Chloe's had the best Prime Rib! Pool was nice and clean and Cabanas bar and grill next to the pool was fantastic. Nice long walks along the beach and tons of shopping. It's going to be hard to leave!

title: Excellent stay!!
review: We stayed here a Diamondhead Beach Resort in 2014 with our my husband cousin and his son. Our suites were next door to each other which was useful.  We enjoyed our stay, the views from our room was fantastic as we could see the pool below and ocean afar.  We were on the 10th floor, we were lucky as the laundry room was not too far as we were able to wash our clothes. The pool was great as well as the jacuzzi. There was entertainment for kids as well as adults. There was little crabs race for kids and bingo for adults as well as for kids. Pool towels were free as well as daily newspapers.  Lots of restaurants nearby if you did not want to eat at the Resort restaurant. Our room included a small kitchen with fridge, inroom coffee and tea, a stove top. The bathroom was fantastic and…

title: Small company business meeting
review: This hotel is great, all the way around. The rooms are nice, all have a nice view, the beach & pool are beautiful & the variety of food & drink on property is wonderful. I think the food at the restaurants is high quality & there is a good variety...some good poolside meals but also a nice, classy restaurant. My son had SO much fun swimming & participating in all the kids activities. ALL the staff are very friendly, professional & so helpful!

title: Great oceanfron suite with large balcony
review: This place would only improve with a stove top or a burner added to the kitchen. The pool view rooms are ocean view also. Suites are roomy and easily accommodated 3 ladies on a girls retreat. Hotel is just off the really busy party part of Fort Myers. Pool is good. Wish beach chairs were included for the price they should be. Hotel restaurant and poolside bar are great.

title: Great
review: A really good place to stay.  Reasonable price.  We got the top floor with a side view of the ocean.  Beautiful view of the sunrise.  Clean and good space in the room.  Nice bar on first floor that serves a great lunch.

title: Mother daughter trip
review: I cannot say enough about this resort. We had originally booked the Hilton in Marco Island, but after reading those reviews after their renovation we changed our plans and booked our stay here. I wanted this trip to be perfect since my mother is hard to please and it was our first trip together since she was feeling well. I spoke to Derek before we left and he did a wonderful job easing my mind that I made the right decision. And boy, it did not disappoint. I can't say enough about the staff, they are so friendly and treat you like family. The room was beautiful and the view was top notch. Wendy at the pool, Carly and Alejandro with food service, and Derek are just fantastic. Chloe's restaurant was wonderful. They have karaoke on Wednesday evening, and much to my surprise, my…

title: Best place on the Gulf Coast to stay in FL!!!!
review: Dear Smurdock34,  Thanks so much for leaving us a flattering review. It’s a huge compliment to us that we’ve secured such a positive, lasting impression. I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team, and while we’re sad that you have to leave as well, we trust that you will come back and stay with us again soon. Until then!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great Beachfront Resort!
review: Had an amazing stay in at this resort! Super friendly and helpful staff, very good value for the money, super nice/luxurious facilities, and best of all the greatest view on the beach in my opinion! Great place guys keep it up!

title: Beautiful Place
review: My mom and I stayed here for a week. Honestly the customer service was the best I have ever been around. You walk past someone and they immediately stop what they are doing and say hello. Rooms are nice, restaurants are okay, nothing special!  We did enjoy the fenced in patio. We also enjoyed a paint and sip event that they do every Thursday in Chloe's lounge.   We were called every morning about the open house where you go and view the timeshare properties, talk about financials and in the end you receive a $200 credit to use either towards your bill or any other purchase you make at the resort. The woman working the counter pointed out my mothers wedding ring and told us that we could still do the tour but wouldn't receive the $200 because her husband wasn't there to review…

title: Resort should not be used in the title of this property
review: Stayed for a week beginning December 30th, 2016. Positives-fabulous weather. Very roomy balcony with a wonderful view of the Gulf. Full size in room coffee maker. Very little noise can be heard between units. That's about it for positives. Negatives-we were located near hotel dumpsters and even though we were 10 floors up, the emptying occurred early morning and beeping from the truck's back-up system was endless and loud enough to wake everyone up. Housekeeping is poor. Had to contact the front desk twice about missing sheets for the sofa bed as well as to complain that despite being gone all day, our room remained untouched at 4:45pm. Sofa bed incredibly uncomfortable and noisy at every movement. Very inexpensive furniture that isn't capable of weathering constant use. Very…

title: Diamondhead Resort
review: I thought our stay was amazing, our view of the beach was fantastic.. The service was prompt and courteous.. The place was clean and organized.. The food at Chole's was amazing.We had the stuffed grouper (fantastic)crab cakes (fantastic)breakfast was great as well..Everything we had was delicious..I would definitely recommend Diamondhead Beach Resort to friends and family..

title: Average at best
review: We stayed at the DiamondHead for 2 nights 12/24 and 12/25.  We paid $620 for 2 nights.  I picked this hotel based on the resort and found that the reviews didn't exactly match our experience.  The rooms are a good size and we liked having a mini fridge and microwave.  They were some what clean, but I did have to clean hair off of the bathroom toilet and debris on the coffee table.  The back of the pocket door was all scratched up.  The rooms are VERY dark!  There isn't a single overhead light.  The tvs are nice and the bathroom was nice as well.  It's my understanding that the rooms were recently remodeled.  If this is the case, the carpet was kind of worn and the colors were kind of drab.  The screened in porch was nice with nice furniture.  The pool was clean but crowded with…

title: Total quality hotel
review: Dear lar75,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a detailed review. As you can imagine, we’re very disappointed to hear certain aspects of our resort did not meet your expectations. I can assure you that the description of your stay is not at all reflective of a typical DiamondHead experience. Guest comfort and satisfaction remain our top priority, and I sincerely apologize for any frustrations encountered during your stay. Unfortunately, the unit that you stayed in was not one of our newly renovated suites, as these rooms feature wall-to-wall tiling throughout. Please feel free to reach out to me directly if you would like to discuss your stay further.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Cabana bar awesomeness
review: Great food and our server Heather (like feather) was super accommodating! Had the Rueben sandwich and a Bloody Mary for lunch! It's appropriate for families and friends. Relaxing atmosphere and live music on the beach!

title: Nice!
review: We stayed here just one night as we were touring Southern Florida.  We were met at the gate by the parking attendant - very nice fellow and extremely helpful!  Check in was good, help with the luggage was good service.   (I always feel a little awkward/under pressure when staff is right there to help you with your luggage and you are not 'put together' in the vehicle as to what you want to come in with you - we tend to road trip on vacation staying just 1-2 nights at each place and be gone for 2-3 weeks at a time, so we have a complicated system of picnic bags, coolers, luggage, sand toys, the kids stuffed animals, special blankets, electronics, books, etc. - I like to know in advance when a hotel does this so we can organize ourselves and be prepared before we pull in) Our room…

title: Cancelled due to illness.
review: We had to cancel due to illness. We called 3 days before our intended visit. They were very nice and said no problem, they would refund our deposit. Sure enough, within the week we had a credit on our credit card for the full amount of our deposit. We would like to try again to go once we recover.

title: Dolphin Tour Jetski
review: This tour is amazing! I highly recommend it. From the time we left the resort and traveled around the smaller islands, we saw many dolphins swimming around us. The trip latest about 1 hour and a half. The weather was perfect as well (the 80s in December). Joe was the perfect tour guide. He was excellent about telling us about the dolphins and the surrounding area. Hope to see you next year.

title: Love this place.
review: Great location, peaceful, great views, nice eateries, and perfect rooms.  Walking distance to local bars and eateries.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  Gorgeous sunrises and sunsets.    Plenty of activities for guests.

title: Gulf Luxury
review: This was our second stay here and it just gets better, we had a top floor room overlooking the Gulf. The room had recently been refurbished and was very comfortable and clean. Car parking is easy with the doorman always offering help. The main square of Fort Myers beach is a 15 minute stroll away. This hotel has everything for a winter Gulf stay.

title: Two Day Getaway
review: Dear bryancrawford54,  Thank you for leaving us such a flattering review. We’re so glad you had a wonderful stay and had the opportunity to enjoy our upgraded units. We appreciate your feedback and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: great hotel
review: My boyfriend and I stayed in the this hotel and we are looking forward to staying here again. The room was gorgeous. The decor was very modern with a beach feel. I looooved the bathroom, it was very chic. The view was spectacular. We were on the 11th floor with a partial gulf view.. we had a perfect view of the sunrise from the bedroom and an even better view of the beach. It was very nice. We had a living room area and a kitchenette (ideal for a long stay). The room service staff was nice. The menu items were fairly priced... a gratuity and room service fee is automatically added.

title: Holiday Water Sports Dolpin Tour
review: we stay her 5 days and were  great fun ..good food..loved both the casual tiki bar and the lounge ..the happy hours are great too.. and right on the beach is awesome... you can walk everywhere and have access to the restaurant by the beach ...

title: Daughter's 40th Birthday celebration
review: My family and I stayed at the Diamond Head Beach resort. We love the place and would certainly return. The highlight of the trip was the jet ski dolphin tour that we took right off the beach of the resort. The tour was led by Zach our tour guide who was absolutely amazing. He not only made sure my family was safe during the tour, but delivered the most amazing tour, picking up dolphins at most stops, and when not he was giving us an education of the area and the indigenous wildlife. An absolute must if your go to Fort Myers Beach

title: LOVE this hotel!
review: I have just booked my 3rd trip to DiamondHead Resort this year.  My first visit was the end of June and I only have great things to say about the hotel, the staff, and the restaurants.  Decided to return in Sept. and the visit was just as wonderful as the first time.  So now I will be back in Nov. and I am really looking forward to it.  Both Chloes and Cabanas are great, service is more than friendly and the pool is overlooking the Gulf is perfect.

title: You don't ever have to leave!
review: Diamond Head Beach Resort & Spa is everything it's name says.  This is the place you never want to leave. Of course it's Fort Myers Beach and you want to check out all this jewel of an island has to offer, but you don't have to if you don't want.  They have beautiful suites on the beach.  There's a Tiki Bar, fine dining, lounge,spa treatment, pool and of course the Gulf of Mexico with water sports just waiting for you to indulge.  They have beach chairs for relaxing on the sand as well. It just doesn't get better than this on the island!

title: Chloe's Restaurant....what an incredible find!
review: Dear Lena N,  Thank you for staying with us at DiamondHead and providing us with your feedback. We couldn’t be happier to hear how much you enjoyed your stay. We hope you come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Fantastic
review: We were in Ft Myers to ride the Key West Express and found this wonderful, wonderful restaurant inside of the Diamondhead Resort and Spa.  It closes at 9, so we were the only customers at 8 pm.  The waiter was totally professional suggesting the specials...he was spot on and the meal was fabulous!  Highly recommend this restaurant!

title: Very Nice!
review: On a lark my wife and i spied this resort while exploring Fort Myers Beach. We got a room on the tenth floor overlooking the pool with a partial vew of the ocean. The room was a full suite for under 125.00 a night.. Off season Priceline price. What a great stay! Excellent  large balcony. The pool was warm. The hot tubs hot. Both very clean. The grounds very clean even though they were renovating the lower floors. Ample parking. The beach was sugar sand and just steps away from the hotel. This section of beach is perfect.  During the weekdays there is no charge to use the beach chairs and umbrella so we benefited from this. The music at the pool was excellent..  The hotel has a beach bar. Excellent prices and good drinks. Wait staff excellent. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: A Great Resort Stop
review: We were on our way back from Miami Beach and had made reservations for only one night. We wished we had made this our first stop. The staff was friendly and helpful. The room (suite) was beautifully decorated, large and clean. Very beachy looking.  A lot of the hotel had been renovated recently.  Next year we will be going back for a longer period of time.

title: Only getting better-
review: Diamondhead offers a perfect blend of full-service (great cabana bar, lounge, restaurant and pool with drink service) while still having a large 2-room suite with a small kitchen area so you can opt to have some meals or cocktails on your private balcony.  The premium rooms have a small cooktop, which we did not use, but we did stock up with sandwich fixings and the kitchen allowed up to bring back and heat up leftovers during the week. The location is on a quiet part of the beach, but close enough to Times Square that we walked one day along the beach and had lunch in town. While there, they were finishing major updates to the regular guest rooms.   The staff went out of their way to minimize the inconvenience to the guests (thank you Jaimee and Caileen for taking care of us). …

title: Wow!
review: Dear hickory727,  Thanks so much for leaving us such a flattering review. From our convenient, beachfront location to our friendly team, it sounds like your stay with us was ideal! I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Excellent views right on the ocean front!
review: We are still here. We upgraded to gulf front and it's worth it! Walk the beach to many restaurants. Full kitchen, tile, large screened porch.. nice staff, 2 flat screen TVs, wifi... restful! Private, and you can order room service. Feeling spoiled!

title: "Good Hotel"
review: Stayed in this hotel for one night - to get away from the East coast during Hurricane Matthew and it was a wonderful experience. The suite was clean and extremely comfortable. We are a family of 5 with 2 young kids and an infant and we felt really happy to be in such a comfortable hotel. the kids enjoyed going to the beach and pool. It was an enjoyable experience even though it was just 2 days and 1 night!

title: Clean Hotel
review: Check in was smooth, up in the lift to our floor. Exit from the elevator and we thought we were in a car park. The corridors give a cold feel, as they are concrete and floor to celing painted grey, which was a shame as the rooms and other areas didnt reflect this. Room was clean and big, sitting area, big balcony and wet room. only other issue was the noise, we booked via Booking.com and the building work being done was noted near the bottom of the email, buried, which was a shame, so visit when its completed in November. Breakfast was good value ($9), shame about the other people in the room who didnt understand the use of a tissue to blow their nose.  We didnt use the pool or spa, but the pool area looked good, overlooking the beach. Checkout was as smooth as the check in.

title: Disappointed this visit
review: We stayed here last year and had an excellent stay but this year was different. First, there is construction going on that's very loud (jack hammering). We did not find this out until we arrived. Then they put us on the 8th floor which was directly below the floor they were working on (9th). Don't know why they didn't put us or anyone away from construction, like on a lower floor. So if you're planning to take a afternoon nap forget about it. One of the construction workers told us they plan to be finished by November some time so be aware.  Second, we were disappointed with daily room cleaning. First day was good but the rest of the week not so good. They didn't refill plastic cups & replace ice bag. The big thing for us was one day they didn't come til 3:30 and we had just…

title: Good but not great
review: My husband & I have been coming here for years. Positive: great location & views  Opportunities for improvement: courtesy staff. (They seemed annoyed to have to deal with us.)  Upon arriving, we recieved a room that was less than desirable. When we asked to change rooms, poor body language from the staff was received.   The room we did stay in had a layer of sand on the floor. We had to wear our flip flops the entire time.  Plus,  the couch was so worn out,  it needs replaced bad!   Construction was happening during our stay.   Fitness center is very dirty. Several lights were out. None of the TV's worked and the equipment needs maintenances. The elliptical was so hard to use it was more taxing on your joints. (Same issues I reported last year at our stay. Along with the 1st day…

title: Location location!!
review: Got a 1 bedroom suite facing the ocean & had a great view off our screened in balcony. The room was very nice, had everything we needed. It was very quiet, perfect for a getaway!!  We walked to town & several other nearby places to eat. While in Ft. Myers order beach bread!!!!

title: Review from a hotelier
review: Dear Carol P,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your comments with us. We’re delighted to hear you had such an enjoyable stay at our resort. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Needs improvement
review: Our room appeared to be clean, updated and nicely decorated. The cleaning staff forgot to clean out the coffee filter and pot,not a big deal until it happened again. The sofa sleeper was left half closed since we were not able to close it our selves. We booked six appointments in their spa only to find out that we had to go to another location about located about 20 minutes away from Diamond head. I was charged $5 extra for a deep tissue massage and my cousin was not charged any extra amount. There are obviously  some issues with a nearby lake in which they open a channel to let the over flow of storm water into the ocean. This is the first time I hadn't swam in the ocean on a vacation of mine, which was very disappointing. We were told it was  due to the recent hurricane.

title: Another awesome vacay stay!!!!!
review: Dear CinFin5534,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We deeply apologize for any inconvenience and frustration you were caused while visiting. The description of your stay is not at all representative of a typical DiamondHead experience. Please feel free to reach out to me directly if you would like to further discuss your stay.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Beautiful beach!
review: What can I say, this resort is still our most favorite place to stay!!!    Our stays have always been a consistent "pleasant experience", from the cleanliness, friendliness and helpful staff.    Honestly, you will not be disappointed.  They offer so many great amenities and everything is within walking distance.

title: Getting dated and lazy
review: Dear Angie K,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your comments with us. Nothing makes us happier than guests who frequent our resort and continuously have wonderful experiences. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Better than anticipated!
review: The suite overlooked the beach, had a large balcony with 2 chaise long, 4 chairs and 2 tables so look over the Gulf of Mexico.  Orange and yellow interior colors, comfortable bed and kitchenette.  When we got there, they had to fix the phones, the TV and the fridge, but after that all was well.  The sound of the waves lull you to sleep.  Lots of places to eat, and a big bar/restaurant right on the beach next to the pool.  Parasailing, wave runners, kayaks all right there, and 2 chaises with blue umbrella in a line as you approach the water.  Sand like flour, and lovely views.

title: Best on the Beach
review: We are local Fort Myers residents and small business owners, so getting away can be tricky. We love heading to the beach for a few days and Diamond Head is an awesome choice for anyone. Great sized rooms, beautiful view and nice amenities. The staff is always friendly and accommodating. We tend to spend most of the time at the pool and the service there is great. The pool is clean and large enough. Breakfast and lunch menus are well executed, tasty and fresh, but dinner is a little touch and go. Overall, we love this spot and will always return when time permits.

title: You get what you pay for!
review: Dear Rob F,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. It’s a huge compliment to us that we’ve secured such a positive, lasting impression. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: This place need a lot improvements.
review: Nice location on the beach. I was only there for one night for a conference nearby. When I arrived at around 7p there were no bell people on the ground floor, which would of been ok except that finding the lobby was rather puzzling. It was on the third floor. Once I found it all was ok. It was clean and bright. Got a bracelet for key. Worked well. There didn't seem to be too much going on but it is off season. I didn't check out the pool bar on the beach but it looked fun for vacationing. The lounge was empty and I could understand closing early on the off season if you post it. I ate at Chloe's restaurant. The bread and pepper jelly was delish! I had a glass of Sauvignon Blanc from Chili it was good. I also had a grilled chicken salad with raspberry vinaigrette and walnuts. The…

title: Great for the Family
review: We visiting the Fort Myers Beach second time for my fiance birthday. We had a wonderful experience first time, but unfortunately not this time, because of o luck of luxury in this hotel.  They don't  have enough staff:  1) housekeeping coming around 3pm 2) changing pool towels should be more closer to the pool or beach, but not on the 2nd floor on a front desk. 3) people eating while they in a Hot Tub and nobody from hotel saying anything to them. 4) restaurant and  bar was closed at 8pm. 5) nobody removed a tables, umbrellas and chairs form the lounge on a second  floor(in time of the Hermine hurricane-storm) for you to wonder: will it  fly to parking lot on a ground floor and hit your car or your lucky tonight. And most frustrating it is a call on my cell phone to schedule an…

title: Ideal location
review: Dear 777Tanya777,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent experience with us. As you can imagine, we’re disappointed to hear certain aspects of our resort did not meet your expectations. The description of your stay does not at all reflect a typical DiamondHead experience, as I’m sure you know based on your previous stay with us. Please know that Tropical Storm Hermine was not a threat to our area and we do carefully monitor all storms to assess what actions should be taken on a case-by-case basis. Your feedback is appreciated and we hope you have the chance to stay with us again soon so that we may have the opportunity to improve upon your recent visit.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Not a four-and-a-half star resorts.
review: People working at this property are very nice. But unfortunately the two different rooms we stayed in we're not very nice. The sofas are sleeper sofas so every time you sit on them they squeak and they are very uncomfortable and they are very worn. The walls are stained the edges of the doors are really dirty the carpet in my first room on level 7 was disgusting so I got moved to the 8th floor which was better but the walls are stained and the patio door would not shut without great force. It would close so far but then you had to drag it. Our bed was normally not made only straightened and we were there 5 days and our Sheets were never changed. I would like to say once again John the bellhop was very very friendly and the young woman at the front desk I believe her name was…

title: very nice but not what I would consider luxurious
review: Dear syd1962,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a thorough review. While we’re glad you enjoyed our friendly team, we’re disappointed to hear certain aspects of our resort did not meet your expectations. As you mentioned, we are currently in the process of updating our units, which are expected to be complete within the next few months. These upgrades will include new flooring, walk-in tiled showers, new kitchen and bathroom cabinets and granite countertops, and more. We appreciate your feedback and hope you have the chance to stay with us again soon so that we may have the opportunity to show you a much better time.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Super location, nice rooms, and friendly staff
review: This is probably one of the more prestigious places on Ft Myers Beach and it was VERY nice....roomy, very clean, comfortable bed, located on the beach, nice accommodating and knowledgeable staff.  However we visited during off season so for the price we paid, I felt it was fair.  If I had to have paid more for the condo, I would have felt it wasn't worth the price.  A/C unit kept kitchen area nice and cold but bedroom didn't get the air as much so you had to leave the bedroom door open...there are no ceiling fans or fans for that matter that might have helped the situation.  The hotel is not soundproof at all...we could hear neighbors opening their sliding glass doors and toilets flushing.  It wasn't crowded when we stayed so it was overall quiet for us but can't imagine how…

title: Awesome!
review: Love this place! I've stayed here twice now and really enjoyed the hotel/resort.  The pool is nice and clean, the rooms have a screened in patio, the bar is fun and located with a view of the ocean. It also serves a quality grouper sandwich. The staff is super friendly. Love the cabanas that are available in season. Bikes are free to use.  If I had to pick one negative, the wifi could use an upgrade. Still, we're already booked for spring break 2017! Fun place to stay.

title: Great trip great service
review: Great room overlooking the beach! Comfortable and clean with a small kitchen setup for quick snacks. Staff is awesome and very accommodating. Beautiful beach with fun outside bar and pool. Restaurant has delicious choices with excellent servers. We come back every year for a quick fun getaway....so worth it!

title: Nightmare
review: We booked our week through AMEX.   Fort Myers Beach was a new destination for us. We travel every year to celebrate our anniversary. This year was 43 years. Upon our arrival we were told at check-in that there was some construction going on, BUT it should not effect our stay. The next morning at exactly 9am the jack hammering over our heads started. The noise was deafening. Every day! 9am until 5pm the jack hammering was unrelenting. The noise was heard at the pool and even to the beach. At NO TIME were we notified in advance of the construction by the resort or for that matter, by AMEX. Then to and insult to injury the beautiful crystal blue water of the Gulf in front of the resort was the color of concrete. They were dredging the bay and dumping the sand into the gulf. We will…

title: Vacation
review: Dear mmlawson,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. We’re so flattered you chose to celebrate such a special occasion at our resort. I can assure you that the description of your stay is not at all representative of a typical DiamondHead experience. Please know that dredging is completed once every four years to renourish our beach and that we did give guests the option to use our sister property’s facilities and beach, located just 3 miles south of our resort. I apologize if this was not properly communicated to you during your stay. We appreciate your feedback and hope you have the chance to stay with us again soon so that we may have the opportunity to present ourselves in a light for which our repeat guests and owners have highlighted in previous reviews.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Pretty Shot Out but will be Nice
review: My stay was back in 2009. Best vacation ever. The outside bar/lunch was excellent the servers were the greatest girls. Rented Jet Ski's had a blast. Pool and jacuzzi were just great. What sealed the deal was dinner. My husband and my son in-law really enjoyed the steak dinners. Overall our family vacation was the best vacation ever. Plan to go back in 2017.

title: Our go to vacation spot in Ft. Myers Beach
review: The hotel is under renovation.  The first negative is that it's difficult to find the lobby.  It is located on the second floor so park then go up to check in.  The hotel is pretty worn out as is reflected by the lobby, the furnishings, the tiles and carpets.  I asked how in the world the place got a 4.5 star rating. The clerk said, "It's the best in THIS area" which was true.  It's run down but will be nice just in a questionable area and some of the folks I saw on the beach reflected a "different lifestyle culture".  The Room was clean as was the pool.  The restaurants in hotel were overpriced, but you can walk to a local place.  Go BEFORE dark.

title: Lovely facility
review: Dear kysdaddy,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We’re disappointed to hear certain aspects of our resort did not meet your expectations. As you mentioned, we are in the process of renovating our units, which will include new floor tiling, walk-in tiled showers, bathroom cabinets with granite counters, kitchen cabinets with granite countertops, and more. We hope you have the chance to stay with us in the near future so that we may have the opportunity to improve upon your recent stay.   Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great stay! Will definitely be back:)
review: My husband and I came for our 1 yr anniversary/baby moon. From the time I called to make reservations I was immediately impressed with the customer service of Melissa. The grounds are clean, the view is breathtaking, the guest service is outstanding! There is plenty to do for all ages-the pool bar & restaurant both have delicious food and great specials! There's also live music which we loved! We will for sure be back!!!

title: Great vacation!
review: Dear Kimmeekiss,  Thank you for taking a moment to provide us with your feedback. We’re so flattered you chose to celebrate such a special occasion at our resort and had such a great experience. Your intent to return means a lot and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Fun family vacation
review: This hotel stay was fantastic! The service from the parking lot staff, front desk staff to the pool server was top notch! No issues checking in and the rooms are spacious and very clean. The drinks at the pool were delicious!! Weather said it would rain all week but the sun was out every day!  Our only complaint was Chloe's restaurant where we ate for breakfast. The food was not very good and the server was half asleep.   Venturing out: Lani Kai has one of the best views on the beach from their roof top bar. The hotel on the outside looks a little scary but take the elevator to the top where you'll find one fine dining restaurant and one outside bar. We ate dinner there a few times and went back the last day for the $2.99 breakfast which was very good!    The Salty Crab was a…

title: Great service
review: The staff was the best!  Maria especially!!  Everyone was helpful and interested in making our stay as good as possible. The pool was great with food and beverages available. Our room was very comfortable with space and a beautiful view. We enjoyed our week tremendously!!!

title: Excellent hotel
review: We had very good service at the hotel but unfortunately the beach was awful!!! We were very disappointed they are dredging about 100 ft. from the beach the bottom was slimy and it smelled awful!!!! We went to the spa I had a massage and a faceial  the ladies were wonderful!

title: Skip Ft. Meyers Beach
review: The staff are very friendly. But the beach was full of sludge water and had a bad smell, so we couldn't go swimming. The pool and Jacuzzi were nice but had a lot of bleach, I have asthma so am sensitive. Also, the construction on the road ruined our hopes to biking with our kids. Skip Ft. Meyers Beach and stay on Sanibel/Captiva.

title: Great Hotel & Staff
review: Dear Dee M,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your feedback with us. While we’re glad you enjoyed our friendly team, we do apologize for any frustrations you were caused during your recent stay with us. Please know that dredging is completed once every four years to renourish our beach. Our team did offer guests access to our sister property’s facilities and beach, just 3 miles south of our property. We appreciate your input and hope you have the chance to stay with us again so that we may have the opportunity to present ourselves in a light for which repeat guests and owners have highlighted in previous reviews.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great Getaway hotel, Outstanding Staff, Beautiful Beach
review: The staff are extremely friendly and accommodating.  the room is spacious and clean.  Had a great view of the Beach.  The cabana Tiki Bar had great food and relatively inexpensive. The fish tacos were fresh and really tasty.    As for the beach, they were dredging near it for the marina's boat access.  Unfortunately, it caused the beach to not smell well and have a muddy, slippery, sticky feel when you walk in.  The waters barely had anyone in it because of it.  They did suggest we were welcome to use the facilities of one of their other two sister locations.  We did and that beach was beautiful with no issues from the dredging as it was far enough away.  We would definitely come back here but only after first calling and asking about the beach condition as that is the reason we…

title: Chloe's
review: 4day/5night stay....Diamondhead was a great hotel for a quiet getaway (granted, it was an off-season visit). The staff is outstanding, incredibly friendly, and knowledgeable. Specifically Kim at Chloe's Lounge, Peter at Chloe's Steak and Seafood, as well as Vicki and Jessica at the front desk.  The staff dealt with a blown transformer (loss of power to the hotel...Florida Power had it fixed with 7 hours) with far more patience than I would have shown. Vicki and Jessica were providing updates and taking care of guest needs, and Kim kept everything flowing smoothly at the bar with great service and recommendations.  The beach is quiet and beautiful with on-site rentals of chairs/umbrellas as well as watercraft and parasailing for those needing adventure. The pool was nice for…

title: Average at best!
review: Dear Chris M,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a detailed review. We’re so glad you had such an enjoyable time at our resort and that our team was able to make your stay extra special. I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great Views, Friendly Staff, Great Location!
review: This resort is located right on the beach and offers beautiful views from every suite.  The top floors of the resort are reserved for timeshare owners.  DiamondHead is geared towards couples, not families, and offers only 1-bedroom suites. Each suite offers 1 bedroom with attached bath, a small, but comfortable living area with pull-out sofa, a screened lanai and a small efficiency kitchenette with sink, microwave, and dishwasher.  There is a restaurant and bar/lounge onsite as well as a full-service spa and salon.  Ice machines are located on every even-numbered  floor.  The pool is nice, but somewhat small for the size of the resort and it is challenging at peak times to get lounge chairs with an umbrella for some shade.  This resort is conveniently located near restaurants…

title: Vacation 2016
review: This place lived up to every expectation we had! From the friendly staff going above and beyond to accommodate our needs to the overcoming "no worries" lifestyle that is Fort Myers Beach Florida! Every staff member even has where they're from on their name  tag which helped spark many conversations with some absolutely wonderfully friendly people. It's so nice to travel and not meet a bunch of strangers. They really made it feel as cozy as home. Great poolside bar with amazing open air view of the Gulf, beach, and pool. There's also a nice lounge upstairs with a large deck area attached. My first time to Fort Myers Beach but wouldn't dream of staying anywhere else! Thanks for making it one of the greatest vacations yet!

title: Great views and comfort
review: Dear biggestrich,  Thank you for leaving us such a flattering review. We’re so glad you felt right at home during your stay, as that’s how we aim to make every guest feel. I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great place, great staff!
review: The hotel was very clean and accommodating for a time share property. We requested a high floor beach front, sunset view. We had the beach but not the sunset. That turned out to be a premium and inevitably not worth the extra money. The rooms were clean and well equipped. Everything we needed was there for a long weekend. My only complaint about the room was that this beautiful gulf view was diminished by an old screened in patio. The patio itself was great, very spacious and well furnished. Otherwise, this property needs to move to a more beach friendly area. The water in the traditionally clear green/blue water was brown and full of algae as could be seen lined up on the sand. Also the pool area and the spa was poorly kept. There was debris in both and no staff members to…

title: Great resort with an even better staff
review: My son and I are just finishing up our stay at Diamond Head, and we could not be happier.  Three things I look for in beach properties are on-site restaurant, easy access to the beach and a nice pool.  Diamond Head meets all of these and then some.  The rooms are large and comfortable, with beautiful bathrooms.  The staff could not be nicer or more helpful.  I spent every morning out on the beach, and all afternoon at the pool/bar area.  Pool towels are plentiful, and there were lots of lounge chairs and tables to accommodate everyone.  The food was delicious (both in the main restaurant and at the pool), which one doesn't always get at a hotel restaurant.  We were very pleased since many times we just didn't feel like going anywhere after a full day in the sun.  Prices are what…

title: Awesome Resort but we did experience a few setbacks
review: This is an Awesome Resort. Large rooms, Poolside Bar, High end Restaurant. Unfortunately we did experience a few negatives that were beyond they're control. Lightning struck blowing up they're transformer. They do have a back up generator, but it only supplies limited power. No Power,(AC), lights, in room for (6) hrs.  Also they are dredging off shore about 150 yards out (24hrs a day) ? You might want to inquire before your stay if this is still going on. Because so much for the soft sounds of the gently waves lowing you to sleep. All you could hear was the sound of a large Diesel Barge all night long..

title: Best on-beach accommodations in Fort Myers Beach
review: Dear Patrick M,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. While we’re glad you enjoyed our spacious accommodations and on property dining, I’d like to sincerely apologize for the inconvenience during your stay. Please know that this was an isolated experience and we certainly did everything we could to resolve this situation in a timely manner. After reaching out to FPL, we were under the impression that the power would be out for 12 hours. However, our team was fortunately able to restore the electricity in 4 hours. I’d also like to apologize for any frustrations regarding the noise on the beach. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we hope you give us the opportunity to present ourselves in a light for which our repeat guests and owners have highlighted in previous reviews.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Outstanding property!
