review: Despite a reservations snafu that took me awhile to check in, my stay at Diamondhead was very nice. I wanted to get directly to the beach from the Ft. Myers airport as soon as possible, and this seems to be one of the nicer hotel options on Fort Myers Beach. The room/suite was spacious and I LOVED the screened in balcony. Great views of the beach, sunset and storms as they rolled in over the Gulf from my 7th floor accommodations.   My room/s were clean and bed was very comfortable, but the couch was not - creaked whenever I sat down on it. My room included a full kitchenette, but I ordered room service breakfasts instead - very tasty and very prompt delivery. Had a couple frozen drinks and a Cuban sandwich one night at the Cabanas beach bar, also very tasty. (Being an Indiana…

title: Great Accomodations but some issues
review: This resort offers quality accommodations, an excellent staff, and views of the beach from every room. There are not enough good things to say about this resort. Each room includes a kitchenette, living room, expansive balcony, a nice-sized bedroom with separate bath. Everything is immaculate! I will return.

title: fun place!
review: TV did not work properly but was fixed.  Telephone had an issue that was not fixed.  Couch looks great in pictures but was horribly uncomfortable. We complained but nothing done about it.  Air conditioner also broke due to lack of maintenance but was fixed.  For the price, you should get a decent couch and fewer to no issues.  Staff though was extremely friendly.

title: Great place!
review: Right before our arrival I called and spoke with Vicky. I requested a low floor room and she wrote the notes. (But did not make any promises) When we finally arrived, check in was a breeze. In a matter of minutes we were in our suite, (low floor) as requested and we had the view of the pool and partial ocean view. Awesome! The room was spotless upon arrival, and continued to be like that throughout our stay.  Staff was friendly and professional.

title: Best place to stay in FMB!!!
review: Dear jcmr63,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We’re happy to hear you had such an enjoyable stay at our resort. I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Exceptional property
review: This was my first time to Ft. Myers beach and I cannot say enough great things about DiamondHead Resort!  Our room was very spacious, clean, and comfortable.. and also had an amazing view!! All of the staff at DiamondHead were extremely nice and helpful. Randy and Kevin (bartenders at Cabanas) were fabulous and made the BEST drinks! We looked forward to chatting with them each day and they always made us laugh!! When researching different resorts to stay at in FMB, our first choice was to stay at Pink Shell resort. We decided to book with DiamondHead because it was $100 less per night than Pink Shell... and I am so so glad we did! DiamondHead resort is in a much better location and everything is within walking distance! I would highly recommend DiamondHead when you're looking…

title: From check in to check out the staff front desk and all were very professional..This is our new favorite place to stay!!
review: Dear krweinhold,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave us such a flattering review. We’re so glad you had such a great time at our resort. From our friendly team to our comfortable accommodations, it sounds like your stay with us was top notch. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to having you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Unforgettable Wedding!
review: This resort epitomizes the perfect getaway! The accommodations, staff, and location are tops. It is on a great expanse of beach directly on the Gulf of Mexico where every room has a view of the water.

title: Dream Wedding at DiamondHead
review: Recently attended the beach wedding of close friends; the DH made the whole week seem magical.   Loved the gulf view from our room and the bay views from the balconies.  Very nice pool and awesome beach bar, that had acoustic acts every day.  The wedding itself was absolutely beautiful and the bride said that the staff was great.  The food at the wedding was tremendous. Loved the Diamondhead Resort, the only issue the $30 per day charge for two chairs and an umbrella (additional $10 for 3rd chair - What? - at their rates, didn't think that was fair).

title: Great girls trip!
review: Dear lovethebeach1114,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you had such a wonderful stay and enjoyed your friend’s beautiful wedding. We appreciate your feedback and hope you come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: The View!!
review: We really enjoyed our stay at Diamondhead!  Our suite was beautiful, the view was amazing!  We did have problems with our toilet throughout our stay but the maintenance workers were very attentive and tried to repair it.  All of the staff that we encountered (with the exception of one) were very helpful and inviting.   We really enjoyed Chloe's and Cabana's.  The live music and karaoke were wonderful!  The hotel is in a perfect location - within walking distance to many restaurants,  bars, and shops.  But still far enough away from all of the hustle and bustle - very relaxing!  This is a great hotel and was perfect for our girls getaway!  We hope to return someday.

title: Nice!
review: Dear Shana E,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you had a wonderful girls’ getaway at our resort. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Wedding Resort Experience
review: First off, the view was absolutely amazing! We had an ocean view suite, which they upgraded us to when we got there. So worth it! Huge lanai with table and chairs. Just beautiful.  The bar was great, the drinks were all good. We basically had one of everything lol (we were there for 5 days)  The pool was so relaxing, and the hot tubes were just perfect. We saw 2 weddings that weekend on the beach, both were beautiful. The beach access is right off the bar and SO convenient.  Definitely worth the trip! The price wasn't bad either!

title: Great frozen drinks served by a great bartender!
review: My wife and I biked down to the Cabana Bar at Diamond Head and I am sure it will turn into a regular stop for us. Out bartender Kevin was great. He was quick to recommend different frozen drinks to help us battle the hot weather. Great drinks, service and atmosphere!

title: Loved it!
review: Dear Jamis2,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your comments with us. We’re so glad you and your wife had such a wonderful experience at Cabañas Beach Bar & Grille. Kevin is a great asset to our team and we’re happy to hear he was able to make your experience extra special. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Meh...
review: We recently stayed here June 4-11. It was the best family vacation we have had yet, even with the storm Colin we had. Rooms were clean and slept 4 of us comfortably. Screened porches are very nice with wonderful views of the pool and ocean. The Cabana bar has amazing food and workers that are friendly and know how to make their guests happy. Drinks and food were great, reasonably priced and we ate lunch and dinner there several days. The pier and downtown shops are perfect walking distance, not too long or short. One of the few vacations we have had that left us actually feeling like we had a vacation. We will definitely be going back.

title: Awesome place to stay, right on the beach
review: Dear jen3358,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We’re so flattered to hear this was your best family vacation yet! From those amazing views from the balcony to our beach bar & grille, it sounds like your stay with us was ideal. Your intent to return means a lot and we look forward to showing you another wonderful getaway soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great resort!
review: We stayed at DiamondHead Beach Resort last week.  We had a suite with a gulf view that was nice, but I was not overly impressed with the room.  The room was clean and was big enough for our family of 4, but our exhaust fan didn't work in the bathroom, and the shower is extremely small-even my 14 year old son made a comment!  The resort itself was OK.  The reception staff were friendly and helpful, and Wendy who does the kids activities was very nice.  They have a cabana bar but it closes very early.  We ate at Chloe's and the food and service were good, prices were high.    The location was OK, but I was under the impression it was closer to the restaurants and shopping area.  The road is under construction so there aren't always sidewalks to get where you need.  We ended up…

title: held up to all my expectations. Clean rooms, fun atmosphere, right on beach, walk to pier
review: Room on 7th floor over looking garbage dumpster  That would be my only negative cause u can hear dumpsters being loaded and vents from restaurant are on that side.  Would request a room higher up or overlooking pool area but then no sunset view from balcony. Trade off. but definitely going back

title: Wonderful Family Owned Hotel
review: Dear Kathy K,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. While we’re glad you enjoyed the cleanliness of our accommodations and beachfront location, we apologize for the noise caused by the outdoor dumpsters and air vents. Your intent to return means a lot to us and we will certainly do our best to find a room that is better suited to your needs next time your return.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Such A Beautiful View
review: About a week ago myself and boyfriend were approached by Dan at the local bagel and waffle shop (tuckaway bagel and waffle which is AMAZING!) and asked if we would be interested in seeing the hotel after a little small talk, it was our last day and we figured what the heck, we have nothing else to do! We knew what we were going into and we had been looking for a vacation plan(this is not a time-share like people keep posting, there's a difference between the two) instead of continuing to piggy back off my parents and be able to pass it on to our daughter when she gets older. We were greeted by Kim who was fabulous and welcoming and of course did all the talking up of the hotel and features we were able to take advantage of. This isn't like your typical vacation plan package,…

title: Decent, not our favorite
review: Dear Jmpowers4039,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a detailed review. We’re so glad you decided to become a Vacation Club member! We look forward to showing you a wonderful time in the near future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Nice hotel near Times Sq, right on the beach!
review: We were staying at Red Coconut Campground right on the beach and walked down the beach to Diamondhead for a couple of drinks. They have every frozen drink possible! We went three times during the week of our stay.  The Dirty Banana was the best frozen drink i have EVER had! Yummy!! The only thing we had to eat were the onion rings and they were delicious and they give you ALOT in an order. The servers/bartenders were very friendly and took good care of us!!

title: Best of Both Worlds
review: I actually stayed in August of 2014. Around this time, the hotel was quite slow, beach was very quiet, and a minimally occupied pool deck--exactly what I went to Fort Myers Beach for. I loved being on beach property, hotel owned bikes available for use, and a walk away from all the entertainment near the epicenter of the bar and restaurant scene, but still far enough that lights and sounds didn't invade the space.  We ate breakfast at the hotel restaurant one morning, but as they were about to close between shifts, I suspect we got the "leftovers" of what was offered, and though the service was by no means poor, or even lackluster for that matter, we could tell they were trying to close up. No big deal to me personally, as I don't necessarily like being bothered by a million…

title: Greatest staff anywhere!
review: Dear Kristina B,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We’re happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, from our guest bicycles to our convenient, beachfront location. We appreciate your feedback and hope you come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great Place To Relax
review: I come to this resort once a year for business but the staff here certainly make sure it is not all business! They are friendly and eager to help in any way possible! The rooms and views are amazing but should there be an issue, usually a single phone call takes care of everything.

title: Absolute BEST Hotel on Fort Myers Beach
review: Dear Bethany M,  Thank you for leaving us such a flattering review. We’re so glad that our team was able to provide you with a one of a kind experience that you cannot get anywhere else! I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team and we look forward to your next visit with us.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Friendly staff and great location
review: Just returned home to the UK after spending 12 days here. This was our third vacation here. What a great place and location, all very convenient, no parking issues, a really relaxed atmosphere which we wanted and it did not disappoint . We had a fantastic beach and sunset view room which we had stayed in previously. The beach location is quite unique being so close to the ocean which gives you the option of sitting by the great pool or on the beach. We spent many evenings in Chloe's Lounge having a drink or two served by the very friendly Kim who mixed the perfect drinks.  If I had to fault anything the Internet connection was quite slow at times and also the room was really in need of a refurbishment - having said that it will not put me off coming in the future. Thank you all…

title: Outstanding!
review: Everything and nearly everyone was perfection! The bellman services were excellent (Dave and John are your go-to men!) , Vicki at reception made check in seamless and pleasant! And all the dozens and dozens of hotels I've stayed at, none have ever let you have your room as soon as it's been cleaned (which in our case was 3 hours before actual check in)! The servers at all of the bars and restaurants are fabulous. There was the exception of about 2 specific servers in the poolside bar/grille Cabanas, that had a less than pleasant demeanor and one of the two in particular needs some education on how to even wait tables! DiamondHead would also do well to put som focus on entertainment activities. Karaoke at Chloe's lounge was a blast though. That being said - literally there isn't…

title: I would suggest DiamondHead for any wedding on the beach
review: Dear Amber M,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you had such a wonderful time at our resort, from our friendly team to the food and service at Chloës. I do apologize for any frustrations encountered at Cabañas, as this certainly does not live up to the standards we have set for ourselves. We appreciate your feedback and hope you have the chance to visit us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Love at first sight!
review: My mom chose DiamondHead Beach Resort Hotel on Fort Myers Beach for our wedding. Now that we've had our wedding - I can honestly say, my mom hit it out of the park. I'm so glad she chose this hotel. Kimberly Gant is in charge of the events at the hotel - and she was available via email and phone ANY time I needed her. In the days leading up to the event - and on the day of the wedding, Kimberly was calm and professional - and handled everything with grace and kindness. I would suggest getting married at this hotel solely because of her. I also cannot say enough about the banquet manager, Marcel. He was as enthusiastic about our wedding as we were! He was there until it ended - making sure our guests were absolutely happy. (And, he worked the next morning at 7am!)  This hotel is…

title: Fun In The Sun!
review: Dear KathrynChicago,  Thanks so much for leaving us such a kind, thorough review. We’re so glad you chose our resort to celebrate such a special occasion! Kimberly and Marcel are wonderful assets to our team and I look forward to sharing your kind words with them. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Wonderful Weekend Getaway
review: My wife and I first traveled to Fort Myers Beach and stayed at Diamondhead 9 years ago.  We were warmly greeted and got right into our spacious room.  The views off of the balcony are breath taking and out on the beach even better.  We haven't missed a year here since we started and have even purchased ownership in Sunstream Vacation Club!  We absolutely can't wait to get back!

title: Great time!
review: Room was CLEAN. The cleanest pool I have ever seen. Kimberly in the bar, Jordan the Chef, John, all made our trip special. The balcony was screened. No bugs! Great food on site! The walk in shower was a nice touch as well.

title: BEST PROPERTY ON THE BEACH!!!!
review: Dear mncoltsfan,  Thank you for taking a moment to provide us with your feedback. We’re happy to hear you had such an enjoyable time at our resort and that our team was able to make your stay extra special. I look forward to sharing your kind words with Kimberly, Jordan, and John and hope to have you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Magnificent Views!
review: I have been vacationing in the Fort Myers/Sanibel/Captiva area for over 20 years and have found that Diamondhead is the best spot to vacation.  We decided to purchase a time share there in 2009 and have used it every year since! Waking up to the sights and sounds of the Gulf of Mexico is a dream come true.  Being a business owner it is the perfect place to unwind, have great food and entertainment.  We also meet some interesting people there!  The staff always remembers us and it feels like family.  Starting our vacation with a massage in the spa is a must for us.  Can't think of a better way to spend our entertainment budget. We now go two or three times a year!

title: Great for a girl's trip
review: Dear l0rigardner,  Thanks so much for leaving us such a flattering review! Nothing makes us happier than happy owners who continuously have wonderful experiences at our resort. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to seeing you soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: "Can't Wait To Return to Diamonhead!"
review: When I first got to this resort, I felt confused. It was painted gray and looked like an office building. But when I opened the door to my room...surprise! The room was happy, with vibrant colors, but most of all...the views in my one bedroom beachfront suite were spectacular! We had a huge, screened balcony with chairs and a table. I woke up early to listen to the waves and watch the ocean and the sky as morning approached. Forget other resorts that charge a bundle and you have to jerk your head out through the window to see the ocean. DiamondHead delivers a true ocean view! I ordered room service and we had a nice breakfast on the porch. Also, the resort was very clean. Another positive note: True relaxation. I did not hear the usual vacuum cleaners in the hallway like I…

title: Great place to stay!
review: Great place to stay.  It's clean and quiet.  Close enough to everything but also just far enough away.  The rooms and decks are large.  A message at the spa is a must, they are great.  The food and beverages are also really good.  The frozen mudslide was to die for.  Poolside bingo is exciting and fun.  Bingo dance!

title: Mothers day brunch
review: Dear Kymm S,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you had such a great time at our resort, from our on property spa to our poolside activities. We appreciate your feedback and hope you come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Beautiful place, too bad they allow smoking.
review: Stayed here on mothers day weekend. Nice weather the beach was great right before going to it you got the bars with awesome tropical drinks and appertizers. Live music and also enjoy any sports game that day. The room was comfortable,two tvs,king size bed,nice and cold . For the kids you have a pool, beach vollyball,jet skies and more. The resort is near shops and restaurants walking distances. A nice morning walk on the beach is nice and the sunset is great. Hope you enjoy your stay like i did...

title: Nice Stay
review: Dear Bob5by,  Thank you for staying with us at DiamondHead. It’s great to hear how much you enjoyed your stay, from our beachfront location to our live music and children’s activities. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great location, beach, pool, nice room, great staff
review: My husband and I recently visited Ft. Myers Beach Fl, we stayed at the beautiful Diamondhead Resort and Spa. My first thought and one that will linger I’m afraid is THEY ALLOW SMOKING. Everywhere you go, you see cigarette butts, on the floor in the bar, in the sand at the bar, on the beach, on the streets, sit down for dinner at a restaurant to enjoy the sunset, and the table next to you is full of smokers, sit at a bar to enjoy and evening out, and the guy next to you is smoking, I sat on my balcony Monday night to enjoy the evening, and yes I was overwhelmed by someone smoking so close that all of the smoke came to my balcony. There is a cigar shop so one night after dinner we went to an open air bar, (that’s why you go on a beach vacation right?) and there was a whole table…

title: Nancy W
review: This was our first time at this resort and we throughly enjoyed our stay.  Looking forward to returning for another great vacation.  We met a ton of very nice people and enjoyed the daily activities at the pool. The staff is very attentive and courteous and always willing to help.  I would like to especially mention Maria who took care of us on multiple occasions in the lounge and by the pool. She is an outstanding server. She always has a smile on her face and is a very hard worker.  We never had to wait or try to track her down by the pool she checked on us frequently to make sure we had everything we needed. Kudos to Maria! I hope the resort realizes what a great employee she is.

title: Amazing Resort!!
review: Dear Nancy W,  Thanks so much for leaving us such a flattering review. We’re delighted to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us and that you intend to return. Maria is a wonderful asset to our team and we’re so glad she was able to make your experience extra special. I look forward to sharing your kind words with her and can’t wait to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: DiamondHead No WIFI
review: My husband and I visited at the end of April and we had a great time! Our room was HUGE! We were not expecting the room to be that big and our view was spectacular! We loved sitting on the screened in balcony and listening to the waves. The staff was very friendly and made us feel so welcomed. It's RIGHT on the beach which is a plus! And the beach wasn't crowded at all..nice and quiet. It's close by to Times Square shopping center. We walked there a couple times. You can either walk there on the beach or street...which the street had a lot of construction going on but it didn't bother us much. We had a car, but the only time we needed it was when we took a day trip to Sanibel Island, which is about 30 mins away. Otherwise, everything is close by that you can just walk. The…

title: Mrs
review: Dear MelToddHarsh,  Thanks so much for leaving us such a thorough review. It’s a huge compliment to us that we’ve secured such a positive, lasting impression, from our friendly team to our beach bar & grille. We are delighted by your kind words and look forward to having you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: "Diamond" in the rough!
review: Extremely poor WIFI. Also lots of street construction. The bars close at 8pm Mon -  Thursday and 10pm Fri &  Sat. Then they tried to get us to purchase a Time Share. Not going to happen. Also you really need a car to get around. Things are really spread out.

title: Great place to stay - Clean
review: This place was very clean and very comfortable!  The staff is very friendly and the food was good and hot.  You can walk out of the hotel to the left or right and walk to any other place you would like to see.  Very centralized,  WiFi very slow!

title: Nice outside pool and by the beach!
review: Dear Kathy V,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We’re so glad you had such a great time at our resort, from our friendly team to our comfortable accommodations. We appreciate your input and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: DiamondHead Resort Visit
review: The hotel is very nice and they offer free parking. The pool outside is good size, especially for small kids. The beach is just few steps from the outside cabana bar by the sand. Very nice location too!

title: Treat yourself to a stay at the Diamondhead Beach Resort
review: Dear alexandrinogonsalves,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you had such a great time at our resort, from our beachfront location to our beautiful pool area. We appreciate your feedback and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Unethical
review: This was a great hotel. We had a beachfront room with the ocean right outside of our room. There was also a balcony. The hotel had a restaurant in it also that was delicious. The best part about the hotel was the pool area that is also waited on. We met some very awesome bartenders, there names were Alex, Kevin, and Carly. Great people and were always willing to help!

title: Fabulous food/drinks, HUGE balcony and living space, horrible WIFI
review: This has been my 4th stay at Diamondhead.  I love the fact that this resort offers a great bar/beach menu which is awesome.  Their shrimp selection is highly recommended.  Each day offers specials that are 1/2 price deals.  I love foo foo drinks and boy do they deliver on that !  Mudslides and frozen lime aides are yummy.  There's a huge variety of drinks to order which makes it fun while you're sitting outside soaking up the atmosphere.  Inside the resort is a choice of sitting outside again or a dining room with a more formal menu to order off of.  Kind of pricey tho.  There is an inside bar as well with nightly drink specials with entertainment.  Wednesday nite is Karoke.  The breakfast selection is the best.  Great selection.  The rooms are huge along with the balcony which…

title: Very nice accommodations, good location, great view
review: Dear LOUDAK,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you had such a great time at our resort, from our on property dining to our spacious accommodations. I do apologize for any technical difficulties connecting to our WiFi. We appreciate your feedback and hope you come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Another great trip
review: This was our first visit to the Fort Myers Beach area, so we don't have any experience with other lodging for comparison purposes.  We found the DiamondHead to be very nice. The suite was spacious, clean, comfortable and well-maintained.  We went with the direct ocean-front room, and the view was great.  The balcony is good-sized and nicely furnished. The kitchen area is very  basic (microwave, small fridge, sink, a few dishes and eating utensils).  It is OK for making morning coffee but not very functional for meal preparation other than microwavable items.  The bathroom is good-size and functional but nothing special. The location suited us very well - it is about a mile from the very busy Times Square area, so it is much less crowded and noisy than the section of the beach…

title: Nice rooms. Weird Hallways.
review: Dear FishBob49,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a thorough review. We’re happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, from our spacious accommodations to our convenient location. It’s also great that our team was able to make your stay extra special. We appreciate your feedback and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Disappointed in DiamondHead.
review: Diamondhead is a great place to stay- beautiful beaches and great food. Bicycles are free to ride. Rooms are clean and beds are fabulous. Spring break was a little noisy, but I brought my ear plugs and slept very well. A great place to stay for families with children of all ages (we used to take our kids when they were little) and also a great place for couples.  Great restaurants and bars within walking distance on beachside.

title: Great Location, nice views, rooms need upgrading
review: was there for March spring break but thankfully college kiddies remained further down the beach. The hotel is in a great location on the beach, has a nice pool area, only tried the beachfront Cabanas grill, food was good and drink service excellent around the pool including happy hours and drink specials. Parking was no problem, but you really had to plan your trips out of the hotel, traffic can be pretty stacked up, again, Spring Break so no surprise, not sure what it's like other times of the year. We were on a top floor beach front, amazing views, nice sized balcony. The room itself is just OK, needs an upgrade similar to what they have done on their Club member floors/rooms. One major complaint is despite keeping the kitchen counter free of food and crumbs, had quite an ant…

title: Clean property with curb appeal
review: Dear Traveller13Calgary,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a detailed review. We’re so glad you had such an enjoyable stay, from our beachfront location to Cabanas Beach Bar & Grille. We value your feedback and will certainly use your review to focus on areas in which we may improve.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: "Fun in the sun, and a staff that is first class"
review: We just stayed in this property for spring break. We had 4 in our party (2 adults, and 2 teens). We were a little worried that the girls would be uncomfortable on the pull out sofa bed, but it had a memory foam mattress and the girls said it was very comfortable - not like a typical pull out sofa bed. The property was very clean and well maintained and there was never a long wait for the elevator. The staff was always very friendly. The walk to the "downtown" area was about a half of a mile, so not bad at all. The only thing I didn't like about the property was the quality of the food at the poolside grill. It wasn't good at all, and it was a little pricey. The drinks (cocktails) were very small and expensive - they, however, were tasty :) Other than the grill, this was an…

title: Looking for  beach resort you don't have to leave for anything; then this is it!
review: Dear LuvHaleiwa,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you enjoyed the cleanliness and comfort of our accommodations, friendly team, and convenient, beachfront location. I do apologize if our beach bar & grille did not meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Easter Buffet at Chloes was outstanding
review: This was my second stay at Diamond Head. The resort is very clean and nice. You are right on the beach, and have a Cabanas bar and crew that is second to none. The employees make your stay unbelievable. Highly recommend this resort.

title: Decent Hotel - But watch out for extra costs!
review: We just enjoyed our first family Spring Break at DiamondHead.  The staff is super friendly, amenities were nice, too.  I did not like that the exterior was all gray, but the interior is beautiful.    The biggest complaint is that they charged for umbrellas and chairs on the beach - the reason we chose Diamond Head was in part because of the hotels beach and pier access, we planned to lay around on the beach all day.  So I was disappointed that they charged $35/day for chairs and an umbrella.  I also thought the pool was very small.  My husband thought the breakfast food was just okay.  My kids loved it. They also loved dinner and lunch there, as did I.    They also charged to use their washers and dryers - $2/wash and $2 to dry one load of clothes.  We could have rented a condo…

title: Gross
review: Dear j_foster1234,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you and your family had a great time at our resort and that you enjoyed our friendly team and amenities. I do apologize if there was any miscommunication regarding any additional charges. We appreciate your feedback and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Another great stay
review: Based on exterior only - bar/pool area.  Did not stay here.  If you're a college kid looking for the usual, this is for you.  It's run down, dirty and kind of gross. I did not see or stay in any rooms but can't imagine they're nice based on what I saw on the ground floor.

title: Wonderful Stay, Wonderful Staff, Relaxing Fun in the Sun!
review: Dear BigDaddySmoove,  I can assure you that what you have described does not at all reflect the high standards we hold ourselves to at DiamondHead. Our team works very hard to keep our resort clean and well maintained and we are sincerely shocked by the notes in your review. We hope we have the chance to have you as our guest in the near future so that we can prove this to you first hand.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: So happy with our choice!
review: We just got back after spending a week at Diamondhead.  As always, the staff was friendly and wonderful.  It got chilly a few days and so we ordered extra blankets and they came within minutes.  The room was clean and the view is spectacular.  I really enjoy having a screened in lanai where I can look down at the beach and pool area but with no bugs.    At night I love to turn off the air conditioning and open both patio doors to hear the waves.  A few nights it got a little noisy as we overlooked the hot tubs (one night they were in the hot tubs until around 2am), but overall it was a great trip and I will be coming back for sure!

title: Great views
review: We stayed here during Spring Break 2016. We were on the 11th floor, which afforded great views up the beach towards the pier and Times Square. The room was a two-room suite, which was nice. While pricey, we knew with Spring Break in full swing the cost was going to be high. Two things that bothered us during our stay, both while sitting on the deck: 1. Florida LOVES their leaf blowers. Every morning we got serenaded to the sound of the ocean mixed with the sound of the leaf blowers running for an hour or two cleaning things up. Not sure how to fix that, but it's something to be aware of when staying on the side facing the pier. 2. We also got to smell whatever was cooking either in the hotel or in one of the nearby restaurants, typically something fried. Morning was bacon,…

title: Great Location
review: Dear Jon L,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a thorough review. We’re so glad you enjoyed our convenient, beachfront location and friendly team. I do apologize for any frustrations you encountered regarding the noise from outside as well as the scent. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and will certainly use your experience to focus on areas in which we may improve. Should you choose to offer us a return visit, please reach out to us directly and we will personally take care of you during your time with us.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Fantastic place!
review: Fantastic location. Upgraded to gulf front room, which was worth it for the views, although looked like other rooms had good views too. Easy walk to all the top rated island restaurants but just far enough away from the wild party hotel down the beach. Great location for walking/biking the other way down the beach for a quieter time. Very clean and nicely equipped rooms, good pools, free bikes (although they are getting a bit old). Great to be able to walk out the door to get to Holiday Water Sports, a Trip Advisor top rated activity ( and I agree with that rating).

title: Great mini vacay!
review: Dear 74johna837,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you had such an enjoyable stay and that our location worked so well for you. You’ll have to come back and stay with us again soon so we can show you another fantastic getaway!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great Hotel and Great Location!
review: Second time staying here.  Upgraded room on a high floor- beautiful comfortable & updated. Accidentally left my earrings in the room when I checked out. Called front desk they put me on hold for five minutes and when they returned to the phone, almost were celebrating as much as I was that they found the earrings! Great place with great beautiful natural beauty in quiet location in Florida!

title: Terrible Stay!!
review: Rooms really need upgraded and remodeled! Room had mold bleeding through paint. Paint peeling where they keep painting over! (Seen maintenance do when room emptied). Room was dirty! Carpet in bedroom dirty and sticky. Tiles in bathroom nasty dirty. Housekeeping was terrible. Never swept carpet the 2 weeks we were there. Same dirt when got there was there when left! Linens were changed 1 time in 2 weeks and we had to ask for that! They would turn the sheets to look like changed. Bathroom rug was ready for trash-backing was crumbling on floor and density gone! Couch and chair was dirty and uncomfortable! Internet service was bad and very slow when able to get. Have nice pool area and chairs. Came to enjoy the heated pool-Water was cold whole time there. Asked them to turn heat up…

title: Great location on the Beach, but very Pricey Ocean view Room!
review: Dear Tom T,  As you can imagine, we’re extremely disappointed to hear about your experience, as this certainly isn’t typical of our establishment. We strive to provide each and every guest with the help and support they require and sincerely apologize if this was not reflected during your stay. Please reach out to me directly at your earliest convenience so that we may discuss your stay further.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: The Best!!
review: Paying $325-$400 dollars per night for an ocean view room is something we have done often in the past. First of all let me say, the Diamond Head has one of the best views that we have ever experienced and we have stayed at hotels up and down the Florida coast. The room was a bit disappointing. I guess for the money we paid, we were expecting a 5 star room with all the bells and whistles.It is not a below average room by any means, it just didn't compare to some other hotels we stayed at for the same price. Saying that, It did offer a better view and accommodations than those other comparable hotels. I guess we might have to increase our vacation budget to get both. :}

title: Loved Our Stay
review: We stayed here in mid December, and I can't say enough about The Diamondhead Beach Resort!  The room was spacious, airy, comfortable and afforded a gorgeous view of the Gulf from the balconies off the living room and bedroom.  The bed was big and comfy and we slept like babies!  The staff was another important plus.  Everyone on the staff, from the bell captain to the servers in the restaurants and bars, were friendly, efficient, and made us feel like we were at home (if our home was a resort!)😄. Most employees have been there for years, and obviously like their jobs and coworkers, making for a real easy, happy atmosphere.  The food in the restaurants was delicious, prepared by a knowledgeable chef who also had been there for over 10 years.  We are going again in early April,…

title: Diamond head resort
review: Dear Kracer12,  Thank you for taking a moment to leave us such a flattering review. We’re so glad you enjoyed our spacious accommodations, friendly team, and those breathtaking views of the Gulf. We appreciate your kind words and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Home away from home
review: We just returned from a week at the Diamondhead resort and couldn't have had a nicer time.   Well, the weather could have been warmer but the resort was fantastic.   It is gulf front and all rooms have a large balcony with two lounge chairs and a dining table with four chairs.   Our room was beachfront and although the weather was a little cool at the start of the week, we were able to be on the balcony and have a view of the sunrise and sunset.     We had dinner at Chloe's one night and the food was delicious.   The special was pork tenderloin with a pineapple sauce served with fresh steamed veggies and rice.  The bread served with dinner was infused with coconut and pineapple.   So yummy!   The restaurant was very elegant but not stuffy and the service was exceptional.    We…

title: Another great stay
review: Dear Relax411,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. We’re so glad you felt right at home during your stay, as this is how every guest should feel when they’re on vacation! It’s also great that you had the opportunity to dine at our on property restaurant when visiting. We appreciate your feedback and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Disappointing to say the least
review: Returned to diamond head after spending the previous year at a different resort. Great to be back.  David is still there to great you when you arrive.  Customer service is second to none and the amenities are top notch.  Rooms are very clean and comfortable, bar is very good, food especially breakfast is wonderful.  Will definitely be back, best place on the island.

title: Car sales person
review: Dear jojonash,  Thanks so much for leaving us such a flattering review! We’re so glad you consider us the best resort on the island. I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team and look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Get the plumbing fixed
review: The only good things about this resort are the staff who are helpful and friendly and its position right on the beach. It is rather an ugly building of poor design in that the restaurant has no balcony area and although has a view of the beach through the windows is very dark at breakfast and has no character/atmosphere for dinner. There is a  terrace area by the bar on the first floor level but as far as I am aware food is not served there, we certainly never saw it used.  Reception desks are one floor up from ground as are restaurant, bar, and concierge. There is also a beach bar that serves the pool area on the ground level. We stayed in room 911 which had a good view down the beach to the pier and inland from the balcony. On arrival we asked if there were any cushions for…

title: " The best place to stay on Fort Myers Beach"
review: We stayed at Diamond Head Resort and Spa over Thanksgiving 2015. We had such a good time we came back for Christmas all the way from Syracuse, New York. From the moment we arrived on the property and during our entire stay we received exceptional service in all areas of the hotel. Everyone on staff went out of their way to ensure all of our needs were met.. We loved our Ocean front suite with private bedroom, large living area and full kitchen. The views of the gulf and evening sunset where spectacular from our very large screened in patio. We started our days with breakfast at Chloe's which included a lovely view of the gulf and pool area. At lunch we stayed in our bathing suits and ate at Cabanas on the beach. We loved the grooper reuben. When we were in the mood for a formal…

title: Beautiful Resort
review: Dear Sherry M,  Thanks so much for leaving us such a flattering review. It’s a huge compliment to us that we’ve secured such a positive, lasting impression. From our friendly team to our on property dining, it sounds like your stay with us was ideal! Randy is a great asset to our team and we’re so glad he was able to make your stay extra special. I look forward to sharing your kind words with him and the rest of our team and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: The good, the bad and the UGLY at DiamondHead FMB
review: My husband and I stayed at the Diamond Head Beach Resort for 3 nights. Our room was very lovely, we had a very nice view of the pier and the ocean. I recommend to anyone to stay on the pier view side. Everything was located within a walking distance, so we didn't have to use our car for anything. The food at Chloe's, and Cabanas was very good especially the prime rib, my compliments to the chef. The fitness center had everything I needed to get a total body workout, They offer yoga classes but never woke up in time for it. Majority of the staff was very friendly, especially John the bell guy who took very good care of us, and gave us very great discounted vouchers to many of the local restaurants, and Jessica at the front desk who was very pleasant, and accommodating. The one…

title: Perfectly located, perfectly lovely!
review: Dear travelbughitme1982,  Thank you for taking the time to thoroughly review your recent stay. We’re so glad you and your husband had a wonderful time at our resort. It’s great to hear that you had the opportunity to dine at our on property restaurants, Chloës and Cabañas. We’re also glad that John was able to provide you with excellent recommendations and restaurant coupons. I do apologize if your experience with our entire team was not representative of the superior level of customer service we take pride in, as this is certainly not typical of our establishment. We appreciate your feedback and hope you join us again soon for another wonderful getaway.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Wonderful place to stay
review: My sister and I went though a travel agent in MN to book our trip to Fort Myers Beach.  Our primary request was for somewhere in Florida with a beautiful beach and a hotel with easy beach access.  She scored on only half of our request.  (We won't be using her again.)  Our goal was to find a pretty beach where we could lay in the sun and read and enjoy time away from our families for a bit.  THE GOOD: 1. The hotel was right on the beach.  You just walk out the back of the hotel and you are there. 2. All rooms have a very large balcony equipped with a patio table and four chairs as well as two lounge chairs.  Ours afforded us a nice view of both the pool and the ocean. 3.  The room was very large with a nice living room area, kitchenette with sink, microwave, dishwasher,…

title: 2nd Stay in 2 years and still great
review: Stayed over New Year and it was fantastic from the time we checked in to the time we left. We checked in very late and everything was virtually closed on the beach. We asked the guy on the desk if there was anywhere we could get something to eat and he gave us a menu for a late delivery service...the food was delivered to our room and tasted good. We watched the fireworks on New Years eve from our perfected positioned room overlooking the pier with a glass of wine...fantastic. We had a cold rainy day but most of the residents headed to the hotel Cabana Bar. Considering it was cold, wet and windy the staff tried to make everyone comfortable with patio heaters.  The hotel has had a facelift which makes a great difference. The overall service and staff interaction is second to…

title: Beautiful Fort Myers Beach
review: Dear clare h,  Thanks so much for the wonderful feedback and choosing our resort to celebrate the New Year! We’re so glad you had a great time watching the fireworks from the comfort of your private balcony. It’s great to hear that our team made such a positive impact on your recent stay. We appreciate your feedback and hope you come see us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Winter vacation. 2015
review: Ft Myers Beach is spectacular and DiamondHead is a fantastic resort.  The pricing is similar to everything else on the island, but the facilities are head shoulders better than other places I've stayed.  It's not the newest hotel, but it is roomy with great views and lots to do.  The staff was fantastic, and it's walking distance from everything.  I will definitely be back!!

title: Good location on Beach
review: Dear Scott O,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your feedback with us. It’s wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed your stay. We’re so glad our resort provided a convenient location for you. We look forward to having you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great hotel with fantastic gulf views
review: The very best place to stay. Great view of the beach, the staff is wonderful. We have a time shear and stay there ever March. I would not trade for any other place or weeks ..   The pool is warm wonderful and the grand kids had a ball. Looking forward to March 2016

title: Recharge
review: This is the place to go to recharge yourself.  Room was nice and comfey.The food was great with so many choices to have.  The bar had specials and live music with pool side service too!!! The view of the beach was beyond expectations.  I found a gem here....

title: Great place to stay at fort Meyers beach
review: Dear Janet D,  We’re so flattered by your review! From our comfortable accommodations to Cabañas Beach Bar & Grille, it sounds like your stay with us was ideal. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to many more visits!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: relaxing, very good food, some irritations
review: Me and my husband stayed here Friday through Tuesday, when booking I had seen a slightly cheaper price advertised on another web site which they matched. Great location on fort Meyers beach, close to shops restaurants and activities. Our room had a kitchenette and was on the west side of building with gulf view over pool and Chloe's  Lounge. Room had a couple issues leaky pipes under sink, banging pipes when you turn on the hot water in the shower, ants in the kitchen and previous guests underwater were found between bed and bedside stand it was hidden so I wouldn't hold it against them.  The pool was nice had beverage and food service. The beach side bar and restaurant cabana was nice. Chloe's was more upscale with indoor and out door seating also has a lounge area and casual…

title: Nice hotel.. fitness center and internet not up to par
review: Dear Normajean1937,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a detailed review. We’re happy to hear you enjoyed our on property dining as well as our beachfront location. I’d like to sincerely apologize if the condition of your accommodation was not up to par. This is certainly not typical of our establishment, but we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Your comfort and enjoyment is our top priority and we will use your feedback to focus on areas where we may improve. We hope you have the chance to stay with us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Excellent holiday trip!
review: the diamondhead resort and hotel in ft. myers beach is an imposing fortress of a structure and thank goodness for that because we had a tornado touch down a mile or two away that did $7 mil or so damage. the rooms are spacious if not elegantly furnished and the balcony is huge which is great. the food at the chloe restaurant is outstanding. you cannot get a better prime rib and other items were also top notch. the staff is very helpful. so far, so good, right, but there are irritating problems that need not be. you want a lounge chair for the beach? expect to pay handsomely for it. you have to deal with an outside contractor and his prices are steep in my opinion. want a towel for the pool? sure but if for some reason you forget to bring it back to the towel stand you will be…

title: Top Floor View but Food is on the Bottom Floor
review: Many restaurants over the years have tried to fool the fat man with dazzles; presentation, ambiance and serving staff that it seemed were trained at Harvard. But one think you can’t do is fool the peasant fat man when it comes to food. Diamonds head hotel is a place I frequent often. The sweet breads started off this peasant on the right foot. The jelly was spiced with a slightly hot spice that mad the bread super flavorful. Being the king of end cuts I ordered the most expensive cut of prime rib $32.00.For $32.00 the end cut should have been complimented by some real great potato dish. In true Harvard speak the waitress described some French onion potato dish that sounded too good for me the peasant to resist. If the chef at Diamondhead’s ever reads this let me school you in…

title: Best beach location in a lovely resort
review: Dear keyasset,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a detailed review. As you can imagine, we’re very disappointed to hear the prime rib at Chloës did not meet your expectations. Your constructive feedback is appreciated and will certainly be taken into consideration for future improvements.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: One of the better places on the front in fort Myers beach
review: Just spent 3 nights here for a girls' getaway and were very pleased with the hotel room and the central location of the resort. Very private, large sized screened balcony overlooking the beach was a great place to relax, and the resort is right on the beach within walking distance to everything! There is also a nice restaurant and lounge on the premises. The best part of the whole experience was our bellman former Kentuckian John.  He was so helpful and always seemed to be right there when we needed something.  When we'd head out to dinner, he'd ask us where we were going and then find coupons for us to use, in addition to unloading and loading our suitcases in the rain  and wind, parking the car, etc.  Such a nice guy!  My husband and I are returning in Feb for a few days of…

title: Great location and great views
review: Dear Carol H,  Thanks so much for leaving us such a flattering review! We’re so glad you had such a wonderful girls’ getaway and have already made plans to return. It’s also great that John was able to make your stay extra special. I look forward to sharing your kind words with him and can’t wait to have you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Best location on Fort Myers Beach
review: First place we visited and arrived after 22 hours of traveling so it's always tempting to be a bit critical.   But this is a nice holiday place , we pulled up and although the concierge wasn't there he cam straight away when we rang reception. Check in is on first floor and we left the car in the designated check in place and booked in. There is plenty of parking and we never had a problem. Room was spacious great view of the beach. We found the concrete floors and walls in the communal areas a bit odd and suspect that this place has a split personality - spring break and the rest . We weren't there at spring break. Pool area is small but. Why would you sit there when there is the beach. Water sports are good I rented a catamaran which was fun 50 dollars for a fairly flexible…

title: Very nice rooms, great view, great location!
review: This hotel was excellent.  The staff was very accommodating and so friendly.  Whether calling the front desk for information, the bell service desk for a taxi, you name it, they were right on it.  Would definitely stay here again.  Only negative, the construction on the main street.  All of Estero Blvd. has work being done on it and the sidewalks are basically non-existent.

title: Nice spacious  room with a view
review: Dear BradleyMLL,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your kind words with us. Our team works very hard to provide each and every guest with a superior level of customer service, and we’re thrilled to hear these efforts paid off on your recent visit. I look forward to sharing your review with our team and hope to have you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: fun place for a few days
review: Located close to beach bars and average restaurants.  Service at breakfast  can be painfully  slow.  Room had a large balcony  overlooking  the ocean.  Traffic in the area is ridiculous  so you pretty  much need to walk to restaurants which are just ok.

title: magnificent view
review: Our suite was clean, spacious and comfortable. Although we ate out, it was convenient to have the kitchenette for drinks and snacks. The oceanfront location on a beautiful wide beach with the beach and pool side  bar and restaurant are what really make the experience. We appreciated that it was a family resort; not too wild and crazy, although there is a crowd when the bar opens in the morning. The food was just ok, but the drinks were great - especially the Bloody Mary bar where you could customize your drink. This end of the island is more crowded and honky-tonk, so you may want to look elsewhere if you're not comfortable mingling with biker-types as you walk down the street.

title: Nice hotel on the inside but the neighborhood . . .
review: Dear 8585rachel,  It’s wonderful to hear you had a wonderful stay and really embraced the Fort Myers Beach experience. The Bloody Mary bar has been such a great addition to our property and we are so glad you had the opportunity to enjoy this amenity as well. We appreciate your input and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway. Until then!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Beautiful spot on a beautiful beach
review: My husband spent four nights here and we had zero complaints.  The rooms were great with amazing views.  The pool and spa was really nice.  It is on the beach and had a bar on the sand.  Would stay here again. The higher the better because the area is loud with people and cars.  They tried to get us to listen to a timeshare pitch but we're not pushy about it so no big deal

title: Loved our room with beautiful view and huge balcony
review: Dear simonpowered,  It’s wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed your stay, as it was truly a pleasure to have you and your husband as our guests. We’re so glad you enjoyed every aspect of our resort, from our accommodations to our beachfront swimming pool and spa. We appreciate your kind feedback and hope you come see us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: 2dollar bingo
review: We stayed at Diamond Head Resort at the end of October for a few nights and thoroughly enjoyed our stay from beginning to end.  The front desk staff was friendly and helpful.  Our room had a view of the beach and the town - loved the big balcony!  The bar and grill was convenient and food was ok - for a snack or lunch.  The specialty frozen drinks were quite expensive though.  I treated myself to a haircut/style in the salon and the staff was professional and did a great job!  We plan to go back to this hotel - its one of the nicest on that entire strip!

title: Enjoyable
review: Dear Julee B,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. It’s great to know that your stay was so enjoyable, that the staff and amenities were top notch, and that you’re already considering to return for another visit. We look forward to seeing you then!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: FMB Weekend
review: Great place to visit but you don't get what you paid for everything you have to pay for $2 bingo $5 crab Race pay for beach chairs even though you pay the resort fee the prize you win as a $0.50 bag for a 4stat resort you figured you would give us shirt you shouldn't be paying for activities at the resort other than that the place is nice to stay

title: Very nice stay (after room change)
review: Ok, there are a lot of reviews so here are my rambling thoughts: As you can tell from other reviews, you really need to make sure you know where your room is going to be located to get what you expect out of your stay here.  Why they blast stuff over the pool PA system is beyond me, unless you are really into bingo and 70's rock it's bad.  The PA speaker placement is terrible and the distortion is terrible.  You do not want a pool view room or gulf view room (on pool side) if you want to sit on your balcony.  Also if you want a view on the gulf or pool views you want to be on floor 5 or higher.   I was initially in a gulf view (on the pool side) and upgraded to beachfront.  There are gulf view rooms on the pool side and on the north side.  Personally, I would only stay at this…

title: Great location and staff
review: Dear Joyboy11,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a thorough review. We’re glad that you were able to enjoy one of our beachfront accommodations. It’s great that you had a wonderful experience at our resort. We appreciate your detailed feedback and hope you have the chance to stay with us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Excellent in all regards
review: We had a very nice two night stay at this property which seems to be part hotel, part time share. For thirty dollars a night we were able to upgrade to a full Gulf view unit with master bedroom, living room and full kitchen. Unit also had full screened balcony with entrances off living room and living room big enough for two lounge chairs and a full table. Everyone on the staff was very nice and helpful. Beautiful location right on gorgeous white sand beach.

title: Wasted potential
review: Dear Rkolb26,  Thanks so much for leaving us such a great review! We’re thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your stay at our resort. I am pleased to hear you took the opportunity to upgrade to a Gulf view suite; the view is worth it! I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team and hope to have you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Loved it for Second year running
review: Lovely, spacious. very clean two room suite, steps to the beach, very friendly and helpful staff, walking distance to Times Square downtown, great restaurant on site (Chloe's), and great fitness center.  We had a wonderful 5 night vacation, will definitely be back.

title: Great location!
review: We recently exchanged a timeshare we own to stay here on Fort Myers Beach.  This place is both a timeshare resort and a hotel.  I was told the timeshares are on designated floors. Our room was angled to overlook both the pool and the beach.  We were able to see beautiful Sunrises from this side of the resort as we are early risers, but that means we are early to bed!!!  That did become an issue a couple of nights. There is a restaurant called Chloe's which has an outdoor seating area which is located on the side of the resort our room was on.  Evidently, wedding receptions and conventions are held here which we didn't know about.  It gets VERY LOUD when there is something going on there.  One night there was an outdoor wedding reception and one night there was some type on…

title: Great location
review: Dear MomWifeGrammie,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a thorough review. We’re so glad you had a fantastic time at our resort. It’s also great that you enjoyed our on property dining at Chloës Restaurant and Cabañas Beach Bar & Grille. I do apologize if the noise was a nuisance during your stay. We appreciate your feedback and hope you come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Best Hotel on the Beach
review: Location and amenities are great.  Jetskis and other beach activities on premise so convenient.  Staff was very helpful and nice (Jessica, Janet, Dylan to name just a few).   All the previous positive reviews were spot on and ditto.  The rooms were perfect for us with two young children being able to utilize the room/bathroom/deck even when they went to bed.  The pullout was surprisingly so very comfortable.  The pool/cabana bar area was very clean and comfortable, and we spent a lot of time there.  Wendi at the pool you're awesome and thank you so much for being so accommodating with our girls.  We had a great week met some nice people and obviously recommend this property.  Lynne -sales- we'll see you next year!

title: The staff makes it!
review: Dear trtrtr998899,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We couldn’t be happier to hear about how much you enjoyed your stay with us at DiamondHead. From our friendly staff to our accommodations, it sounds like we really hit the mark. I look forward to sharing your kind words with Jessica, Janet, Dylan, Lynne and the rest of our team, and look forward to welcoming you back next year!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great location, beautiful spot
review: We have stayed at various places on Fort Myers Beach over the years. Diamondhead is the jewel on the beach. The staff is exceptional. From Derek at the bell desk, Vickie at check-in and Alex who waited on us hand and foot at the pool even though he was kept busy all day. We had the best time. Our room was beachfront and nothing matches the view at Diamondhead.  My 12 year old is already begging to go back again, In fact, she didn't want to leave. The staff is friendly and all were courteous and gave their best service. I would only say that it would be great if the pool bar opened at 10am instead of 11am  and also that the nighttime entertainment was there until the beach bar closed at 9pm. The singer stopped playing at 7pm just when we got down to the bar. Other than that, I…

title: Great Views
review: We stayed here for a week as a timeshare getaway. Fully equipped kitchenette with 4 barstools around the counter. Patio door off the bedroom and the living room out to the lanai. The screened in lanai had 2 chaise lounges and a table with 4 chairs. The lanai overlooked the gulf. Very relaxing sitting on the lanai watching things going on on the beach and the sunsets. The pool area has a lot of lounge chairs. The bar in the pool area is a great place to sit and have a cocktail and lunch. The daily paper was delivered every morning to your door. Its about 3/4 of a mile to the pier and Times  Square. But easily walkable on the beach. Would definitely stay here again!

title: The best time at the beach
review: Dear maolson,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We’re so glad you enjoyed your stay at our resort and would consider another trip! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to having you as a guest again in the future.  SIncerley, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Nice hotel on the beach
review: We had a gulf view suite - the resort is all one bedroom suites.  Very nice and equipped with everything you need.  VERY comfortable. Wonderful restaurants with excellent food at both Chloe's and Cabana's.  All employees were exceptional in making us feel at home.  Great location on the beach.  Had a hard time leaving and would go back in a minute.  In fact we will definitely be back!

title: A perfect holiday stop
review: Dear DebSCS,  Thanks so much for such an incredible review. I couldn’t be happier to hear how much you enjoyed your stay at DiamondHead! It’s also great that you enjoyed our on property dining while visiting. I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team and can’t wait to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great beach front location
review: We had a suite overlooking the pool area and the beach. Very Nice room with separate bedroom and a well equipped kitchenette. Very clean and nice, New towels every day. The hotel is on the beach and the beach bar served nice lunches and drinks. The hotel is situated within walking distance from downtown. The hotel bar and restaurant also was very nice and the karaoke night was unforgettable! I will absolutely recommend this hotel, and given another chance I will use it again.

title: Perfect Location
review: The DiamondHead Beach Resort is a great location for those who want to visit Fort Myers Beach. It is perfect walking distance to many shops and restaurants.   The Cabana Beach Bar and Grill serves "ok" food. No beer on tap. The wine you can purchase at the local supermarket for $3.00 cheaper.   The high speed wireless internet is pretty slow. In order to receive internet that is best for smart phones one would have to upgrade.  The views are amazing and the room sizes are great. The hotel should invest in better TP. It was very rough and felt like sandpaper.  The fitness equipment needs updated. Only 1 out of 3 treadmills worked. The elllipticals need serviced to a point they were harder on your knees.   The hotel did have live music, which was very nice in the evening time. …

title: Lovely Beachfront Hotel
review: Dear C W,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a detailed review. We’re glad you enjoyed our beautiful beachfront location and live music. I’m sorry if there were any difficulties connecting to the WiFi. I’d also like to apologize for the Jacuzzi being under construction. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we hope you come back and visit us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great place!
review: We visited for three nights (not nearly long enough) and were very impressed with the quality of the suites, bedding, kitchenette, etc.  Lovely screened lanai with table, four chairs, and two chaises overlooking the gulf, delightful employees at every turn asking about our stay and if they could help with anything, beautiful pool, nice spa, fun bar on the beach - the place has everything!  The expense is justified by the quality of the suites and the caliber of staff they employ.  Yes, we would definitely return!

title: fantastic location and great hotel
review: Dear Charlene A,  Thanks so much for such a wonderful review. It’s always flattering when a guest has this many great things to say about DiamondHead. I look forward to sharing your kind words with our team and can’t wait to show you another fantastic getaway in the future!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Gorgeous wedding on a beautiful beachfront property!
review: Great location! Right on the beach, has a pool, gym and spa. The restaurants on property serve good food for decent prices. Had no problems during the stay...however, maid service was spotty time-wise.

title: Great hotel on the beach!
review: Nice roomy accommodations with a bedroom and a pullout sofa in the main room. Every suite has a beach view with a lanai equipped with a table and lounge chairs. There is an outdoor cabana bar on the ground floor, next to the pool that offers terrific views and easy access to the beach. The hotel operates a restaurant with decent food, but if you wish to enjoy a little variety in your dining, the village of Fort Myers Beach is a short walk. Tons of good, fun, casual dining options there. I would recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a nice place to stay on the beach.

title: Great place
review: Dear Hangun61,  Thank you for sharing your input with us. We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay and our spacious accommodations. We hope you come back and stay with us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great experience during the Songwriters festival
review: This place was definitely worth the money. So close yo everything and your on the beach. Hotel staff was so polite and friendly.  Rooms were definitely clean and spacious.  Must take tour on waverunners with Zack. He was so nice and the tour was just great. He alwayd made sure we were okay. We are definitely going to come back.

title: Quick Anniversary Getaway
review: Dear Angie G,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at DiamondHead. We’re so happy you had such a wonderful experience. It sounds like you received the full Fort Myers Beach experience by spending some time on the water and experiencing a wave runner tour. We appreciate your feedback and would love to have you as a guest again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Great place to stay and friendly staff!
review: We spent 3 nights at the Resort during the Island Hopper Song writers festival. We frequent this hotel  two to three times a year. The staff is wonderful and treats us like we are friends and family. Randy, Joe and Jessie in the Cabana Bar and Restaurant are very personable and professional. Roberta from Choles is great.

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: This is a wonderful hotel with everything one would need (including a great spa) . I traveled and stayed here for 7 days /nights with my family and had no complaints. I would definitely recommend this beautiful place to anyone!

title: Loved this place
review: Dear Brittany P,  We’re so happy to hear you had such an incredible stay at our resort! You’ll have to come visit us again soon, next time you’re in the area!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Perfect example of what I'd like a beach hotel to be!
review: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights and enjoyed every minute of our stay. Our room was really big and comfortable with a separate lounge & kitchenette which was great. All were very well equipped.The room had a really large balcony overlooking the beach & was well equipped with sun loungers as well as a table with chairs. The hotel staff are really helpful & friendly and the free bikes are a great addition & popular with guests. The hotel is in a great location & a short walk to all of the great bars & restaurants on the island. There's also Topps supermarket which is a 5 minute walk away & was useful as we chose to prepare breakfast in our room each morning. The pool area and the bar are nice & well maintained. I would definitely love to return to this hotel in the future,…

title: Beachside!
review: Dear holmakerrachel,  Thanks so much for the wonderful review. We’re happy to hear how enjoyable your stay with us was! We agree that our location is very convenient and allows guests to experience many wonderful Fort Myers Beach attractions; we’re glad to hear you were able to take advantage of this during your recent stay. Thanks again for your feedback. We hope you come visit us again soon for an extended stay!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Relaxing fun
review: We came down for my stepdaughter's wedding and stayed Saturday through Monday and, from start to finish, we have been very happy! First, they had upgraded us to a beachfront room. Then, every meal we had here, the servers were so attentive and really worked hard at keeping every customer happy. (Thanks, Marcel, Mathew and John). Anytime I had to contact the front desk, they immediately aknowledged what room I was in, without me having to tell them. The room was beautiful and clean. The food in Chloe's and the Cabana lounge was very good. Beautiful location! We could open our sliders and listen to the ocean surf...I just cannot say enough! I can't remember staying in a hotel where I've been that happy! All the rooms are suites and they are part of Interval International. I am not…

title: summer staycation
review: Booked a stay on the beach for a little getaway. Saw the reviews on Trip adviser and decided to give DiamondHead a try along with the restaurant Chloe's. Well neither disappointed. Staff was excellent from the parking attendant when we arrived to the front desk checkout person when we left. Chloe's is a must if you are looking for an awesome meal with a view. Oh Cabana's beach bar was great as well. Highly recommended by this local

title: Great location, ok room!
review: Dear doorguy2015,  Thank you for staying with us at DiamondHead and sharing your comments with us. We’re so glad you enjoyed our resort and dining facilities. Come back and see us again soon so we can show you another fantastic getaway!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Weekend Getaway
review: Came for an overnight get away, and left feeling somewhat underwhelmed. Pros... Great location, right on the beach, staff extremely friendly, was allowed to check in early at no additional cost, hvac worked so well it was almost to cold, spacious room. Cons... Bedside lamp did not work, television in living room did not work, showerhead sprayed water everywhere, stain on top sheet.  I realize that it is off season, however I feel that these issues could have been easily corrected if the room had been inspected properly. At that price point I had expected more.

title: Beautiful place.
review: Dear NYFAN29,  Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. While I’m glad you enjoyed our beachfront location, friendly staff, and spacious accommodations, I’m disappointed to hear about the room condition you described. Our housekeeping team follows a strict procedure when cleaning the rooms, so this is certainly not typical of our establishment. Oftentimes, when availability allows, we are able to accommodate and move guests into a different room to better fit their needs when we are made aware of any concerns with accommodations. If there is anything I can do to assist, please don’t hesitate to reach out to me directly. We appreciate your input and hope you have the chance to visit us again soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood – General Manager

title: Needs to Recognize Off Season
review: My girlfriend and I wanted a nice long weekend getaway.  This place was the perfect fit.  From the moment we arrived on the property, the people working there were great.  The concierge (Derek), the registration desk, the restaurant and bar workers, and the hotel staff were all very friendly and courteous.  The room itself was very clean and spacious (separate bedroom and living room).  The outdoor screened in patio provided a very calm atmosphere with a great view.   The pool deck was actually under construction when we visited, but we were offered free beach chairs and umbrella.  I actually preferred that, as we were there to enjoy the beach.  I can use my pool at home.  When I travel to Fort Myers, I plan on staying at the Diamondhead Beach Resort Hotel again.   I've been to…

title: The place to stay in ft. Myers Beach Florida!!!
