Changes in reservations would have been too costly. Definitely ruined what could have been a perfect vacation. The staff was very accommodating and customer friendly. Room was clean and nicely furnished. However, we felt as if we were on a construction site not a resort. Disappointed to say the least. For the money we paid, it was not worth it. Hotel could have communicated these planned repairs earlier and we may have been able to make some changes to our travel dates.

title: This resort is really a treasure.
review: Dear JStephenson908, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to give us your valuable feedback. I'm happy you enjoyed your suite and the wonderful service by our staff. We truly do strive to give each and every person a special experience. I do apologize for the construction work being done on the pool and Cabana's Beach Bar, I completely agree that the guests staying during this period should have been notified earlier. We take full responsibility. The Fall season is the quiet time of year for us and that's when we schedule more of our larger property improvement projects, so that the fewest number of guests are inconvenienced. I would like to invite you back so that you can enjoy the resort amenities once they are completed and have the experience you deserve. Again I apologize and we do hope to see you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: My little get away!
review: My daughter and I spent a week at Diamondhead Resort and Spa. Our room was clean and well appointed with a nice view of both the city and the beach. The staff was wonderful. They were friendly, helpful and really cared that we had an enjoyable experience. It is rare to find that among everyone on the staff - front desk, waiters & waitresses, bellman, maintenance. Chloe's is great from breakfast and Cabana's is casual outdoor dining. Both restaurants had great food. Everyone we met in Fort Myers was so friendly and helpful. It was such a nice experience for us. We felt safe in our hotel room and on the beach - even at night. The front desk associate, Nathan, was especially friendly and helpful. The sunsets are not to be missed! We would recommend this resort to anyone looking for…

title: GreatTimes
review: Dear Eleen C, Thank so much for staying with us at DIamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm excited to hear that you and your daughter had a fantastic experience on Fort Myers Beach and I'm glad our staff could help make that happen for you. Each person on our team genuinely cares about our guests and wants to make sure that each person has a special experience when staying with us. I will be sure to pass along your kind words to Nathan and the rest of our team. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back in the near future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Fun time at the Cabana/DiamondHead
review: I've been coming here one to two times a year.. It's where I go when I need a break n change.. I live in SE fla, which is very different! The atmosphere is warm n friendly, from the staff, to the guests, to those living on the island.. They have a great pier n several pretty good restaurants.. Everyone gathers at sunset on the beach, it's quite beautiful!! The gulf is a bit yucky and cloudy in the summer and there are no waves!! The sand is like packed talc, very easy to walk on,  but you need a lounge chair, which are provided, lunch at the pool is always great, as is the staff, servers etc...whatever I've needed from extra towels, pillows etc, are brought to the room promptly!! If you like there's lots of fun bars to go to, a lot of dif art shops, and of course tourist shops!!…

title: Friendly Staff
review: My husband and I stayed at the Diamondhead for Labor Day weekend. The hotel is located centrally along Estero Blvd. we had a beach front view on the 10th floor. Cabanas by the pool is a great casual beachfront bar/restaurant. The food is good and the staff is friendly. The hotel has bikes you can borrow to take a ride around the island. This is a nice touch. The bar service around the pool is attentive. I would definitely recommend this resort and we will be returning.

title: See you in court
review: Dear Michelle T, Thank you so very much for choosing DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa as the location for your Labor Day weekend. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed our convenient location and Cabana's Beach Bar & Grille. We recently finished up a remodeling projected that added beach seating, a new bar, and the thatched roof. I'm glad you enjoyed it and our staff. The guest bikes are a new feature as well, I'm excited to hear you enjoyed exploring the island on them. Thank you again and we are already looking forward to serving you again soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Fun times
review: I recently booked 2 oceanfront rooms with this resort.  It was room 608 and 609.  One of the rooms had a bit of a smokey smell, but we noticed the ashtrays next to our patio door outside on the screened in room.  Being a smoker myself, and knowing we were only staying one night, we decided to stay.  At over $200 per night, I expect the TV to work (ours didn't even after a visit from maintenance) and a comforter on the bed, not a Motel 6 bedspread.  After checking out and heading to my next destination, I was informed that my card was charged $265 for smoking in the room.  It's really sad after spending over $600 in one night at this resort, they had the nerve to accuse us of smoking in the room.  There are two 6' patio doors attaching the room to an exterior screen room with a…

title: ' HAND'S DOWN...THE BEST'
review: Thank you very much for your feedback Mgreg651 and hopefully the phone call from our Guest Services Manager has alleviated your concerns about the charge on your credit card. I apologize for making you accountable for someone else smoking in the room but with many of our guests being non-smokers we take our in-room non smoking policy very seriously. With our large open air room balconies we ask our guests to keep their patio doors closed if they do have an urge to smoke and only provide ashtrays to keep the area clean. We are in the process of changing the remaining 3 floors of rooms to our new Premium unit décor and I hope you give us an opportunity to see these rooms with their upgrades in the future. I'm also very happy to hear you experienced first hand the personality and service level of our team. I think they are what sets us apart from the rest of the Resorts in our area.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Kudos to the staff!
review: The room was very clean upon arrival. I liked that the balcony was screened in so that we didn't have bugs or any other creatures disturbing us while we had our morning coffee. The restaurant/bar down by the pool had outstanding food and drinks. The pool was well kept and fun to spend the afternoons at. I also love the fact that there's tons of restaurants and other attractions around the hotel so we had something to do at night.

title: Review from 2007
review: I'm writing this review 7 years after my last stay. It relaxed me that much I'm only just getting round to it! :)  I have visited Florida year after year for over a decade and have stayed all over, from orlando to the keys, and places inbetween. I usually stay in Orlando for 11 nights then go to a beach resort for 10, as two weeks just doesn't seem enough here. Florida will cedrtainly not be to everyones taste, but for me it is the perfect holiday, and I could visit here every year and not feel bored with it!  The Diamondhead:  After having visited Naples and Fort Myers, I fell in love with the relaxed atmosphere of this area, the laid back sleepy beachside towns and tranquil beaches (spring/summer break excluded) and the convenience of having plenty to do surrounding you. The…

title: Staycation Away from Home
review: Dear Monkeymafia, Thank you very much for staying with us and for taking the time to give us your detailed review. I can't tell you how pleased I am to know that we made such a strong impression on you that you still wanted to write about us 7 years later. A lot of positive changes have happened since your last stay and we are eager to show them to you. We have redone a good portion of our rooms, completely changed and upgraded our Cabana's Beach Bar and so much more. We would like to invite you back to experience us again. Fort Myers Beach is indeed a special place and I'm glad to hear you love it just as much as we do. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Made the start of a bad trip brighter!
review: DiamondHead Resort is made up of suites, so its has a small kitchen with refrigerator and dish washer. The resort is part time-share units. The bathroom in our suite was nice and modern. Balcony is screened in with outdoor furniture. The pool area is clean with plenty of lounge chairs. The pool bar, Cabana's is a fully bar with a bar menu. Access to the beach is right past the pool and bar. The beach rental hut is right at the runaway of the beach. The entire resort staff were friend, engaging and helpful from the time we arrived to the time we left. I was so pleased with my two night stay at DiamondHead Resort. It is definitely a first class resort. I would recommend this resort to everyone I know who plan on vacationing at Ft. Myers beach.

title: One night stay, though friendly people.
review: Dear Ray G, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm excited to hear that you had a fantastic time and enjoyed your large suite and balcony. We strive to give all our guests the best Fort Myers Beach experience possible. We do that with the best staff on the beach, the best location, and a host of amenities. Again, I'm very happy to hear about your positive experience and we do hope to see you back on your next visit to southwest Florida.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Good Value
review: DiamondHead is amazing!   Checked in on August 12 for 3 nights and loved it.  Had originally rented a beach house Fort Myers Beach and for unforseen reasons had to seek alternate accommodations.  We were a group of 10 checking in around 10pm and the staff was amazing at booking our rooms and accommodating us all on the same floor.   Very friendly staff.  Pool is slightly small,  but not too bad.  Didn't seem crowded on our visit.   Beach has powdered sugar sand.  Parking was never an issue. The hallways are open air.  Rooms are great (and clean)!   Very spacious and amazing beachfront view from our room.  Balcony is to die for!  King size bed and sofa bed.  Showers were a little short for everyone else,  but perfect for my 5'2" height ;)  Loved that we had a mini fridge, …

title: Great long weekend!
review: Hotel was nice and clean.  Pull out couch was comfortable and everything in the room seemed newer (couch, beds, etc) Screened-in porch was great to keep bugs out. We loved the pool activities and the amenities offered at the beach (wave runners, parasailing, etc.)   I did feel a bit "nickeled and dimed" by having to sign out beach towels and purchase a laundry card.  I understand the need for keeping track of towels, but the laundry card was a bit much (not cost-wise, just annoying).  I am not an expert on coin laundry machines, but they seem to work for other places, so why not here?  Anyway, if you return the laundry card to the front desk , the $5 charge gets removed from your bill - just an extra hassle to run a load of laundry. Overall, our stay was relaxing and fun!

title: Mini Staycation
review: Dear CincinnatiLisa, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm pleased to hear you had a wonderful experience with us and enjoyed the beach activities. We want our guests to have the options of quiet relaxation and exciting fun on the water. Thank you for the feedback on the laundry cards, we are always looking to improve our service and operations. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Great value!
review: We are fairly new to the Fort Myers area so this was our first time staying on the beach.  What a great hotel!  The location is perfect.  All of the rooms were one bedroom suites with a mini kitchen.  The refrigerator is not full size but big enough to stock with drinks and use for leftovers and the kitchen was well stocked with pots, pans, utensils.  The lanai was enormous and had a great view of the beach as well as the pool.  Since this resort does not allow anyone under the age of 25 to rent a room, if you decide to go over Spring Break, you will not have to worry about a bunch of drunk college kids swarming the hotel.  The staff was fantastic.  The front desk agent that checked us in was very knowledgeable and accommodating.  Janet, our server at Cabanas was incredible! …

title: Great stay!!!
review: Dear Booamy, Thank you very much for spending your staycation with us on Fort Myers Beach. I'm happy to hear you had a wonderful experience and enjoyed your fully-equipped suite. We want to give our guests that home away from home feeling when they stay with us. I'm also pleased to hear that our staff did a great job of taking care of you. We really do strive to give you a special experience. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Beach Front Resort
review: We stayed at diamondhead for 5 nights and are already counting down the days until we can go back next year! From the time we checked in the entire staff was welcoming and helpful. The rooms are a great size and we were able to save money on breakfast by utilizing the kitchenette in the room. The oversized balcony was also a huge plus and the view was outstanding. Ask for a higher floor, the view is worth is!! We spent a lot of time at Cabanas for lunch and happy hour, it felt very tropical and had an awesome ocean breeze. We really had no reason to leave the hotel for happy hour, it would be nice if the bar was open later though! Make sure to look for Randy at the bar, by the first day he already had our drink orders memorized and was a ton of fun! The hotel is in easy walking…

title: very nice hotel
review: the hotel is on a beautiful beach. the pool was very nice and the service was great. i told the front desk i did not want room service for all week because they are trying to save water.  they appreciated it very much.  i was alone and i told them i would keep the room clean.i was next to the big exaust pipes and they made noise but overall it was  a great room.

title: Gorgeous
review: Dear Luke1942eggman, Thank you for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm pleased to hear you had a great time and enjoyed the pool service, and thank you for your efforts to conserve water. It's much appreciated. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Nice Stay
review: Great staff, beautiful accommodations. We had a great time at Diamond Head. Everyone was friendly and the room was immaculate. Just know, they are trying to sell those time shares, but an hour of our time scored us $150. I do wish the Beach cabana stayed open a later

title: Just OK.... but they haven't repaid a deposit they demanded!
review: Dear Jodi A, Thank you for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm pleased to know that you had a fantastic time and glad our staff was able to take such great care of you. We really do have the best team on the beach and exceeding your expectations is always our top priority. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Rooms over grill hood should be discounted
review: Very nice Gulf-Front hotel! One of the largest buildings in the area. Rooms and service were very good. Staff was fast and helpful. Screened in balconies made it possible to enjoy the waves at night! The in-room kitchenette had all the basics covered so you can save money preparing basic in-room breakfast and lunch. Not huge but the salt water pool was refreshing with a maximum number of sun lounger chairs. Free use of bicycles was a nice plus. I can't say anything bad about our stay! Plenty of available beach activities, restaurants, nightlife and shopping nearby.  If I had to nit pic; hallways are covered but are not air conditioned and are exposed to outside humidity. Elevators are slow. The outside bar closes early during the week. If back in the area I would consider…

title: overnight at the beach
review: The hotel was very nice ,right on the beach with the pool just steps from the sand the room we were shown at first on the 3rd floor was okay but I felt they could do better and they upgraded us to a premier room on the 5th floor ,much nicer beautiful view and a large balcony separate bedroom and lovely living room/dinning area  the corridors are a bit dark and the signage could be better but overall I would love to go back  staff were very helpful and the facilities were very good

title: Perfect Place!!!
review: Dear Scothamish, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and happy to know our staff did a great job of taking care of you. Your happiness is our top priority. Our upgraded suites are beautiful and I'm glad you enjoyed it. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Quality Stay
review: My family and I (2adults1child) just had the absolute amazing stay at Diamondhead.  First of all, we were greeted by David (bellman) who was not your typical bellman.  Very warm, friendly and outgoing.  Ready to lend a hand, take our bags and lock them up (we arrived at 1030am and checkin isnt until 3) and show us where to check in and then where to have lunch while we waited for our room.  There are 2 restaurants, Chloe and The Cabana.  The Cabana sits at the pool (very well shaded) and is 50ft from the sand.  Not only breath taking views immediately, but  I was offered a Gluten Free Menu.  That was great!!  I will say this about both restaurants, although the food was amazing, the drinks were amazing and we couldnt have asked for better staff, the restaurants were overpriced…

title: Perfect Mini Trip
review: Dear Lynn T, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I can't tell you how happy I am to hear that you and your family had a fantastic time. We have the best staff on the beach and they truly do strive to exceed your every expectation. David is the best, he is a great asset to the team. I'm also happy to hear you enjoyed your time at Cabana's Beach Bar and Grille, we have recently completed several renovation projects and we are excited to hear that so many people are loving it. Thank you again for staying with us and we are looking forward to seeing you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Family Getaway
review: Was there in August of 2001.  Married on Pelican Pier.....enjoyed the beach and hotel very much!  Very updated and clean. A lot of activities that include restaurants, bars, etc.  If your looking for a oceanfront, updated and very clean hotel..........this is your place!  My dad lives in Fort Myers, and this is the only place he stays!

title: July 4th weekend!
review: Great resort :) being a local to Fort Myers I was aware Diamondhead was a great place to stay. Just exceeded our expectations for the Fourth of July weekend they had availability which was great the  staff and bellhops were excellent,  they let us have early check in and late check out  which was fabulous. If you're  looking for five-star on Fort Myers Beach Diamondhead is the place to be !!

title: Our "Spur of the Moment" Trip!
review: Dear Kimme3378, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. Nothing makes me happier than knowing we could exceed your expectations. I'm excited to hear that our staff did a great job of taking care of you, we want our guests to feel like family here. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Everything was perfect!
review: We had family visiting us from Tennessee.  They had never been to the Gulf Coast of Florida, and expressed an interest in going there.  So....I went to the web, checked out a few places.  Then I spotted the DiamondHead Resort in Ft. Myers Beach.  I called on Sunday and we reserved two rooms, for Tues and Wed. (since that is all the time we had).  The staff was fantastic!  They even got us two adjoining rooms!  I have Parkinson's, which puts limits on my mobility.  The staff was not only professional, but caring and friendly.  Which, I might add, reflected in the moods of their many guests.   The rooms were lovely, with a wonderful view...the beach, pool, restaurant and lunge staff were fantastic!  We had a blast!  This was my first visit to DiamondHead, but it won't be my last!

title: Nice Lodgings on the Beach
review: Dear Josephine Jill F, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm excited to hear that your first experience with us was a fantastic one. Nothing makes me happier than knowing our staff did a great job of taking care of you and that we were able to exceed your expectations. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Excellent Location and a Great Overall Hotel
review: Visited in early June and stayed on fifth floor. We had an oceanfront view and paid a decent price for offseason. Every staff member, from the time we got there, to the time we left, was extremely helpful and friendly. As soon as we opened out room, we were greeted with a view of the ocean's horizon. Our room was flawless and was more of a suite than anything else. Bed was comfortable and bathroom, kitchen, living room were spotless. The balcony was beautiful and perfect for relaxing evenings. The pool and hot tubs were nice and very lenient on operating hours. It seemed as if the guests were enjoying themselves responsibly, the pool area was available very late. The beach front tiki bar was convenient and the food and drinks were very good. The restaurant was classy and tasty.…

title: Favorite Place to Stay When Going South
review: The staff are all friendly and if you return yearly, you will see most of the save staff year after year.  I have stayed on various floors with various views and really enjoy the screened in balcony, especially when I bring the grandchildren who love playing out there.  The beach is just a few steps away from the resort and Austin the bellhop has great suggestions on where to go for dinner.  It doesn't matter if you go doing the busy session or slow session, it is always clean and a very relaxing place to stay.

title: Wonderful experience
review: Dear Teresia, Thank you very much for staying with us again at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. Nothing makes me happier than know we can continue to give you a fantastic experience year after year. I feel we have the best staff on the beach, each one of them strives to give you and every other guest a truly special experience. Thank you again and we are looking forward to seeing you back in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Mini Vacation
review: We had a newly decorated one bedroom ocean view. Room 507. It was well appointed and clean. We thoroughly enjoyed the oversized screened in balcony. The location, beach and pool were all terrific. The beach is excellent for walking and there are all kinds of water activities right outside your door step for a fee. Speaking of fees thought it odd that this higher end establishment did not provide beach chairs and umbrellas gratis. Instead you had to pay an additional $30  a day. With the pool overlooking the beach it appeared that most folks just hung out there at. no cost. Highly recommend.

title: Good location
review: Dear TwoGrays, Thank you for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm excited to hear that you had a wonderful experience and enjoyed your large balcony. It's definitely a great place to relax and take in the Gulf views. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Great place for relaxing getaway
review: First time to Ft Myers, location was awesome, teenagers walked to the Pier down the beach for shopping, I enjoyed the beach.  Room was fabulous, had my own bedroom, morning paper delivered  each morning, enjoyed coffee, reading the paper with a beautiful view of the gulf from my balcony.   The food selection was plentiful, not pricey, enjoyed a dinner and breakfast with a great view.  Staff was informative and suggested both food and activities,. Thank you for a great mini vacation, I'll be back, well worth the trip.

title: Great 4 days
review: My husband had only a few days to get away so we decided Ft Myers would be good because we had never been there and there was a direct flight.  We booked the hotel off of good reviews and trusted compete strangers.  We had a wonderful time.  They have great employees who take the time to make you feel welcome and well taken care of.  I would suggest this resort to anyone.

title: Great place to stay on the beach
review: Dear Steelersgirl2014, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm pleased to hear that you and your husband had a wonderful experience and that our staff did a great job of taking care of you. We truly do strive to give each guest a special experience. Thank you again, we are looking forward to seeing you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Excelent!! Great view
review: The hotel is directly on the beach with gulf view and gulf front rooms.  The rooms are spacious with a long balcony, living area with sofa that opens to a queen size bed, bedroom with king size bed and bathroom with tub and great shower (other than the shower is kind of geared to short people).  The rooms were clean.  The staff was very friendly and helped with recommendations for dinner/drinks.   You can easily walk to many restaurants and bars.  Take your own beach chairs and umbrella unless you want to pay $30 a day to rent 2 chairs and an umbrella.

title: We found a pearl on the beach
review: Dear MrsH0622, Thank you for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm excited to know that our staff did a great job of helping you feel comfortable and giving you good recommendations for places to dine on the island. Our large suites are designed to give you stunning views of the Gulf and plenty of space to relax. Your happiness is our number one priority. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Diamondhead Beach Hotel
review: I a great time at Diamond Head!! Great service, clean rooms, great views!! I will definitely come back!! The staff was friendly and helpful! Me and my husband are returning next year with the kids, we saw lots of family's with their kids, so must be kid friendly!! The food at Chloe's was amazing!! The service by the pool was a plus

title: A poor value for the money!!
review: Way over priced.  All you hear is the 5 huge air conditioners while you are out on the porch.  Terrible over crowded pool all the time.  Not able to handle handicap .    Bad food. Forced to buy poor quality internet.  My tablet kept reverting back to my 4 G because it was so poor.    We were told it had a kitchen.  There is no kitchen.  Handicap room did not have hand held shower.  It was broken off.  The bellmen were very nice.    I would never stay here again.

title: Awesome beach spot!
review: Dear Cinderella5252, Thank you very much for staying with us and for giving us your valuable feedback. I do apologize that you weren't completely satisfied with your experience. We would have been happy to have moved you to another room if you weren't satisfied with the one you were in. We try to give every guest the post possible experience. Our two on-site restaurants are known for their great good, wonderful atmosphere and friendly service. We do not advertise that our rooms have kitchens, every room does however have kitchenettes that our guests love. Thank you again and we do hope to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: The Beach and much more
review: Wonderful vacation spot! On the beach and within walking distance to Time Square, shopping, dining etc.. Staff is courteous and professional. Rooms are clean and beautifully decorated. Awesome vacation where all your needed are met and exceeded. This is our third year......we will be back.

title: Never stayed in such hotel
review: Dear Kim S, Thank you so very much for staying with us the last few years. I'm pleased to know that we are able to give you a fantastic experience stay after stay. Nothing makes me happier. Our staff truly does strive to exceed the expectations of each guests and to give everyone a special experience. Thank you again and we are already looking forward to seeing back.   Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: We fell in love here!
review: First the beach on the Gulf of Mexico is enough. However, the rooms have great gulf views with an oversized balcony made it extra special. The staff was great and friendly. On site spa for even more relaxation. Nice pool overlooking gulf. Food a little over priced but close to other restaurants with a variety of cuisine. If you are looking for a beach vacation this is definitely the place. Just skis available for rental right on property too.

title: Diamondhead Beach Resort & Spa, Fort Myers
review: The place is beautiful and the staff were extremely helpful.  Right on the beach!  We've been there twice and can't wait to go back!  There are several restaurants and we had great food at all of them.  Poolside waiter service.The cabana bar restaurant sits right on the beach.

title: Waitress
review: Dear SandyLS, Thank you very much for staying with us again at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed our poolside service and our newly renovated Cabana's Beach Bar and Grille. Give our guests the best beach vacation possible is what we love to do. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Incredible Hotel!
review: The service is excellent. Janet was our waitress in The Cabana and she gave us great service. Very friendly and always keeping up with our drinks and food. The food was very good and the atmosphere was very comfortable. Looking forward to going back.

title: AMAZING HOTEL
review: Dear Terry H, Thank you very much for visiting our Cabana's Beach Bar & Grill. I'm excited to hear that you had a great experience and that Janet was able to take great care of you. She, as well as the rest of our team are simply amazing and they are all tremendous assets to our property. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Relaxing and Fun!
review: The staff were very Nice & polite. We had no complaints, 2nd time here. The room made us feel like we were at home, cozy & clean, and the bonus....comfortable. The pool view awesome, great service as well.  Nice get away. Clean, affordable rooms.

title: Not only a terrible experience, no attempts to rectify by the hotel.
review: Please read and share the letter I sent to the President and CEO for Diamond Head Resorts. I've posted it to their Facebook page along with photos, only to have them removed 6 times. They stated on their page that if I would send them my phone number, they would call me and make it right. They have not called. They said they were only removing the redundant posts. There are no posts. I tried to post again on their website this morning and they've blocked me. If you would like to join me in not settling for being ripped off and then lied to, please feel free to share this letter and voice your opinion on their web page. They are Diamondhead Resorts in Ft. Meyers.   Here's the letter:    Good Afternoon,   I wanted to write and share with you our experience at your hotel this past…

title: Great location
review: Dear TessFromSebring, Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. We do apologize for the experience you had and would like to show you why we are one of the top resorts on Fort Myers Beach. It was a pleasure to speak to you less than 24 hours after your first comment. Yes, we did remove a couple of the posts as they were duplicates of the same posts that were shared earlier in the day. I'm excited that we have corrected the experience and we are looking forward to giving you the stay you deserve.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Family Vacation
review: The hotel is nicely situated close enough to shops but not too close to public beach areas. Clean pool and outdoor bar area. Very nice staff. Rooms are all king bed suites making it tough for groups. There is a pull out coach. Room we had , had some mold issues with the moister. Great screened in porch though, I slept out there. Food is decent though lots of good places yo eat along the beach too.

title: Had a great time
review: Dear Votenochains, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm pleased to know that you enjoyed your experience and found our location to be convenient. We are located close to the main hub of Fort Myers Beach, yet far enough away to give our guests quiet beachfront relaxation. Our staff loves to give all our guests an extra special experience, I'm glad they could give that to you as well. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Simply Great!
review: My family from Ohio took advantage of their time in SW FL to visit Ft. Myers Beach and stayed at the DiamondHead Beach Resort Hotel for 3 nights.  The year previously they had stayed at another facility close by and found it less than desirable.  DiamonHead was so much better they changed their plans from two to three nights.  The room was outstanding with an a view of the Gulf.  The hotel amenities were great and family friendly.  My 15 year old granddaughter and her friend took advantage of the bikes offered.  The family received many special coupons for businesses in the area and took advantage of them.  They enjoyed it so much they are planning on returning next year and inviting other family members to vacation at the same time.  A very good value for their money. They were…

title: Great beach vacation
review: We just returned from staying 3 nights here and wish we could have stayed longer. It was a little pricey but well worth it. It's right on a sandy beach that wasn't too crowded for Memorial Day weekend. We went to the pool everyday and enjoyed the restaurants.  Cabanas had wonderful service and food. Chloe's for breakfast was pretty good for a hotel breakfast.   One day our key stopped working and I was impressed at how they handled it. Within minutes we had maintenance there at our door and it seemed like within seconds the locksmith was there. They did have to change out the lock and the whole thing probably took 20-30 minutes. They were prompt, polite and handled it very well.   I got a massage at the spa and Sue was outstanding. I wish I lived closer so I could go again.  The…

title: Exceptional Service!
review: Dear Weekendtrvlr, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm pleased to know that you had a wonderful experience and enjoyed our location on the beach. We are close to the main hub of Fort Myers Beach, yet far enough away to give our guests peaceful relaxation. Yes, we close our food and beverage outlets at those times due to demand. The surrounding area has a wide variety fun and entertaining restaurants for our guests to enjoy. Thank you again for staying with us and we are looking forward to seeing you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Hotel has a lot to offer
review: From arrival through departure the entire staff was overwhelming!  They were friendly, welcoming and yet not overbearing by any means!  The room was spotless and I love the daily housekeeping with replenishing the coffee, soaps etc....Lunch down at Cabana's was a perfect way to get off the beach for awhile and enjoy the sand in your toes under the colorful umbrellas and dine on a great lunch and sip a frozen drink!  Everything was perfect! Awesome sunset from the balcony! Definitely will go back again!

title: Our favorite place to stay!!!
review: Dear Barbara F, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm extremely pleased to hear that our service was expectational at every level. We love to exceed expectations and give you an experience you'll remember for a long long time. Thank you again for staying with us and we are looking forward to serving you again soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Wonderful Experience!
review: I stayed here for two nights while in town for business.  I go to Ft Myers Beach every spring for vacation and have a time share at a different property on the beach, so I am very familiar with the area.  Although I wasn't able to spend a lot of time enjoying this hotel, I will say they have a lot to do.  It's right on the beach, activities for kids, a nice pool bar and an additional hotel bar.  The room was spacious and clean.  I had daily maid service.  The room has a coffee maker, microwave and small refrigerator.  They replenish the coffee every day, I would have liked more than one four cup packet.  Also, I was upgraded to a corner beachfront room which was very nice.  The balcony has access from the living room as well as the bedroom.  Check in and check out were quick and…

title: Chloes Lounge at DiamondHead...Amazing
review: Of all the vacation spots we have been to, DiamondHead is one of our favorites!  While there, you must spend some time at Chloes Lounge...Spike makes the best drinks...she is so much fun to talk to, has lots of stories and is the reason we spend time in the lounge!! We are going back in June and can't wait to see her...she truly is a sweetheart!   OSU Buckeyes!!

title: Great Experience!
review: Dear Dianne J, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm excited to hear that Spike is always able to take great care of you, she is a great asset to DiamondHead and we are lucky to have her. She always gets a lot of compliments from our guests. Thank you again for staying with us and for enjoying Chloes Lounge.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Perfect relaxing vacation
review: The Diamond Head Beach Resort Hotel more than lived up to my expectations. Arrived with a group of families in town for girls high school Nationals gymnastics competition. Hotel was booked by the coach, so I had no hand in making this choice. I fretted a little about this, but there was no need to. The hotel was beautiful. Very friendly staff and the room was the cleanest I have ever stayed in. Considering these suites with kitchenettes are occupied by beach-goers that is saying a lot! I also had a spectacular view on the 8th floor of the beach and pier. Sliding glass doors in the living area and bedroom could be left open all night and ocean waves lulled me to sleep each night. I also loved the beach bar by the pool and beach. Could eat and drink on tiles or in the sand.…

title: Oversold, Underdelivered!
review: Dear Skimlatte, Thank you for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm pleased to hear that you and your group enjoyed your stay at our resort. We pride ourselves on giving our guests the best possible service and exceeding expectations at every opportunity. We recently completed upgrades to our Cabana's Beach Bar & Grille, I'm happy to hear you enjoyed the food and beach atmosphere there. Thank you again, we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Beautiful views, excellent service!
review: We spent 4 nights at the diamond head with my husband and two kids (6&3).  This was our first time to ft Myers beach and we will be back. The hotel: pros: great location, on the beach within walking distance of the pier and restaurants.  Our kids loved the pool and two hot tubs and having the pool bar open from 9-8 was awesome! The beach access is right through the gate by the pool bar and the beach is wonderful with soft white sand and sandbar was great for finding shells and sand dollars!  The kids got a kick out of the hermit crab races. The room: we were on the 12th floor and had the best view of the pool and beach, the room was a good size and was nice to have the kitchenette.  No issues finding parking in the lot. We loved the we could walk to heavenly biscuit (a…

title: Don't touch the timeshare, though!
review: It's a perfectly serviceable place -- 3.5 stars is about right -- but it's really not flash.  The beach is long and sandy, the staff is veteran and friendly, and the rooms, comfortable and clean.  If you have a choice, get a room facing west.  The balconies are large, and just made for having room service (which was amazingly fast!) while watching the sun set over Sanibel Island.  Full-on oceanfront is not worth the extra jack.    They will ask you to do a timeshare presentation; if you indulge (they essentially pay you $100 to listen to the spiel), get familiar with Interval International before you go. What they tell you sounds too good to be true, and when you check, you find that it is.  It's harder to get a week on II than to find a place on Priceline. A lot harder.

title: Excellent  Stay
review: Dear Dissenter, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and were able to experience some of our magical Gulf coast sunsets from your balcony. Locals and visitors alike call it the Sunset Celebration, a true thing of beauty. I'm also happy to know that our staff was able to take such good care of you, they truly do strive to give each guest a special experience. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Exceeded Expecations
review: We stayed here recently and had a one bedroom suite.  It didn't disappoint.  The room was very comfortable and everything you wanted.  Wonderful balcony view over the gulf and beach.  The rooms were clean.  The bed comfortable.  Good bathroom area, although sometimes there was a problem with hot water at peak times.  Kitchen area well equipped with everything you could want (although I wish the US would provide a kettle for us English tea drinkers).  Coffee was replenished daily.  Would definitely stay again.  Only problem I would say was the noisy air conditioning units when you sat on the balcony.

title: Diamondhead beach resort
review: Dear RoseCambridge, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and your well equipped suite. We try to make all our guests feel as if they are at their home away from home, only on the beach! Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back soon.   Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Anniversary Getaway
review: We had 11 adults (6 rooms) for 6 nights,  so there was a great potential for something to go wrong, but all were thrilled with the Diamondhead.  We chose the resort since it is has a bar/restaurant, ocean front, large balconies, and easy walk or trolley ride to Times Square.  Our 6 rooms covered all views/costs (OF, Pool view, gulf view, premium), and although the updated oceanfront was my favorite, the "cheapest" view was still spectacular.  We arrived at 930 am, so it wasn't surprising that our rooms were not ready.  We hopped on the trolley, did some grocery shopping ($5 cab back).  We left the groceries with David (bell hop), who refrigerated as needed.  While we were eating lunch at Cabana's, we received a call that our room was ready.  By the time I went to retrieve our…

title: Plenty nice at this price point
review: We were in a one bedroom king on the eighth floor with a partial view of the beach.  This hotel is far from new but the room was very clean and nothing appeared worn.  The kitchen was small but well appointed....we only used the fridge and coffee maker.   The bed was very comfy, the bathroom a comfortable size for two, a walk in shower, no tub.  We had lunch twice at the beachside cafe and the food and service were very good.  We didn't use the pool area at all.....spent each day on the beach.  It was rather annoying to pay a resort fee and then also have to pay for beach chairs, and not a small fee at that.  Twenty five dollars a day for two chairs.  A ways down the beach chairs could be had for less than half that.    This hotel is right on the beach and an easy walk to shops…

title: Great views but that's about it
review: Great location right on the beach. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable. Room was comfortable but the interior of the hotel was very dark and unattractive. Restaurant dinner was delicious but they failed miserably on the Easter Sunday buffet. The meats offered were way over cooked. Chairs and umbrella were a daily rate and quite expense for guests staying at the hotel especially for a week. We enjoyed our week because the weather was great and the beach was beautiful not the hotel.

title: Liked it, but didn't love it
review: Dear Janet M, Thank you very much for staying with us and for taking the time to give us your feedback. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed our location and glad our friendly staff did a great job of taking care of you. I apologize you weren't satisfied with the Easter buffet, but thank you for letting me know so we can correct that for the future. The beach chair rental service is run by a separate company and unfortunately we don't have any control over their pricing. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Spring Break
review: First- what I liked. Convenient location-right on the beach. Very friendly and helpful staff. Nice, open air, beachside casual restaurant/bar adjacent to the pool. (I LOVED the fact that they don't allow people to "reserve" chairs by putting towels on them.) More formal restaurant upstairs seemed quite nice although we only went there for breakfast. We stayed in an oceanfront one bedroom suite on the second floor. It was a little pricey at $330 per night for the quality of the hotel, but was spacious enough and had a nice screened in patio. The beach is a beautiful white sand beach and all water sports activities are available right there. You can rent 2 chaise lounge chairs and an umbrella for $25.00 per day ($20.00 per day for three days or more) and it's $5.00 per day for…

title: Great Staff!
review: Dear Camsdad11, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort and Spa. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed our location on the beach and glad our staff was able to take great care of you. We work hard to exceed expectations at every opportunity. We do have newly renovated rooms you can upgrade to, they have granite counter tops, new stylish furniture, and look fantastic. Thank you again for staying with us and we are already looking forward to serving you in the future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Visited friends here only but loved it....
review: Our friends were in town staying here for a few days so we visited and spent the whole day with them on the property. The beach right behind the property is fantastic. All sorts of water activities are available for purchase. Lots of food and drink available as there is a restaurant in the hotel and a nice outdoor bar/restaurant on the sand by the beach. The pool was very nice with wait staff available to get you food/drinks. Ample parking and close to everything on the strip. Doesn't look run down like some other resorts close by. Next time we are in the area we will stay ourselves, possibly for a Florida residents rate.

title: Lovely hotel, but needs a bigger pool area
review: Dear LVLN, Thank you very much for spending the day with us. I'm happy to hear you and your friends enjoyed your time on property. We try to anticipate every need and give each person a fantastic beach resort experience. We would love to see you again and please do take advantage of our Florida Resident Discount. Thank you again and we are looking forward to serving you soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Wonderful resort, wonderful staff
review: We had a suite on the top floor (12th) and couldn't fault any of it.  The view was superb, the bed comfortable, kitchen area clean, living area just what you need and the 'Buck Rogers' bath tub/pod/shower thing was... different.  Location brilliant, Cabanas food & drink service was excellent and you could even get them delivered to your sunbed!  The one negative point I have is that the pool area is very small for the size of the hotel and as half of it spends most of the day in the shade the beds get moved and become all on top of each other.  Would definitely recommend though.

title: Excellent
review: Dear Mags72, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. The 12th floor view is one of the best on the beach, I'm happy to hear you enjoyed it and the rest of your suite. Enjoying the warm Florida sun poolside with drinks and food delivered directly to you is a great way to spend a day. Your happiness is our number one priority. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Spring Training Stay
review: Just got home from Ft. Myers yesterday. Stayed at Diamond Head.  Everything was fantastic. Had dinner twice and breakfast once at Chloe's. Food and service were excellent. Everything you need is right there. The only negative is that smoking is allowed on the patios of each suite.  We are non smokers but people below us were heavy smokers.  We would enjoy our patio and wonderful gulf view for a few minutes and then have to run inside and close the doors to avoid the smoke.  We'd love to go back but honestly the smoking would deter us.  Definitely recommend the premium suite for the straight on gulf view.  Just spectacular.  Please Diamond Head, make the resort (Except for Cabanas) a non smoking facility. Thanks for a great stay!

title: Is this true?
review: I have stayed at Diamond head 4 times, it's a great place.  I suggest it to most of my friends that go to Florida on vacation.  I just talked to one of my friend who spend a week there this month. He really enjoyed it, but he said there is a  20% TIP ADDED TO THE BILLS. (food/drink) I'm sure that the person is mistaken, because, all of us tip well while were there.  Can anyone tell me if this is true? And if it is true,why was it added?  Don't the employee's make enough, or is the mgt keeping a part of the tips?  Any help would be appreciated.  Thanks

title: Diamondhead is wonderful!! BUT....Fitness Center needs an update!!
review: Dear Biil A, Thank you very much for staying with us over the years. I'm happy to hear your friend had a great time. Let me try to explain what probably happened. The only situations that we add an 18% gratuity is if there is a dining party of 6 or more people, or if the guest opened up a tab at the bar and didn't come back to sign the credit card slip. Many guests leave without closing their check and this is when an 18% gratuity is added. Management never keeps any of this and it goes directly to the wait staff. I hope this helped answer your question and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Great family vacation
review: We are owners at Diamondhead and have no regrets about investing in this premium resort. The staff is always accommodating, friendly and they go out of their way. There have been several updates to the resort in the last few years and we welcome them! The fitness center should be high on the priority list of needing the next update. The equipment is lacking and needs an update badly. The exercise bike barely works, is noisy and the controls are ready to fall off.  Since there have been so many great improvements to this resort in recent years, we hope that the future holds a new fitness center for Diamondhead. Diamondhead is definitely  a must see in Fort Myers Beach. Great place to bring your kids!!  Thanks Diamondhead for another wonderful visit!!!

title: First time in Fort Myers
review: Dear Nancy G, Thank you so much for being a Vacation Club owner! I'm very pleased to hear that you love the new improvements we have been making to DiamondHead Beach Resort, and we do plan to continue improving the property every year. Thank you for your suggestion about the fitness room, I will definitely add that to our list of possible improvements. Thank you again and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Stunning views over the beach with great facilities.
review: Great place for a family vacation.   We confirmed 3 premium ocean view suites and 1 oceanfront suite. Book the premium suites as it is worth it for the updated furnishings.  They were able to place the 3 premium rooms together with the balcony doors opened to connect all  3 rooms, perfect for the kids. The staff were all very friendly and efficient. Daniel at Cabana's beach and pool bar was the best, making sure we had everything we needed even finding an extra umbrella to shade one of the kids that fell asleep on a lounge chair.  Our one complaint was dinner Sat night. Reservations had been made for our large party 2 weeks prior requesting outside seating, unfortunately we were told when we arrived that  the terrace at Chloes was not available due to a wedding.(had we known in…

title: Welcoming and relaxing atmosphere!
review: Due to the hoards of Spring breakers we were not able to get a reservation here or anywhere else on the beach but as we live fairly close decided on a day trip. We have stayed here before and love the location and atmosphere. The staff is very welcoming from the moment you park. We had breakfast at Chloe's and it was very good, waitress was awesome and very patient with the three girls, my mom and myself. Beach staff was also terrific, the young man putting up the umbrellas was very engaging and chatted and laughed with us as he did his work, worth every penny to have someone else handle that! Water was still frigid but the sun was shining so no one seemed to mind. I had a little mishap and dropped my phone in a bucket of salt water, ugh! Ran up to Chloe's at the urging of the…

title: Really Really nice
review: Everyone/everything about this place is nice!  It's a little pricey but I am a firm believer you get what you pay for. Beautiful views, walking distance to Times Square, rm service excellent, Fab BEACH spot. Traffic SLOW, add 1hr to you trip.

title: Great rooms and location
review: Dear RedheadedMenace, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm excited to hear you had a wonderful stay and enjoyed the location. We put our guests within a short walk of all the fun Fort Myers Beach offers, yet far enough to give you a quiet place to relax. This is our busiest time of year and traffic can be stop and go, but it is clear most of the year. Come visit us this summer and it will be free flowing. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Has lost some of it's appeal.
review: My husband and I were in town for spring training and stayed 3 nights at the resort. The staff was very friendly from the moment we  pulled into the parking lot. The rooms were great and we enjoyed the ocean view. The convenience of staying on the beach was worth the price we paid for the room. We will be back!

title: Great Service!
review: Dear Bethany K, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm pleased to hear you had a wonderful experience and I hope your baseball team won its games! Our staff strives to exceed expectations and I'm happy they were able to take great care of you. Your happiness is our number one goal. Thank you again and we are looking forward to seeing back in the future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: lovely relaxing experience ,staff do great job
review: we stayed from fri to monday ...really nice room, view of sunrise from our balcony.....pool area very relaxing ,family friendly ,right on the beach ....we just wanted to relax for couple days get some sun. it worked out perfect.....one thing having a car in this area not recommended traffic crawls all the time ......only one main street

title: Home away from home
review: Dear Laimhin, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your suite, the view, and were able to soak in the warm southwest Florida sun like you wanted. Yes, it's high season right now and traffic can be slow. We are located close to all the great restaurants and entertainment on Fort Myers Beach though, so a short 10-minute walk puts you in the middle of the Times Square area. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Amazing
review: We've stayed here enough times and feel very comfortable here.  The staff is extremely friendly and there is always a nice surprise at the renovations from the previous visit.  Units are always clean and well maintained.  It's the perfect distance from the pier.  It's within walking distance but yet is far enough away from all of the noise.  There are 2 restaurants, a spa, small gym, and of course, a swimming pool!  Access to the beach is very convenient and water sport rentals are right here.  There are daily activities such as volleyball, bingo, and other games at the pool.  There is a DJ on the weekends by the pool too.

title: WE WILL BE BACK!!!!
review: Dear CathyLuvsVacations, Thank you for staying with us again at DiamondHead Beach Resort. Nothing makes us happier than being able to exceed you expectations stay after stay. Your continued happiness is our number one goal. We really do try to make all our guests feel as if they're at their home away from home, only on the beach! Thank you again and we are already looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Third Year
review: The best rooms, location and hotel.  Would recommend to anyone. Loved it that much going back this year. Perfect part of the beach and close to all the restaurants etc. The balcony and views from The room were stunning.

title: Second Visit as Good as First
review: Two years ago we visited DiamondHead on Fort Myers Beach and we loved it.  This was our second visit and if anything we liked it even more.  We really appreciated that the hotel granted our request to have a 12th floor room.  We loved the view.  The 'rooms' are really spacious mini-apartments with living area, kitchenette, screened porch and bedroom.  The hotel is small in a sense (124 suites) and has a family feel, yet it also has many of the amenities of a larger resort - beachfront, nice pool, great poolside service, live music, newly expanded Cabana beach bar (good food), room service, spa, restaurant, etc.  We really felt relaxed here.  The location can't be beat, a 10-15 minute walk by road or by beach into town with all its shops and restaurants.  You never have to use…

title: My thoughts on DiamondHead, Ft.Myers Beach,FL
review: Dear Gor101, Thank you very much for staying with us again. I'm pleased to hear you had an even better experience on your second visit, nothing makes us happier than exceeding expectations stay after stay. Our staff does a great job of anticipating the needs of our guests and making each stay a special experience. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Service at the restaurant outside on the beach
review: My wife and myself stayed at Diamondhead 2-8 to 2-14-2014. This is our 4th visit to the Hotel.  We enjoy the closeness to all the "Action". Just a couple of my thoughts: Very Nice Hotel, Clean, no spring breakers. very peaceful. Get's kinda spendy, but I guess what you pay for, my per night (+ tax) ran 389 to 420/night! I ordred a pizza one night for $12.99 from room service, they add $2.00 delivery chg and 20% tip on the bill.  too bad, cause I would have given the person delivering the pizza $5.00 tip.  She lost out.. I DO NOT APPRECIATE ADDING THE 20% TIP ON THE BILL!!!. Another thing is the silly "bed tax" the city puts on the tab. Local paper says they take in $4,300,00.00 yr. on that tax alone!!  AT LEAST THEY COULD IMPROVE THE SIDEWALKS ON THE DIAMONDHEAD SIDE OF THE…

title: Nice Hotel but busy location
review: Dear Fun2Flyfast725ds, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you had another great experience with us, your happiness really is our number one priority. Thank you for giving me your concerns, all guest feedback is very important. The City of Fort Myers Beach is planning on doing a major sidewalk improvement in the next year or two, hopefully that situation will be better for you on your next visit. I believe the price for the beach chairs is $20 for the entire day, that service is run by a third party company and unfortunately we don't have control over their pricing. Thank you again and we are already looking forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Great relaxing visit!
review: The food was terrific - we had sandwiches and drinks outside watching the beautiful sunset.  Vicki was our server - she was excellent so if you go - see if she is around.  What an excellent day.  If you have a meal at this location, i suggest stayig to watch the sunset as well.

title: Will be back year after year
review: This was our first vacation stay at Diamond Head as owners of one of the units and it was wonderful!  Our balcony faced the pool but still had a beautiful view of the beach and the Naples.  The staff was so friendly and we were made to feel a part of a big family.  Early morning walks on the beach yielded some gorgeous shells and watching the sun come up out of the mist was breathtaking.  Everything you could possibly need is right here or within easy walking distance.  Our rental car sat in the parking lot the entire time we were here!

title: Great Trip To Fort Myers Beach
review: Dear Sue H, Thank you very much for staying with and and for being an owner of our vacation club. I'm very pleased to hear you had a wonderful stay and that our staff did a great job making you feel like part of the family. We truly do strive to give each guest a special experience. Thank you again and we are looking forward to see back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Outstanding!!
review: Very nice hotel, nice room, lovely pool and hot tubs (2).  Incredible view of the Gulf.  On a clear day you can see Sanibel Island to the north and Naples to the south.  We saw dolphins in the water from our balcony.  A great screened in balcony, large with a nice table and 4 chairs and 2 loungers with a little table.  Double doors so you could enter from the living area and the bedroom.  You can lay in bed and see the Gulf, just beautiful.  You can leave the doors open and hear the ocean and get a great breeze, no bugs, no birds.  Very nice staff.  Daniel waited on us by the pool and provided great service!  Everyone provided great service.  We ate at Chloe's and Cabanas.  Good food, great staff.  We did listen to the presentation for a possible timeshare, but they were not…

title: Love it here!
review: Dear Michele W, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm pleased to hear you had a great time and enjoyed your room, balcony, and the Gulf view. There's nothing better than falling asleep with your balcony door open and the sound of the waves. Thank you for giving us your feedback on the freezers, tile showers, and pool hours. We take all feedback seriously and use it to improve our award winning services even more. Stay warm in Ohio, if you need another break from the cold we would love to see you again.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Awesome time
review: We have been coming to Diamondhead for years and always have a wonderful experience! The rooms are very clean, the staff is extremely friendly and helpful and the amenities are great! We love coming here because it is right on the beach and also has a very nice pool with a wonderful view of the gulf. Cabana's Beach Bar is a fun place to kick back for refreshments and relax and Chloe's Lounge is terrific for a more quiet setting. There is a nice restaurant (also named Chloe's) if you want a meal inside. In addition, the resort is within walking distance to many island bars, shops, and restaurants. All in all a perfect place for a relaxing vacation.....with friends or family including the kids!!!! We can't wait to return!!!!! :)

title: Great location
review: The hotel is right on the beach and a 10-15 minute stroll along the beach or sidewalk to lots of bars and restaurants in Times Square. Our room was quite large with a nice balcony, but a little dark and the decor and furniture dated. The rooms are cleaned to a very high standard on a daily basis. The corridors from the elevators to the rooms are quite dark and basic. Avoid a room near the elevators as you can hear them going up and down. Despite what is written above we still had a good time and overall enjoyed our stay here.

title: Let down compared to last time
review: Dear Si_BecksUK, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed our location and close proximity to Times Square on Fort Myers Beach. I'm happy that our staff was able to take good care of you, we really do strive to give each guest a fantastic experience. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Lovely :)
review: We were greeted with the sounds of a jackhammer and construction noise at the pool bar.  While checking in we asked what was going on - completely redoing the pool bar, which meant they were offering a very limited pop-up bar at the pool. At check-in, at least 3 other guests were complaining - the only comp they were offering was a free beach chair where you could still hear the noise.  Not what was expected for people that were paying $230+ for rooms. We had wanted to sit by the pool and enjoy some drinks, but were forced to take our business elsewhere.   Luckily, the jack hammering stopped for the weekend, however, it started right back up at 8am on Monday morning - we were forced to have bfast at a different restaurant due to the noise.  Rooms - clean as always, cleaning crew…

title: Perfect after upgrade!
review: Dear beachluvr13, Thank you for staying with us again, it's always great to see our returning guests again. I do apologize for the renovation we are doing to our Cabana's pool bar. We were suppose to receive our construction permit in December, our slowest month, but due to a delay we had to start in January. Again, I apologize for the inconvenience but we know you'll love the improvements. I'm not sure what happened during your check-out, but I'll be following up so that nothing like that ever happens. Guest happiness is our number one priority here. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back so you can enjoy all the new improvements.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Three days turned into six days.
review: I stay at this hotel at least twice a year..  Great location - walking distance to Time Square.  Safe area..  Hotel is clean and rooms are beautiful and big.  Balcony is huge - love it!  Not a bad view from any of the rooms.  The beach is nicer farther South down Estero Island, but it's still nice at this hotel.  The pool is really nice and it's really fun to hang out at the pool..  They have live music, games, and the Cabana bar is sooo FUN!  Love, love, love this hotel!

title: Excelent room
review: Was for a meeting in Naples and stayed in Fort Myers. Hotel room was excellent, very big, nice view, very clean and renovated. The hotel itself a little bit old fashioned. Outside Spa not working and they charged a Resort fee!!!!

title: Great Service
review: Dear Daniel R, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your spacious suite and the stunning Gulf views. We strive to give each guest a memorable experience and I'm glad we could do that for you. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: No disappointments here!
review: Second time that I have stayed here. Whole bunch of amenities in the room, great view from the balcony. Was there as an attendant at a seminar, food and hospitality was excellent. Very friendly staff. Will definitely be back next year. By the way, ordered pizza from restaurant downstairs, was awesome!!

title: Fort Myers Beach
review: Dear rmoore615, Thank you very much for staying with us. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your room and our delicious pizza! I will pass along your kind words to our staff, they really do strive to give each guest a special experience. I'm glad they could do that for you. Thank you again and hopefully next time you stay with us it will be for relaxation instead of work.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Beautiful property and perfect location
review: I traveled alone just to regroup and relax and my choice of hotels was perfect!  I loved the view that overlooked the pool/gulf from my expansive 12th floor veranda.  The room was extremely clean and contained several amenities, such as micro, fridge, toaster, coffee pot and yes even a dishwasher!  The entire hotel staff were very accommodating and the beach was merely minutes from my room.  There are many little shops as well as moped and bike rentals.  I enjoyed a beach bike along the waters edge one afternoon and purchased several items from the cute little shops.  I can't say enough about my stay here at the Diamond Head Hotel, it was exactly what I needed to rejuvenate my soul!

title: Beautiful place and great location
review: My friend and I loved our after Christmas getaway at DiamondHead. The staff is so friendly and accommodates any request with a smile. We were on the 12th floor where we enjoyed the beautiful sunsets from our screened in beachfront balcony while having a glass of wine. Just heavenly. If you don't want to go anywhere, you have everything right there; the beach, fine dining, pool, etc. We ventured out most nights to enjoy great dining, shopping and entertainment all within comfortable walking distance. New Years Eve was a special treat. We spent it on the beach watching fireworks being let off everywhere and the ultimate big show at midnight from the pier. We will definitely return to DiamondHead!

title: Good location - everything else was blah!
review: Dear Julie I, Thank you very much for choosing to spend your post Christmas vacation with us. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed the view from your balcony and our onsite dining options. Our location is a big benefit to our guests, we are within easy walking distance to the town hub, but far enough away for peaceful relaxation. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed the New Year's Eve fireworks, you came during a great time of year. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Best place we have stayed in Florida for years
review: Escaped Midwestern blizzard/deep freeze for 5 nights at Diamond Head. Location is great - far away from the pier area but close enough to walk to everything as traffic is horrible on the island. Shelling and parasailing outside of the pool are fantastic!!   Some of the staff are great - the parking attendant (turned pool host) gentleman and the gentleman who maintains the pool were the best. The front desk staff were average at best - seemed annoyed if you asked any questions. The housekeeping staff is non-existent at best. Had to call almost every day to have our room serviced (and more towels) as it was never done before 3pm - although on check out day they were knocking at 11:05 to get out. No late check outs available as they were 'booked' - which I highly doubt.   Pool area…

title: Best to find another place
review: Dear southsidesusan, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort and for taking the time to give us your feedback. All guest feedback is extremely valuable to us. I apologize you were not completely satisfied with you experience. I can assure you our entire staff strives to give each guest a memorable experience. I will be looking into the issues you brought up and want to thank you again for the feedback. We would like to invite you back so that we can better serve you.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Fabulous Diamondhead
review: Only 120 rooms, full service w two restaurants and two bars, pool heated and two hot tubs, stayed in room beach front, huge screened in deck. Clean and kept up very well. Staff were over the top accomodating. Kylie w kids programs was great. Close to crowds and dowtown but outside of them with this location. Beach and shelling were great right in front of this place. Would go back again and again.

title: Best Christmas Present
review: Stayed here over Christmas and was the best choice on the beach. The room was right on the beach with a total private sceened in balcony, sleeped with both patio doors opened with the sounds of the beach and gentle breeze was exactly what I wished for. Room was spotless. I will be Back Judi J

title: CLASS A VIEW!
review: Dear Judijenkins, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and received the beach escape you were looking for. Nothing beats falling asleep with the balcony doors open and letting the sound of the waves fill the room. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back in the near future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: A real gem on Fort Myers Beach
review: Be sure to ask for a room with a gulf view and you will not be disappointed!  The Diamond Head is a classic - on the beach high rise.  Staff and support are wonderfully prompt with issues that may arise and are heartfelt in their care for their residents and customers.  The hotel is a bit older - floors and the building are cement - comes in handy I'm sure when cleaning the sand that inevitably comes into the building from the beach….  most equipped with a kitchenette and living space.  Again - the View is the 4 Star - the building is a 3 - and the customer support is a 4 as well!

title: pre-holdiay break
review: Dear TerriMcCormick, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm excited to hear you enjoyed your Gulf view and our wonderful staff. We truly do strive to exceed expectations and give each guest a wonderful vacation experience. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Disappointed
review: I am currently staying at the Diamondhead Beach Resort with my family and we managed to escape the horrible weather in Indiana. We chose this resort based on the great reviews it received on Trip Advisor and it EXCEEDED all of our expectations. The room is perfect for our family of four. We have a private bedroom and the kids sleep on the sleeper sofa. The bathroom is very nice and we've made good use of the kitchenette. Our room overlooks the pool and the beach, both of which are outstanding. The staff is courteous and friendly and it's only a five minute walk to Time Square. Everything is perfect and it's too bad we have to leave in two days... I highly recommend this resort to anybody thinking about a vacation in Fort Myers Beach!

title: Great place to enjoy the Sun.
review: Our recent stay at Diamondhead Beach resort was wonderful. Upon arrival, David greeted us and welcomed us to Hotel.  Personality plus, Outstanding young man who made your first impression of place great.  Truly cares about people and was very helpful about the happenings at the Beach.  He should be cloned.  Great 1 bedroom condo that was very clean and views second to none.  Vicky at front desk was also great. Very helpful and had wonderful attitude. Food is good and service was very good.  Bar is great, however, bartenders not overly friendly.  Could learn a lot from David and Vicky- Bar would be much busier. This is our third stay and place and was best yet.  Will definitely go back.  The beach is not overly crowded in December and is fabulous.  Fort Myers Beach has many…

title: Great views
review: Dear Jojonash, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us. I'm happy to hear that David gave you great service and a wonderful first impression. He is a great asset to our team and always makes guests feel almost like family. David, Vicky and the rest of our team strive to exceed expectations and give each guest a truly special experience. We are lucky to have all of them. Fort Myers Beach is a Florida paradise with much to do and see, please come back and see us again soon and experience even more!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Perfect holiday
review: Stayed here from 15th Nov to 4th Dec 2013.  It was the 4th time that we have stayed at this hotel. Last time was in May 2008, and I have to say that I was a little dissappointed this time. The rooms are advertised as being updated, but the only update that I can recall is the tv's are now Flat screen.  Our room 1204, seemed a little tired.  The shower head was loose from the wall, there were parts missing from the fridge door, and when we arrived the cupboard door was hanging off.  The room had obviously not been checked prior to our arrival.  The cupboard door was fixed immediately when I told reception.  There is a nice pool area, but again we didn't use it much as it looked a bit dirty.  Pool floor could do with a good scrub.  Food and drink prices in the hotel are expensive,…

title: Perfect Beach Getaway!
review: Dear Clive T, Thank you for staying with us again and for taking the time to give us your feedback. It sounds like you didn't stay in one of our newly renovated rooms. We are currently in the process of updating our rooms, the new rooms have granite counter tops, new stone showers, and new furniture and loungers. I really wish you could have experienced one of these updated rooms, I think you would have been extremely impressed.   Our food and beverage outlets are very popular and do offer great value.
