Compared to other resorts, we provide our guests with top value and quality.   Thank you again for staying with us and I do hope we have another chance to impress you with our recent upgrades on your next stay.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Delightful Rooms and Service
review: My wife and I recently spent a week at Diamond Head and the only problem was that we were only there one week! Everything was just fantastic,the beach is amazing-OK the water is a funny colour but I was told it was due to river water emptying into the sea.Our suite was excellent,very comfortable and spacious with a great view up to the pier and Sanibel.All of the staff at DH were very helpful and friendly although we did nt spend much time in the hotel as there is so much to see and do in the area.Sanibel and Captiva are just paradise,the wildlife is amazing,every day was a new and exciting wildlife spectacle.Dolphins swim really close to the beach early in the mornings,birds including Ospreys are hunting on the beach right outside DH even a bald eagle flew over,Gators on…

title: Paradise
review: My family spent 3 nights at Diamond Head. The rooms are spacious, we had a gorgeous view if the pool and ocean. The terrace has two lounge chairs and a nice sized table; we spent a lot of time on the terrace at night listening to the ocean. I enjoyed the pool side bingo and cabana lounge, the staff is wonderful and cater to all of your needs. The pool is very clean and over looks the ocean. This place is five star!

title: Comfortable and Friendly
review: Dear jmack_75, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us for three nights. I'm please to hear you enjoyed your spacious room and balcony view of the pool and Gulf. There's nothing better than sitting outside on your own balcony while listening to the waves roll ashore. Pure paradise. Our staff strives to give each guest a special experience and I'm glad we could do that for you. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: What a way to enjoy Florida
review: From the moment I arrived the staff exceeded my expectations.  Nothing over the top, they do it the way it should be done.  Every employee had a smile and truly looked like they enjoyed what they were doing.  Room was clean comfortable with all the amenities of home. I'll be back and would recommend friends and family.

title: Great place and perfect location
review: Dear InTheBizToo, Thank you for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear our staff gave you a great experience, exceeding expectations is what we love to do for our guests. We also want to do everything we can to make you feel as if you are at your home away from home. Thank you again for the recommendation and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Worth the Price of Admission
review: This resort is ideally  Coated in the heart of the fabulous fort Myers beach area.  Convenient to a variety of restaurants and sport options.  I loved the room we had overlooking the beach.  It was well appointed and fresh.  The staff was well trained and efficient.  We recently took a cruise and these folks had the same training class.  They would greet guests in the halls, lobby and pool areas with a sincere concern for our enjoyment.  Love this place and I will definitely go back.

title: Above and beyong my expectations
review: I was here for business and was staying here and everyone from the front desk to the restaurant staff was nothing but AWESOME! Everyone there knew my last name so charging things to the room wasn't a problem. I was here for business so I didn't really get to enjoy the beach but the weather there was super nice and best of all the ENTIRE facility was well maintain and clean! I always notice the hallways, stairways and elevators to see how clean they are but this resort tops everyone else around the area. Housekeeping did a superb job at cleaning my room. I've stayed at Ritz before and I would say some of the housekeeper should learn from the housekeeper here who cleaned my room. Every single day, my room was cleaned with attention. The pool was nice and best of all it was RIGHT…

title: great location
review: Dear Paris4Life, Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to give us such a nice review. I'm most excited to hear that our staff was able to take such great care of you. I will be sure to pass along your kind words to them. I will also let our housekeeping staff know they are doing a great job, everyone at DiamondHead Beach Resort strives to exceed the expectations of our guests. Thank you again and we hope you can spend more time relaxing instead of working!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Super satsfied guest.
review: I stayed at the DiamondHead in late October for a friend's wedding. The location is perfect, being close everything you need and yet just far enough away that the noise of the nightlife never reached the hotel. The view was amazing, rooms fairly clean and beds comfortable. There was a convenient little kitchen with a microwave, toaster, small fridge/freezer, a couple of sets of dishes with silverware and sink. The bellhop was super friendly and helpful when we arrived and everyone that we ran into that worked at the hotel couldn't have been nicer. Docked one star because of the lady that had the lawn blower going EVERY morning to clean off the pool deck and when we arrived our room was clean but not "clean". Not a huge deal but not 5 star either.

title: SUPERB EXPERIENCE!
review: Dear Achristemn, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed our location on the beach that was close to all the action, but far enough away for peace and quiet. Our rooms are designed to give our guests extra conveniences you might find at home. We try to exceed the expectations of all our guests and give each person a fantastic Fort Myers Beach vacation. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Diamond Head Beach Resort/Hotel on the Ft Myers Beach
review: This is the premiere hotel in the south Florida area. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone interested in deluxe accomodations in a relaxing environment.  The staff at Diamondhead will go over and beyond all expectations to satisfy their guests.

title: Beautiful views, killer beach
review: The beach here is phenomenal - one of the nicest I have ever seen.  The property has the best views on the island, and you can see up and down the coast and into the mangroves of the Florida Keys.  There is a pool, bar, and restaurant which are all fine - not spectacular, but certainly nice.  People were very nice and friendly, and service was responsive.  The units by and large were in good shape, and I believe recently underwent a renovation.  A few nicks and scrapes, and kind of an odd layout to the hotel (not the rooms, they are great), but especially for the price, it is well-recommended.

title: Beautiful venue for a wedding!
review: Dear Christopher P, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm glad you enjoyed your spacious room and the wonderful view it gives. There's nothing like sitting on your balcony watching the sunset and having dolphins cruise by. Pure paradise. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Great place to just relax and enjoy the sun!
review: We stayed at this hotel because my best friend's wedding reception was being held here! This hotel is very nice. The best part of it is the beautiful white sand beach is just a short walk outside the back door. The view was amazing! Both restaurants were very good and they did a wonderful job hosting the wedding and the Esterro Spa & Salon employees were very nice also plus a great bonus was mimosa's and chocolate chips cookies! Yum!

title: Relaxing Break
review: Dear Abby S, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your room and the soft sand of Ft. Myers Beach. Congratulations to your best friend and we are honored that we could be a part of the special day. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Love love!!
review: All the employees at Diamond Head are amazing...too many to mention and do not want to leave anyone out! Made some great friends this week and can't wait to see them again next year. The rooms are newly remodeled and they did a first class job! Sunshine and Sunsets...all the best in this location...take your next getaway here...you won't regret it!

title: They try really hard!
review: Older beach front property that does about as much as one could expect for the dollars spent... rooms were spacious and clean and all the facilities were open even in the 'off' season...  Sunsets were awesome from the upper floors!!!!  Special props to the beach bar staff for service at and around the pool aera...    Worth the money.

title: Nice by the beach, but noisy by the road.
review: Dear wblewis17, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, you're right, nothing beats our sunset views! Our staff strives to give each guest a special experience and I'm glad we could provide that for you. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: A very enjoyable place to stay during our visit to Fort Myers Beach
review: Stayed here a week Getaway. Nice clean room overlooking the pool, no sunset on this side - shame. The pool was not heated as stated, people were saying it is cold. Asked about heating was told it is heated but not much! Not enough for us! The hot tub was a bit hit and miss regards heat. No fan in the kitchen. Tiny fridge. Staff very pleasant and helpful. Sitting by the pool would have been nicer had they a pool deck open to the sea and sands like the one next door, the Estero Resort. All you can see is a patch of green shrub land.  A seat and umbrella on the beach costs 26 dollars a day, no way after paying what we did for a week, should have been provided.

title: Always love coming back
review: Dear William F, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort and for taking the time to give us your feedback. Our pool is heated, but Florida's hot weather does most of the work this time of year. During the winter months we do increase the heat so that our guests are comfortable and have a great time. We are currently expanding Cabanas Beach Bar and are moving some of the green landscaping on the dunes which should help with view as you are sitting down, though you can see the Gulf completely fine when standing and moving around the pool deck.   Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Scrumptious breakfast
review: We stayed in this Hotel during out 7 nights stay in Fort Myers Beach (2 adults and 2 children, 4 & 1) and found the Hotel to be above our expectations.  Great location on the beach, excellent pool, fantastic room (gulf suite view) with all amenities & within walking distance to most things in Fort Myers beach.  The staff were extremely friendly and we really appreciated the fact that you could get free water with ice at the poolside, especially with young children in the heat.  Free parking is also a bonus as you can walk to most places from the Hotel.  Hot tub at the poolside is also very attractive and definitely an enjoyable part of our stay.  Not ideal that you have to pay for sun loungers at the beach, however towels are provided, which is good.  We did not eat in the…

title: Well done, very relaxing
review: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel very much.  We thought the acomodations were wonderful.  We had a very nice suite with kitchen and living room, newly renovated, granite countertops and upscale appointments.  We loved our room.  Being there in September was great because it was the off season.  The beach access was great and the pool was nice.  The poolside service was very good and the food was good as well.  I would return to this resort in an instant and look forward to visiting next year.

title: If you want comfort, cleanliness, convenience---you've found it!
review: Dear kOnaa, Thank you very much for staying with us and for taking the time to give us your valuable feedback. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found your room to be spacious and beautifully appointed. Yes September is our low season and guests do enjoy the lower prices and more space on the beach and pool. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Wonderful stay!
review: Recently reserved three nights facing the gulf.  It was great!!!  Aside from the spacious room and beautiful view of the gulf I was really impressed with the entire staff at Diamond Head.  Halls are mopped at least once or twice per day.  The room is spotless.  Housekeeping even washed our used dishes in the dishwasher that came with our suite.  Beds were soooooo......comfortable I thought I was at home. Our refrigerator was a bit noisy and when I brought it up to maintenance it was gone within the hour.  Avoided the restaurant the first day, my mistake.  The food was great, the prices were very reasonable and once again the service was just the best.  We were given directions to some of the night life spots but since it was September there wasn't really a lot going on.  I saw…

title: Great accommodation but restaurant poor
review: Dear Frank B, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much. Nothing makes us more happy than giving our guests the best possible vacation experience! I will pass along your kind words to our hotel and restaurant staff members, I know they will greatly appreciate them. I'm also glad to hear that you enjoyed your dining experiences at Chloes and Cabanas, chef Noopie does an amazing job giving our guests the highest quality meals that taste fantastic. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Perfect vacation place; yucky ocean water
review: We enjoyed this resort.  The room was very good and the pool and beach were excellent.  The staff at the pool was top notch. The food served at the pool was great. The views of the Gulf from our rooms were amazing.  We watched the pelicans diving for fish and dophins swim by every morning!  The views of the town from our front walkway were gorgeous. Very Key West, without the cost of Key West. We will definitely be returning again.

title: Relaxing Beach Day
review: I'm a Fort Myers local and like to go to the beach in front of the DiamondHead. Holiday Water Sports rents chairs for a reasonable cost and they have some great water sports activities like waverunners and paddleboards. The Diamondhead property is well taken care of, there is absolutely no trash on their beach and during the day you can hear the music from their pool area, it is not crowded or obnoxious like the beach areas down by the Lani Kai or the pier. They have a great Cabana Bar to grab lunch and cocktails at, I absolutely love the pineapple chicken quesodillas! I highly reccommend spending your beach days here :)

title: Great place
review: Dear ALK726, Thank you very much for spending your beach time with us! I'm happy to hear that you enjoy the quality beach environment that is provided. There's nothing like relaxing the day away on the sand and then having the convenience of Cabanas Beach Bar right behind you. You're right, the Pineapple Chicken Quesadillas are delicious! Thank you again and we hope to see you on the beach soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: A great find!
review: Came for a weekend with friends.  Staff was wonderful, room spotless and the amenities in the kitchen perfect.  Maintenance requests were handled promptly.  Only disappointment was having t walk through the bar to and from the beach.

title: Beachfront views
review: Our stay at this resort couldn't have been more perfect. The guy who showed us the rooms recommended a different room to us that had an unbelievable view of the gulf and the lights of the city. We chose that great corner room and had room service bring us dinner and set it up on the balcony so we could dine while watching the sunset. It couldn't have been more romantic. The service in this hotel is excellent. We can't wait for our next stay in this room with a view Hotel!!

title: awesome trip
review: Dear 68Munzie, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear that our staff suggested a better room for you and that it gave you romantic views of the setting sun. It sounds like you had a wonderful time and we hope to see you back in the future so you can experience it all over again.   Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Nicest hotel on the beach
review: This resort was definitely the cream of the crop in Fort Myers beach. Great spacious, modern and clean rooms. Room service, beach views, pool and hot tub with outside bar. Also the room we stayed in had a nice kitchen with refrigerator and microwave, even a small stovetop. I would definitely recommend this hotel to another couple or family.

title: Great weekend getaway!
review: Dear TiffanyHen, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm excited to hear that you had a great time and really loved your room. We work hard to exceed the expectations of our guests so that you experience the best possible vacation experience. Thank you for taking the time to give us your review and we hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: GREAT PLACE, GREAT LOCATION, GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE.
review: We arrived early afternoon on a Friday and immediately noticed the that the grounds were clean and the property inviting. The check-in process was smooth and the Bellman reached the room at the same time we did. Our room was a corner beachfront 1br with a spectacular view on the 6th floor. The beach was very clean and the water was exceptionally warm which was most agreeable for our 13 month old daughter. We saw pods of dolphins feeding offshore, and also found 3 sand dollars along the beach early one morning. The location is great as there are several good restaurants within walking distance (Heavenly Biscuit for breakfast). Having the kitchen is ideal as we were able to have lunch during the hottest part of the day in our room on the balcony overlooking the beach. The pool was…

title: Great service, nice location
review: Dear RenegadeOlson, Thank you very much for staying with us. I'm excited to hear that you and your family enjoyed your experience at DiamondHead Beach Resort. There's nothing like sitting on your balcony and watching the dolphins swim off shore. I'm glad you found our central location to be beneficial, we love Heavenly Biscuit too! Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Great place great beach service was great
review: I'm a Realtor here in Southwest Florida. I always refer my out of town customer's to this hotel. It has shown to be a great experience for all of them! You can't beat the sunsets and you're right in Fort Myers Beach. just walk to the beach and all of the entertainment it has to offer. Really, you must try it.

title: The Best Place to Stay on Ft. Myers Beach
review: We thoroughly enjoyed every minute of our stay here. From the moment we pulled in, we were treated like royalty by Rob Green, our Bellman. The girls at the Front Desk were very friendly & helpful. The staff in the Cabana Bar & Chloe's were wonderful, Dylan in particular. Housekeeping was prompt & polite. Our favorite aspect of the facility was the Spa; Be sure to take advantage of this amenity!

title: Relaxing and Beautiful
review: Dear SWFLcouple, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm excited to hear that our staff was able to take such good care of you. We truly do have a talented team that enjoys giving our guests lasting memories. I will be sure to pass along your kind words as I know they will greatly appreciate them. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Perfect weekend getaway
review: I love Fort Mymers Beach and this resort is the only place to stay. We took our grandaughter and her friend and reserved two connecting suites. They were perfect, great mattresses and pillows, full kitchen, beautiful furnisehed and balconies facing the Gulf. The staff was so friendly, the room attendant was great and the server by the pool was fantastic. He brought our drinks right up to the pool. Vicky at the front desk was outstanding. Of course the beach and Gulf were perfect and nothing beats watching the Sunset. I give this hotel 5 stars, I live in Miami and this is the perfect get away. Thums up to the management and staff. By the way, we called room service each morning for breakfast and ate on our screened balconly.

title: Nice high rise on the beach.
review: Dear Jay R, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort! There's nothing like waking up and having breakfast outside on the balcony, it's perfect way to start a day. I'm happy to hear that our staff was able to take great care of you. We truly do strive to give each guest a special experience. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Best Vacation
review: The resort donated a 2 night stay to our local school's silent auction which my family won, so I was impressed with their community spirit before checking in.  We arrived on a Friday afternoon and were greeted immediately by the friendly staff.  At check in we were upgraded to a gulf/pool view.  We had a two room suite with an equipped kitchenette.  The bedroom was newly carpeted and had a comfortable king bed with nice linens.  My children,11 and 17, slept on a sofabed.  Normally this would emit much groaning and complaining.  But no, the mattress was very comfortable and both were pleasantly surprised.  The bathroom appeared to have also been recently remodeled.  One caveat to the tall, the shower head is rather low, but water pressure was good. The patio off our room was…

title: Insanely Nice Staff
review: Okay, I'll start off with my only knock on it: it's in Ft. Myers Beach, an insanely low-key type of town that was not my scene (but could be yours!). Besides that though, everyone was nice, especially Mike in Parking, and I had no issues whatsoever. Our room was always clean, and we got upgraded to the beachview which was nice. It's in walking distance to a lot of areas, and the pool and beach were nice (except for the lake runoff that haunted our trip). This place was pretty cool, and if for some reason I found myself back here, I'd stay here again.

title: 2nd trip
review: Dear MainCanePlane, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear our staff was able to take such good care of you. We truly do strive to give each guest a special experience. I'm glad you enjoyed your upgrade to our beach view suites, the Gulf water is starting to clear up a bit now as well. Thank you again and if you do happen to find yourself on Fort Myers Beach in the future we would love to serve you again.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Great suites and friendly staff!
review: well we went back to diamond head and I must say I was disappointed this year. The friendly man at the desk when you walk in was gone, who knows who was there is time you never really seen him or if he was there his head was buried in a paper. Room service was ok but we were missing $40, and Vinny with money there was no mistake it was gone! The ocean was brown (we could get that at home) so we opted for the pool. Kids jumping in the pool every couple seconds doesn't make a fun pool stay along with having floats in the pool takes up people room. The bar tender Spike was great and makes a wonderful drink! The thought the food was very good. Needless to say next year we will not be going back.

title: Great view, old room
review: Dear Penny M, Thank you for coming back to stay with us again and for taking the time to give us your feedback. I'm sorry you didn't receive the same type of quality you received on your first visit. I can assure you our entire staff goes out of their way to give each guest a special experience. That type of amazing service has kept us ranked as one of the top hotels on Fort Myers Beach. I would like to invite you back so that we can give you the same high quality experience you had the first time.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Perfect Vacation
review: We enjoyed our stay at Diamondhead!! The staff was all so friendly! Only issue that I had was the 200 hold they want to place on your card. I had no plans on charging anything to my room as I had cash planned out for every thing.   The restaurant there had great food too that you could sit down at or order by pool to eat.  The room we had was pool view and gulf view!  Room was always clean all staff was nice!  Lots of optional kid activities at pool!! We won a beach towel playing bingo.  Great location too!

title: Best Family Vacation
review: If you are looking for an nice relaxing vacation for the family, Diamondhead beach resort is highly recommended.   My wife and 13yr old daughter spent 5 great nights at Diamondhead.   We were well received with our early check-in (10:30am) and beautiful room on the 12th floor over looking the Gulf of Mexico.   The resort offers jet ski rentals, parasailing, close to shops and resturaunts.   The absolute perfect vacation we have taking a long time.   We typically go to Virginia Beach but wanted to try something new, and DiamondHead Resort has it beat.  Thank you Diamondhead resort for a wonderful time!!!

title: The best!
review: Dear Greenmikeb, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us. I'm glad to hear your Fort Myers Beach vacation was everything you had hoped for and I'm happy we could be a part of it. We strive to give each guest a fantastic experience and I'm happy we could do that for you. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: The Best Hotel On Fort Myers Beach
review: My husband and I recently stayed here for one night. I am ready to go back. It is the best hotel on Ft. Myers beach. Very clean rooms. Very roomy, nice kitchen and seating area. Our room had 2 TVs!! Nice pool side bar. Great beach area. Most places are within walking distance. Only upset was that the spa wasnt open on a saturday afternoon or sunday...wish it was.They give you coupons at check in! Enjoy!

title: Fabulous Hotel with Amazing View!
review: Dear mratty, Thank you very much for staying with us. We wish you could have stayed longer as well! I'm glad you found the rooms to be perfect for your needs. We try to make our guests feel as if they are at their home away from home. Thank you for taking the time to give us your review. Please come back and see us soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Great Location!
review: We have stayed at many hotels on Fort Myers Beach and by far this is the best hotel we have stayed at. The staff was very nice and helpful. If you enjoy having a drink at poolside the prices are fair and the food is great. We were there in August of 2012 and are returning there again October 2013 for a 20th anniversary and birthday. We are very much looking forward to having another great vacation. Thanks The Getterz

title: Amazing Hotel
review: We stayed here for 1 week and absolutely loved it. Brilliant location, friendly staff. The rooms are massive with huge balconies. We were overlooking the gulf and the whole of fort myers beach. It is on the best part of the beach. Already booked to go back.

title: Best vacation ever!
review: Dear Sarah_sadler18, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed the large balconies overlooking the Gulf and beach. Thank you for already booking another vacation! We are looking forward to serving you again.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Nice, not great
review: We just returned from a fantastic 7 day stay and were overly impressed with everything. The staff was amazing and helpful.  NOTHING was dirty here.  Aside from having no 2 bedroom suites, this resort has it all.  We took two teenage boys with and they were both comfortable sleeping on the pull out couch in the living room.  Make sure you do the Dolphin tour available right at the resort.  Great family getaway:)

title: Great Place
review: Dear Kerry E, Thank you very much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm so happy to hear you and your family had a great time with us and enjoyed everything that Fort Myers Beach has to offer. Glad you did the dolphin tour, that's one of the best activities to do in my opinion. Thank you again and please come back and see us soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Hotel without any style
review: We just came back from a week stay at the diamond head resort on fort Meyers beach... This hotel is all suites - king bed in a separate bedroom and a sofa sleeper in living area - we have a teenage son who found it impossible to sleep on the thin, lumpy mattress, I traded places with him and was up all night - the next morning I complained and asked for a room w two beds - this hotel does not have any - they did exchange the sofa mattress which was improved but still lumpy and saggy - the hotel did not offer discount or anything else - as for location - it is right on the beach - however - it is south of the pier - I recommend staying north of the pier - the neighborhood is nicer there - there are many bars, liquor stores, loud music on this side of the pier - the pool at this…

title: The little hotel that grows on you
review: We were greeted by Rob, who remembered and greeted us everyday and our daughter by name, and had a good feeling about our stay UNTIL we came into the room. It was really dated and the kitchenette could have at least a two burner mini-stove (later we learned that that is an "upgrade" and that the hotel is under renovation). We had come from a 2 bdrm suite, so this was a downgrade and downsize, BUT they gave a wonderful view AWESOME a welcome package with coupons for breakfast at Chloe's AWESOME coupons for cocktails at Cabanas AWESOME coupons for cocktails at Chole's Lounge AWESOME All the staff you encounter is knowledgeable and super friendly The chair and umbrella rentals were fair $$ We will come back

title: What a fabulous hotel in a great location on Fort Myers Beach
review: Dear LadyCinctus, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you had a good time and that our staff was able to take such good care of you. We strive to give each guest a special experience. Yes, we are in the process of renovating our rooms, updating them so that our guests completely satisfied. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Think vacation rental
review: Two of my girlfriends and I decided to stay on the beach while our husbands were on a golf trip.  As all the reviews have indicated, the staff is the friendliest group of people we ever encountered from the time we pulled up in our car, till the time we pulled away.  Rob, was there to greet us and help with luggage.  We continued to see him throughout the weekend and was always checking to make sure everything was going great.   We had one dinner and all breakfasts in Chloes.  The food was very good, reasonably priced and Diana, our waitress, was great! Our room, which overlooked the pool, and had a fabulous view of the water was very clean and very comfortable, including the pull out couch.  Thanks Diamondhead for a great weekend...we have decided to make this a yearly event!

title: THE BUSINESSMANS' GETAWAY FOR BUSINESS
review: Dear Rascal1959, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you and your girl friends had a great time and enjoyed the room and view. I will pass along your kind words to Diana and Rob as well. Our staff truly does strive to give each guest a special experience and I'm glad we could do that for you. Thank you again and we are looking forward to seeing you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Another fab fortnight at the DiamondHead
review: This is not a hotel. It is a timeshare/vacation rental property. The views are stunning and the beach is beautiful. The room was clean, but not maintained like a hotel. The sheets were not changed, there wasn't a card to ask to wash or leave them so I figured they would be changed, but as I said, this is a vacation rental not a hotel. The wifi in our room was not working and since we were there over the weekend and IT did not feel is was an emergency we were unable to use the wifi service in our room. They did bring an ethernet cord so the laptop would work, but the ipods/ipads did not work. Also had to use data plan on the smartphones because it would not connect either, unless we went to the lobby. Oh and the cord--there was a $10 fee if we did not return it to the front desk…

title: Super Hotel! Excellent Location!
review: We stayed for six nights at DiamondHead Resort along with friends of ours.  We had a wonderful stay, topped off with wonderful weather.  The rooms were nicely arranged with a small kitchenette.  The bedroom was very spacious with a connecting bath that was nice and roomy.  The only fault with the bathroom is that the shower head is quite low.  The family we travelled with had a 6'5" gentleman that could barely fit in the shower and the shower spray hit him in the chest.  The beds were extremely comfortable and we had great sleep the whole week.  The beach was absolutely beautiful.  Loved that the pool and beach were close together.  Little awkward that you had to walk through the pool bar/dining area to get to the pool or beach.  The staff were all very courteous and helpful. …

title: Outstanding!
review: Dear huffy22, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you had a great time and enjoyed your room, the beach, and the on-site dining. We also love Chucks Last Stop, I'm glad you enjoyed it! Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Spectacular view
review: I just finished my second visit at Diamond Head.  I was greeted by a smiling employee named "Vicki" who remembered me from my visit last year. Even though I was ridiculously early for Check in, Vicki took great care of me and helped me find the location of my meeting, and then she called me when my room was ready.  During our meeting food and beverages were provided, buffet style.  Everything was fresh and just the right temperature.   Plates were cleared quickly and in a way that did not disturb the meeting.  There were times I noticed my water glass had magically been refilled and was frankly stunned at how smoothly the Diamond Head staff operates!  My room was one of the “Club” rooms.  It was a corner suite with a full view of the beach.  Our balcony was outfitted with lounge…

title: Excellent!
review: Dear KRG_13, Thank you so much for staying with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort and for giving us such a wonderful review. I can't thank you enough for all your kind words and I will be sure to pass along your review to our staff, I know they will appreciate it. We strive to give each guest a special experience and I'm glad we could do that for you. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you back soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Amazing Experience
review: Once again a relaxing stay. The staff are all top-notch, great food, spectacular view from the 12th floor. Family oriented!  After spending 12 day's traveling around Florida on business it's always wonderful to end the jaunt at the Diamond Head Resort ... Always my favorite! We often overlook the best things that are in our backyard.

title: Great place with great waitress at pool and poolside bar
review: Stay at Diamondhead several times a year on Ft. Myers Beach.  The resort is wonderful, right on the beach with great accomodations and great service.  The pool area is fantastic and Cabana's (the pool bar and grill) is great.  The food is outstanding and always freash.  Reasonably priced as well.  Janet, our waitress all week wasw absolutely wonderful.  Very attentive and always made sure our glasses were always full.  She anticipated our needs very well.  We go to Diamondhead as a staycation since we live nearby, and everytime we have had Janet as our waitress she has been wonderful.  Kudo's to Diamondhead for having such a friendly, fantastic server!!!!   Can't wait for our next visit!!!!

title: A great week
review: Dear Melanie C, Thank you very much for choosing DiamondHead Beach Resort as the location for your staycation and coming back time and time again. I'm so happy we can continue to give you a fantastic experience. Janet is the best! I will be sure to pass along your kind words, I know she will appreciate them. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Another wonderful trip to the beach
review: We have stayed in Fort Myers a few times this was the first time at the Diamondhead. We booked through Virgin this time and were not disappointed. Its very easy to criticize any hotel, there will always be some small fault. From the helpful staff at check in, to the view from our room it got the wow you want from a holiday The room had everything you need for a great stay. I would not hesitate to stay there again, oh and the fault, you have to pay for the loungers on the beach . A small price to pay for a week to remember Thank you

title: My family loves this place!
review: Dear Margaret H, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm very happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. Our staff strives to give each guest a special experience and I'm glad we could do that for you. Please come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: A great place to stay
review: I stayed at the hotel a few years ago and was hoping the trip would live up to the same experience we had last time- and it did! The hotel is RIGHT on the beach (so that for those with small children, you can take your children to the bathroom in your room, it's that convenient.) The pool is also right on the beach and it is a great place for everyone in the family to swim and relax. I enjoyed the fact that you can rent umbrellas and chairs and charge it to your room. The dining facilities - especially at the very casual and "beachy" Cabanas"- are great for kids and adults. The water in the Gulf is very calm so we had no problem with the little kids swimming. All in all, another wonderful trip to the beach at Diamondhead!

title: You NEED to stay here!
review: My partner and I stayed here for 4 days and it was absolutely wonderful!!   We took advantage of their Operation Open Arms program special as we are both military and rarely get time off at the same time to enjoy a relaxing vacation (if you are a military member that has been or will be deployed then you MUST ask about this!!).  Everything from check-in to check-out was absolutely perfect.    Pros:  -The staff is SO FRIENDLY and accommodating!  And I mean ALL the staff, the reception desk, Cabanas, Chloes, etc. -The rooms are gorgeous.  I had a gulf view suite and it had a bedroom, private bath, a living room with a pullout couch, a mini kitchen, and an amazing screened in deck with beach chairs and tables. -Hi-def TV's in both rooms with cable -Upon arrival they give you free…

title: Wonderful "Staycation" on Fort Myers Beach
review: Dear Rockafella1384, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. First of all, thank you for your military service and keeping us safe. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed our onsite restaurants and your large suite style room. I'm also glad to hear our staff was able to take great care of you. Our goal is to give each guest a special experience and I'm glad we could do that for you. Thank you for taking the time to give us your review and we are looking forward to seeing you again in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: beautiful location!
review: This year we won't be going on a "vacation", so we are taking several "week-ends" away from home to relax. We chose Diamondhead Beach Resort because of it's location on Fort Myers Beach. Staying there was fantastic-they have a wonderful, friendly staff and the rooms were all suites, with a view of the beach to die for!  We saw dolphins swim by morning and evening, walked the beach each day to the pier, and they were located near the end of the "hotels" area where it was really quite.   We had great breakfasts outside on Chloe's patio each morning, and charged our meals/drinks while we soaked up the sun during the day at the poolside bar!  No one would ever know we were just 25 miles from home! When you check in, the front desk gives you a packet of "goodies" and "coupons",…

title: Best Beach, Best Service :)
review: Dear DianeF46, Thank you so much for choosing DiamondHead Beach Resort as your "staycation" destination! I'm so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and large suite style room. There's nothing quite like sitting on your balcony and watching dolphins cruise the Gulf waters. I'm glad you were able to enjoy a relaxing breakfast on Chloes' outdoor terrace as well. Our staff truly strives to make sure each guest has a wonderful time and I'm glad they could do that for you. Thank you again and we hope to see you back real soon!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Best Beach! Best Service :)
review: We are locals and love Diamond Head for it's friendly poolside bar and great food.  It is a great getaway and has first class food and drinks, with friendly staff and great atmosphere.  It is by far the best beach spot and has reasonable prices.

title: GREAT STAY
review: This is the second time we have stayed here.  What a great place to stay.  The employees go out of their way to make your stay enjoyable.  The rooms are clean, the pool is very relaxing and the tiki bar with Randy and Joe are very friendly.  We will defiently be back!!

title: Best Secret in South Florida
review: Dear Markinchboy, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy you enjoyed your oceanfront room and the central location of the property. I'm glad Dave could help you out and give you a great experience. Our staff strives to give each guest a special experience. I hope you enjoyed your trip on the Key West Express as well. Thank you again and we hope to see you in the near future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Honeymoon
review: My family recently spent a weekend at Diamondhead Resort.  It was a holiday weekend and eventhough the beach was packed, it was beautiful and so clean.  Cabana's was a wonderful spot to hang out.  Great food and speedy service.  Chloe's breakfast buffet was a great way to start the day.  Extremely reasonable pricing and delicious food.  What I could not get over, was how clean the resort and it's grounds were.  We really enjoy this beach, and are glad to have this place to visit. I strongly recommend this spot for families and for special occasions.  The staff is top notch, too.

title: Great Stay
review: Dear Wendy F, Thank so very much for taking the time to give us your review. I really appreciate all your kind words and will pass them along to our staff. We truly strive to give each guest a fantastic experience and I'm glad we could do that for you. I'm glad to hear you enjoyed Cabanas and Chloes and it sounds like you really enjoyed our great beach. Nothing makes me more happy than hearing how happy our guests are. Thank you again and we hope to see you in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Another great vacation overall...
review: My fiance and I visited DiamondHead this month for our honeymoon. Mike at the bel ldesk was great. He found us a nice sunset dinner cruise and even called to book our reservations. We liked being right on the beach and able to walk to the water in minutes. Our room was spacious and having the small kitchen area was nice. We enjoyed our Gulf View ( wished the balcony wasn't screened in, but understand the need due to bugs)  We ate at chloes for breakfast a few mornings, the food was good but not over the top. We also ate at cabanas for lunch one day, I wouldn't have gone back, the drink was good but the hot dog was over cooked and the fries barely warm. We were surprised to have gotten a thank you card from the front desk for choosing to spend our honeymoon here and a…

title: Perfect!!
review: This hotel is wonderful! The suites are large, the views AMAZING, the food at Cabana's is really good, the pool is well-kept and everything is clean. My husband and I just spent a week in a Gulf view suite (room 911)and it was seriously painful to leave! The location of his hotel is great! Its a short walk from Times Square and has sand PERFECT for beach strolling day or night. We saw tons of ocean creatures (dolphins, birds, sand dollars, fish, living shells, etc.) on the beach every day. Dave at the bell hop/concierge desk is great and has some good hook-ups for local food and activities. All the staff we encountered were very friendly and helpful (especially Dave and the staff at Cabana's). Parking is free and we didn't have a problem finding a spot any time or day. Free…

title: Can't Wait to Go Back
review: Dear Sugarpea81, Thank so much for taking the time to give us your review and for all your kind words. I really appreciate it and will be sure to pass them along to our staff, including Dave. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your large Gulf view suite and I'm glad were were able to see plenty of dolphins and other beach critters. The beach chair rentals are run by a third party company and we don't have any control over what they charge, sorry about that. Thank you again and we hope to have you back soon.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Waste of my 30th anniversary celebration!
review: My daugher and I just had a 5 night "Girls min-vacation" at the Diamondhead and thoroughly enjoyed it.  From check-in to check-out, the experience was wonderful  It is in walking distance to Times Square and a number of restaurants and pubs, so we didn't need a car. The staff bends over backward to make your stay enjoyable. That includes Front desk, bar, restaurant, and beach activities staff.  We were pleasantly impress with the size of the room -- and the quality of the furnishings.  We had a large bedroom and a separate living area with a kitchen and a large, well-furnished sreened porch.  The kitchen had dishes and supplies.  We enjoyed every activity, meal, and drink and can't wait to go back.  I may come back with my husband before long!

title: I love this place !!!
review: While this resort looks good in the pics don't be fooled. There's not much private beach access due to so many numerous public beach accesses that surround the property. The sand is not nearly as pretty as in the Navarre area. If you like to hear ocean waves - do NOT come here. There aren't very many. You have to walk through the lounge/cafe area to get to the beach. There should have been a better set up for this. Our gulf-front view was impeded by the screened in balcony. The beds mattress sagged and the pillows were lumpy. You couldn't control the room temperature as the living room was cold but the bedroom was hot. There were no ceiling fans.  We were asked before we even left home if we wanted to participate in a time share discussion. We declined. We were asked 3…

title: Wonderful Wedding Venue
review: We have stayed at Diamond twice already and will keep coming back !! Love this hotel ! Love the staff   love the rooms , love the beach, love it all !! We will be back in July and every time I am visiting Fort Meyers Beach we will stay at Diamond Head !

title: Tourist money trap and nasty dirty beach
review: So me and my new wife shell out thousands of dollars to go to diamond head beach resort in ft myers Fl, everything was paid for thru Travelocity.com. The hotel..not resort.. is just a slightly nicer hotel than a lot of the ones we have seen around here, its just a ''kinda nice hotel''.. I have traveled all around this country.. and been in nicer hotels. We go here on our honeymoon and honestly I am a little embarrassed that I chose this place when we could have gone to alot of other places that I know are better- (in hind sight), but we wanted to try something different.  The hotel staff at the front desk are friendly.. however when we arrived they demanded a credit card and placed a 200 dollar hold on funds for a security deposit.. even though the room was already paid for...…

title: Another great stay
review: Dear DJfarr2004, I would first like to congratulate you on your recent wedding and thank you for choosing our resort for your honeymoon. I would also like to note that throughout my 10+ years on Fort Myers Beach never have I seen the kind of garbage mentioned on our beaches. The city and property owners take great pride in our community and understand that tourism is vital to our economy, and work tirelessly to ensure the type of scene described does not exist. We at DiamondHead sincerely appreciate the type of constructive feedback that some of our guests have shared with us using TripAdvisor in an effort to improve our property and services. We are proud of the fact that DiamondHead Beach Resort is rated as one of the top resorts on Fort Myers Beach. I will address the pool hour concerns with our Evening Team as well as pass on your compliments to our Housekeeping and Guest Services departments. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, safe travels!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood - General Manager

title: Exceeded our expectations
review: This was my second stay at Diamondhead Beach Resort and it didn't disappoint. Our ocean front unit was clean, comfortable and the views alone were fantastic. We did have one issue at check-in, we were given a portfolio for one room but the keys were programmed for another. The folks already in the unit acted like it was the end of the world and were rather obnoxious . (Mistakes happen folks, get over it!!! I asked the front desk agent to apologize to them, not sure if that happened.)  Regardless of this little snafu, our stay was relaxing. The entire staff is polite, kind and accommodating - from Chloe's, Cabana's to Holiday Watersports, everyone we dealt with was wonderful.   I was only able to stay the weekend, while the hubby stayed on 4 more days for a business conference.…

title: Enjoyed every minute
review: Dear CeesaRae, Thank you for choosing DiamondHead Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear your second time with us was just as special as your first time. I'm glad our staff was able to take good care of you and correct the key-card issue you had. We strive to make sure each guest has a fantastic experience during their stay. Thank you for taking the time to give us your review and we hope to see you again in the future. Safe travels.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: NOT THE BEST PLACE TO STAY
review: In May my wife and I spent several nights in a wonderful unit on the eight floor.  A beach front unit with a large screened patio. The view was outstanding and our large suite looked like new. At night we slept with the slidding door open to hear the waves and enjoy the cool breeze. We had a fun time. Looking foward to a longer stay next time.

title: We have stayed here on and off for over 7 years, and love it!
review: We have always had great service and wonderful times here, we booked to go back for our 35th wedding anniversary and even though its in August we are counting the days. We just love the hotel and the staff never had one complaint, any time we need something extra, ie coffee, lots of it, they always gave us extras.

title: Great hotel in a crummy area
review: Dear Laurenbookkeeper, Thank you so much for staying with us for the past seven years! The staff and I truly appreciate your loyalty. We strive to make sure every guest has a special experience and I'm glad that we can continue to make that happen for you. We are looking forward to seeing you again in August! Thank you again and safe travels.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: Good and Bad
review: Just got back from a 5 day stay at Diamondhead Beach Resort, and the weather was fantastic! Only a couple things detracted from our stay. We stayed there using the 3 night special package where you have to take a 60 minute tour. Our room was probably the crummiest room we could have been given, the handicap access room right above the dumpsters and a/c units. It was nice and clean, but the shower wouldn't drain and the toilet would run every few minutes. I called the front desk to ask them to repair it, they said no problem. Came back to the room several hours later, used the restroom, flush the toilet and nothing happens. Take the lid off, the chain is broken to the flapper. I had to fix it myself, but I also fixed the float so it wouldn't run on. But the shower draining issue…

title: Great location, ok room, they are very high pressure about getting you to do the time share meeting.
review: Dear VacationFan1, Thank you for reviewing your stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. All guest feedback is important to us. I'm glad you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for bringing the toilet issue to my attention. I'm glad you enjoyed your time with Maria as well. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: Vacation
review: This is a nice property, but you can get a bad room here. I had a room on the second floor next to the restaurant cooking vents, which were loud and blocked the view, or even opening the doors to the patio. If you have a high floor it might be nice, but this room was a loser. I was only here for 2 nights so I just dealt with it, but definitely something you shouldnt have to do at a 4 star hotel, a pretty expensive one at that. It is a time share, so the higher floors are probably reserved for owners. Its a nice walk down the beach to the pier, but I think there are nicer places nearby.

title: Can't wait to go back
review: This was the first time me and my husband spent time alone in a very long time.  It was a much needed vacation.  DiamondHead was a above average resort...Clean, bright, colorful, friendly staff, great food, comfortable very comfortable king size beds, just everything about this place was great...I would recommend this resort to anyone looking for a great clean place, nice size rooms, great beach and located within walking distance to everything....

title: Girls weekend!
review: Dear Nancy J, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort and for taking the time to give us your review. All guest feedback is important to us as it helps us to improve our property and services. I'm happy to hear you had had a fantastic time and that our staff was able to take great care of you. We strive to make sure each guest has a special experience. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: Great location
review: We just spent a long weekend at Diamond Beach Resort.  Very impressed with the whole experience.  Hotel was very clean and staff was amazing.  We had a beachfront room and it was wonderful.  Will definitely return next year with the girls.  Thanks Diamond Head for a relaxing and wonderful weekend.

title: Enjoyed our stay!
review: Dear Melissa W, Thank you so much for choosing DiamondHead Resort for your girls weekend. We really appreciate your taking the time to review your stay with us. We are humbled by your kind words and I will be sure to pass them along to our staff. We truly strive to make sure each guest has a fantastic time and I'm glad we could do that for you. Thank you again and we look forward to serving you and your friends again in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: Enjoyed every minute!
review: Great location. We had a corner room with a view of the ocean and pool. Takes some getting used to to have nets on the balcony. Room was spacious. The bed linens were not the quality I like when I travel, nor the rugs. The staff was friendly and helpful. Had an early check in and late check out which was wonderful. Just a block or so from "Heavenly Biscuit" and all the restaurants. Enjoyed walking, going to Santibel and loved Lovers Key.

title: A perfect week
review: Booked a gulf-view premium suite for one week with my husband. Had a fantastic time! The resort was just right in terms of amenities. We made breakfast and lunch in our kitchenette each day and made lots of our own drinks that you are allowed to take poolside in the plastic glasses provided.. The housekeeper took care of the dishes, trash, fresh towels daily, etc. There was a local grocery store about 4 blocks south on Estero Blvd called Topps that has everything  you need for a weeks worth of supplies. Walked to a different restaurant for dinner each night. I highly recommend YoTaco and The Caribbean Pearl. Also ate in the onsite restaurant called Chloe's. Had a good meal for around $80 but thought the décor was a bit tired and stuffy looking. The poolside bar and grill had…

title: Florida vacation
review: Dear Beth B, Thank you so much for staying with us and for giving us your valuable feedback. I'm happy to hear you had a fantastic time and that our staff was able to take such great care of you. We truly strive to make sure each guest has a great experience. Glad to hear you were able to take full advantage of the in-room kitchenette, our guests really do love that feature. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: Not really as pictured
review: This Hotel has a great location, but very outdated.  Originally had a room that screened porch was over the kitchen exhaust fans.  Smell was unbearable.  We requested a room change and did get a better location with a pool and gulf view.  Same decor.  They are switching some floors over to time shares, so I hope they will update the entire facility.  /.

title: Lovely ocean front suite on Fort Myers beach
review: Dear Cindy H, Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. I'm glad we were able to accommodate your room change. Guest happiness is our number one priority and it sounds like we were able to make that happen for you. We do have room renovations planned as well. Thank you for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead and we look forward to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: We have stayed at many places on the beach and DiamondHead is one of the best!
review: The pool area is small and crowded. The resort touts smoke free but allows people to light up at the pool with the chairs literally on top of each other. Never fails as soon as you order an overpriced lunch someone within 10 feet lights up another cigarette. Waitstaff at pool are great. The lunch offerings are limited and overpriced. Rooms are nice sized but really dated. Shower/tub area had nice new liner. However the shower head was mid chest high. Living room couch was very worn. Carpets need replacement. No curtain liners on door walls so you had to close them all the time as you can see right into the rooms near you. We were on 12th floor overlooking the pool and to the ocean.  Knew going in that they do not offer free charisma at the beach but for the money they should.…

title: Nice beaches, good service...avoid Spring Break!
review: Our family visited Diamondhead for two nights after spending 4 nights in Anna Maria, FL.  The best thing about this hotel was the service...friendly and accessible.  The rooms were average, but not as nice as I expected for the price we payed during peak season.  I would not return however, because of the traffic and headache to get there.  It took us over an hour just to cross the bridge.  We didn't want to go anywhere in our car because the traffic was constantly bumper to bumper.    On our second day, we made a trip over to Sanibel island which was much more relaxed and family friendly.

title: Perfect Location - Terrible Traffic
review: Dear MProut0712, Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your feedback. All guest feedback is extremely important to us as it helps us to improve our property and services. Yes, March is our busiest time of year so traffic can be bad at times. We invite you to return during the summer months and you will see a big difference. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: Highly Recommended
review: My wife and I recently stayed at the Diamond Head Resort.  The staff was excellent and attended to our every need.  The location is right on the beach and within walking distance of  local shops and eateries.  Plan your day trips around traffic patterns, it can be very congested at certain times.  The rooms are a little dated and are showing some wear.  That said, we would definitely stay at the resort again when in the area.  Make sure you get a room facing the gulf; you won't regret it.

title: Good Family Vaction Location
review: Dear Iss19, Thank you for choosing DiamondHead Resort for your Fort Myers Beach stay and for taking the time to give us your feedback. I'm glad to hear our staff was able to take such great care of you. They truly do strive to make sure each guest has a wonderful time. March is our busiest time of the year, so traffic can get a little crazy. Also, I wanted to let you know that we have a multi-million-dollar renovation planned to update our rooms. We invite you back to enjoy the new rooms and that Gulf of Mexico view. Thank you again and we look forward to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: Perfect Spring Getaway
review: We have just returned from a two week stay at this hotel. All the staff are very helpful & friendly, the location and facilities are excellent, what more could you ask for? We would certainly recommend the Diamond Head and are thinking to return next year. Chas Smitten.

title: Diamondhead - Year #6
review: We stay at this resort each year.  3 years without kids and 3 years with our son.  Everything we need within the facility (food, recreation, beach chairs, pool, hot tubs, aundry, exercise room) and a great short distance to the hot spots 'in town'.  The rooms are consistent and well maintained.  The staff is incredibly helpful and friendly.  Moreso, than any other hotel I have stayed at.  Will be looking forward to year #7.

title: Fabulous place!
review: Dear Karen F, I would like to personally thank you for continued business. We are thrilled you have enjoyed your time at DiamondHead Beach Resort over the years. All guest feedback is very important to us, thank you for taking the time to leave your comments. Our staff strives had to make every guest experience a special one and I'm happy to hear that that is what you received. We look forward to serving you again in the future!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: Clean, Comfortable, Close to Everything
review: We stayed at Diamondhead 3/17/13-3/20/13 and had a fantastic time. The suite (11th floor, beach view) was super clean and very comfortable. The view was gorgeous. The balcony is quite private and screened in. The screen mars the view ever so slightly but probably deters pelicans from hanging out on your patio furniture. It was extremely quiet up on the 11th floor, heard no "spring break" noise or anything, just the sound of the waves. The pool area is great: heated pool and two hot tubs.  The other guests were all couples (mostly 30's or older, very few college kids unless they were there with their parents) and families. Cabanas, the poolside bar, was great! Not a huge menu but decent for daytime beach food (salad, snacks, burgers, sandwiches) and they have a great selection of…

title: Would never stay here again! Only thing good was the location.
review: Dear Stephanie C, Thank you so much for your feedback on your recent stay at Diamond Beach Resort! It sounds like you had a fantastic time and we are thrilled we could be a part of making your vacation a great one. We think Fort Myers Beach is a little slice of paradise that has something to offer everyone. Thank you for the comments about the towel bars in the bathrooms. We can look into space requirements and see if this is something that works for future room upgrades. We hope to serve you again in the future!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: Great place, extremely friendly staff :)
review: Diamond Head Beach Resort is centrally located on the beach and is close enough to access most everything you need. The room has 2 parts - a main bedroom with its own television and a living room area with pull out sofa, small kitchen, and television. We were on 11th floor so we had a wonderful view of the beach from a screened balcony. Free coffee and local newspaper are a great way to start the day. The room was cleaned daily. The pool area was small but we had no problem finding a place to worship the sun. The staff were welcoming and friendly. We would definitely return if we return to the area.

title: Nice clean hotel
review: We came down for the Bonita Springs Blues Festival, and quickly discovered that we were doing far more driving than we would have liked.   Our check in went very smoothly and the front desk staff were always most helpful. The bar and restaurant prices were excessive in my opinion.  We had breakfast one day at the Chloes and would not go back.  We spent over $38 just for breakfast for two that had very small portions and the service was very slow.  The restaurant looks pretty in the brochures, but is really overrated. The beachfront was great and very clean.  We had several great walk on the beach.  We had planned to go parasailing, as the pricing in front of the hotel was some of the most reasonable that we've seen; however, we ran out of time. Hung out at the pool for several…

title: Perfect As Usual
review: Dear Lisab4498, Thank you so much for taking the time to review DiamondHead Beach Resort. We are happy that our staff was able to give you a great experience and that you loved our beautiful beach. We are sorry you weren't able to find a pool chair one day. When the weather is cool our heated pool becomes very popular. We look forward to serving you again and give you a great experience.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: Fabulous hotel on Estero Blvd
review: I've probably stayed at this hotel 15 times over the years and as usual the hotel is perfect.  The front desk personal was great on our late night check-in.  Unfortunately, the weather wasn't the best so we did not use the outdoor bar/pool area much but still......no complaints.  Even though it was a bit cool at night you still have to take advantage of the big screen in balconies and keep the  doors open just to hear the waves on the beach....so nice.

title: Amazing customer service!
review: Dear TDubby, We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at DiamondHead Beach Resort. You've stayed with us over 15 times? That's amazing! On your next visit please let me know when you're arriving. We will have something special waiting for you in your room Hopefully you'll have a little warmer weather as well. Thank you again for your feedback, our staff truly appreciates it. We are looking forward to seeing again!  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager

title: Best location on the beach
review: We own timeshare at this hotel and look forward to our annual visit every year.   The staff is extremely helpful and very friendly, go out of their way to make your stay a great one. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. Each unit has a great view of the Gulf; small kitchen; king size bedroom; pull out sofa that sleeps 2 and a screened lei. There is a nice pool with 2 hot tubs and laundry on site. The restaurants and bars are great; excellent food.  The location of this hotel is fabulous, right on Fort Myers beach, walking distance to the Fishing pier, Times Square, restaurants and shopping;  bus stop right in front of the hotel for those who don't like to walk or need assistance. I would hightly recommend this hotel.

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: I would highly recommend this hotel!!!!  It had the friendliest staff at any hotel I've stayed at. The location is great, walking distance to the town square with lots of things to do. All the rooms have a wonderful Gulf view.  We met the owner of the hotel who is from MN and he was really friendly also!

title: Two Days in Ft. Myers Beach, Florida
review: Dear cronneberg,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. Our staff takes great pride in their work and, they are always striving to serve our guests with the highest level of customer service and products available. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your accommodations. Thanks again for your feedback. We hope to serve you again in the future.   Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood General Manager, DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Great place to stay
review: We spent two nights at DiamondHead Beach Resort Hotel. It has nice amenities such as being beachfront, a large heated swimming pool and a hot tub. The bar is right next to the swimming area. It was fun watching a fiddler crab race. The room was very comfortable and was a suite with a nice sitting area and TV, kitchenette, refrig and microwave. My husband and I wanted something casual the first night so we went to Chuck's Last Stop, just a short distance from the hotel. We didn't eat the next day until after church (The Baptist Church a mile south at 10:30 a.m.) Then we met with several friends at Doc Ford's on the waterfront harbor. We had various delicious seafood and drinks. I ordered their paella which was a new dish on the menu. Very large and good. We have stayed at the…

title: Initial Check In Problem. Fabulous Hotel
review: Dear Jackie D,  Thank you for taking the time to review and comment on your stay with DiamondHead Beach Resort.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your room as well as the many amenities.  I am especially happy to hear David B. took such good care of you. Our staff takes great pride in their work and, they are always striving to serve our guests with the highest level of customer service and products available. Thanks again for your feedback. We hope to serve you again in the future.    Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood General Manager, DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: The perfect beachfront vacation!
review: Absolutely loved the hotel! Great place to stay, great staff. Great location. Huge balcony overlooking the pool and beach was definitely my favorite part. Just make sure to bring your own drinks with you to the pool or you will end up spending a fortune. I will definitely be back.

title: Wish we could have stayed longer!
review: We only spent one night at the beach during our trip and had a beautiful room at the Diamondhead.  The suite was very nicely appointed and very comfortable.  The beach bar was under construction but it should be finished soon.  Beach access is easy and the hotel is close to the center of the Fort Myers Beach pier and downtown area.  The screened porches are great but my husband did not enjoy ours as much because we had a corner location that allowed us to see into other rooms/porches.  I think this was called a Gulf View.

title: bad service horible location if you want quiet
review: Dear SeadooSue,  Thank you so much for taking the time to comment on your stay at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I am sorry to learn of your disappointments with the screened in porch. I assure you that each guest’s comfort is a very important aspect of our success and I will take your comments back to our team members so that we may discuss the opportunities available to each of us to improve the guest experience. I hope you will allow us another opportunity to serve you when you return to the area.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood General Manager, DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Everything you hope for
review: stayed for 10 days and every day we had to call for missing towels, toliet paper and coffee, we were then told the coffee would cost more if we had more then 1 in our room. the coffee pot was for 3 cups and we had four people in the room, the front desk people were rude except for 2 of them. all they really want to do is sell condos they call your room repeatedly and we were on the 8th floor the view was nice but if you looked down you had a view of the garbage which stunk even on the 8th floor. would never go back AGAIN

title: On a beach to die for
review: Dear kayw1029,  Thank your for taking the time to review and comment on our hotel property and guest services. We appreciate your feedback and are sorry to hear about your dissatisfaction.  We assure you that each guest’s satisfaction is of the utmost importance to us and we will share your input with our staff in an effort to better your future experience with us – and all of our other guests’. We hope you will allow us another opportunity to serve you if you return our area again in the future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood General Manager, DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: AS GOOD AS EVER
review: We just spent four nights on the seventh floor of this hotel.  The expansive view from the balcony is unparalleled, the suite is spacious, clean and bright, the beds comfortable, and the staff friendly.  It's nice to have a kitchen with a fridge.  If you only have a few days, this is the place to stay.  You walk out of the hotel directly out onto the beach, into sand as soft as flour, rent a couple of beach chairs and an umbrella for the day, read and watch the volleyball players, walk back the few steps to the outdoor restaurant for lunch, and then sit back down and wait for a magnificent sunset.  The hotel is situated in a perfect spot along the beach, close to restaurants and a grocery store. We also enjoyed having breakfast on the balcony overlooking the pool area.  We will…

title: Wonderful Resort!
review: This was our first visit to DiamondHead Resort and it was wonderful!  The room was very nice and clean and had updated furnishings and decor.  Screened in balcony was also really nice.  We stayed on the 7th floor and had a gulf view which overlooked the pool area.  If you want to be looking straight out at the ocean you have to request a beach front room.   The pool area and outside bar was also very nice and the staff very friendly.  Beach area was also beautiful and a great place to people watch.    The only negative about this resort is their restaurant, Chloe's.  The food was just average and the staff were not knowledgeable about food allergens at all.  Otherwise I would have given DiamondHead 5 stars.    Really enjoyed our stay and and would definitely go back!  Thanks…

title: Down market by the sea
review: Dear Brenda M,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am so pleased you were happy with your accommodations. I am very sorry to hear of your disappointment with Chloe's Restaurant. I can assure you that our staff strives to serve our guests to the best of their abilities. I will be taking your comments back to our team to discuss ways that we can improve. Thanks again for taking the time to comment. We hope to be able to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood General Manager, DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Great Way to End Vacation
review: I should have known.  Price was so reasonable.  This is not luxury but a miracle of photoshop. Looked good, mighty fine on the Internet. In fact, in person, it is not bad. But, consider the traffic to get anywhere anytime on or off the island. Consider an uncomfortable mattress and pillow.  Maybe it is just me, but o my aching back. Then, if you like lounging at the pool quietly, consider the public bingo games and loud sixties music. And, for your comfort, try looking for the nonexistent beach umbrellas. But, if you are into kareouk, this is the place for you.  The restaurant on property... Well there are equally non tempting places all around.  Tattoo parlors too. O yeah, great shopping.. Five tee shirts with inglorious slogans for some special bargain.

title: Great staff, average hotel, screened balconies ruin an otherwise fantastic ocean view
review: Dear Ann G,  Thank you for commenting on our DiamondHead Beach Resort in Fort Myers Beach. We wish to apologize regarding not meeting your expectations during your stay; we are currently in the middle of renovations/improvements to the rooms and to our F&B outlets in an effort to exceed the needs of all our guests. My staff and I greatly appreciate your feedback as we work towards the improvements in the future and we do hope to have another opportunity to serve you again.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: awesomeresort
review: We had one night to stay before departing Ft.Myers Beach and were fortunate to stay at this facility.  We have never stayed in a place that had such friendly, nice and accommodating personnel.  Everyone went out of their way to make us feel welcome in this beautiful resort.  We were amazed when we arrived to our room to see such a beautiful view of the beach and later, the sunset.  The lanai had access from both the living room and our bedroom.  Our room was very clean and was very large and comfortable.  The location of the resort is within walking distance to the popular pier attractions.  This resort had everything that a traveler would need to make a stay memorable and it certainly was for us.  We only stayed here one night but when we return to the area, we could see…

title: Well maintained
review: This hotel is older, but so well maintained it seems a lot newer. Our room was large and the only thing missing was a stove ( I imagine because of a possibility of fire) even though the hotel was equipped with sprinklers and a smoke detector. The biggest plus was the wonderful staff. A big "thumbs-up" to our chambermaids, the desk staff, the pleasant staff at the bellman's booth on the ground level, bar tender and dining room waiter. The beach is the attraction here and it was great. The traffic going into and out of the island can get heavy during rush hours, but people seem to cope well.
