While we were there the bar area floors were replaced and painting and a new roof were being done. That's probably why everything doesn't seem dated, constant updates !

title: The best place on Ft. Myers beach!
review: Dear Dofnay,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on our DiamondHead Beach Resort property here in Fort Myers Beach. I am very happy to hear that our team was of great assistance to you during your visit and we will certainly pass your kind comments on to our staff. On behalf of myself and my staff, we appreciate your comments on the room and amenities you experienced here as well. Thanks again for taking the time to review our property. We hope to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood General Manager, DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: great ocean views/conveniently located
review: I've vacationed at Diamondhead Beach Resort since it first opened.  It is the same now as it was then--fantastic!  Staff is friendly and accommodating, suites are comfortable, screened-in patios are large.  There is no sign of age. The maintenance is unbelievable.  It never changes. Our room wasn't ready when we got there and we had to wait for more than an hour.  We were given a coupon for free lunch for two while we waited.

title: Superb accommodation and service
review: Dear aging1,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on our resort and welcome back! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your accomodations and the staff. Our staff takes great pride in their work and, they are always striving to serve our guests with the highest level of customer service and products available. Thanks again for your feedback. We hope to serve you again in the future.   Sincerely,  Neil Hopgood General Manager, DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Diamondhead doesn't disappoint...almost
review: We spent two nights at this hotel which is very conveniently located to the airport, Sanibel and the Fort Myers area.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  Parking was easy and the rooms were very spacious.  The hotel hallways are a little sterile - all stucco, no carpet, etc. but I can see why they would with all of the beach traffic and the sand, dirt that comes with that.  We did not try the restaurant or spa so I can't comment.  We stayed here to be on the beach without paying the Sanibel hotel prices and it was perfect.  The only negative was the noise from the traffic, the music from the pool area and the construction they were doing to renovate the pool area.

title: So good we are going back!
review: We stayed at Diamondhead for 4 nights last week, Wed-Sunday.  Very pleasant stay.  So much so, we are packing up the kids and heading back in a few weeks!  Check in was smooth, room was beautiful, clean and comfortable.  Kitchenette will be very handy when we return with the kids.  Balcony was great...amazing view of the gulf. I'd prefer the screens on the balcony be retractable, so as to allow for sunset pictures, but it was nicer to be on the beach at sunset anyways.  We had the room directly above the Beach bar, right next to the pool, and just around the corner from the lounge.  Did hear a little music (barely) from the bar one night, but it was not bothersome at all.  Was a very convenient room to have!  Just steps from the bar, beach bar, pool, front desk, restaurant, and…

title: Good location...once you get there.
review: The hotel was nice.  The suites are very spaceous.  I liked having the option of both pool and beach right next to each other.  There was waitress service at the pool which was nice.  Other restaurants and shopping are with in walking distance.  The only thing that I did not like was the distance from the airport.  By taxi or car service it is $50 each way plus gratuity.  We spent $120 just on travel but ig was great weather and very relaxing once we got there.

title: First Time to Fort Myers Beach
review: I wanted a hotel on the beach with nice amenities.  This was it.   The rooms were clean, the bathroom was clean and the general grounds were very nice.  We were on the 9th floor.  The staff was terrific, very friendly, especially the Bellman.  I would go back and recommend to others.  We used the spa and had mixed reviews (a separate review is written).  The massage was average, the pedicure was great, the facial was outstanding.  However, my 15 year old niece was supposed to get just a blow out for dinner when I was in my facial.  The stylist decided she needed a trim and rather than discussing with me, she only discussed with my niece.  She was pushed into it and it was a bit more than  a trim and now an issue for her dance team requirements as well as it was more expensive. …

title: Super Nice
review: Dear KAN1115, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at our DiamondHead Beach Resort property. I am very happy to hear you enjoyed your room accommodations and our staff's level of customer service, I will be sharing your kind comments with them directly. I also wish to thank you for expressing your concern about the situation that occurred at the salon, please know that we will be passing your comments and concerns to the salon management directly for further review. My staff and I hope to have an opportunity to serve you again in the very near future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Exactly the Type of Place We Wanted
review: We stayed here 3 nights, January 11th - 13th, and had a wonderful time. From the minute the cab dropped us off, everyone was extremely helpful and polite. Our room was a beachfront on the 6th floor, very clean, and the view was outstanding. It was nice having a balcony to sit outside on during our rest times.  We had a great lunch and a couple of drinks at Cabanas Beach Bar, where the food and atmosphere was awesome. We also had breakfast and dinner one day at Chloes, which had excellent food too. The location is very good; you're within walking distance of some of the best bars and dining in the area.  Keep up the great work DiamondHead Employees...you will see me again!!!!

title: Great place on the beach
review: Stayed here for two nights in December. The lady on reception gave us a wonderful welcome on arrival (sorry I can't remember her name). We were offered a room upgrade on arrival and for $25 per night it was superb and well worth the money. We were on 6th floor with the most magnificent sunset view, which was basically a panoramic view if the beach/ocean.  The two room suite was very large with all the amenities you'd need for a short stay, including a well equipped kitchenette. This was ideal for preparing breakfast etc and gave the option of eating out or staying in.Both bedroom & living room had patio doors onto a huge balcony. I've read reviewers commenting on the mesh which encloses this area and I have to say I think it is a good idea. It stopped the birds from perching on…

title: Great!
review: Dear Millie086, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay with us here at our DiamondHead Beach Resort property. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your suite accommodations and beach view. My staff and I are also happy to hear you enjoyed our local beach and resort amenities. We greatly appreciate your feedback as we work diligently to provide the very best products and services to all our guests and we truly look forward to serving you again in the near future.  Sincerely. Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Couldn't have been more helpfull
review: I stayed here a few years ago and had a great time! Hotel is beautiful. I had a room on the top floor and the view was outstanding! The room was very clean. I like how the bedroom is separate from the living area. It's a good walking distance to the shops, restaurants, and bars. Not too bad at all. I enjoyed the bar right next to the pool! Staff was great! I would definitely stay at the DiamondHead again!

title: Loved this hotel
review: ParrotHead RN, Thank you for commenting on your recent visit to our DiamondHead Beach Resort property. My staff and I appreciate your kind comments and feedback regarding your accommodations and the level of customer service you experienced during your stay. We work diligently to offer only the very bet products and services to all our guests and we all look forward to another opportunity to serve you in the very near future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Sasha is outstanding!
review: We arrived at the hotel to find that our reservation had been  cancelled by the tour company without telling us. Molly was so helpfull, she no managed to find us rooms to meet our requirments. Also, to do all she could to find out what had happend, and to provide  support to sort out the problem when we got home. In additon the hotel is in a fabulous position both for the excellent views, and perfect access to bars and marvellous restaurants.   The rooms are spacious, well maintained and have everything you need. We will be back !!!

title: Had a blast!
review: Stayed here for a friends wedding.  Had a wonderful experience and would definitely return.  Our room was spacious and had a great view.  Had several meals at the resort, including snacks by the pool, the Sunday breakfast buffet, and a buffet-style dinner at the wedding reception.  Everything was great!  All staff members were friendly and helpful.  Randy at the Cabana's Beach Bar and Grill was great!

title: Winter Getaway
review: Dear Ksief9, Thank you for commenting on your recent stay at our DiamondHead Beach Resort property. I greatly appreciate your kind comments regarding your accommodations and our resort products and services. My staff and I appreciate your feedback on our level of customer service you experienced during your stay and I will be sharing your comment with Randy at Cabanas Beach Bar & Grill as well. We hope to have an opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Stay at one of their other resorts
review: Have been comimg here for years.  Top rated and thats why people keep coming back.  2 hot tubs on both sides of the pool and beautiful sunsets!  Rooms are spacious and the help is very accomadating. The hotel is ideally located so you can walk up the road to find all sorts of food and shopping.

title: Pretty amazing...
review: Dear Chuck H, Thank you for taking time to comment on your recent stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort in Fort Myers Beach. I am very happy to hear you enjoyed your accommodations and the pool and hot tub amenities. My staff and I are also grateful for your kind comment regarding our level of customer service as we take great pride in offering the very best service and products to each and every guest. We truly look forward to serving you again in the near future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Great potential, but falls short on execution.
review: We were looking forward to staying at this resort since we had stayed at three of their other resorts. We thought it would be nice to be closer to the shops and restaurants. That part was nice, and we did walk to a couple of places we like. We came with a Sniqueaway, but I was disappointed to be on the second floor when it was not that busy. We made the best of it and were enjoying the view on our balcony. We don't like cigarette smoke, so we were chased indoors by someone smoking by the pool. In the afternoon, the noise was quite loud. This one bedroom was small and not nicely decorated. The other resorts have a beautiful full kitchen. There is no stove and the refrigerator was the size we gave our daughter for her dorm room. Even with the rate we got from Sniqueaway, this one…

title: A great time
review: Have just returned fron twelve days at the Diamondhead and have thoroughly enjoyed it. This was our second time at this place and we enjoyed possibly more than the last time. After a difficult start due to a reservation problem, nothing to do with the hotel but the booking agent and still ongoing, we settled into Fort Myers beach life again. The room wasn't what we had wanted but due to the problem it was the best available and to be fair it was very comfortable. It was bright, clean and facing the pool and beach. If I had to be picky I would have liked the kitchenette to be a bit better equipped, not even a jug, and would have preferred the air con to run cooler but saying that I never mentioned it to reception so it can't have been that bad can it? The hotel has a great…

title: nice find
review: Dear wotsit89, Thank you for taking a moment to comment on your recent stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your accommodations and that our staff was able to assist you with your needs. My staff and I appreciate your comments and we will be sharing them with management as we work hard to offer the very best products and services to all our guests. We hope to have another opportunity to serve you on your next visit to Fort Myers Beach.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Return visits bring a better perspective
review: Recently back from a road trip to south west florida. We were doing some exploring of the area , when Sandy forced us to extend our visit a few days while she traveled up the coast. We stuymbled upon Diamond Head and immediately liked it. The accomodations were excellent, spacious suite type with great views of the gulf. The entire staff was freindly and extemely helpful, rooms were made up promptly everyday. They a beautiful pool area right off the beach with a nice outdoor bar area that also serves food. The hotel is located on the main road which has lots of shops and resteraunts and bars. Was nice when we didn't want to eat in the hotel. The beach is great. If I had anytjing negative to say it would br that the food in the hotel was mediocre. Otherwise a great find.

title: Had a blast!
review: Dear dltvm, Thank you for commenting on your recent visit at our DiamondHead Beach Resort. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your suite accommodations with the view of the Gulf. I am also happy to know you enjoyed our pool and beach area and you were able to take advantage of our surrounding area offerings. We appreciate your kind comments regarding our level of customer service as we work hard to diligently to offer every guest the best service possible. I would like to apologize for not meeting your expectations with our food selections at the resort, I will be sharing your concerns with our management team for future reference. We all look forward to serving you again in the near future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Fall escape
review: Here for a conference, thus the group price created increased value. I eat three times on the property and found the food excellent. Saturday afternoon had live music at the pool and the viewing of beach volley ball was inspirational. I may return this next fall.

title: It was ok
review: View was good, nice deck to sit in the a.m. And have your coffee. The bed was very uncomfortable very saggy should have already been replaced, could not get much rest at night, the a.c. Was noisy when it kicked on or off so that kept us up also. Staff was friendly. Having the bar at the pool, hot tub area was something we liked. Beach/water was close that was a plus. Had breakfast at Chloe's not too bad. The rooms are on the small side. We stayed a week and this our fourth year in fmb. More than likely we will try a different place next year.

title: exceptional service!
review: Dear Kevin K, Thank you for commenting on our DiamondHead Beach Resort in Fort Myers Beach. We wish to apologize regarding not meeting your expectations during your stay; we are currently in the middle of renovations/improvements to the rooms and to our F&B outlets in an effort to exceed the needs of all our guests. My staff and I greatly appreciate your feedback as we work towards the improvements in the future and we do hope to have another opportunity to serve you again.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Perfect way to celebrate our one year anniversary!
review: We stayed at Diamondhead Resort on our first trip to Ft. Myers. We are always a bit cautious when making a reservation at a hotel for the first time, and did a lot of research. It was clear, as soon as we arrived that we made the right choice. We were greeted by a very kind bellman, who unpacked the car for us, called the lobby to let them know we had arrived, parked our car, and carried out luggage up to our gorgeous room. Vickie, at the front desk was kind, informative and seemed truly pleased to have us as guests, and not an inconvenience. After settling in, we ventured to Cabanas for lunch. We were greeted as if we were long-time guests.our waitress brought us a newspaper to show us some places we may like to visit. Everyone greets you with a smile and a warm welcome. I have…

title: A nice place to stay!
review: Dear sutton1626, Thank you for commenting on your recent visit with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. We are happy to hear you were pleased with your accommodations and that our front desk staff member, Vickie, was able to assist you with all your needs. I am also happy to hear you stopped in at our Cabanas Beach Bar & Grill and you were more than satisfied with everything. We appreciate your feedback as we work hard on a daily basis to exceed each and every guest's expectations. We look forward to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Beautiful views, pristine property, excellent service!
review: My boyfriend and I are in our late 20s/early 30s and wanted somewhere relaxing to celebrate our one year anniversary, rather than the typical party scene found in Vegas/Miami, and could not have been happier w/The Diamondhead.  Cleanliness was our #1 priority and we were not disappointed.  The maid service comes 2x a day and are constantly observed to be scrubbing the floors/walls to keep everything clean.  They even give you a call every day to see if there's anything else you need before they leave for the day!  The beaches, pool, and common areas are also very cleanly.  We stayed in a one bedroom king suite on the 8th floor and had a beautiful sunset view each night.  The balcony is huge: has a table w/chairs and 2 lounge chairs as well.  All of the staff were really…

title: Another good stay
review: We spent 14 nights at the Diamondhead late August early September.  It was our second successive stay at the hotel having had an excellent experience previously.  This stay was no different, great rooms, great staff and an outstanding location.  We were evacuated as Isaac approached, but this was only for 24 hours and our holiday was back on track very quickly.  One comment I would make without wishing to be critical, if there is need to evacuate guests in future it would be helpful to offer guests, especially from overseas a little assistance in finding alternative accommodation.  Another good stay though and we are looking to return again next year.

title: Great Time
review: Dear Macmcd, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at our DiamondHead Beach Resort. We apologize for any misunderstanding regarding the lack of communication you may have received from our associates during our evacuation procedure. There was some confusion in the local area as to how far the evacuation was mandated for and may have contributed to our associates not giving you better direction. We have since put contingencies in place to communicate better with inland properties to evacuate to in the event of a similar situation. We appreciate your feedback and patience as we look forward to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Amazing Time
review: My husband and I stayed here for our 15 year wedding anniversary.  When I made the reservation, I requested a room that was high up and away from families with children, as we left ours home.  Our room was very clean and our bed was very comfortable.  LOVED our screened in balcony!  The staff was great!  The food was good and the drinks were even better!  Based on the research I did prior to our arrival and once we got down there, this resort was by far the best on the beach.

title: The only place to stay in Ft Meyers
review: Dear Michelle H, Thank you for taking time to comment on our DiamondHead Beach Resort property regarding your recent stay. I am very happy to hear that you and your husband enjoyed your 15th Anniversary celebration and that the accommodations and food options met all of your expectations. My staff and I appreciate your feedback as we work to provide the very best products and services to all our guests. I will share your comments with my team and we truly look forward to serving you again in the very near future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Fort Myers Beach Stay
review: We loved diamondhead beach resort and we cant wait to book our next trip. We were upgraded to a beach view suite that was amazing and we had such a view. everyone was very polite. the room was always cleaned on time. the entire resort was amazing a must try...

title: "BEST RESORT IN THE STATE" From the Locals!!
review: Living in Central Florida for over 35 years we have had the opportunity to visit some of the very best Beachfront Resorts/Hotels in the State….We must say Diamondhead Beach Resort Hotel is one of the VERY BEST!!	Living in the State of Florida and working in the Customer Service industry it is very important to us to receive the best service as we give our Clients. This is why we can’t say enough and a Hugh Thank You to the “Entire “Staff at DiamondHead….During our visit the service we received from the entire staff was superb!! How refreshing to see an entire group of every department absolutely love their job and go above and beyond to make our and all guests visit most enjoyable!! During our stay we took advantage of all the amenities…we loved the Room Service as we were…

title: Best in Ft Meyers Beach!
review: Dear Lisa A,  Thank you for taking a moment to comment on your recent stay with us at our DiamondHead Beach Resort property located in Fort Myers Beach. My staff and I are thrilled to hear that you and your husband received the utmost level of customer service, products and amenities during your stay. Quality customer service is a top priority with us to ensure each and every guest has the most enjoyable experience we can offer.  We also greatly appreciate your comments on our resort's cleanliness as we work hard and pride ourselves on this aspect of our resort. I am personally happy to know that you both enjoyed our beach location and local area offerings. My staff and I are honored that you chose our resort and hope your 30th Anniversary will be one you will cherish always. We look forward with great pleasure to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Diamondhead resort hotel , Fort Myers Florida
review: We stay here every year after we stay in Key West. Its the perfect hotel to decompress and wind down. All of the restaurants and little shops are walking distance from the resort. The bar area is happening during the day but it closes right after happy hour. Pool is nice but somewhat small and there are 2 hottubs. We love the beach and the water stays shallow for at least 50 yards out. The rooms are 1 bedroom suites which is not the case in most basic hotel rooms. The porches are really nice and are screened in. The kitchen is nice but we never use it. Everything is very clean because its also a timeshare. There is a restaurant and inside bar too which makes it nice if you dont want to leave the property. We did order pizza one night from the kitchen and it was very good but for…

title: A tropical storm threat had little effect on our stay.
review: Dear chevelletodd72,  Thank you for taking a moment to comment on your recent stay at our DiamondHead Beach Resort on Fort Myers Beach.  My staff and I love to hear about our guest's experiences and we are happy to hear that, as a return guest, your stay was more than satisfactory and you enjoyed your suite (along with it's amenities) as well as our beach area. We truly appreciate your feedback and look forward with great excitement to serving you again next summer, or maybe even before.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Nice Stay
review: Soothing warm waters await you at this fabulous resort hotel that's on the beach. The suites are immaculate fully equipped with all utensils needed to cook. Beautiful modern flat screen T.V. Sit at your porch and enjoy fresh breezes of the ocean water after you get a massage hair cut and manicure at the spa located on the second floor. On the ground floor enjoy a comfty jacuzzi and pool with a lemon martini. There are so many little shops and tasty restaurants on the beach.Country music and artsy bars. Go take a ride on the beach with your rented bike. Have tasty fish tacos across the street from the hotel. And if your still hungry enjoy the Diamondhead restaurant for lunch and dinner. The steak is scrumptous. I stayed on the ninth floor of this hotel and the view is…

title: Nice stay
review: We stayed in Diamond Head hotel last 2011 August for a week and were overall very happy with the resort. The pool was nice and clean and the beach was right by the hotel. The beach was also kept clean by the resort. Many restaurants were at walking distance from the hotel which made that a big plus. We dined at the breakfast brunch and were happy with the quality of food. We did order room service the first day and the food was overpriced but atleast tasted good :-). We had an ocean view room with a pretty big balcony on the 11th floor I think. I do feel that the spa in the hotel is not that great - they will try to coax you to spend more than you feel like spending.  Overall we had no complaints about the hotel staff and management - there was a real fire alarm during our stay…

title: Great Staff- Great Hotel
review: Dear via62,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on our DiamondHead Beach Resort property regarding your recent stay. It is great to know you enjoyed your room, resort amenities and our beach location.  My staff and I also wish to thank you for your comments and observations regarding our actions during the approach of Hurricane Isaac. We pride ourselves in the fact that each and every guest's comfort and safety are always the first priority when we are experiencing storm conditions.  Our management and staff are extensively trained in the proper procedures to follow when we experience changes in our local weather conditions, quickly taking the steps to ensure we secure the safety of all our guests and entire staff as well.  We look forward to serving you again in the very near future on your next visit to Fort Myers Beach.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Um..No
review: Stayed from 8/13-8/17. I knew we would have a great stay right away when we arrived at noon on 8/13 and Vicki at the front desk was able to check us into a room without having to wait until 3PM. Thanks Vicki! We were unpacked and relaxing at the pool in no time. The TV in the living room died around 9PM on Monday night- it was replaced within 20 minutes- and the gentleman (Paul) who did it refused a tip saying it was their fault we were inconvenienced. Thanks Paul. All the staff at the facility were great.  Room itself was very nice- having a suite was very convenient and let us eat breakfast and lunch in and save a few bucks to go toward dinner. All furnishing were in great shape and the bed was comfortable. View from our room overlooking the pool and gulf was beautiful.  Pool…

title: Can't wait for next year
review: Dear tai57chi80,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on our DiamondHead Beach Property. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay along with our beach and pool amenities.  We greatly appreciate your comments on our staff and level of customer service, we take pride daily in ensuring all our guests receive the best level of service and products. We will certainly pass along your thank you to our staff members, Vicki and Paul, and we truly look forward to seeing you again in the very near future.  Sincerely, Neil Hopgood, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Beautifull place to stay!
review: I know my review is late, but as long as it’s true that’s all that matters.   First of all let me say that we visited Fort Myers area week of June 11th. I came here because a couple of acquaintances swore up and down that this was a nice place with a nice beach and the three and four star reviews on this site told me to give it a try.   Put it this way, for now on, I  will only believe reviews with pictures. I want to see your GREAT time in pictures. A picture of a sunrise/sunset or a picture of a dish is not a depiction of a great review/time.  Even more surprising were the number of people from UK there. My jaw dropped! You mean to tell me this is the BEST beach they could find! Were they like forget the Bahamas, Key West, I'm going to Fort Myers! Really?  First, The Diamond…

title: Nice, Comfortable Place
review: My husband and I just got back from spending a 5-night stay at Diamond Head Beach Resort and Spa.  We received a good price for a premium-beachfront view suite.  When we arrived, we were greeted with a friendly greeting.  Check in was effortless.   We were very pleased with our corner beachfront suite with a beautiful view of the gulf.  We had a large terrace with an entrance from the living room and king size bedroom. There were 2 lounge chairs and a small round table with 4 chairs on the terrace.  Granite counter bathroom with a good amount of towels.  Small but equipped granite topped kitchenette.  Plenty of cold air-conditioning.  A flat screen tv in living room and bedroom.  Right outside the hotel on the beach it was like a water sport playground. You could rent wave …

title: Good Value for the money...
review: I always go overboard with these reviews so let me break it up into the good and the bad: The GOOD: Staff is very, very friendly and accommodating. We checked in at about 2am and were given a full GULF view room facing the water. Total privacy on out balcony. We were always greeted and it felt genuine. Free Parking Room size- separate living room was super nice Large, screened balcony. LOVED it. Bed was very comfortable QUIET environment Refrigerator in rom was of a nice size.  Now the NOT-SO-GOOD (dont reallly want to say BAD) Housekeeping missed us 1day. Food, drinks were just ok. Pool was rather smallish Watersports on Beach in front of hotel (NOT DIRECTLY affiliated with the Diamondhead) was significantly higher than most, not all activities were available. Pool closes a…

title: Not Destin
review: Got a great price we couldn't pass on, the pictures are not representative of the beach sand is gray water is green. Not white sand and blue water as in pictures the beach was the dirtiest around all the other resorts raked the beach, not Diamondhead the sea grass was all over had to rent chairs and umbrella for 25 a day and they placed them first thing in am so really had to walk to get good location if u bought own chairs. Would not rent just the umbrella to us saying it would block others view even though 2 sets of chairs behind us were empty staff was wonderful will not ever go back though as destin is closer cheapier and prettier room was nice and clean sheets do not fit the bed don't k ow how they sale club memberships with the beach looking like it did

title: Not exactly what we expected-but nice!
review: We are a young married couple who just returned from staying at this hotel for a week. First impression walking into the lobby was that it was nice and the staff was friendly. PROS: Not too crowded for late July- the room was spacious- the kitchenette was helpful- the pool was relaxing and was the perfect temperature the whole time-there was ample parking for guests- it was in a good location and was near many places to eat-the room cleaning crew was there every day-the gulf-beach views were very nice- the connecting doors to the rooms were actually on the outside on the porches so you couldn't hear others in rooms next to you. The beach was lovely and the low tides left really cool sandbars for you to lay out on. CONS: I was super surprised when I walked out of the elevator to…

title: Great stay
review: We just got back from a week long stay at DiamondHead.  It was just my husband and I on this trip.  At check-in, which we were able to do early - we found they had upgraded our room to the top floor, corner room.  Clearly the best in the hotel. . .we had the ocean front view and the bay view from the side.  The king size bed was comfortable, with many pillows, the living room, quiet large with a small kitchenette.  There was only a microwave to cook with, however, we weren't planning on cooking!!  We did take advantage of the dishwasher and mini fridge - - plenty big enough to hold our beverages, cold cuts and yogurts.    The beach is one of the best. . .not crowded like those closer to downtown, yet you still had all the 'toys'. . .jetski's, water bikes, parasailing, etc (all…

title: Good hotel
review: Nothing wrong with the hotel. Good clean rooms, nice balcony with a wonderful view towards the Mexican Gulf. But it all seemed to be a little worn and could do with some painting.   The beach in front of the hotel was not good. There was no daily cleaning and the water was filled with seagrass and brown water due to much water from the nearby river (so we were told).

title: Not what I expected
review: For a name like Diamondhead I would have expected better. We got a room that was recently "renovated" to today's standards, if that's what you call it. Bed spreads looked like they were still in the 60's era and there was nowhere to put food including in that small fridge. The restaurant downstairs was a joke. Priced way to high for the low quality you get.  Overall it's got a great pool erea and activities and location isn't bad either

title: Great Hotel
review: We got an excellent deal on our stay and were very pleased with everything!  I would recommend this hotel and would come back to stay!

title: Awesome beach front resort
review: Booked a one week stay here and it was well worth every penny. Location is excellent and all rooms have some type of ocean view. Very gracious and helpful staff. Great for families!

title: Okay for a budget minded family getaway
review: As usual the property isn't nearly as nice as the online photos.  The upside is, it is an all suite property, so you have a seperate bedroom with a pull out couch in the living room with a large balcony and small refrigerator and microwave.  One thing we found strange is that all the balconies are screened in instead of giving you an unobstructed, open air view of the ocean.  The room was clean and staff accomadating.  It is not within walking distance of any real restaurants and shops so make sure you have a car.  A mistake we made and lived to regret it.  I went there on my annual girls trip because we booked on somewhat short notice and were able to get a deal there.  This is NOT a place for a romantic couples getaway or a friend trip.  Definitely a lot of families there.  I…

title: Super nice beachfront hotel!
review: My husband and I spent 4 nights here the end of June. We loved it! Our 1 bedroom suite (603)was recently updated, nicely decorated, clean, and roomy. We had an awesome lani which faced the ocean. The beach was filled with shells, especially conch shells, which were just beautiful! The pool area was nice too, but we spent most of our time on the beach. I am not sure why this hotel is not rated higher than it is. We have stayed in many hotels on Myrtle Beach and Diamondhead would have been one of the top rated ones there! This was our first trip to Ft. Myers and we loved it. There are good restaurants like Doc Ford's and Nervous Nellie's, plus themed miniature golf for evenings. We also toured the winter homes and museums of Thomas Edison and Henry Ford, located next to each other…

title: Great Location, wonderful views!
review: My Husband and I spent our Anniversary here the 4th of July, The 3rd thru the 5th,  Upon trying to reserve a room for these two nights I had been informed that because of the holiday, that they where requiring a three day mim stay. So I asked to speak to management Viola! Two day stay was fine, and upon check-in, they UPGRADED us to, the top floor! Nice, nice, nice! What a view! Now comes my complaint. Very busy week, bunch of kids in the pool, pool was actually pretty darn filthy the next morning. Need to really ramp up the cleaning after a couple of days of tons of kids in there. My Husband and I and other adults decided NOT to use the pool for this reason. Not enough bar service either in the inside bar of the hotel. The bar tender was swamped! With a nice place like this you…

title: Great place to chill and relax
review: My family and I stayed at the Diamond head beach resort June 2012. We had room 1107 beach view, amazing location. There is everything needed for a peaceful & relaxing vacation. Great service and facilities. On the beach you have everything that a watersport enthusiast could wish for. The pool was also great, lots if beds and no reserving them. Great pool bar and grill with also excellent service all over the hotel. Resturants and shops only 5 minute walk. Would recommend the Diamond Head to anyone. A+

title: Vacation!
review: We stayed att Diamondhead for 11 nights and really enjoyed this place. Wonderful rooms (Beachfront on 11th floor) and good poolarea. We really loved the close distance to the beach and Times Square, every morning we took an early stroll down to the pier and watched the Dolphins hunt for breakfast. We really liked the fact that wildlife is a part of your dailly rutines, Pelicans hunting near the beach, Dolphins all around, Ospreys using our hotel as watchtower, Manatees playing in the shallow waters etc. We can really recommend this place and we will probably be back in the future.

title: A Jewel of a Hotel
review: We have stayed here many times over the past few years. Great location, walking distance to restaurants and bars, shoping and even church. The rooms all have living room and bedroom, and kitchenette. Right on the beach, nice and big white sandy beach. Great pool with a pool bar and grille. Great food and drinks, friendly staff. The Chloe's restaurant is very nice as well. Have always had a great stay. They have a great banquet and event staff. Had my daughter's wedding there in Oct. of 2010, fantastic job!

title: Better Then Great
review: We stay very often and ALWAYS a great stay. Can"t say enough about the staff. Starting with the bell service to check-in to the rooms. The staff in the rest. bar, pool bar are the best you will find.The people in maint. keep everything clean and all working well. Hope i didn"t forget anyone because everyone there is great. Give it a try, you won"t be sorry.

title: nice Spot, Close to Everything!
review: We stayed here for 2 nights for a quick getaway. The rooms were clean and spacious and the bed was comfortable. We ate in Chloe's and found the food to be  good but overpriced.

title: Right in the Heart of Fort Myers Beach
review: My husband and I stayed at the DiamondHead beach resort hotel for a week. I loved the Fort Myers Beach location, the room, the service, the food, and the friendly staff. The weather was perfect. The pool setting and design are very appealing. We were stressed out from work when we arrived, so we spent the entire first day enscounced in a poolside table and chairs, ordering food and drinks to be eaten at the table, reading, walking up and down the beach near the property, and occasionally wading in the ocean. Nobody bothered us; nobody asked us to move. By the end of the first day, our stress level had dropped ten notches. There are many "fun" places just waiting for you to shop, eat, and drink (responsibly!) in, and in general soak up the southwest Florida lifestyle of Fort…

title: Service with a smile
review: We arrived at Diamond Head and were met by a smiling bellhop that was concerned only with our well-being and comfort. In fact, everyone we met was eager to serve and insure we got what we needed. Some of the rooms have been updated while the others are kept equally clean and maintained both cosmetically and mechanically (AC, plumbing, etc.).  I would visit Diamond Head again.

title: Had a wonderful time
review: Loved the suite.  Balcony was so big it had two sliding glass doors, one coming from the bedroom, one coming from the living room.  Balcony was screened in so it took care of the bugs and no sand coming in on the wind.  Staff was 5 star; helpful and friendly.  Drinks from the Cabana and the beach chairs and umbrella were just what we were looking for.  Taking the trolly to Lover's Key State Park was an added bonus to the trip.  Would definitely go again.

title: Wonderful service
review: Stayed at Diamondhead for a long weekend getaway. We used a LivingSocial coupon and couldn't have been happier with our choice. Every person we encountered here was wonderful - friendly and helpful. The room was perfect, clean and well appointed. Loved the screened balcony. After walking up and down the beach, this resort really appears to be one of the nicest here.

title: THIRD TIME
review: This was our third visit to Diamondhead. We arrived on memorial Day weekend and had the fastest check-in I have ever experienced. The bell hop came right over and unpacked our trunk and met us on our floor. In my past 2 experiences, I was dissapointed with the front desk staff but this time they were excellent. They finally matched the wonderful service every other employee gave us, especially housekeeping. Can't say enough about them! Estero Blvd was bumper to bumper for the holiday but fortunaley many of our favorite places to eat are towards the other end of the island so driving was a breeze. We were very happy to see the businnesses are bounding back and Times Square was hopping.

title: Good bye Atlantic hello Gulf
review: We left Pompano Beach disappointment and drove to the Gulf.  We had a 1 bedroom 1 bathroom suite overlooking the pool and the beach.  Loved the balcony with table and chairs and two loungers.  It was completely screened in and very large. Room was clean, pullout queen sofa was fairly comfy but wouldnt want to spend more than a couple nights on it.  Little kitchen was adequate.  Tiki bar and restaurant on site.  Food was reasonably good, breakfast expensive.  Pool was cool in temp but it was hot so it was refreshing.  Gulf water was warm. Walking distance to the pier were there is the hustle and bustle of restaurants and shops.  Beach was clean and we felt very safe. The pool was gated with a key to keep out non residents...a plus i thought.

title: AMAZING!!!!!
review: My fiancé and our 7 year old came down here for a relaxing vacation. We have not even been here three days and I am ready to book the next trip. The rooms are wonderful. They are clean,spacious and the views from any room are amazing. The staff are some of the nicest people I have ever met. I have never been to a resort where every single person on staff treats you like Royalty. Yesterday I had a "mommy" day at the Esterra spa here at the resort and it was perfect. Location is perfect, right on the white sand beach, pool is spectacular and accommodations are more than I could have asked for. No cons for this place. Love it!!!!

title: Great Place to Stay!
review: My husband and I just returned from our honeymoon in Fort Myers and we stayed at Diamondhead.  I was extremely impressed with the clean rooms and great food. It was fairly quiet but also had plenty of activities to enjoy. We did the dolphin wave runner tour which was awesome! We saw lots of manatees,dolphins, and osprey. Every evening during low tide, this is the beach to be at for shelling and/or surf fishing.  I would definately recommend this to anyone that wants a nice place to stay for an affordable price (away from the heavy party scene at Lani Kai), and great staff.

title: Vacation away from it all
review: I booked here for my wedding weekend although I live only 15 minutes away. It was worth it and I felt like I was somewhere else. Ask to get one of the newly renovated rooms because my room was nicer than most but cost the same amount. All of the rooms have great views, they have a triple A discount and the room service is good and not overpriced. I plan on coming back every year to get a mini vacation.

title: Girl's vacation!!!
review: A couple girlfriends and I recently stayed at DiamondHead.  We had such a great time, we're already thinking of going back!!  The room was beautiful.  Roomy, clean, and quiet.   The staff was wonderful right from the start.  We arrived early, and our room was ready.  We checked in, got to our room, changed, and hit the pool/beach!   Everyone was soooo nice. I know I won't be able to name everyone, but here are some of the folks who made our stay exceptional.... Vicki, Janet, Sharon (towel hut), Spike, Dave D., Robin, the bellmen, the housekeeping staff, the wait staff, the guy who delivered our pizza, and everyone else we encountered.  Thank you all!!!! Everything you need is within walking distance.  If not, the trolley is a fun ride!!  We had fun where ever we went....Times…

title: Wonderful mini vacation
review: We recently did a mini vacation at Diamondhead. We cannot say enough good things about the resort.  The staff-Spike,Robin,Jay etc., were excellent. They made our stay fun and were so helpful.The rooms were beautiful and the views were breathtaking.  The only downfall was that we agreed to the 75 minute timeshare talk. It turned into 2 and 1/2 hours which was very long and too long to expect someone to give up their vacation time to listen to. I would recommend this resort to anyone and would like to come back again sometime. Thanks to everyone at the resort!

title: Totally amazing  best thing we ever did!
review: we have a week 11 t.s and love every minute of our stay!  everything is so close to Diamondhead, can walk most anywhere,  but hate to leave the pool!  We always getAAAAA service and the best food!  hoping to buy another week in the future!  we don't even want to trade pour week for anywhere else!

title: Fabulous Wedding
review: My daughter got married at Diamondhead on Fort Myers Beach in April.  Johnny and Kathy were great to work with, as was everyone else at the resort.  The wedding turned out perfect.  What a beautiful place to have a wedding.  And the staff made it an exceptional exprience.  I would highly recommend having your wedding at this resort, it was incredible!

title: Great resort
review: Have been meeting friends here for the last 10 years. Beautiful pool area and tiki bar.  Close to Times Square and all beach activities.

title: Great Place, Great Time, Great Staff, Stay Here!!
review: We are here until this Friday, What a great place to stay. We are very pleased with the room, staff, food, Pool, beach!  I will reccomend to anyone staying on FMB.. Had dinner at Choles last night and the Snapper was to die for!! again, great staff.  Do the Waverunner Dolphin tour!  we saw at least 12 yesterday and some were mating! It was icing on the cake!  I don't want to leave this place but we plan on returning!

title: First class resort!
review: We always enjoy a stay at Diamond Head. It is a great place to have a reunion with friends.  Everything you need is right there. There is plenty of shopping and dining in walking distance.

title: Best place to stay on FMB!
review: This was our third year on Ft Myers Beach and I'm so glad that we stayed at Diamond Head, by far the nicest resort in the area.  They had everything we could ask for, and the food at Chloes restaurant inside is amazing!  We had Jeremy as our server and he was great.  He offered new food choices everyday, made sure we had our drinks fast, and even knew the best night spots nearby!  I'd highly recommend Diamond Head and Chloes!  Cya next year!

title: Everything I needed
review: This was a great hotel.  Nice clean room, with basic kitchen amenities.  Staff was very nice, especially the pool waitstaff/bartenders!  This was my second year going and plan to go again.  It truly seems to be the nicest hotel in the area.  Many restaurants/bars very close by too.  However the food and drinks at the hotel were great as well.

title: Great hotel
review: The room could have been a small condo for an extended stay! It was a wonderful hotel and within walking distance to several restaurants.  Wonderful view of the pool and beach from the screened in porch.  I would definitely recommend this hotel and will stay here again when we visit Fort Myers!

title: Great place!
review: Rooms were great - service was great!  Walking distance to wonderful restaurants - go one block south to Chuck's Last Stop (excellent steaks and volcano roll!)or one block north for great Italian at Terra Nostra.  No complaints, our third year and we will return next year!

title: Nice place & great location!
review: Great location! Walking distance to Times Square & the Pier, and close to shops, restaurants & bars.  It sits on the edge of all the action, so you can walk the beach & stop to eat or drink along the way, or go other way and enjoy peace & quiet.  The beach is close with white sand and clear waters.  The rooms are very clean and nice.  The only downside is renting chairs & umbrellas for $25, and the pool is on the small side with no diving board.  They have a couple bars and restaurant on site, and offer room service.   We enjoyed a beachfront room and it had a wonderful view.  I loved that the deck had alot of room and was screened in.  It's definately one of the best places to stay!

title: Great Hotel
review: Our family (including 2 children 7 and 12) are just returning home from a great trip to Fort Myers.  Our stay at DiamondHead lived up to the expectations that were created based on several great reviews on Trip Advisor.  Hotel was clean and well maintained, staff were very friendly and helpful, and the views from the balcony were great.  After a busy winter our family was looking forward to a vacation that included relaxing and playing around a pool.  We had lots of fun at the pool with bingo, crab races, live music, and great service from Janet.  We are looking forward to returning to Fort Myers and staying at DiamondHead again.

title: Extremely accommodating!!!
review: We were supposed to stay at another hotel but when we pulled in it did not appear to be somewhere we wanted to stay. We went to Diamonhead and they arranged for our stay without hesitation. Everyone that works there is extremely friendly and accommodating! Our bartender Randy was the best!!! He was more than friendly, he not only remembered our name and our drink order,  he suggested several places to go and things to do!!! By the end of the trip he became our  friend!!!! We will def be back to visit Randy and stay at Diamondhead!!!!

title: A very pleasant stay
review: Overall, we had a very enjoyable week at the Diamond Head on our trip to South West Florida. The suite we had on the 12th floor was very nice, with fantastic views. The staff were very friendly, especially the bar tenders - Robin and Spike, who made us feel very welcome.  If we have the opportunity to return to South West Florida, we would definitely consider staying again.

title: We will return again!
review: My partner and I stayed at the Diamondhead from 4/8-4/11 2012. We had a wonderful time and loved the resort. Upon our arrival, we went to the lobby on the 2nd floor and checked in. The desk person was very friendly and courteous. The bellman helped us with our things to our beautiful room on the 11th floor. He was a local and told us if we needed anything to let him know. We asked him about good places to eat and he was very helpfu with his suggestions. Our room was spacious and clean. It has a nice large living area with a large screen TV and a kitchenette with a dining table. The bedroom was nice as well with another TV. The balcony was awesome and spans both rooms. We asked for a high floor and they honored our request by putting us on the 11th floor. There are 12 floors in…

title: Nice, love beach, to bad going to Timeshares
review: We have been to Diamondhead a few times now & we LOVE the beach, we also like that there is plenty of room for our family of four to spread out a bit in the rooms - we like that we have a mini kitchenette but wish there was a burner or a toaster oven or something for a bit more cooking. Pool is average, hottubs- one was not so "hot", the view is AWESOME, recommend getting a room facing the pool or on that side of the building so you do not have to worry about hot sun beating on your rooms/porch all day. I went to spa one day & got a deep tissue massage which was probably the 2nd best massage I have ever had!   We would recommend, we would go  back but unfortunately they are converting to a timeshare but that will likely take a few years.....

title: Great Resort on FMB!
review: We continue to return to Diamond Head.  It is located on a great beach.  We had a great view from our 10th floor room.  The staff are all extraordinarily nice and helpful.  Not a 5star resort, but a great spot for a family trip.  We most likely will be back in the future.

title: Great place on FMB
review: This was our first trip to Fort Myers Beach and DiamondHead.  Very nice resort in a great location - walking distance to everything and I would have no reservations recommending to others.  Hotel itself was not 5-star but definitely one of the nicer ones at least from what I could tell (we did not go inside any other hotels/motels so hard to compare).  Would certainly stay here again although would probably try something else with a bit of a different style (condo/low-rise) if we return.   Almost felt that although the hotel was very nice compared to others around it didn't seem to fit the rest of the culture of things around it.     We did not spend a ton of time at or in the hotel as we prefer to explore more but it did suit our needs - everything was clean, friendly staff,…

title: Great time
review: Took the dolphin jet ski run with Stacey and had a blast. She was very helpful and her presentations were interesting and enjoyable to hear. We thought the resort was very nice,very clean, with polite and eager to please staff.

title: Jet Ski Dolphin tour
review: The dolphin tour was a highlight of our trip!!!! Stacey, Kaleb, and Cody were so helpful and fun and we were soooooo close to the dolphins that I had eye to eye contact with one.  What a moment! We also were able to be close to an osprey nest with a chick sitting up and studying us and  we saw a couple of manatees from a distance.  Stacey was very good with sharing information and stories about the area and the animals and we had an awesome time. I would recommend this trip to everyone.

title: Ugh, in a word - HORRIBLE!
review: Hubby and I chose this place for romantic one night getaway after seeing Red Sox at new Jet Blue stadium. It had tons of reviews that raved about the place and location. I must have very different taste than all these people. Fort Myers beach is completely cheesy/run down. There were three tattoo parlors within a three minute walk of  our hotel. The only eateries are local dives and Hooters. We ended up eating in the hotel restaurant. I got their 'award winning' salmon, hubby got grouper special. His had clearly been sitting under a heat lamp for an hour and my salmon was uncooked in center. If it was supposed to be sushi that might have been ok. Alas...  The screened porches are nice enough, and except for the mold the room/efficiency was actually pretty nice. I hate that it…

title: 5 wonderful days!
review: Dear Schmawn,  We appreciate your feedback regarding our hotel and dining facilities. I am sorry to learn of your disappointments during your visit at our hotel. I assure you that each guest’s comfort is a very important aspect of our success and I will take your comments back to our team members so that we may discuss the opportunities available to each of us to improve the guest experience.  I hope you will allow us another opportunity to serve you when you return to the area.  Sincerely, The Management Staff at DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Great Resort and location
review: My two teenagers and I recently spent five days at DiamondHead Beach Resort Hotel, and I can't think of one negative comment.  The accomodations were very clean and spacious, with a gorgeous view of the ocean and pool from our huge screened in balcony.  All of the employees were cheerful, polite and professional.  The pool water was very warm, so it was always a pleasure to swim.  Being right on the beach and within walking distance of several restaurants was a plus.  We rarely needed to drive anywhere. We only had breakfast at Chloe's, the resort restaurant, but it was good.  The sunrises and sunsets on the beach were beautiful! I would definitely stay at DiamondHead again, sooner rather than later!

title: A Wonderful Place
review: Lovely rooms, friendly staff, great cocktails and sun. We have a 5 month old baby so we requested a cot and high chair they were up in the room 5 mins after we requested, all in good condition. Bed was massive and very relaxing, rooms were well equiped. As it was Spring break the atmosphere in the area was high. Would definatly consider returning to this hotel.

title: Excellent accommodations, right on the beach
review: My family had a wonderful time at DiamondHead Beach Resort.  We were able to enjoy the gorgeous beach knowing that we were only a walk out the door from our room.  Wonderful accommodations and clean and bright.

title: Lovely beach view, but disappointing overall.
review: We thoroughly enjoyed the large screened-in balcony with the excellent view of the gulf.the beach is clean and not overly crowded;  very family-friendly. Our suite was clean and roomy, though rather outdated.  The staff was very friendly, but not very efficient.  First of all, take them seriously when they say that check-in is at 3:00 pm.  Though we were understanding of this, we had checked with them twice earlier in the afternoon, and they said they would call our cellphone.  We check back at 2:15, and they said that the maid had just finished and the room needed to be inspected.  We sat in the lobby for another hour, within 10 feet of the front desk.  When we asked again about our room at 3:15, they said that they had called our cellphone to let us know it was ready.  We had…

title: Wow. Even better than expected or advertised!
review: Dear knitloon,  Thank you for your review and for choosing to stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort. I am very sorry to hear about the disruptions you encountered during your stay. I regret that a member of our management team was not made aware of your concerns while you were here. I apologize for the miscommunication in regards to the room availability during check-in.  We do our very best to make sure that everyone’s visit to our resort is an exceptional one and do hope you will allow us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely, The Management Team at DiamondHead Beach Resort

title: Lovely stay
review: My wife and I thoroughly researched lodging options before finally choosing the DiamondHead Beach Resort Hotel. Having never been to SW Florida before, we were essentially travelling "sight unseen". From the moment we arrived at the resort, the staff was friendly, pleasant and continuously delivered great service to any and all of our requests.   After spending a week on Ft. Myers Beach and walking by and through many of the other hotels and resorts, my wife and I agreed that we had overwhelmingly made the right choice! There is no nicer, well-accommodated hotel/resort on the beach, and the staff at the DiamondHead is definitely second to none.  We can't say enough good things about this resort. How anyone could possibly write a negative review about this hotel is unfathomable…

title: PERFECT
review: Spent 6 nights here as part of a driving holiday. This hotel has to be one of the nicest places we have ever stayed, and we've been about a bit! We e-mailed in advance asking for a room with a view of the sunset and this upgrade was provided at no extra cost, we even got a room on one of the upgraded floors. Room facilities are superb with good quality crockery, cutlery and kitchen utensils. The rooms include a microwave, double hob, sink, dishwasher and refridgerator, so self catering was easy. The room was kept spotlessly clean and every member of staff we came into contact with was friendly and helpful. Will stay here again.

title: loved this place!
review: this place is fantastic! customer service was exceptional. they've done some upgrades since the pictures posted on their site. one major improvement I was told is the towel service. now, when you go down to the pool area to get towels, they have a sign up sheet with a rep there - all you do is sign your name, room # and how many towels you took. Then turn them in at the end of the day and they mark you off. there were 2 of us and each day we got 4 towels- no problem. service for food and drinks at the pool was great. they had games and we won some free drinks. time share person came through the area once to ask if anyone wanted to listen to presentation- told no and they left and didn't bother again. room was clean and the view was exactly as was advertised on site. close to…

title: perfect
review: My husband and I stayed at Diamond Head in mid  February. The staff is very professional. There for any of your needs, but not over kilt. Accommodations very clean. Food very good. Beautiful pool, very warm and comfortable.:) I would highly recommend staying here I definately would return.

title: Great location, overall nice place
review: Stayed here with two young kids and enjoyed the hotel very much.  Check in was fast and the room was great.  Very clean, spacious and amazing views from our screened in balcony.  We had a pool view room on the 5th floor and could see a lot.  Loved leaving the patio door open at night to fall asleep to the sound of waves.  Pool area was very nice, the bar food was pretty decent, only complaint was that they stopped serving food at 5pm.  Not good when you have young kids who are hungry and you're too tired to walk to a restaurant with them.    We could easily walk along the beach or the main road down to the pier and Times Square area, a short walk.  Traffic in front of the hotel looked bad but it only took us about 7 minutes to drive from the hotel to the Times Square area.   …

title: Would definitely go back to Diamondhead.
review: We really enjoyed our time at the Diamondhead.  Great view from any room, obviously the higher up the better.  Extremely friendly staff.  Anytime we needed something they brought it right up and were very courteous.  The resturaunt staff at Cabana's was so fun and friendly.  The food was good too.  VERY clean pool, hot tubs and pool area.  Extremely clean beach which was well maintained.  The water sports offered through Holiday Water Sports was amazing. I cant say enough about Cody, Jon, and Stacy from Holiday Water Sports.  Stacy's dolphin tour was great fun and an experience we will never forget.  Jon and Cody helped me search for my lost wedding ring and were very kind to me.  The rooms are a nice size for a couple or small family.  The only complaint I have which really…

title: Dolphin Tour
review: We did the dolphin tour while down there and it is worth the money.  Had a great time and can't wait to go down and do it again.

title: Senior 653
review: Great place to stay--good eating and drinking facilities--beautiful location--out of the noise zone of beach boardwalk area--room appliances need to be upgraded--service excellent--"Jay" and his partner bell boys provide not only help getting in the hotel, but are great guides to the area for entertainment and recommendations of sites not to be missed.

title: 20 yrs of marriage...honeymoon finally!
review: For a couple who never has traveled we are a little picky.  Especially when it comes to a hotel room.  Diamond head was the best!!! The room itself was was roomy and clean.  It was overlooking the pool A N D the gulf.  I love the size of the balcony.  We had our friends over that live in Florida and there was plenty of room for all of us to enjoy the view together.  Nice walk to TimeSquare for dinner with lots of choices to eat and bars to people watch.  The pool was always beautiful and never over crowded with great bar service and a snack bar.  Definately going back!

title: Would stay again in a heartbeat!!
review: I booked one night to celebrate my husbands 33rd birthday. We come from Palm Beach County, FL so the drive was arduous but when we arrived we were so glad to be staying at the Diamonhead. All other inns or motels we passes on the way in looked dilapidated and old.  Check in was a breeze and front desk ladies were very nice!  Upon entrance to our room I was delighted. I had booked a gulf view room instead of the upgrade to the beachfront. I'm so happy I made that choice. We were on the 12th floor right on the corner so to our right we could see Estero Blvd, all of the channels, and houses.  Our view in front was the beach and shore line, basically a great 180 degree view of Ft. Myers Beach!  Unfortunately it was too cold to go onto the beach or in the pool.  We took advantage of…

title: Loved DiamondHead - Will return
review: My wife and I are just back from 6 days at DiamondHead and the resort exceeded our expectations.  Our 12th floor suite was roomy, clean and totally comfortable with a lanai overlooking the pool and beach - not overly fancy but far superior to the typical hotel room, even at very nice and far more expensive places.  The suite had a kitchenette and 2 flat screen TV's.  The staff, without exception, was friendly and helpful - responsive to all requests (i.e. two coffee packs instead of one; cleaned room early one day so we could watch football playoff game w/o interruption, extended checkout by a hour, etc.).  The pool area drink/food servers were the best we've experienced - sociable and efficient - always available to see if we needed anything.  There were a lot of little touches…

title: Typically I am really difficult to please...
review: Okay, so I am writing this while we are staying at this resort, after only the third day of our nine day stay. Both my husband and I are really impressed with this place. The room/suite is amazing and fully equipped. Most importantly though, it's CLEAN! The housekeeping staff does an excellent job of keeping things spotless and inviting. This morning before we set out for today's jaunt I took all the dishes/silverware/glassware from the room (service for four) and put everything in the dishwasher so we'd have nice clean utensils and tableware for dinner. I did this with the assumption that I would empty the dishwasher when we returned for our evening meal. I was completely blown away to find that our housekeeper, whoever he or she (an angel) may be, emptied the dishwasher and…

title: Almost Perfect:Almost!!
review: My husband and I went to Ft Myers for a long weekent to relax Dec 8th to the 11th,2011. We have stayed at other Sunstream properties in Florida so  I felt comfortable making our first reservation here. The bellman,front desk staff, pool waiters and waitresses, dining room personell and the maids were all OUTSTANDING!! The property is situated right on the beach and its pretty nice. The pool was great, really clean, and it was heated. Our room faced the gulf and the pool/ It was a one bedroom suite and just right for 2 people, very comfortable. We had a full balcony with lounge chairs and a nice size table with 4 chairs. The hotel is walking distance to the market, resteraunts and the Times Square area, as well as the pier. It is Old Florida and has its charm.  It has a  Jimmy…

title: Wonderful location and staff
review: Beautiful beachfront resort within walking distance to food and entertaiment. The staff was probably the nicest we've encountered in our travels. Everyone was friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and just the right size for a couple. The beachfront condos have an amazing view of the sunsets from the screened lanai. I did not like that there was a charge for beach chairs but the hotel offered them for free during our week due to renovations going on by the pool. That was a nice touch. I would definitely stay here again.

title: We keep coming back!
review: We have stayed at Diamondhead several times, as we try to come to Fort Myers from Michigan once a year.  We absolutely love the location, the view, and the private screened balcony.  We have stayed in beach hotels all over the country and most simply charge a lot for the ocean experience rather than try to maintain a quality hotel.  Diamondhead is clean and comfortable. While it is a tad pricey, we find that it is worth it to stay in a place that has been consistently excellent.  If you want fun and excitement and roaches, check out the reviews for the Lani Kai right down the road. Yikes.

title: Excellent
review: Very good location with excellent views of the beach.  Fort myers beach is a lovely quiet location, if you are into partying fort myers beach is not for you.  The suites are lovely and the staff are great.  We had a power cut while we were there, not the hotels fault, even so they could't do enough for you.  They arranged for hot snacks to be available and free drinks at the bar.  We stayed at the best western last year and when there was no gas (which meant no hot water etc...), they were rude and unhelpful.  The staff and the diamond head were lovely and I would stay there again.

title: Think twice before you stay here
review: I did not enjoy my stay. In fact, I checked out early and headed to a more reasonable location while in South Florida. While the rooms were large, I felt as if I was being charged for every little expense while attending a conference. My recommendation is that if you enjoy the 1950s and 1960’s Diamondhead maybe the spot for you. My time, my funds, and my recreation require a higher standard of hospitality performance.

title: Will definately return!
review: Dear Hackbert,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at DiamondHead.  Because we value our guests’ opinion of us, I was able to look into your reservation to try and understand your experience.  It appears you made your reservation the same day you checked in and only made it for the 1 evening that you stayed.  Based on the time of your arrival and departure and the fact that DiamondHead does not charge any resort or parking fees and provides free Wi-Fi throughout the resort & a daily newspaper, I am not sure what ancillary services you feel you were charged for.  If the information about your stay that I have presented is incorrect, I welcome you to contact me directly so we can sort out what may have occurred during your stay as we strive for complete guest satisfaction.  Sincerely, General Manager DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa 239-765-7654

title: nice beach / pool / but................
review: We only stayed one night on our way to Key West.  Staff was very friendly and knowledgeable.  Room was clean, great view and plenty of space.  Dinner was great at Chloe's.  Service was exceptional. Jeremy's attention to detail was second to none.  He was friendly and prompt.  It is evident that he loves his job.  We will definately return!

title: Will return to DiamondHead
review: We stayed at Diamondhead beach resort early August, 2011, Fort Myers off season. We had mixed reviews.   First the pro's - Very friendly staff, especially (((STEVE))) the bellman. He went out of his way to make our stay enjoyable. The pool & beach were nice. The place was clean / well kept, we loved the room & screened in balcony. Beautiful views of the gulf.   Now the con's - There was very little entertainment, the bar closed 10 pm Sunday, 11pm during the week. It rained one morning till early afternoon. When it cleared up, the pool & pool bar never re-opened. The resort has no beach chairs; you could rent them for $25 per day. There's no in room safe, you need to ask at the front desk for a security box, if there's any left. The touch screen computer in the room never worked.…

title: Cabana's Beach Bar & Grill
review: Dear RRanella,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa. We are thankful that you enjoyed most aspects of your stay at our resort, however apologize that Ft. Myers Beach as a whole did not meet your vacation expectations.    There are some other really great places in Southwest Florida and hope you will consider visiting this area again in the future.  Sincerely, The Management Team at DiamondHead Beach Resort & Spa

title: Totally Awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review: DiamondHead Beach Resort Hotel located at fabulous Ft. Myers Beach, Florida is the best Hotel/Resort that my husband & I have been to in years...Just the 7 miles of fine white powder beaches alone...never mind the Hotel itself and it's first class style restaurant as well as it's first class staff...always a smile...and always there if you need anything!!  The pool...the whirlpool....the beach chairs and umbrellas...you can dress down or up...either way you can relax and be yourself....it's totally a first rate...fine...and a cozy feeling kind of Hotel.. We love the 10th floor and above Ocean Front suites...we're an older couple and love the privacy,  peace and serenity....our son and fiance' have now visited as well as my newly married niece....and they won't go anywhere…

title: Great Stay
review: We have been travelling to Florida for many years now, previously we have travelled around the state staying a few days here and a few days there, normally staying in standard hotel rooms, but this trip we planned to stay in the same hotel for the 2 weeks of our stay so spent a little more time researching which hotel to stay at.  We opted for the Diamondhead as the suite was much more appealing for a two week stay than a standard hotel room.  I can honestly say that we experienced nothing negative in our stay at the Diamondhead, from or late night arrival to our departure we loved every minute of our stay here.  We upgraded (very cheaply) to a beach view room on arrival, the rooms were large, well equipped and spotlessly clean, the huge bed comfortable.  Everything worked as it…

title: sun sand what could be better
review: I have stayed at diamondhead multiple times and it is always first rate.  The hotel staff are always willing to help, rooms are clean great beds.  The thing you can' put in words is the view get a pool view or beach view and you will not be disappointed.  The concierge was very helpful every time we have been.  The only thing I thought was a little off was it does have a small pool for the size of the hotel but right beside it is an ocean.  You are not over 75 feet from the water when you exit the back of the hotel.

title: Great beach resort in Ft. Myers Beach
review: I first went to Ft. Myers Beach with my family & then girlfriend(now my wife) almost 20 years ago and was totally underwhelmed.  Cut to Labor Day weekend 2011 and my parents, 2 brothers and their families, my wife & 2 kids & I took over 4 one bedroom suites at the DiamondHead Resort.  The rooms were very clean, large by typical hotel room standards, had a beautiful view from the balcony & had great amenities.  After my first trip to Ft. Myers Beach I wouldn't go back for anything, but after this trip I would gladly go back to  Ft. Myers Beach which is a lovely area.  Most of the area is filled with beach- & waterfront  homes and hotels with just a few commercial areas where the tourist business is in full swing.  There is a beachfront broadwalk shopping & dining area that is…

title: OK HOTEL
review: Diamondhead is just OK.. I am not sure why everyone is raving about this resort,  We were not happy.  Maybe because we stayed 3 nights at the Laplaya Resort in Naples fl, this resort was 5 star and the beach in Naples is so beautiful, The beach at Diamonhead Ft myers is bad... Jellyfish, stingrays,   the pool is just ok ... I looked over a car garage. ,, You have to get your beach towels from the cleaning staff when they clean your room.. But our room was cleaned after 4pm so I had no towels.  Why don't they just have towels around the pool? The rooms are just OK   the balcony is screened-in. Do not stay on the 2nd or 3rd floors, bed is hard...  This is a  3 star hotel.  Will not be back..   The only this that is good in Ft  myers is going to Sanibel, eating at the Lighthouse…

title: Best place on the beach!
review: Great service. Beautiful beach with spectacular views from the balcony of our room. Can't wait to visit here again. Very romantic with lots of fun things to do in the area.

title: LOVED IT! OUR SECOND VISIT THERE
review: This was our second visit to Diamondhead. Love the room, the spacious patio, shower is awesome (something to appreciate after a long day at the beach), pool area is fun and great pina coladas! Our only complaint and I have to say it because it was a sore spot on both occasions and that is the front desk staff. Both times they had bad attitudes. Our visits were 2 years apart. It's a shame because everyone else we encountered was wonderful including housekeeping, waitresses, pool staff.

title: Great people and great times!
review: I went to Fort Myers Beach in July of 2011 for my birthday, it was an awesome trip not just because of the location but because of the hotel and the people that worked there! The hotel was clean and pretty. The people that worked there were nothing but friendly and helpful! Especially Jeremy Beard, an employee at the hotel, he was very considerate and helpful. He even took extra time out to give us suggestions of what to see and where to go on out trip! The whole trip was probably one of the best vacations I've ever been on!

title: Our Wedding!!
review: We got married at Diamondhead in June of 2009 and spend every anniversary there.  They always remember us and do special things for us as well as greet us as if we are their best friends.  Diamondhead is like our second home and we just love it there!

title: Love this place! Jermey the server is great!
review: Very friendly and Jermey is so helpful and best server so far we have had. Can't wait to go back.

title: 5th time here and still a great property and value!
review: I stayed here with a group of 20 other families for a national hockey tournament.  This was my 5th time to the Diamondhead.  I upgraded to a premium suite so that I would have a cook top and I managed very nicely for a two week stay.
